AS1.Title: Dua No. 1
AS1.Data:
When he (a.s.) began to supplicate, he would begin with praise and laudation of Allah (Mighty and Majestic is He). He would say:
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ 
ALHAMDO LILLAAHIL
Praise belongs to Allah,
الْاَوَّلِ بِلَا اَوَّلٍ كَانَ قَبْلَهٗ 
AWWALE BELAA AWWALIN KAANA QABLAHU
the First, without a first before Him,
وَالْاٰخِرِ بِلَا اٰخِرٍ يَكُوْنُ بَعْدَهٗ 
WAL-AAKHERE BELAA AAKHERIN YAKOONO BA’DAHUL
the Last, without a last behind Him.
الَّذِىْ قَصُرَتْ عَنْ رُؤْيَتِهٖ اَبْصَارُ النَّاظِرِيْنَ 
LAZE QASORAT A’N ROAYATEHI ABSAARUN NAAZEREEN
Beholders’ eyes fall short of seeing Him,
وَ عَجَزَتْ عَنْ نَعْتِهٖ اَوْهَامُ الْوَاصِفِيْنَ 
WA A’JAZAT A’N NA’TEHI AWHAAMUL WAASEFEEN
describers’ imaginations are not able to depict Him.
ابْتَدَعَ بِقُدْرَتِهِ الْخَلْقَ ابْتِدَاعًا 
IBTADA-A’ BEQUDRATEHIL KHALQAB TEDAA-A’N
He originated the creatures through His power with an origination,
وَ اخْتَرَعَهُمْ عَلٰى مَشِيَّتِهِ اخْتِرَاعًا 
WAKH TARA-A’HUM A’LAA MASHIYYATEHIKH TA-RA-A’N
He devised them in accordance with His will with a devising.
ثُمَّ سَلَكَ بِهِمْ طَرِيْقَ اِرَادَتِهٖ 
SUMMA SALAKA BEHIM TAREEQA ERAADATEHI
Then He made them walk on the path of His desire,
وَ بَعَثَهُمْ فِىْ سَبِيْلِ مُحَبَّتِهٖ 
WA BA-A’SAHUM FEE SABEELE MOHABBATEHI
He sent them out on the way of His love.
لَا يَمْلِكُوْنَ تَاخِيْرًا عَمَّا قَدَّمَهُمْ اِلَيْهِ 
LAA YAMLEKOONA TAAKHEERAN A’MMAA QADDAMAHUM ELAYHE
They cannot keep back from that to which He has sent them forward,
وَ لَا يَسْتَطِيْعُوْنَ تَقَدُّمًا اِلٰى مَا اَخَّرَهُمْ عَنْهُ 
WA LAA YASTA-TEE-O’ONO TAQADDOMAN ELAA MAA AKKHARAHUM A’NHO
nor can they go forward to that from which He has kept them back.
وَ جَعَلَ لِكُلِّ رُوْحٍ مِنْهُمْ قُوْتًا  مَعْلُوْمًا مَقْسُوْمًا مِنْ رِزْقِهٖ
WA JA-A’LA LEKULLE ROOHIM MINHUM QOOTAN MA’LOOMAN MAQSOOMAN MIN RIZQEHI
He assigned from His provision to each of their spirits a nourishment known and apportioned.
لَا يَنْقُصُ مَنْ زَادَهٗ نَاقِصٌ 
LAA YANQOSO MAN ZAADAHU NAAQESUN
No decreaser decreases those whom He increases,
وَ لَا يَزِيْدُ مَنْ نَقَصَ مِنْهُمْ زَآئِدٌ 
WA LAA YAZEEDO MAN NAQASA MINHUM ZAA-EDUN
no increaser increases those of them whom He decreases.
ثُمَّ ضَرَبَ لَهٗ فِى الْحَيٰوةِ اَجَلًا مَوْقُوْتًا 
SUMMA ZARABA LAHU FIL-HAYAATE AJALAN MAWQOOTAN
Then for each spirit He strikes a fixed term in life,
وَ نَصَبَ لَهٗ اَمَدًا مَحْدُوْدًا 
WA NASABA LAHU AMADAN MAHDOODAN
for each He sets up a determined end;
يَتَخَطَّاُ اِلَيْهِ بِاَيَّامِ عُمُرِهٖ 
YATAKHATTAO ELAYHE BE-AYYAAME O’MOREHI
he walks toward it through the days of his span,
وَ يَرْهَقُهٗ بِاَعْوَامِ دَهْرِهٖ 
WA YARHAQOHU BE-A-A’WAAME DAHREHI
he overtakes it through the years of his time.
حَتّٰى اِذَا بَلَغَ اَقْصٰى اَثَرِهٖ 
HATTAA EZAA BALAGHA AQSAA ASAREHI
Then, when he takes his final step
وَاسْتَوْعَبَ حِسَابَ عُمُرِهٖ 
WAS-TAW-A’BA HESAABA O’MOREHI
and embraces the reckoning of his span,
قَبَضَهٗ اِلٰى مَا نَدَبَهٗ اِلَيْهِ مِنْ مَوْفُوْرِ ثَوَابِهٖ اَوْ مَحْذُوْرِ عِقَابِهٖ 
QABAZAHU ELAA MAA NADABAHU ELAYHE MIN MAWFOORE SAWAABEHI AW MAHZOORE E’QAABEHI
Allah seizes him to the abundant reward or the feared punishment to which He has called him,
لِيَجْزِىَ الَّذِيْنَ اَسَآؤُا بِمَا عَمِلُوْا وَ يَجْزِىَ الَّذِيْنَ اَحْسَنُوْا بِالْحُسْنٰى 
LEYAJZEYAL LAZEENA ASAAA-OO BEMAA A’MELOO WA YAJZEYAL LAZEENA AHSANOO BIL-HUSNAA
That He may repay those who do evil for what they have done and repay those who do good with goodness, 
عَدْلًا مِنْهُ 
A’DLAN MINHO
as justice from Him
تَقَدَّسَتْ اَسْمَآؤُهٗ 
TAQADDASAT ASMAAA-OHU
(holy are His names,
وَ تَظَاهَرَتْ اٰلَآؤُهٗ 
WA TAZAAHARAT AALAAA-OHU
and manifest His boons).
لَا يُسْئَلُ عَمَّا يَفْعَلُ وَ هُمْ يُسْئَلُوْنَ 
LAA YUS-ALO A’MMAA YAF-A’LO WA HUM YUS-ALOON
He shall not be questioned as to what He does, but they shall be questioned. 
وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ 
WAL-HAMDO LILLAAHIL LAZEE
Praise belongs to Allah, for,
لَوْ حَبَسَ عَنْ عِبَادِهٖ مَعْرِفَةَ حَمْدِهٖ عَلٰى مَا اَبْلَاهُمْ مِنْ مِنَنِهٖ الْمُتَتَابِعَةِ وَ اَسْبَغَ عَلَيْهِمْ مِنْ نِعَمِهِ الْمُتَظَاهِرَةِ 
LAW HABASA A’N E’BAADEHI MA’REFATA HAMDEHI A’LAA MAA ABLAAHUM MIN MENANEHIL MOTATAABEA’TE WA ASBAGHA A’LAYHIM MIN NE-A’MEHIL MOTAZAAHERATE
had He withheld from His servants the knowledge to praise Him for the uninterrupted kindnesseswith which He has tried them  and the manifest favours which He has lavished upon them,
لَتَصَرَّفُوْا فِىْ مِنَنِهٖ فَلَمْ يَحْمَدُوْهُ 
LE-TASARRAFOO FEE MENANEHI FALAM YAHMADOOHO
they would have moved about in His kindnesses without praising Him,
وَ تَوَسَّعُوْا فِىْ رِزْقِهٖ فَلَمْ يَشْكُرُوْهُ 
WA TAWASSA-O’O FEE RIZQEHI FALAM YASHKOROOHO
and spread themselves out in His provision without thanking Him.
وَ لَوْ كَانُوْا كَذٰلِكَ لَخَرَجُوْا مِنْ حُدُوْدِ الْاِنْسَانِيَّتِ اِلٰى حَدِّ الْبَهِيْمِيَّةِ فَكَانُوْا كَمَا وَصَفَ فِىْ مُحْكَمِ كِتَابِهٖ 
WA LAW KAANOO KAZAALEKA LA-KHARAJOO MIN HODOODIL INSAANIYYATE ELAA HADDIL BAHEEMIYYATE FA KAANOO KAMAA WA SAFA FEE MOHKAME KETAABEHI
Had such been the case, they would have left the bounds of humanity for that of beastliness and become as He has described in the firm text of His Book:
اِنْ هُمْ اِلاَّ كَالْاَنْعَامِ بَلْ هُمْ اَضَلُّ سَبِيْلًا 
IN HUM ILLAA KAL-AN-A’AME BAL HUM AZALLO SABEELAN
They are but as the cattle—nay, but they are further astray from the way!. 
وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ عَلٰى مَا 
WAL-HAMDO LILLAAHE A’LAA MAA 
Praise belongs to Allah, for
عَرَّفَنَا مِنْ نَفْسِهٖ 
A’RRAFANAA MIN NAFSEHI
the true knowledge of Himself He has given to us,
وَ اَلْهَمَنَا مِنْ شُكْرِهٖ 
WA-ALHAMANAA MIN SHUKREHI
the thanksgiving He has inspired us to offer Him,
وَ فَتَحَ لَنَا مِنْ اَبْوَابِ الْعِلْمِ بِرُبُوْبِيَّتِهٖ 
WA FATAHA LANAA MIN ABWAABIL I’LME BE-ROBOOBIYYATEHI
the doors to knowing His Lordship He has opened for us,
وَ دَلَّنَا عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْاِخْلَاصِ لَهٗ فِىْ تَوْحِيْدِهٖ 
WA DALLANAA A’LAYHE MENAL IKHLAASE LAHU FEE TAWHEEDEHI
the sincerity towards Him in professing His Unity to which He has led us,
وَ جَنَّبَنَا مِنَ الْاِلْحَادِ وَالْشَكِّ فِىْ اَمْرِهٖ 
WA JANNABANAA MENAL ILHAADE WASH-SHAKKE FEE AMREHI
and the deviation and doubt in His Command from which He has turned us aside;
حَمْدًا 
HAMDAN
a praise through which we
نُعَمَّرُ بِهٖ فِيْمَنْ حَمِدَهٗ مِنْ خَلْقِهٖ 
NO-A’MMERO BEHI FEEMAN HAMEDAHU MIN KHALQEHI
may be given long life among those of His creatures who praise Him,
وَ نَسْبِقُ بِهٖ مَنْ سَبَقَ اِلٰى رِضَاهُ وَ عَفْوِهٖ 
WA NASBEQO BEHI MAN SABAQA ELAA REZAAHO WA ‘AFWEHI
and overtake those who have gone ahead toward His good pleasure and pardon;
حَمْدًا 
HAMDAN
a praise through which
يُضِىْٓءُ لَنَا بِهٖ ظُلُمَاتِ الْبَرْزَخِ 
YOZEEE-O LANAA BEHI ZOLOMAATIL BARZAKHE
He will illuminate for us the shadows of the interworld, 
وَ يُسَهِّلُ عَلَيْنَا بِهٖ سَبِيْلَ الْمَبْعَثِ 
WA YOSAHHELO A’LAYNAA BEHI SABEELAL MAB-A’SE
ease for us the path of the Resurrection,
وَ يُشَرِّفُ بِهٖ مَنَازِلَنَا عِنْدَ مَوَاقِفِ الْاَشْهَادِ يَوْمَ تُجْزٰى كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ وَ هُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُوْنَ 
WA YOSHARREFO BEHI MANAAZELANAA I’NDA MAWAAQEFIL ASH-HAADE YAWMA TUJZAA KULLO NAFSIN BEMAA KASABAT WA HUM LAA YUZLAMOON
and raise up our stations at the standing places of the Witnesses  on the day when every soul will be repaid for what it has earned -they shall not be wronged; 
يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِىْ مَوْلًى عَنْ مَوْلًى شَيْئًا وَّ لَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُوْنَ 
YAWMA LAA YUGHNEE MAWLAN A’N MAWLAN SHAY-AWN WA LAA HUM YUNSAROON
the day a master shall avail nothing a client, and they shall not be helped; 
حَمْدًا يَرْتَفِعُ مِنَّا اِلٰى اَعْلٰى عِلِّيِّيْنَ فِىْ كِتَابٍ مَرْقُوْمٍ يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُوْنَ 
HAMDAN YARTAFE-O’ MINNAA ELAA A-A’LAA I’LLIYYEENA FEE KETAABIN MARQOOMIN YASH-HADOHUL MOQARRABOON
a praise which will rise up from us to the highest of the ‘Illiyun  in a book inscribed, witnessed by those brought nigh, 
حَمْدًا تَقَرُّ بِهٖ عُيُوْنُنَا اِذَا بَرِقَتِ الْاَبْصَارُ وَ تَبْيَضُّ بِهٖ وُجُوْهُنَا اِذَا اسْوَدَّتِ الْاَبْشَارُ 
HAMDAN TAQARRO BEHI O’YOONONAA EZAA BAREQATIL ABSAARO WA TABYAZZO BEHIWOJOOHONAA EZAS WADDATIL ABSHAARO
a praise whereby our eyes may be at rest when sight is dazzled,  our faces whitened when skins are blackened, 
حَمْدًا نُعْتَقُ بِهٖ مِنْ اَلِيْمِ نَارِ اللهِ اِلٰى كَرِيْمِ جِوَارِ اللهِ 
HAMDAN NO’TAQO BEHI MIN ALEEME NAARIL LAAHE ELAA KAREEME JEWAARIL LAAHE
a praise through which we may be released from Allah’s painful Fire and enter Allah’s generous neighbourhood,
حَمْدًا 
HAMDAN
a praise by which
نُزَاحِمُ بِهٖ مَلَائِكَتَهُ الْمُقَرَّبِيْنَ 
NOZAAHEMO BEHI MALAAA-EKATAHUL MOQARRABEENA
we may jostle the angels brought nigh
وَ نُضَامُّ بِهٖ اَنْبِيَآئَهُ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ 
WA NOZAAMMO BEHI AMBEYAAA-ABUL MURSALEENA
and join the prophets, the envoys,
فِىْ دَارِ الْمُقَامَةِ الَّتِىْ لَا تَزُوْلُ 
FE DAARIL MOQAAMATIL LATEE LAA TAZOOLO
in a House of Permanence that does not remove,
وَ مَحَلِّ كَرَامَتِهِ الَّتِىْ لَا تَحُوْلُ 
WA MAHALLE KARAAMATEHIL LATEE LAA TAHOOLO
the Place of His Generosity that does not change.
وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِى 
WAL HAMDO LILLAAHIL LAZIKH
Praise belongs to Allah, who
اخْتَارَ لَنَا مَحَاسِنَ الْخَلْقِ 
TAARA LANAA MAHAASENAL KHALQE
chose for us the good qualities of creation,
وَ اَجْرٰى عَلَيْنَا طَيِّبَاتِ الرِّزْقِ 
WA AJRAA A’LAYNAA TAYYEBAATIR RIZQE
granted us the agreeable things of provision,
وَ جَعَلَ لَنَا الْفَضِيْلَةَ بِالْمَلَكَةِ عَلٰى جَمِيْعِ الْخَلْقِ 
WA JA-A’LA LANAL FAZEELATA BIL-MALAKATE A’LAA JAMEE-A’L KHALQE
and appointed for us excellence through domination over all creation;
فَكُلُّ خَلِيْقَتِهٖ مُنْقَادَةٌ لَنَا بِقُدْرَتِهٖ وَ صَائِرَةٌ اِلٰى طَاعَتِنَا بِعِزَّتِهٖ 
FA KULLO KHALEEQATEHI MUNQAADATUN LANAA BE-QUDRATEHI WA SAA-ERATUN ELAA TAA-A’TENAA BE-I’ZZATEHI
every one of His creatures submits to us through His power and comes to obey us through His might. 
وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ اَغْلَقَ عَنَّا بَابَ الْحَاجَةِ اِلاَّ اِلَيْهِ 
WAL HAMDO LILLAAHIL LAZEE AGH-LAQA A’NNAA BAABAL HAAJATE ILLAA ELAYHE
Praise belongs to Allah, who locked for us the gate of need except toward Him.
فَكَيْفَ نُطِيْقُ حَمْدَهٗ 
FAKAYFA NOTEEQO HAMDAHU
So how can we praise Him?
اَمْ مَتٰى نُوَدِّىْ شُكْرَهٗ لَا مَتٰى 
AM MATAA NOWADDEE SHUKRAHU LAA MATAA
When can we thank Him? Indeed, when?
وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ 
WAL HAMDO LILLAAHIL LAZEE
Praise belongs to Allah,
رَكَّبَ فِيْنَا اٰلَاتِ الْبَسْطِ 
RAKKABA FEENAA AALAATIL BASTE
who placed within us the organs of expansion,
وَ جَعَلَ لَنَا اَدَوَاتِ الْقَبْضِ 
WA JA-A’LA LANAA ADWAATIL QABZE
assigned for us the agents of contraction,
وَ مَتَّعَنَا بِاَرْوَاحِ الْحَيٰوةِ 
WA MATTAA-A’NAA BE-ARWAAHIL HAYAATE
gave us to enjoy the spirits of life,
وَ اَثْبَتَ فِيْنَا جَوَارِحَ الْاَعْمَالِ 
WA ASBATA FEENAA JAWAAREHAL A-A’MAALE
fixed within us the limbs of works,
وَ غَذَّانَا بِطَيِّبَاتِ الرِّزْقِ 
WA GHAZZANAA BETAYYEBAATIR RIZQE
nourished us with the agreeable things of provision,
وَ اَغْنَا نَا بِفَضْلِهٖ 
WA AGHNENAA BE-FAZLEHI
freed us from need through His bounty,
وَ اَقْنَانَا بِمَنِّهٖ 
WA AQNENAA BEMANNEHI
and gave us possessions through His kindness.
ثُمَّ اَمَرَنَا لِيَخْتَبِرَ طَاعَتَنَا 
SUMMA AMARANAA BE-YAKHTABERA TAA-A’TANAA
Then He commanded us that He might test our obedience
وَ نَهَانَا لِيَبْتَلِىَ شُكْرَنَا 
WA NAHAANAA LEYABTALEYA SHUKRANAA
and prohibited us that He might try our thanksgiving.
فَخَالَفْنَا عَنْ طَرِيْقِ اَمْرِهٖ 
FA-KHAALAFNAA A’N TAREEQE AMREHI
So we turned against the path of His commandments
وَ رَكِبْنَا مُتُوْنَ زَجْرِهٖ 
WA RAKEIBNAA MOTOONA ZAJREHI
and mounted the backs of His warnings.
فَلَمْ يَبْتَدِرْنَا بِعُقُوْبَتِهٖ 
FALAM YABTADIRNAA BE-O’QOOBATEHI
Yet He hurried us not to His punishment,
وَ لَمْ يُعَاجِلْنَا بِنِقْمَتِهٖ 
WA LAM YO-A’AJILNAA BE-NIQMATEHI
nor hastened us on to His vengeance.
بَلْ تَاَنَّانَا بِرَحْمَتِهٖ تَكَرُّمًا 
BAL TA-ANNAANAA BE-RAHMATEHI TAKARROMAN
No, He went slowly with us through His mercy, in generosity,
وَانْتَظَرَ مُرَاجَعَتَنَا بِرَافَتِهٖ حِلْمًا 
WAN TAZARA MORAAJA-A’TANAA BE-RAAFATEHI HILMAN
and awaited our return through His clemency, in mildness.
وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ دَلَّنَا عَلَى التَّوْبَةِ الَّتِىْ لَمْ نُفِدْهَا اِلاَّ مِنْ فَضْلِهٖ 
WAL-HAMDO LILLAAHIZEE DALLANAA A’LAAT TAWBATIL LATEE LAM NOFIDHAA ILLAA MIN FAZLEHI
Praise belongs to Allah, who showed us the way to repentance, which we would not have won save through His bounty.
فَلَوْ لَمْ نَعْتَدِدْ مِنْ فَضْلِهٖ اِلاَّ بِهَا 
FALAW LAM NA’TADID MIN FAZLEHI ILLAA BEHAA
Had we nothing to count as His bounty but this,
لَقَدْ حَسُنَ بَلَاؤُهٗ عِنْدَنَا 
LAQAD HASONA BALAAA-OHU I’NDANAA
His trial of us would have been good,
وَ جَلَّ اِحْسَانُهٗ اِلَيْنَا 
WA JALLA EHAANOHU ELAYNAA
His beneficence toward us great,
وَ جَسُمَ فَضْلُهٗ عَلَيْنَا 
WA JASOMA FAZLOHU A’LAYNAA
His bounty upon us immense.
فَمَا هٰكَذَا كَانَتْ سُنَّتُهٗ فِى التَّوْبَةٍ لِمَنْ كَانَ قَبْلَنَا 
FAMAA HAAKAZAA KAANAT SUNNATOHU FIT TAWBATE LEMAN KAANA QABLANAA
For such was not His wont in repentance with those who went before us. 
لَقَدْ وَضَعَ عَنَّا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهٖ 
LAQAD WA-ZA-A’ A’NNAA MAA LAA TAAQATA LANAA BEHI
He has lifted up from us what we have not the strength to bear, 
وَ لَمْ يُكَلِّفْنَا اِلاَّ وُسْعًا 
WA LAM YOKALLIFNAA ILLAA WUS-A’N
charged us only to our capacity, 
وَ لَمْ يُجَشِّمْنَا اِلاَّ يُسْرًا 
WA LAM YOHASH-SHIMNAA ILLAA YUSRAN
imposed upon us nothing but ease,
وَ لَمْ يَدَعَ لَاَحَدٍ مِنَّا حُجَّةً وَّ لَا عُذْرًا 
WA LAM YADA-A’ LA-AHADIN MINNAA HUJJATAWN WA LAA U’ZRAN
and left none of us with an argument or excuse.
فَالْهَالِكُ مِنَّا مَنْ هَلَكَ عَلَيْهِ 
FAL-HAALEKO MINNAA MAN HALAKA A’LAYHE
So the perisher among us is he who perishes in spite of Him
وَ السَّعِيْدُ مِنَّا مَنْ رَغِبَ اِلَيْهِ 
WAS-SA-E’EDO MINNAA MAN RAGHEBA ELAYHE
and the felicitous among us he who beseeches Him. 
وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ بِكُلِّ مَا حَمِدَهٗ بِهٖ 
WAL-HAMDO LILLAAHE BE-KULLE MAA HAMEDAHU BEHI
And praise belongs to Allah with all the praises of
اَدْنٰى مَلَآئِكَتِهٖ اِلَيْهِ 
ADNAA MALAAA-EKATEHI ELAYHE 
His angels closest to Him,
وَ اَكْرَمُ خَلِيْقَتِهٖ عَلَيْهِ 
WA AKRAMO KHALEEQATEHI A’LAYHE
His creatures most noble in His eyes,
وَ اَرْضٰى حَامِدِيْهِ لَدَيْهِ 
WA ARZAA HAAMEDEEHE LADAYHE
and His praisers most pleasing to Him;
حَمْدًا يَفْضُلُ سَآئِرَ الْحَمْدِ كَفَضْلِ رَبِّنَا عَلٰى جَمِيْعِ خَلْقِهٖ 
HAMDAN YAFZOLO SAA-ERAL HAMDE KA-FAZLE RABBENAA A’LAA JAMEE-E’ KHALQEHI
a praise that may surpass other praises as our Lord surpasses all His creatures.
ثُمَّ لَهُ الْحَمْدُ 
SUMMA LAHUL HAMDO
Then to Him belongs praise,
مَكَانَ كُلِّ نِعْمَةٍ لَهٗ عَلَيْنَا وَ عَلٰى جَمِيْعِ عِبَادِهِ الْمَاضِيْنَ وَ الْبَاقِيْنَ عَدَدَ مَا اَحَاطَ بِهٖ عِلْمُهٗ مِنْ جَمِيْعِ الْاَشْيَآءِ 
MAKAANA KULLE NEA’MATIN LAHU A’LAYNAA WA A’LAA JAMEE-E’ E’BAADEHIL MAAZEENA WAL-BAAQEENA A’DADA MAA AHAATA BEHI I’LMOHU MIN JAMEE-I’L ASH-YAAA-E
in place of His every favour upon us and upon all His servants, past and still remaining, to the number of all things His knowledge encompasses,
وَ مَكَانَ كُلِّ وَاحِدَةٍ مِنْهَا عَدَدُهَا اَضْعَافًا مُضَاعَفَةً اَبَدًا سَرْمَدًا اِلٰى يَوْمِ الْقِيٰمَةِ 
WA MAKAANA KULLE WAAHEDATIN MINHAA A’DADOHAA AZA-A’FAN MOZAA-A’FATAN ABADAN SARMATAN ELAA YAWMIL QEYAAMATE
and in place of each of His favours, their number doubling and redoubling always and forever, to the Day of Resurrection;
حَمْدًا 
HAMDAN
a praise
لَا مُنْتَهٰى لِحَدِّهٖ 
LAA MUNTAHAA LE-HADDEHI
whose bound has no utmost end,
وَ لَا حِسَابَ لِعَدَدِهٖ 
WA LAA HESAABA LE-A’DADEHI
whose number has no reckoning,
وَ لَا مَبْلَغَ لِغَايَتِهٖ 
WA LAA MABLAGHA LE-GHAAYATEHI
whose limit cannot be reached,
وَ لَا انْقِطَاعَ لِاَمَدِهٖ 
WA LAN QE-TAA-E’ LE-AMADEHI
whose period cannot be cut off;
حَمْدًا يَكُوْنُ 
HAMDAN YAKOONO 
a praise which will become
وُصْلَةً اِلٰى طَاعَتِهٖ وَ عَفْوِهٖ 
WUSLATAN ELAA TAA-A’TEHI WA A’FWEHI
a link to His obedience and pardon,
وَ سَبَبًا اِلٰى رِضْوَاٰنِهٖ 
WA SABABAN ELAA RIZWAANEHI
a tie to His good pleasure,
وَ ذَرِيْعَةً اِلٰى مَغْفِرَتِهٖ 
WA ZAREE-A’TAN ELAA MAGHFERATEHI
a means to His forgiveness,
وَ طَرِيْقًا اِلٰى جَنَّتِهٖ 
WA TAREEQAN ELAA JANNATEHI
a path to His Garden,
وَ خَفِيْرًا مِنْ نَقِمَتِهٖ 
WA KHAFEERAN MIN NEQAMATEHI
a protector against His vengeance,
وَ اَمْنًا مِنْ غَضَبِهٖ 
WA AMNAN MIN GHAZABEHI
a security against His wrath,
وَ ظَهِيْرًا عَلٰى طَاعَتِهٖ 
WA ZAHEERAN A’LAA TAA-A’TEHI
an aid to obeying Him,
وَ حَاجِزًا عَنْ مَعْصِيَتِهٖ 
WA HAAJEZAN AN MA’SEYATEHI
a barrier against disobeying Him,
وَ عَوْنًا عَلٰى تَادِيَةِ حَقِّهٖ وَ وَظَآئِغِهٖ 
WA A’WNAN A’LAA TAADEYATE HAQQEHI WA ZAAA-E-GHEHI
a help in fulfilling His right and His duties; 
حَمْدًا نَسْعَدُ بِهٖ فِى السُّعَدَآءِ مِنْ اَوْلِيَآئِهٖ وَ نَصِيْرُ بِهٖ فِىْ نَظْمِ الشُهَدَآءِ بِسُيُوْفِ اَعْدَآئِهٖ 
HAMDAN NAS-A’DO BEHI FIS-SO-A’DAAA-E MIN AWLEYAAA-EHI WA NASEERO BEHI FEE NAZMISH SHOHA-DAAA-E BE-SOYOOFE A-A’DAAA-EHI
a praise that will make us felicitous among His felicitous friends, and bring us into the ranks of those martyred by the swords of His enemies.
اِنَّهٗ وَ لِىٌّ حَمِيْدٌ.
INNAHU WALIYYUN HAMEED.
He is a Friend, Praiseworthy!

B4.Title: Verbal harassment to a female pilgrim talking with Na Mahram

B5.Title: Asking Permission for Entering The Holy Shrines (Izn Dukhool)

C16.Title: Aamal of the day of Navroz

D1.Title: General Taqibaat
D1.Data:
Ta’qeebaat
Ta’qaeeb means to pursue and follow. After completing the obligatory prayer (wajib salaat) – instead of being immediately wrapped up in worldly affairs, games or pastime, to stay in the presence of the Almighty Lord under the umbrella of His grace to call, invoke or request Him through supplication is ta’qeeb.
According to a most reliable tradition every ta’qeeb is dua’:
The Almighty Lord says in the Holy Quran:
And when My servants ask you about Me, then (say to them that) verily I am very near - I answer the prayer of the supplicant when he beseeches Me. (Al Baqarah (2), Verse 186.)
According to the Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) the essence of Salaat is dua’.
There are several rewards Allah promises to bestow on those who recite ta’qeebaat. For example those who recite tasbeeh of Hazrat Fatemah Zahra (s.a.) after every salaat receives recompense of a thousand rak’at and other countless blessings.
In fact it is the decoration (zeenat) of Salaat.
Verses 190 and 191 of Aal-e-Imran say that:
“Men of understanding remember (pray to) Allah standing, sitting and reclining.”
Verse 62 of Naml says:
“Allah answers the distressed when he calls (prays) to Him, and removes the distress.”
Verse 186 of Surah Baqarah says:
“I (Allah) answer the prayer of the supplicant when he cries unto Me.”
 So recite taqeebat after wajib prayers to seek pleasure of Allah and to beseech Him for His favours and bounties.

D2.Title: Dua to be recited after Namaz-e-Subh
D2.Data:
It is narrated that those who recite this dua after Namaz-e-Subh, their prayers will be answered and their difficulties will be eased.
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
بِسْمِ اللهِ وَ صَلَّی اللهُ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِهٖ
BISMIL LAAHE WA SALLAL LAAHO A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALEHEE 
(I begin) in the name of Allah. O Allah, send blessings on Mohammed and on the children of Mohammed. 
وَ اُفَوِّضُ اَمْرِیْ اِلَی اللهِ اِنَّ اللهَ بَصِيْرٌ بِالْعِبَادِ
WA OFAWWEZO AMREE ELAL LAAHE INNAL LAAHA BASEERUM BIL-E’BAADE 
I entrust my cause (affairs) to Allah. Verily, Allah looks after (His) servants. 
فَوَقَاهُ اللهُ سَيِّئَاتِ مَا مَكَرُوْا 
FAWAQAAHUL LAAHO SAYYE-AATE MAA MAKAROO 
Allah keeps His eyes open to the evil which is done. 
لآ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ اِنِّىْ کُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِيْنَ.
LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTA SUBH’AANAKA INNEE KUNTO MENAZ ZAALEMEENA 
There is no god save You, glory be to You; verily I have been of the unjust.” 
فَاسْتَجَبْنَا لَهٗ وَ نَجَّيْنَاهُ مِنَ الْغَمِّ، وَ كَذٰلِكَ نُنْجِی الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ، 
FASTAJABNAA LAHU WA NAJJAYNAAHO MENAL GHAMME WA KAZAALEKA NUNJIL MOAMENEENA 
“So We compiled with their request and saved them from worries, and like this We come to the rescue of believers.” 
حَسْبُنَا اللهُ وَ نِعْمَ الْوَكِيْلُ 
HASBONAL LAAHO WA NE’MAL WAKEELO 
Allah is sufficient for us; and the most excellent protector is He. 
فَانْقَلَبُوْا بِنِعْمَةٍ مِّنَ اللهِ وَ فَضْلٍ
FANQALABOO BE-NE’MATIM MENAL LAAHE WA FAZLIN 
They returned therefore, with grace and favour from Allah, 
لَّمْ يَمْسَسْهُمْ سُوْ ءٌ، مَا شَآءَ اللهُ لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّةَ اِلاَّ بِاللهِ، 
LAM YAMSAS-HUM SOO-UN MAA SHAA-AL LAAHO LAA HAWLA WA LAA QUWWATA ILLAA BILLAAHE 
and no harm touched them. (It is) as Allah wills. There is no stratagem and no power save with Allah. 
مَا شَآءَ اللهُ لَا مَا شَآءَ النَّاسُ
MAA SHAA-AL LAAHO LAA MAA-SHAA-AN NAASO 
(It is) as Allah wills; not as the people want (it). 
مَا شَآءَ اللهُ وَ اِنْ كَرِهَ النَّاسُ
MAA SHAA-AL LAAHO WA IN KAREHAN NAASO 
(It is) as Allah wills; be it that the people do not like (it). 
حَسْبِیَ الرَّبُّ مِنَ الْمَرْبُوْبِيْنَ
HASBEYAR RABBO MENAL MARBOOBEEN 
Sufficient for me is the Lord against the (other) lords (His servants). 
حَسْبِیَ الْخَالِقُ مِنَ الْمَخْلُوْقِيْنَ
HASBEYAL KHAALEQO MINAL MAKHLOQEENA 
Sufficient for me is the creator, against the creatures (that have been created by Him.) 
حَسْبِیَ الرَّازِقُ مِنَ الْمَرْزُوْقِيْنَ
HASBEYAR RAAZEQO MENAL MARZOOQEENA 
Sufficient for me is the nourisher, against those who receive livelihood (from Him). 
حَسْبِیَ اللهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ
HASBEYAL LAAHO RABBUL A’ALAMEENA 
Sufficient for me is Allah, the Lord of the worlds. 
حَسْبِیْ مَنْ هُوَ حَسْبِیْ
HASBEE MAN HOWA HASBEE 
Sufficient for me is He. Sufficient for me, 
حَسْبِیْ مَنْ لَّمْ يَزَلْ حَسْبِیْ
HASBEE MAN LAM YAZAL HASBEE 
sufficient for me is He who is “Lam Yazal” (does not ever pass away). 
حَسْبِیْ مَنْ كَانَ مُذْ کُنْتُ لَمْ يَزَلْ حَسْبِیْ
HASBEE MAN KAANA MUZ KUNTO LAM YAZAL HASBEE 
Sufficient for me, sufficient for me is He who is the creator, and I am the creation (and does not ever pass away). 
حَسْبِیَ اللهُ لآ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ هُوَ عَلَيْهِ 
HASBEYAL LAAHO LAA ELAAHA ILLAA HOWA A’LAYHE 
Sufficient for me, sufficient for me is Allah, there is no god save He. 
تَوَكَّلْتُ وَ هُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيْمِ.
TAWAKKALTO WA HOWA RABBUL A’RSHIL A’ZEEME.
I put my trust in Him, and He is the Lord of the great arsh.

D3.Title: Taqibaat-e-Namaz-e-Fajr
D3.Data:
1. It is highly desirable in every salaat after salaam, recite the following without talking to any one or doing anything and remaining in the same position.
اَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ الَّذِیْ 
ASTAGHFERUL LAAHAL LAZEE 
I seek pardon and protection from Allah Who is 
لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَىُّ الْقَيُّوْمُ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAA HOWAL HAYYUL QAYYOOMO 
“There is no god save He, the Eternal and Self-subsisting, 
ذُوْ الْجَلاَلِ وَ اْلاِکْرَامِ 
ZUL JALAALE WAL IKRAAME 
the Owner of glory and generosity” 
لِجَمِيْعِ ظُلْمِیْ وَ جُرْمِیْ وَ اِسْرَافِیْ عَلٰی نَفْسِیْ وَ اَتُوْبُ اِلَيْهِ.
LEJAMEE-E’ ZULMEE WA JURMEE WA ISRAAFEE A’LAA NAFSEE WA ATOOBO ELAYHE.
with reference to all my injustices, crimes and transgressions which I have committed; and I turn repentant unto Him.
1a.
رَبِّ صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اَهْلِ بَيْتِهٖ.
RABBE SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AHLE BAYTEHEE.
O Lord, send blessings on Mohammed and on his Ahlul Bayt.
2.       Recite tasbih of Hazrat Faatemah Zahra (s.a.). It is recited after every salaat.
اَللهُ اَکْبَرُ
ALLAAHO AKBAR
Allah is the greatest.
34 times
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ
ALHAMDO LIL LAAHE
Praise be to Allah.
33 times
سُبْحَانَ اللهِ
SUBHAANAL LAAHE
Glory be to Allah.
33 times
لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHO
There is no god save Allah.
Once
3.       Recite:
سُبْحَانَ اللهِ وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ 
SUBHAANAL LAAHE WAL HAMDO LIL LAAHE 
Glory be to Allah. Praise be to Allah. 
وَ لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ وَ اللهُ اَکْبَرُ 
WA LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHO WAL LAAHO AKBARO 
There is no god save Allah. Allah is the greatest. 
وَ لاَ حَوْلَ وَ لاَ قُوَّةَ اِلاَّ بِاللهِ الْعَلِیِّ الْعَظِيْمِ.
WA LAA HAWLA WA LAA QUWWATA ILLAA BILLAAHIL A’LIYYIL A’ZEEME.
There is no stratagem and no power save with Allah, the Supreme Almighty.
4.       Recite:
مَا شَآءَ اللهُ كَانَ وَ لاَ حَوْلَ وَ لاَ قُوَّةَ اِلاَّ بِاللهِ الْعَلِىِّ الْعَظِيْمِ.
MAA SHAA ALLAAHO KAANA WA LAA HAWLA WA LAA QUWWATA ILLAA BILLAAHIL A’LEE-IL A’ZEEME.
That which Allah wills takes place. There is no stratagem and no power save with Allah, the Supreme Almighty.
5.       Say 70 times keeping the right hand on the chest:
يَا فَتَّاحُ
YA FATTAAHO
O Opener.
6.       Recite:
لاَ حَوْلَ وَ لاَ قُوَّةَ اِلاَّ بِاللهِ 
LAA HAWLA WA LAA QUWWATA ILLAA BILLAAHE 
There is no power nor strength (with any) save with Allah. 
تَوَكَلْتُ عَلَی الْحَىِّ الْقَيُّوْمِ الَّذِیْ لاَ يَمُوْتُ 
TAWAKKALTO A’LAL HAYY-IL QAYYOOMIL LAZEE LAA YAMOOTO 
I depend upon the everliving self-subsisting (Lord) who does not die. 
وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِیْ لَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًا 
WAL HAMDO LILLAAHIL LAZEE LAM YATTAKHIZ WALADAN 
Praise be to Allah who has not taken (unto Himself) a son, 
وَّ لَمْ يَکُنْ لَّهٗ شَرِيْكٌ فِیْ الْمُلْكِ 
WA LAM YAKUL LAHU SHAREEKUN FIL MULKE 
neither He has any partner in the kingdom, 
وَ لَمْ يَکُنْ لَّهٗ وَلِیٌّ مِّنَ الذُّلِّ وَ كَبِّرْهُ تَکْبِيْرًا 
WA LAM YAKUL LAHU WALEE-UM MENAZ ZULLE WA KABBIRHO TAKBEERAN 
nor has He any helper out of humility; and proclaim His greatness by extolling (His glory). 
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبُؤْسِ وَ الْفَقْرِ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AO’OZO BEKA MENAL BO’SE WAL FAQRE 
O Allah, verily I take refuge with You from distress, grief, 
وَ مِنْ غَلَبَةِ الدَّيْنِ وَ السُّقْمِ 
WA MIN GHALABATID DAYNE WAS SUQME 
burden of debt and bad health. 
وَ اَسْئَلُكَ اَنْ تُعِيْنَنِیْ عَلٰی اَدَآءِ حَقِّكَ اِلَيْكَ وَ اِلَی النَّاسِ.
WA AS-ALOKA AN TO-E’ENANEE A’LAA ADAAE HAQQEKA ELAYKA WA ELAN NAASE.
I beseech You to please help me in discharging my duties to You and to mankind.
7.       Recite: (link to be given of ‘Dua to be recited after Namaz-e-Subh	‘
8.       Recite: (i)
اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
ALLAAHUMMA SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMEDIN WA AALE MOHAMMEDIN 
O Allah! Send blessings on Mohammed and the progeny of Mohammed
وَ اهْدِنِیْ لِمَا اخْتُلِفَ فِيْهِ مِنَ الْحَقِّ بِاِذْنِكَ 
WAH-DENEE LEMAKH TOLEFA FEEHE MENAL HAQQE BE-IZNEKA 
and show me the way out of the controversial quarrel unto the truth by Your permission. 
اِنَّكَ تَهْدِیْ مَنْ تَشَآءُ اِلٰی صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيْمٍ.
INNAKA TAHDEE MAN TASHAAA-O ELAA SERAATIM MUSTAQEEMIN.
Verily You guide whomsoever You want unto the right path.
(ii)
اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
ALLAAHUMMA SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMEDIN WA AALE MOHAMMEDENIL 
O Allah! Bless Mohammed and the children of Mohammed, 
اْلاَوْصِيَاءِ الرَّاضِيْنَ الْمَرْضِيِّيْنَ بِاَفْضَلِ صَلَوَاتِكَ 
AWSEYAAA-IR RAAZEENAL MARZIYYEENA BE-AFZALE SALAWAATEKA 
with Your superior-most blessings, 
وَ بَارِكْ عَلَيْهِمْ بِاَفْضَلِ بَرَكَاتِكَ 
WA BAARIK A’LAIHIM BE AFZALE BARAKAATEKA 
and endow them with Your excellent endowments, 
وَ السَّلاَمُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَ عَلٰی اَرْوَاحِهِمْ 
WAS SALAAMO A’LAYHIM WA A’LAA ARWAAHEHIM 
and rest them along with their bodies 
وَ اَجْسَادِهِمْ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَ بَرَكَاتُهُ.
WA AJSAADEHIM WA RAHMATUL LAAHE WA BARAKAATOHU.
and souls in peace and tranquility. Mercy and blessings of Allah be on them.
(iii)   
اَللّٰهُمَّ اَحْيِنِىْ عَلٰى مَا اَحْيَيْتَ عَلَيْهِ عَلِىَّ بْنَ اَبِىْ طَالِبٍ 
ALLAAHUMMA AHYENEE A’LAA MAA AHYAYTA A’LAYHE A’LIYYABNA ABEE TAALEBIN 
O Allah keep me alive in the same style and manner Ali ibn Abi Talib had lived 
وَ اَمِتْنِىْ عَلٰى مَا مَاتَ عَلَيْهِ عَلِىَّ بْنَ اَبِىْ طَالِبٍ عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمُ
WA AMITNEE A’LAA MAA MAATA A’LAYHE A’LIYYABNA ABEE TAALEBIN A’LAYHIS SALAAMO
and make me die exactly like Ali Ibn Abi Talib had departed, peace be on him.
(iv)    Say each of the following 100 or 10 times:
(a)
اَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ وَ اَتُوْبُ اِلَيْهِ
ASHTAGHFERUL LAAHA WA ATOOBO ELAYHE.
I ask forgiveness of Allah and I turn repentant unto Him.
(b)
اَسْئَلُ اللهَ الْعَافِيَةَ
AS-ALUL LAAHAL A’AFEYATA.
I beseech Allah for welfare.
(c)
اَسْتَجِيْرُ بِاللهِ مِنَ النَّارِ.
ASTAJEERO BILLAAHE MENAN NAARE.
I seek refuge with Allah from the fire.
(d)
اَسْئَلُهُ الْجَنَّةَ
AS-ALOHUL JANNATA.
I ask Him for the paradise.
(e)
اَسْئَلُ اللهَ الْحُوْرَ الْعِيْنَ
AS ALUL LAAHAL HOORAL E’ENA
I invoke Allah for a pious and beautiful spouse.
(f)
لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ الْمَلِكُ الْحَقُّ الْمُبِيْنُ
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHUL MALEKUL HAQQUL MUBEENO.
There is no god save Allah, the true and evident sovereign.
(i)      Every hardship that afflicts you in this world will be made easy with the help of Allah, and He shall make light your burden on the day of judgment.
(ii)     You will remain safe from the oppression of the tyrants.
(iii)    Your belief in Allah shall not weaken in whatever manner Satan tries to lure you to the life of sin.
(10)   Imam Hasan bin Ali al-Askari (a.s.) advised the faithful to pray the (following) dua’ after Farj salaat:
Recite 4 Quls then recite this dua’:
يَا مَالِكَ الرِّقَابِ وَ يَا هَازِمَ اْلاَحْزَابِ 
YAA MAALEKAR REQAABE WA YAA HAAZEMAL AHZAABE 
O the master of slaves, O the annihilator of armies, 
يَا مُفَتِّحَ اْلاَبْوَابِ يَا مُسَبِّبَ اْلاَسْبَابِ 
YAA MOFATTEHAL ABWAABE YA MOSABBEBAL ASBAABE 
O He who opens the doors (of opportunities), O the causer of causes, 
سَبِّبْ لَنَا... سَبَبًا لاَ نَسْتَطِيْعُ لَهٗ طَلَبًا 
SABBIB LANA… (mention desires) SABABAN LAA NASTATEE-O’ LAHU TALABAN 
originate a basis for us… (mention desires) which we may not make serve us on our own, 
بِحَقِّ لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ مُحَمَّدٌ رَسُوْلُ اللهِ
BEHAQQE LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHO MOHAMMADUR RASOOLUL LAAHE 
for the sake of - “There is no god save Allah, and Mohammed is His messenger.” – 
صَلَّی اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ اٰلِهٖ اَجْمَعِيْنَ.
SALLAL LAAHO ALAYHE WA AALEHEE AJMA-E’ENA.
blessings of Allah be on him and on all his children.
(11)   Recite:
اَصْبَحْتُ اَللّٰهُمَّ مُعْتَصِمًا بِذِمَامِكَ 
ASBAHTO ALLAAHUMMA MO’TASEMAN BEZEMAAMEKAL 
I begin the day, O Allah, taking refuge under Your out of reach 
الْمَنِيْعِ الَّذِیْ لاَ يُطَاوَلُ وَ لاَ يُحَاوَلُ 
MANEE-I’L LAZEE LAA YOTAAWALO WALAA YOHAAWALO 
and safe shelter were neither can harass nor ambush (me the evil of) 
مِنْ شَرِّ کُلِّ غَاشِمٍ وَ طَارِقٍ 
MIN SHARRE KULLE GHAASHEMIN WA TAAREQIN 
any unjust persecutor or preyful assaulter, 
مِنْ سَآئِرِ مَنْ خَلَقْتَ وَ مَا خَلَقْتَ 
MIN SAAA-ERE MAN KHALAQTA WAMAA KHALAQTA 
easy to be found, among Your creation, 
مِنْ خَلْقِكَ الصَّامِتِ وَ النَّاطِقِ 
MIN KHALQEKAS SAAMETE WAN NAATEQE 
irrational tongue-tied plotters and articulate brutes seeking false pretexts 
فِیْ جُنَّةٍ مِنْ کُلِّ مَخُوْفٍ بِلِبَاسٍ سَابِغَةٍ 
FEE JUNNATIN MIN KULLE MAKHOOFIN BELEBAASIN SAABEGHATIN 
to commit crimes (against humanity). Clad in armour 
وِلآَءِ اَهْلِ بَيْتِ نَبِيِّكَ مُحْتَجِبًا مِنْ کُلِّ قَاصِدٍ لِیْ 
WELAAE AHLE BAYTE NABEEYEKA MOHTAJEBAN MIN KULLE QAASEDIN LEE
of the love of the Ahlul Bayt of Your Prophet I have been rendered secure against evil schemes, 
اِلٰی اَذِيَّةٍ بِجِدَارٍ حَصِيْنٍ 
ELAA AZIYYATIN BEJEDAARIN HASEENENIL 
walled in and kept within the well-fortified walls erected 
اْلاِخْلاَصِ فِیْ اْلاِعْتِرَافِ 
IKHLAASE FIL E-A’TERAAFE 
on the foundation of sincere heart and soul declaration of their rights
بِحَقِّهِمْ وَ التَّمَسُّكِ بِحَبْلِهِمْ مُوْقِنًا اَنَّ الْحَقَّ لَهُمْ 
BEHAQQEHIM WAT TAMASSOKE BEHABLEHIM MOOQENAN ANNAL HAQQA LAHUM 
and inseparable attachment to their friendship, knowing for certain that truth belongs to them,
وَ مَعَهُمْ وَ فِيْهِمْ وَ بِهِمْ اُوَالِیْ مَنْ وَالَوْا وَ اُجَانِبُ مَنْ جَانَبُوْا 
WA MA-A’HUM WA FEEHIM WA BEHIM OWAALEE MAN WAALAW WA OJAANEBO MAN JAANABOO 
(it is) along with them in them and around them. Whoso loves them is my friend; I forsake those who drift away from them; 
فَاَعِذْنِیْ اَللّٰهُمَّ بِهِمْ مِنْ شَرِّ کُلِّ مَا اَتَّقِيْهِ 
FA-AI’ZNEE ALLAAHUMMA BEHIM MIN SHARRE KULLE MAA ATTAQEEHE 
so my Allah keep me safe from every evil that threatens me, 
يَا عَظِيْمُ حَجَزْتُ اْلاَعَادِیَ عَنِّیْ بِبَدِيْعِ السَّمٰوَاتِ وَ اْلاَرْضِ 
YAA A’ZEEMO HAJAZTUL A-A’AADEYA A’NNEE BEBADEE-I’S SAMAAWAATE WAL A’RZE 
O the Almighty come between me and my enemies 
اِنَّا جَعَلْنَا مِنْ بَيْنِ اَيْدِيْهِمْ سَدًّا وَ مِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا 
INNAA JA-A’LNAA MIN BAYNE AYDEEHIM SADDAN WA MIN KHALFEHIM SADDAN 
just as You set up the sky and the earth, and barricade their approach unto us from all sides, 
فَاَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لاَ يُبْصِرُوْنَ.
FA- AGHSHAYNAAHUM FAHUM LAA YUBSEROON.
make them swoon and faint inside the fence so that they do not know what to do.
(12)   Recite:
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْئَلُكَ اْلاِيْمَانَ بِكَ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKAL EEMAANA BEKA 
O Allah, I beseech You to let me have faith in You, 
وَ التَّصْدِيْقَ بِنَبِيِّكَ 
WAT TASDEEKA BENABIYYEKA 
and acknowledge the truthfulness of Your Prophet; 
وَ الْعَافِيَةِ مِنْ جَمِيْعِ الْبَلآَءِ 
WAL A’AAFEYATE MIN JAMEE-I’L BALAAA-E 
(and I beseech You to keep me safe) from all misfortunes; 
وَ الشُّکْرَ عَلَی الْعَافِيَةِ 
WASH SHUKRA A’LAL A’AFEYATE 
(and let me) thank You for the welfare, 
وَ الْغِنٰی عَنْ شِرَارِ النَّاسِ.
WAL GHENAA A’N SHERAARIN NAASE.
and (enable me) to dispense with the evil of the people.
(13)   Recite:
اَللّٰهُمَّ فَاطِرَ السَّمٰوَاتِ وَ اْلاَرْضِ 
ALLAHUMMA FAATERAS SAMAAWAATE WAL ARZE 
O Allah! The Creator of the heavens and the earth, 
عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَ الشَّهَادَةِ 
A’ALEMAL GHAYBE WASH SHAHADATIR 
knower of the unseen and the seen, 
الرَّحْمٰنَ الرَّحِيْمَ اَعْهَدُ اِلَيْكَ فِی هٰذِهِ الدُّنْيَا 
RAHMAANAR RAHEEMA A-A’HADO ELAYKA FEE HAAZEHID DUNYAA 
the beneficent, the merciful, I make a covenant in this world 
اَنَّكَ اَنْتَ اللهُ لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ 
ANNAKA ANTAL LAAHO LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTA 
that verily You are Allah, there is no god save You, 
وَحْدَكَ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَكَ 
WAHDAKA LAA SHAREEKA LAKA 
one, there is no associate with You; 
وَ اَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا صَلَّی اللهُ عَلَيْهِِ وَ اٰلِهٖ 
WA ANNA MOHAMMADAN SALLAL LAAHO ALAYHE WA AALEHI 
and that Mohammed, blessings of Allah be on Him and on his children, 
عَبْدُكَ وَ رَسُوْلُكَ 
A’BDOKA WA RASOOLOKA 
is Your servant and messenger. 
اَللّٰهُمَّ فَصَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِهٖ
ALLAAHUMMA FASALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALEHI 
O Allah send blessings on Mohammed and on his children, 
وَ لاَ تَكِلْنِىْ اِلٰی نَفْسِیْ طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ اَبَدًا 
WA LAA TAKILNEE ELAA NAFSEE TARFATA A’YNIN ABADAN 
and do not ever leave me to follow my nafs (desires) even for a flash of an eye, 
وَ لاَ اِلٰی اَحَدٍ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ 
WA LAA ELAA AHADIM MIN KHALQEKA 
nor hand over me to any of Your created beings, 
فَاِنَّكَ اِنْ وَكَلْتَنِىْ اِلَيْهَا تُبَاعِدْنِیْ 
FA-INNAKA IN WAKALTANEE ELAYHAA TOBAA-I’DNEE 
because if You do so it will bring me 
مِنَ الْخَيْرِ وَ تُقَرِّبْنِیْ مِنَ الشَّرِّ 
MENAL KHAYRE WA TOQARRIBNEE MENASH SHARRE 
near to evil and keep away from good. 
يَا رَبِّ لاَ اَثِقُ اِلاَّ بِرَحْمَتِكَ

O Lord! I do not put trust in anything save Your mercy. 
فَصَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهٖ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ 
FASALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALEHIT TAYYEBEENA 
Then send blessings upon Muhammad and his pure progeny
وَ اجْعَلْ لِیْ عِنْدَكَ عَهْدًا تُؤَدِيْهِ اِلَیَّ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ 
WAJ A’L LEE I’NDAKA A’HDAN TO-ADEEHE ELAYYA YAWMAL QEYAAMATE 
So I deposit my covenant with You to use it on the day of judgment. 
اِنَّكَ لاَ تُخْلِفُ الْمِيْعَادَ.
INNAKA LAA TUKHLEFUL MEE-A’ADA.
Verily You do not break promise.

اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَ الْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَ وَ الْمُسْلِمَاتِ.

(16)   Zayn al-Muttaqin says that the following multipurpose dua’ was brought by Jibraeel (a.s.) to the Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) and said:
Whoever prays it after Fajr salaat and also keeps it on the body as ta’weez receive the following benefits:
(i)      Protection from death by accident;
(ii)     Exemption from the questioning by munkar and nakir in the grave;
(iii)    Relief from the fright of abandonment and melancholy in the grave;
(iv)    Diseases will be cured;
(v)     Safety from oppression and exploitation;
(vi)    The eight gates of heaven will be thrown open for those who pray this dua’.
لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ الْجَلِيْلُ الْجَبَّارُ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHUL JALEELUL JABBAARO 
There is no god save Allah, the Glorious, the Supreme. 
لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ الْعَزِيْزُ الْغَفَّارُ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHUL A’ZEEZUL GHAFFAARO 
There is no god save Allah, the Mighty, the Oft-forgiving. 
لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHUL WAAHEDUL QAHHAARO 
There is no god save Allah, the One, the Dominating. 
لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهٗ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHO WAHDAHU LAA SHAREEKA LAHU 
There is no god save Allah, the Single Who has no associate, 
اِلٰهًا وَّاحِدًا وَّ نَحْنُ لَهٗ مُسْلِمُوْنَ 
ELAAHAN WAAHEDAN WA NAHNO LAHU MUSLEMOONA 
the only God, we surrender ourselves to His will. 
لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهٗ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHO WAHDAHU LAA SHAREEKA LAHU 
There is no god save Allah, the Single, Who has no associate, 
اِلٰهًا وَّاحِدًا وَ نَحْنُ لَهٗ مُخْلِصُوْنَ 
ELAAHAN WAAHEDAN WA NAHNO LAHU MUKHLESOONA 
and to Him we are sincere. 
لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهٗ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHO WAHDAHU LAA SHAREEKA LAHU 
There is no god save Allah, 
اِلٰهًا وَّاحِدًا وَّ نَحْنُ لَهٗ عَابِدُوْنَ 
ELAAHAN WAAHEDAN WA NAHNO LAHU A’ABEDOONA 
the Single, Who has no associate, and we worship Him. 
لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ مُحَمَّدٌ رَّسُوْلُ اللهِ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHO MOHAMMADUR RASOOLUL LAAHE 
There is no god save Allah, Mohammed is the messenger of Allah, 
عَلِیٌّ وَلِیُّ اللهِ وَ صَلَّی اللهُ عَلٰی خَيْرِ خَلْقِهٖ
A’LIYYUN WALIYYUL LAAHE WA SALLAL LAAHO A’LAA KHAYRE KHALQEHI 
Ali is the vicegerent of Allah. Blessings of Allah be on His best creation, 
وَ مَظْهَرِ لُطْفِهِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِهٖ  اَجْمَعِيْنَ 
WA MAZHARE LUTFEHI MOHAMMADIN WA AALEHI AJMA-E’ENAT 
the manifestation of His pleasure, Mohammed, and all his pure, 
الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ يَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ

pious and clean children, on account of Your mercy, O the most merciful. 
حَسْبُنَا اللهُ وَ نِعْمَ الْوَكِيْلُ نِعْمَ الْمَوْلٰی وَ نِعْمَ النَّصِيْرُ.
HASBONAL LAAHO WA NE’MAL WAKEELO NE’MAL MAWLAA WA NE’MAN NASEERO.
Allah is sufficient for us, He is the best supporter, the best master, the best helper.
(17)   Recite surah Qadr 10 times.
(18)   Recite surah YaaSeen.
(19)      Recite surah Ikhlaas 100 times.

D4.Title: Nafilah Fajr
D4.Data:
The Supererogatory Dawn Prayer
Upon accomplishment of the Night Prayer, you may stand up for offering the supererogatory dawn prayer, which consists of two units in the first of which you may recite Surah al-Faatehah and Surah al-Kafirun and in the second unit Surah al-Faatehah and Surah al-Tawheed. When you accomplish the prayer, you may sleep on the right side like a dead in the grave, put your right cheek on your right hand, and say the following:
اِسْتَمْسَكْتُ بِعُرْوَةِ اللهِ الْوُثْقَى
ISTAMSAKTO BE-U’RWATIL WUSQAL
I have laid hold on Allah’s firmest handle
الَّتِي لَا انْفِصَامَ لَهَا
LATEE LAN FE-SAAMA LAHAA
that shall never break off.
وَ اعْتَصَمْتُ بِحَبْلِ اللهِ الْمَتِيْنِ
WA’ TASAMTO BE-HABLIL LAAHIL MATEENE
I have held fast to Allah’s solid rope.
وَ اَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنْ شَرِّ فَسَقَةِ الْعَرَبِ وَ الْعَجَمِ
WA A-O’OZO BILLAAHE MIN SHARRE FASAQATIL A’RABE WAL A’JAME
I pray for Allah’s protection against the evil of the sinful Arabs and non-Arabs.
وَ اَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنْ شَرِّ فَسَقَةِ الْجِنِّ وَ الْاِنْسِ
WA A-O’OZO BILLAAHE MIN SHARRE FASAQATIL JINNE WAL INSE.
I pray for Allah’s protection against the evil of the sinful jinn and men.
You may then repeat the following doxology three times:
سُبْحَانَ رَبِّ الصَّبَاحِ فَالِقِ الاِصْبَاحِ
SUBHAANA RABBIS SABAAHE FAALEQIL ISBAAHE
All glory be to the Lord of mornings, the Cleaver of daybreak.
You may then recite the previously mentioned five verses of Surah Al-’Imran.
You may then sit and say Tasbih al-Zahra’.
In the book of Man-La-Yahduruhul-Faqih, it is reported that whoever invoke blessings upon the Holy Prophet and his Household one hundred times between the supererogatory and the obligatory dawn prayers, Almighty Allah will save his face from the heat of Hellfire:
اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
ALLAAHUMMA SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN.
O Allah, (please) send blessings upon Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad,
Whoever repeats the following supplicatory prayer one hundred times, Almighty Allah will build for him a house in Paradise:
سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْعَظِيْمِ وَ بِحَمْدِهٖ
SUBHAANA RABBEYAL A’ZEEME WA BEHAMDEHI
All glory be to my Lord, the All-great, and in praise of Him.
اَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ رَبِّي وَ اَتُوبُ اِلَيْهِ
ASTAGHFERUL LAAHE RABBEE WA ATOOBO ELAYHE.
I implore Allah, my Lord, for forgiveness and I repent to Him.
Whoever recites Surah al-Tawheed twenty-one times, Almighty Allah will build for him a house in Paradise, and whoever recites it forty times, Almighty Allah will forgive him.
After accomplishing the Night Prayer, it is highly advisable to say the thirty-second supplication of al-Sahifah al-Kamilah al-Sajjadiyyah:
اَللّٰهُمَّ يَا ذَا الْمُلْكِ الْمُتَاَبِّدِ بِالْخُلُودِ…
ALLAAHUMMA YAA ZAL MULKIL MOTA-ABBEDE BIL-KHOLOODE.
O Allah, O Possessor of kingdom perpetual in everlastingness… 
You may then do a thanksgiving prostration during which you are highly advised to pray for the good of your brothers-in-faith and say the aforementioned supplication that is said in the thanksgiving prostrations:
اَللّٰهُمَّ رَبَّ الْفَجْرِ وَاللَّيَالِي الْعَشْرِ
ALLAAHUMMA RABBAL FAJRE WAL LAYAALIL A’SHRE
O Allah, O Lord of the daybreak, the ten nights,
وَ الشَّفْعِ وَ الْوَتْرِ
WASH SHAF-E’ WAL WATRE
the even and the odd,
وَ اللَّيْلِ اِذَا يَسْرِ
WAL LAYLE EZAA YASRE
and the night when it departs!
وَ رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ
WA RABBA KULLE SHAY-IN
O Lord of all things!
وَ اِلٰهَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ
WA ELAAHA KULLE SHAY-IN
O Lord of all things!
وَ خَالِقَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ
WA KHAALEQA KULLE SHAY-IN
O Creator of all things!
وَ مَلِكَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ
WA MALEKA KULLE SHAY-IN
O King of all things!
صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِهٖ
SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADINW WA AALEHI
(Please) send blessings upon Muhammad and his Household,
وَ افْعَلْ بِي وَ بِـ… مَا اَنْتَ اَهْلُهٗ
WAF A’L BEE WA BE… MAA ANTA AHLOHU
do to me and to so-and-so that which befits You,
وَ لَا تَفْعَلْ بِنَا مَا نَحْنُ اَهْلُهٗ
WA LAA TAF-A’L BENAA MAA NAHNO AHLOHU
but do not do to us that which we deserve,
فَاِنَّكَ اَهْلُ التَّقْوٰى وَ اَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
FA-INNAKA AHLUT TAQWAA WA AHLUL MAGHFERATE.
for You are verily worthy to be feared and worthy to forgive.
I please my faithful brothers to mention me - the sinful whose face has been blackened by sins - in their supplications, because I am in urgent need for prayers. Eventually, Allah is the source of success.

D5.Title: Taqibaat e Namaz e Zuhr
D5.Data:
Dua to be recited after Namaz-e-Zohr
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
لَا اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ الْعَظِيْمُ الْحَلِيْمُ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHUL A’ZEEMUL HALEEMO 
There is no god save Allah, the Greatest, the Loving. 
لَا اِلٰـهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْكَرِيْمُ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHO RABBUL A’RSHIL 
There is no god save Allah, the Lord of the exalted arsh. 
الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ 
KAREEMO AL-HAMDO LILLAAHE RABBIL A’ALAMEENA 
Praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds. 
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ مُوْجِبَاتِ رَحْمَتِكَ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA MOOJEBAATE RAHMATEKA 
O Allah, I beseech You for that which brings forth Your mercy 
وَ عَزَآئِمَ مَغْفِرَتِكَ وَ الْغَنِيْمَةَ مِنْ كُلِّ بِرٍّ وَ السَّلَامَةَ مِنْ كُلِّ اِثْمٍ 
WA A’ZAA-EME MAGHFERATEKA WAL GHANEEMATA MIN KULLE BIRRIN WAS-SALAAMATA MIN KULLE ISMIN
and for Your intention of forgiveness, and for safety from all sins. 
اَللّٰهُمَّ لَا تَدَعْ لِيْ ذَنْبًا اِلاَّ غَفَرْتَهٗ وَ لَا هَمًّا اِلاَّ فَرَّجْتَهٗ 
ALLAAHUMMA LAA TADA’ LEE ZAMBAN ILLAA GHAFARTAHU WA LAA HAMMAN ILLAA FARRAJTAHU 
O Allah let there not be a single sin, not forgiven, not a worry, not dispersed, 
وَ لَا سُقْمًا اِلاَّ شَفَيْتَهٗ وَ لَا عَيْبًا اِلاَّ سَتَرْتَهٗ 
WA LAA SUQMAN ILLAA SHAFAYTAHU WA LAA A’YBAN ILLAA SATARTAHU 
not a disease, that has not been healed, not a fault, that has not been concealed, 
وَ لَا رِزْقًا اِلاَّ بَسَطْتَهٗ وَ لَا خَوْفًا اِلاَّ اٰمَنْتَهٗ 
WA LAA RIZQAN ILLAA BASAT-TAHU WA LAA KHAWFAN ILLAA AAMANTAHU 
let there be no livelihood that has not been multiplied, nor fear that has not been dispelled, 
وَ لَا سُوْ ءًا اِلاَّ صَرَفْتَهٗ وَ لَا حَاجَةً هِيَ لَكَ رِضًا 
WA LAA SOOO-AN ILLAA SARAFTAHU WA LAA HAAJATAN HEYA LAKA REZAN 
no evil that has not been turned away, and (let there be) no desire, 
وَّ لِيَ فِيْهَا صَلَاحٌ اِلاَّ قَضَيْتَهَا يَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ 
WA LEYA FEEHAA SALAAHUN ILLAA QAZAYTAHAA YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEENA 
which You approve, and benefits me, that has not been satisfied, O the most Merciful of all the merciful. 
اٰمِيْنَ رَبَّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ.
AAMEENA RABBAL A’ALAMEENA.
So be it, O Lord of the worlds.

D6.Title: Nafilah Zuhr
D6.Data:
The Supererogatory Noon Prayer
The Supererogatory Noon Prayer consists of eight units as follows: In the first two units, you may intend offering them, utter the Takbir statement seven times as has been previously explained, say the supplications dedicated to these statements, and pray Almighty Allah to protect you against Satan the accursed:
اَعُوذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
AO'OZO BILLAAHE MENASH SHAYTAANIR RAJEEM
I pray for Allah’s protection from Satan, the accursed.

You may now recite Surah al-Faatehah and Surah al-Tawheed in the first unit and Surah al-Faatehah and Surah al-Kafirun (No. 109) in the second. Upon accomplishment, you may repeat the Takbir statements three times, as has been previously explained in the beginning of the general post-prayer utterances, utter Tasbih al-Zahra’, and then say the following supplicatory prayer:
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّيْ ضَعِيْفٌ
ALLAAHUMMA INNE ZA-E’EFUN
O Allah, I am weak;
فَقَوِّ فِيْ رِضَاكَ ضَعْفِيْ
FAQAWWE FEE REZAAKA ZA’FEE
so, (please) strengthen my weakness in the course of Your pleasure,
وَخُذْ اِلَى الْخَيْرِ بِنَاصِيَتِيْ
WA KHUZ ELAL KHAYRE BENAASEYATEE
lead my forelock to goodness,
وَ اجْعَلِ الْاِيْـمَانَ مُنْتَهٰى رِضَائِيْ
WAJ A’LIL EEMAANA MUNTAHAA REZAA-EE
cause faith to be the utmost of my pleasure,
وَ بَارِكْ لِيْ فِيْمَا قَسَمْتَ لِيْ
WA BAARIK LEE FEEMAA QASAMTA LEE
bless for me that which You have decided for me,
وَ بَلِّغْنِيْ بِرَحْمَتِكَ كُلَّ الَّذِيْ اَرْجُوْ مِنْكَ
WA BALLIGHNEE BE-RAHMATEKA KULLAL LAZEE ARJOO MINKA
make me attain, by means of Your mercy, all that which I wish from You,
وَ اجْعَلْ لِيْ وُدًّا
WAJ A’L LEE WUDDAN
and appoint love for me,
وَ سُرُوْرًا لِلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
WA SOROORAL MOAMENEENA
delight for the believers,
وَ عَهْدًا عِنْدَكَ
WA A’HDAN I’NDAKA
and a covenant with You.

D7.Title: Taqibaat e Namaz e Asr
D7.Data:
Dua to be recited after Namaz-e-Asr
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
سُبْحَانَ اللّٰہِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ وَ لَا اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اللّٰہُ وَاللّٰہُ اَکْبَرُ 
SUBHAANALLAHE WAL HAMDO LILLAAHE WA LAA ELAAHA ILLALLAAHO WALLAAHO AKBAR, 
Glory be to Allah, all praise is due to Him! There is no god but Allah. 
وَ لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّۃَ اِلَّا بِاللّٰہِ الْعَلِیِّ الْعَظِیْمِ 
WA LAA HAWLA WA LAA QUWWATA ILLAA BILLAAHIL A’LIYYEEL A’ZEEM, 
Allah is the greatest; and there is no might and no strength but from Allah, the most superior, the All-tremendous. 
سُبْحَانَ اللّٰہِ بِالْغُدُوِّ وَالْاٰصَالِ 
SUBHAANAL LAAHE BIL GHODUWWE WAL AASAALE, 
Glory be to Allah at morning and evening. 
سُبْحَانَ اللّٰہِ بِالْعَشِیِّ وَ الْاِبکَارِ 
SUBHAANAL LAAHE BIL A’SHIYYE WAL IBKAARE, 
Glorify His purity when you enter upon the time of evening and morning. 
سُبْحَانَ اللّٰہِ حِیْنَ تُمْسُوْنَ وَ حِیْنَ تُصْبِحُوْنَ 
SUBHAANAL LAAHE HEENA TUMSOONA WA HEENA TUSBEHOON 
وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ فِیْ السَّمٰوَاتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ 
WA LAHUL HAMDO FIS-SAMAAWAATE WAL ARZE 
And to Him belongs praise in the heavens and the earth, 
وَ عَشِیًِّا وَ حِیْنَ تُظْھِرُوْنَ 
WA ASHIYYAN WA HEENA TUZHEROON, 
at night fall and mid-day. 
سُبْحَانَ رَبِّکَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّۃِ عَمَّا یَصِفُوْنَ 
SUBHAANA RABBEKA RABBIL I’ZZATE A’MMAA YASEFOON 
Glory be to Allah and all honour for He is free from the stories ascribed (about Him). 
وَ سَلَامٌ عَلَی الْمُرْسَلِیْنَ وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِیْنَ 
WA SALAAMUN A’LAL MURSALEENA WAL HAMDO LILLAAHE RABBIL A’ALAMEENA, 
Peace be on His apostles. And all praise rightly belongs to Allah – Lord of the worlds. 
سُبْحَانَ ذِیْ الْمُلْکِ وَالْمَلَکُوْتِ سُبْحَانَ ذِیْ الْعِزَّۃِ وَ الْجَبَرُوْتِ 
SUBHAANA ZIL MULKE WAL MALAKOOTE SUBHAANA ZIL I’ZZATE WAL JABAROOTE. 
Glory be to possessor of the dominion and the Kingdom. Glory be to possessor of might and invincibility.
سُبْحَانَ الْحَیِّ الَّذِیْ لَا یَمُوْتُ 
SUBHAANAL HAYYIL LAZEE LAA YAMOOTO 
Glory be to the Living, the one Who will never die. 
سُبْحَانَ ذِیْ الْقَائِمِ الدَّائِمِ 
SUBHAANAL QAAEMID DAAA-EME. 
Glory be to the All-Self-existent, the Everlasting, 
سُبْحَانَ الْحَیِّ الْقَیُّوْمِ سُبْحَانَ عَلِیِّ الْاَعْلٰی 
SUBHAANAL HAYYUL QAYYUM, SUBHAANAL A’LIYYIL A’ALAA 
Glory be to the Living the Self-subsistent. 
سُبْحَانَہٗ وَ تَعَالٰی 
SUBHAANAHU WA TA-A’ALAA, 
Glory be to the All-high, the Most High. 
سُبُّوْحٌ قُدُّوْسٌ رَبُّنَا وَ رَبُّ الْمَلَآءِکَۃِ وَ الرُّوْحِ 
SUBBOOHUN QUDDOOSUN RABBONAA WA RABBUL MALAAA-EKATE WAR ROOHE. 
Glory be to Him and exalted be He, All-glory and All-holy, our Lord and the Lord of Angels and spirit. 
اَللّٰھُمَّ اِنَّ ذَنْبِیْ اَمْسٰی مُسْتَجِیْرًا بِعَفْوِکَ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNAA ZANBI AMSAA MUSTAJEERAN BE A’FWEKA 
O Allah, surely my sin seeks the refuge of Thy pardon; 
وَ خَوْفِیْ اَمْسٰی مُسْتَجِیْرًا بِاَمْنِکَ 
WA KHAWFEE AMSAA MUSTAJEERAN BE AMNEKA 
and my fear seeks the refuge of Thy peace; 
وَ فَقْرِیْ اَمْسٰی مُسْتَجِیْرًا بِغِنَاکَ 
WA FAQREE AMSAA MUSTAJEERAN BE GHENAKA. 
and my indigence seeks the refuge of Thy self-sufficiency; 
وَذُلِّیْ اَمْسٰی مُسْتَجِیْرًا بِعِزِّکَ 
WA ZULLEE AMSAA MUSTAJEERAN BE-I’ZZEKA. 
and my abasement seeks the refuge of Thy exaltation. 
اَللّٰھُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
ALLAAHUMMA SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN. 
O Allah! Bless Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad, 
وَ اغْفِرْ لِیْ وَارْحَمْنِیْ اِنَّکَ حَمِیْدٌ مَّجِیْدٌ 
WAGHFIRLEE WAR HAMNEE INNAKA HAMEEDUN MAJEED. 
and pardon me, and have mercy on me, for surely Thou art the Praised and the Glorious. 
اَللّٰھُمَّ تَمَّ نُوْرِکَ فَھَدَیْتَ 
ALLAAHUMMA TAMMA NOORAKA FA HADAYTA, 
O Allah! As Thy light has guided me, 
فَلَکَ الْحَمْدُ وَ عَظِیْمُ حِلْمُکَ فَعَفَوْتَ فَلَکَ الْحَمْدُ وَجْھِکَ 
FA LAKAL HAMDO WA A’ZOMA HILMOKA FA AFAWTA FA LAKAL HAMDO WAJHEKA, 
so all praise is due to Thee; and by the bounty of Thy clemency pardon me, so all praise is due to Thee 
رَبَّنَا اَکْرَمِ الْوُجُوْہِ وَ جَاھُکَ اَعْظَمُ الْجَاہِ 
RABBANAA AKRAMUL WOJOOHE WA JAAHOKA A-A’ZAMUL JAAHE 
O our Lord! Thou art the Most Generous of the generous and Thy Splendour is greater than all splendour, 
وَ عَطَائُکَ اَفْضَلُ الْاَعْطَاءِ تُعْطِیْ
WA ATIYYATOKA, AFZALUL A’TAAA-E TO’TEE, 
and Thy gift is greater in merit than all gifts. 
رَبَّنَا فَتَشْکُرُ وَ تُؤْسَا فَتَغْفِرُ فَتُجِیْبَ الْمُضْطَرَّ 
RABBANAA FA-TASHKORO WA TO-A’SAA FA TAGHFERO FA-TOJEEBUL MUZTARRA 
Thou thank those who obey thee and forgive when disobeyed, and grants the supplication of one in distress, 
وَ تَکْشِفِ الضُّرَّ وَ تَمْنِیْ مِنَ الْکَرْبِ 
WA TAKSHEFUZ ZURRA WA TUNJEE MENAL KARBE 
and removes the harm, and rescues from affliction, 
وَ تُغْنِ الفَقِیْرِ وَ تَشْفِ السَّقِیْمِ 
WA TUGHNIL FAQEERA WA TASH-FIS SAKEEME
and enriches the indigent, and cures the ailing, 
وَ لَا یُجَازِیْ اٰلَائِکَ اَحَدٌ 
WA LAA YOJAAZEE A-A’LAAEKA AHADUN 
and nobody can recompense for any of Thy blessings. 
یَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِیْنَ.
YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEENA.
O Most Merciful of the Merciful!”

D8.Title: Taqibaat & Nafilah of Asr
D8.Data:
Upon accomplishment of the post-prayer utterances, you may ready yourself for performing the Afternoon (Asr) Prayer.
The Afternoon obligatory, supererogatory prayers, and post- prayer utterances
You may begin with offering the Supererogatory Afternoon Prayer, which consists of eight units. Upon accomplishment, you may perform the Afternoon Obligatory Prayer, observing all the aforesaid etiquettes. It is highly advisable to recite Surah al-Faatehah and Surah al-Nasr (No. 110), Surah al-Fath (No. 48), Surah al-Takathur (No. 102), or a similar Surah in the first unit and Surah al-Faatehah and Surah al-Tawheed in the second.
Upon accomplishment, you may say any of the general post-prayer supplicatory utterances and the other supplications dedicated to the Afternoon Prayer, such as imploring Almighty Allah’s forgiveness seventy times and repeating Surah al-Qadr ten times. You may then do the thanksgiving prostration.

D9.Title: Taqibaat e Namaz e Maghrib
D9.Data:
Dua to be recited after Namaz-e-Maghrib
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْاَلُكَ مُوجِبَاتِ رَحْمَتِكَ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA MOOJEBAATE RAHMATEKA
O Allah I beseech Thee for the causes of Thy Mercy; 
وَ عَزَائِمَ مَغْفِرَتِكَ وَ النَّجَاةَ مِنَ النَّارِ 
WA A’ZAAEMA MAGHFERATEKA WAN NAJAATA MINAN NAARE 
the rights of Thy pardon; Safety from every sin; the benefit from virtue: Salvation from (Hell) Fire 

وَ مِنْ کُلِّ بَلِيَّةٍ وَ الْفَوْزَ بِالْجَنَّةِ 
WA MIN KULLE BALIYYATIN WAL FAWZA BIL JANNATE 
and every Calamity; achievement of the Paradise 
وَ الرِّضْوَانَ فِیْ دَارِ السَّلَامِ وَ جِوَارَ نَبِّيِّكَ مُحَمَّدٍ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ السَّلَامُ 
WAR RIZWAANA FEE DAARIS SALAAME WA JEWAARA NABIYYEKA MOHAMMADIN A’LAYHE WA AALEHIS SALAAMO 
and (Thy) Pleasure in the abode of peace; and the proximity of Thy Prophet Mohammed and his (purified) progeny-peace be on all of them.
اَللّٰهُمَّ مَا بِنَا مِنْ نِّعْمَةٍ فَمِنْكَ لآَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ اَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَ اَتُوْبُ اِلَيْكَ.
ALLAAHUMMA MAA BENAA MIN NEA’MATIN FAMINKA LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTA ASTAGHFEROKA WA ATOOBO ELAYKA.
O Allah! Whatever bounties we have, all are from Thee: there is no deity except Thee; I beseech Thy forgiveness and turn unto Thee.

D10.Title: Taqibaat e Namaz e Isha
D10.Data:
Dua to be recited after Namaz-e-Ishaa
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اَعُوْذُ بِعِزَّۃِ اللّٰہِ وَ اَعُوْذُ بِقُدْرَۃِ اللّٰہِ 
A-O’OZO BE I’ZZATILLAAHE, WA A-O’OZO BE QUD-RATILLAAHE 
I seek protection with the Honour of Allah; I seek protection with the Might of Allah
وَ اَعُوْذُ بِمَغْفِرَۃِ اللّٰہِ وَ اَعُوْذُ بِرَحْمَۃِ اللّٰہِ 
WA A-O’OZO BE MAGHFERATILLAAHE WA A-O’OZO BE RAMATILLAAHE, 
I seek protection with the forgiveness of Allah I seek protection with the mercy of Allah
وَ اَعُوْذُ بِسُلْطَانِ اللّٰہِ الَّذِیْ ھُوَ عَلٰی کُلِّ شَیْءٍ قَدِیْرٍ 
WA A-O’OZO BE SULTAANILLAAHILLAZEE, HOWA A’LAA KULLE SHAY-IN QADEER, 
I seek protection with the Authority of Allah who is All Powerful over everything
وَ اَعُوْذُ بِجَمِیْعِ اللّٰہِ مِنْ شَرِّ کُلِّ جَبَّارٍ عَنِیْدٍ وَ سُلْطَانٍ مَرِیْدٍ 
WA A-O’OZO BE KARAMILLAAHE WA A-O’OZO BE JAM-ILLAAHE MIN SHARRE KULLE JABBAARIN A’NEED WASH SHAYTANIM MAREED 
I seek protection with the Grace of Allah: and I seek protection with All-Prevalent Allah from the evil of every insolent tyrant and the despised Devil, 
وَ کُلِّ مُخْتَالٍ وَ سَارِقٍ وَ عَارِضٍ وَ مِنْ شَرِّ السَّامَّۃِ وَ الْحَامَّۃِ وَالْعَامَّۃِ 
WA KULLE MUGHTAALIN WA SAAREQIN WA AAREZIN WA MIN SHARRIS SAAM-MATE VAL HAAM-MATE WAL LAAM-MATE 
every Killer, thief and every one approaching (to harm); and from the evil of poisonous (animals), Vermin’s and those causing in-jury; 
وَ مِنْ شَرِّ کُلِّ دَابَّۃٍ صَغِیْرَۃٍ وَ کَبِیْرَۃٍ بِلَیْلٍ وَ نَھَارٍ 
WA MIN SHARRE KULLE DAAB-BATIN SAGHEERATIN AW KABEERATIN, BE LAYLIN WA NAHAARIN, 
and from the evil of every animal, whether small or big, by night and by day; 
وَ مِنْ شَرِّ فُسَّاقِ الْعَرَبِ وَ الْعَجَمِ وَ فُجَّارِھِمْ 
WA MIN SHARRE FUSSAQIL A’RABE WAL A’JAME WA FUJ-JAAREHIM 
and from the evil of the transgressors of Arabs and non-Arabs; and of loose-conduct from among them; 
وَ مِنْ شَرِّ فَسَقَۃِ الْجِنِّ وَ الْاِنْسِ 
WA MIN SHARRE FASAQATIL JINNE WAL-INSE, 
and from the evil of the transgressors from among the genil and men; 
وَ مِنْ شَرِّ کُلِّ دَابَّۃٍ اَنْتَ آخِذٌ بِنَاصِیَتِھَا 
WA MIN SHARRE KULLE DAABBATIN ANTA AAKHEZOON BE NAASEYATEHAA, 
and from the evil of every animal Thou takest by its fore-lock
اِنَّ رَبِّیْ عَلٰی صَرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِیْمٍ.
INNA RABBI A’LAA SERAATIM MUSTAQEEM.
indeed my Lord is on the right path.
