E5.Title: Dua al Hujjah اِلٰهِيْ بِحَقِّ مَنْ نَاجَاكَ

E6.Title: Dua al Mahdi اللهم ارزقنا توفیق الطاعه و بعد المعصیه

E7.Title: Dua Allahumma Asleh اَللّٰهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ عَبْدَكَ
E7.Data:
Dua-e-Allahumma Asleh
اَللّٰہُمَّ اَصْلِحْ عَبْدَکَ وَ خَلِیْفَتَکَ 
O Allah! Reform conditions of Your servant and caliph 
بِمَا اَصْلَحْتَ بِہٖ اَنْبِیَآئَکَ وَ رُسُلَکَ 
with those means by which You have reformed conditions of Your messengers and prophets. 
وَ حُفَّہٗ بِمَلٰئِکَتِکَ وَاَیِّدْہُ بِرُوْحِ الْقُدُسِ مِنْ عِنْدِکَ 
Surround him with the angels and support him with the Holy Spirit. 
وَاسْلُکْہُ مِنْۢ بَیْنِ یَدَیْہِ وَ مِنْ خَلْفِہٖ رَصَدًا 
Appoint protectors from the front and behind him, 
یَحْفَظُوْنَہٗ مِنْ کُلِّ سُوْءٍ  وَ اَبْدِلْہُ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ خَوْفِہٖ اَمْنًا، 
(those) who would guard him from all troubles and calamities. Convert his fear into security, 
یَعْبُدُکَ لَا یُشْرِکُ بِکَ شَیْئًا، 
(so that) he may worship only You and doesn't associate anybody with You. 
وَ لَا تَجْعَلْ لِاَحَدٍ مِنْ خَلْقِکَ عَلٰی وَلِیِّکَ سُلْطَانًا، 
Do not make any of Your creatures an authority over Your vicegerent. 
وَائْذَنْ لَہٗ فِیْ جِہَادِ عَدُوِّکَ وَعَدُوِّہٖ، 
Permit him to fight against Your enemies and his enemies 
وَاجْعَلْنِیْ مِنْ اَنْصَارِہٖ اِنَّکَ عَلٰی کُلِّ شَیْءٍ قَدِیْرٌ.
and include me among his helpers. Surely You possess power over everything.

E8.Title: Dua Alqamah
E8.Data:
Dua-e-Alqama after Ziyarat-e-Ashura
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ. 
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful. 
يَا اللہُ يَا اللہُ يَا اللہُ يَا مُجِيبَ دَعْوَةِ الْمُضْطَرِّينَ 
O Allah! O Allah! O Allah! O He Who responds to the prayer of the distressed!
يَا كَاشِفَ كُرَبِ الْمَكْرُوبِينَ 
O He Who relieves the agonies of the agonized!
يَا غِيَاثَ الْمُسْتَغِيْثِيْنَ 
O Aide of the callers for aid!
وَ يَا صَرِيخَ الْمُسْتَصْرِخِينَ 
O Helper of those who cry for help!
يَا مَنْ هُوَ اَقْرَبُ اِلَيَّ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ 
O He Who is nearer to me than my life-vein!
وَ يَا مَنْ يَحُولُ بَيْنَ الْمَرْءِ وَ قَلْبِهٖ 
O He Who intervenes between man and his heart!
يَا مَنْ هُوَ بِالْمَنْظَرِ الْاَعْلَى وَ بِالْاُفُقِ الْمُبِيْنِ 
O He Who is in the Highest Position and in the Clear Horizon!
وَ يَا مَنْ هُوَ الرَّحْمٰنُ الرَّحِيمُ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ اسْتَوٰى 
O He Who is all-beneficent and all-merciful and is established on the Throne!
وَ يَا مَنْ يَعْلَمُ خَائِنَةَ الْاَعْيُنِ وَ مَا تُخْفِي الصُّدُوْرُ 
O He Who knows the stealthy looks and that which the breasts conceal!
وَ يَا مَنْ لَا تَخْفٰى عَلَيْهِ خَافِيَةٌ 
O He from Whom no secret can remain hidden!
وَ يَا مَنْ لَا تَشْتَبِهُ عَلَيْهِ الْاَصْوَاتُ 
O He Whom is not confused by the many voices (that pray Him)!
وَ يَا مَنْ لَا تُغَلِّطُهُ الْحَاجَاتُ 
O He Whom is not confounded by the many requests (that are raised to Him)!
وَ يَا مَنْ لَا يُبْرِمُهٗ اِلْحَاحُ الْمُلِحِّينَ 
O He Who is not annoyed by the insistence of those who entreat Him persistently!
يَا مُدْرِكَ كُلِّ فَوْتٍ 
O He Who overtakes every attempt of escape!
وَ يَا جَامِعَ كُلِّ شَمْلٍ 
O Reunifier of every scattering thing!
وَ يَا بَارِءَ النُّفُوسِ بَعْدَ الْمَوْتِ 
O Re-originator of the souls after death!
يَا مَنْ هُوَ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ فِي شَأْنٍ 
O He Who is in a state every moment!
يَا قَاضِيَ الْحَاجَاتِ 
O Grantor of requests!
يَا مُنَفِّسَ الْكُرُبَاتِ 
O Reliever of agonies!
يَا مُعْطِيَ السُّؤَالَاتِ 
O Conferrer of demands!
يَا وَلِيَّ الرَّغَبَاتِ 
O Bestower of desires!
يَا كَافِيَ الْمُهِمَّاتِ 
O Savior from sufferings!
يَا مَنْ يَكْفِيْ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ 
O He Who can save from all things
وَ لَا يَكْفِي مِنْهُ شَيْءٌ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ 
and nothing in the heavens or in the earth can save from Him!
اَسْاَلُكَ بِحَقِّ مُحَمَّدٍ خَاتَمِ النَّبِيِّيْنَ 
I beseech You in the name of Mu¦ammad the seal of the Prophets,
وَ عَلِيٍّ اَمِيْرِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
Ali, the commander of the faithful,
وَ بِحَقِّ فَاطِمَةَ بِنْتِ نَبِيِّكَ 
Fatemah the daughter of Your Prophet,
وَ بِحَقِّ الْحَسَنِ وَ الْحُسَيْنِ 
al-Hasan, and al-Husain,
فَاِنِّي بِهِمْ اَتَوَجَّهُ اِلَيْكَ فِي مَقَامِيْ هٰذَا
for I turn my face towards You in their names at this very situation of mine,
وَ بِهِمْ اَتَوَسَّلُ 
I make them my means to You, 
وَ بِهِمْ اَتَشَفَّعُ اِلَيْكَ 
I seek their intercession for me with You,
وَ بِحَقِّهِمْ اَسْاَلُكَ وَ اُقْسِمُ وَ اَعْزِمُ عَلَيْكَ 
I beseech You in the name of Your duty towards them, I adjure You, and I beg You earnestly,
وَ بِالشَّأْنِ الَّذِيْ لَهُمْ عِنْدَكَ 
in the name of the status that they enjoy with You,
وَ بِالْقَدْرِ الَّذِيْ لَهُمْ عِنْدَكَ
the value that they enjoy in Your sight,
وَ بِالَّذِيْ فَضَّلْتَهُمْ عَلَى الْعَالَمِيْنَ 
in the name of the thing by which You have preferred them over all the other beings,
وَ بِاسْمِكَ الَّذِيْ جَعَلْتَهٗ عِنْدَهُمْ 
in the name of Your Name that You have placed with them
وَ بِهٖ خَصَصْتَهُمْ دُوْنَ الْعَالَمِيْنَ 
and given them exclusively other than all the other beings,
وَ بِهٖ اَبَنْتَهُمْ 
and through which You have distinguished them
وَ اَبَنْتَ فَضْلَهُمْ مِنْ فَضْلِ الْعَالَمِيْنَ 
and demonstrated their distinctive precedence over all the other beings so uniquely
حَتّٰى فَاقَ فَضْلُهُمْ فَضْلَ الْعَالَمِينَ  جَمِيْعًا
that their preference has exceeded all the distinctive features of all the other beings;
اَسْئَلُكَ اَنْ تُصَلِّيَ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
I beseech You (in the name of all that) to send blessings upon Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad,
وَ اَنْ تَكْشِفَ عَنِّي غَمِّي 
to relieve me from my distress,
وَ هَمِّيْ وَ كَرْبِي 
grief, and agony,
وَ تَكْفِيَنِي الْمُهِمَّ مِنْ اُمُورِيْ 
to make up for me all my distressing affairs,
وَ تَقْضِيَ عَنِّيْ دَيْنِيْ 
to help me settle my debts,
وَ تُجِيْرَنِيْ مِنَ الْفَقْرِ 
to safeguard me against poverty,
وَ تُجِيرَنِيْ مِنَ الْفَاقَةِ 
to safeguard me against scarcity,
وَ تُغْنِيَنِيْ عَنِ الْمَسْاَلَةِ اِلَى الْمَخْلُوقِينَ 
to make me dispense with begging from the created beings,
وَ تَكْفِيَنِيْ هَمَّ مَنْ اَخَافُ هَمَّهٗ 
to spare me from the distress of what I anticipate to distress me,
وَ عُسْرَ مَنْ اَخَافُ عُسْرَهٗ 
the difficulty of what I anticipate to be difficult for me,
وَ حُزُوْنَةَ مَنْ اَخَافُ حُزُوْنَتَهٗ 
the toughness of what I anticipate to be hard for me (to deal with),
وَ شَرَّ مَنْ اَخَافُ شَرَّهٗ 
the evil of what I anticipate to be evil,
وَ مَكْرَ مَنْ اَخَافُ مَكْرَهٗ 
the conspiracy of whom I anticipate to plot conspiracy (against me),
وَ بَغْيَ مَنْ اَخَافُ بَغْيَهٗ 
the tyranny of whom I anticipate to treat me tyrannically,
وَ جَوْرَ مَنْ اَخَافُ جَوْرَهٗ 
the injustice of whom I anticipate to be unjust to me
وَ سُلْطَانَ مَنْ اَخَافُ سُلْطَانَهٗ 
the domination of whom I anticipate to dominate me,
وَ كَيْدَ مَنْ اَخَافُ كَيْدَهٗ 
the trickery of whom I anticipate to trick me,
وَ مَقْدُرَةَ مَنْ اَخَافُ مَقْدُرَتَهٗ عَلَيَّ 
and the authority of whom I anticipate to seize me,
وَ تَرُدَّ عَنِّيْ كَيْدَ الْكَيَدَةِ 
and to ward off from me the trickeries of the deceivers
وَ مَكْرَ الْمَكَرَةِ 
and the cunning of the devious.
اَللّٰهُمَّ مَنْ اَرَادَنِي فَاَرِدْهُ 
O Allah, stand for me against him who intends evil for me,
وَ مَنْ كَادَنِي فَكِدْهُ 
intrigue against him who intends to conspire against me,
وَ اصْرِفْ عَنِّي كَيْدَهٗ وَ مَكْرَهٗ 
turn away from me his trickeries, cunning,
وَ بَأْسَهٗ وَ اَمَانِيَّهٗ 
influence, and evil desires,
وَ امْنَعْهُ عَنِّيْ كَيْفَ شِئْتَ وَ اَنَّى شِئْتَ 
and prevent him against me in any way You choose and at any time You choose.
اَللّٰهُمَّ اشْغَلْهُ عَنِّي 
O Allah, (please) preoccupy him against me
بِفَقْرٍ لَا تَجْبُرُهٗ 
by means of poverty that You never cut down,
وَ بِبَلَاءٍ لَا تَسْتُرُهٗ 
ordeals that You never recover,
وَ بِفَاقَةٍ لَا تَسُدُّهَا 
neediness that You never stop,
وَ بِسُقْمٍ لَا تُعَافِيْهِ 
ailment that You never heal,
وَ ذُلٍّ لَا تُعِزُّهٗ 
humility that You never change into dignity,
وَ بِمَسْكَنَةٍ لَا تَجْبُرُهَا 
and destitution that You never cut down.
اَللّٰهُمَّ اضْرِبْ بِالذُّلِّ نَصْبَ عَيْنَيْهِ
O Allah, (please) strike him with humility in the center of his eyes,
وَ اَدْخِلْ عَلَيْهِ الْفَقْرَ فِي مَنْزِلِهٖ 
interleave poverty to his own house,
وَ الْعِلَّةَ وَ السُّقْمَ فِي بَدَنِهٖ
place ailment and disease in his body
حَتّٰى تَشْغَلَهٗ عَنِّيْ بِشُغْلٍ شَاغِلٍ لَا فَرَاغَ لَهٗ 
so that You will preoccupy him with an engrossing, relentless preoccupation,
وَ اَنْسِهٖ ذِكْرِي كَمَا اَنْسَيْتَهٗ ذِكْرَكَ 
make him fail to remember me in the same was as he has failed to remember You,
وَ خُذْ عَنِّيْ بِسَمْعِهٖ وَ بَصَرِهٖ 
divert from me his hearing, sight,
وَ لِسَانِهٖ وَ يَدِهٖ وَ رِجْلِهٖ وَ قَلْبِهٖ وَ جَمِيْعِ جَوَارِحِهٖ 
tongue, hand, leg, heart, and all of his organs,
وَ اَدْخِلْ عَلَيْهِ فِيْ جَمِيْعِ ذٰلِكَ السُّقْمَ 
place in him sickness in all these (organs),
وَ لَا تَشْفِهٖ حَتّٰى تَجْعَلَ ذٰلِكَ شُغْلًا شَاغِلًا بِهٖ 
and do not heal him so that all these (sicknesses) will preoccupy him relentlessly
عَنِّي وَ عَنْ ذِكْرِيْ 
from me and from mentioning me.
وَ اكْفِنِيْ يَا كَافِيَ مَا لَا يَكْفِيْ سِوَاكَ 
And spare me, O Savior, from all that which cannot be spared by anyone other than You,
فَاِنَّكَ الْكَافِيْ لَا كَافِيَ سِوَاكَ 
for You are verily the Savior; and there is no savior other than You,
وَ مُفَرِّجٌ لَا مُفَرِّجَ سِوَاكَ 
You are verily the Reliever, and there is no reliever other than You,
وَ مُغِيْثٌ لَا مُغِيْثَ سِوَاكَ 
You are verily the Succorer, and there is no succorer other than You,
وَ جَارٌ لَا جَارَ سِوَاكَ 
and You are verily the Shelterer, and there is no shelterer other than You.
خَابَ مَنْ كَانَ جَارُهٗ سِوَاكَ 
Disappointed is he whose shelterer is other than You,
وَ مُغِيثُهٗ سِوَاكَ 
whose recourse to anywhere other than You,
وَ مَفْزَعُهٗ اِلٰى سِوَاكَ 
whose resort is anywhere other than You,
وَ مَهْرَبُهٗ اِلٰى سِوَاكَ 
whose way out is anywhere other than You,
وَ مَلْجَاهُ اِلٰى غَيْرِكَ 
whose haven is anywhere other than You,
وَ مَنْجَاهُ مِنْ مَخْلُوقٍ غَيْرِكَ
and whose savior from any created being is anyone other than You.
فَاَنْتَ ثِقَتِيْ وَ رَجَائِيْ 
You are verily my trust, my hope,
وَ مَفْزَعِيْ وَ مَهْرَبِيْ 
my resort, my way out,
وَ مَلْجَائِيْ وَ مَنْجَايَ 
my haven, and my savior.
فَبِكَ اَسْتَفْتِحُ 
With You do I commence
وَ بِكَ اَسْتَنْجِحُ 
and through You do I seek success.
وَ بِمُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
In the name of Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad
اَتَوَجَّهُ اِلَيْكَ وَ اَتَوَسَّلُ وَ اَتَشَفَّعُ 
do I turn my face towards You, seek means to You, and seek intercession to You.
فَاَسْاَلُكَ يَا اَللہُ يَا اَللہُ يَا اَللہُ 
So, I beseech You, O Allah! O Allah! O Allah!
فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ وَ لَكَ الشُّكْرُ
Yours is all praise and Yours is all thanks.
وَ اِلَيْكَ الْمُشْتَكٰی وَ اَنْتَ الْمُسْتَعَانُ
To You is my complaint and You are the Besought for help.
فَاَسْاَلُكَ يَا اَللہُ يَا اَللہُ يَا اَللہُ 
So, I beseech You, O Allah! O Allah! O Allah!
بِحَقِّ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
In the name of Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad
اَنْ تُصَلِّيَ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
to send blessings upon Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad
وَ اَنْ تَكْشِفَ عَنِّيْ غَمِّيْ وَ هَمِّي وَ كَرْبِي 
and to relieve my distress, grief, and agony
فِي مَقَامِي هٰذَا 
in this situation of mine
كَمَا كَشَفْتَ عَنْ نَبِيِّكَ هَمَّهٗ وَ غَمَّهٗ وَ كَرْبَهٗ 
in the same way as You have relieved the distress, grief, and agony of Your Prophet
وَ كَفَيْتَهٗ هَوْلَ عَدُوِّهٖ 
and saved him from the horrors of his enemy.
فَاكْشِفْ عَنِّي كَمَا كَشَفْتَ عَنْهُ 
So, (please) relieve me in the same way as You did to him,
وَ فَرِّجْ عَنِّي كَمَا فَرَّجْتَ عَنْهُ 
dispel my worries in the same way as You did to him,
وَ اكْفِنِي كَمَا كَفَيْتَهٗ 
save me in the same way as You did to him,
وَ اصْرِفْ عَنِّي هَوْلَ مَا اَخَافُ هَوْلَهٗ 
drive away from me the horror of what I anticipate to horrify me,
وَ مَؤُوْنَةَ مَا اَخَافُ مَؤُوْنَتَهٗ 
the encumbrance of what I anticipate to overburden me,
وَ هَمَّ مَا اَخَافُ هَمَّهٗ 
and the distress of what I anticipate to distress me
بِلَا مَؤُنَةٍ عَلَى نَفْسِيْ مِنْ ذٰلِكَ 
without making me suffer any encumbrance due to all that.
وَ اصْرِفْنِيْ بِقَضَاءِ حَوَائِجِيْ 
And make me leave having all my requests granted
وَ كِفَايَةِ مَا اَهَمَّنِيْ هَمُّهٗ 
and having all my distresses relieved,
مِنْ اَمْرِ آخِرَتِي وَ دُنْيَايَ 
including the affairs of this world and the Hereafter.
يَا اَمِيرَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ 
O Commander of the Faithful!
وَ یَا اَبَا عَبْدِ اللہِ 
O Aba-Abdillah!
عَلَيْكُمَا مِنِّي سَلَامُ اللہِ اَبَدًا 
Peace of Allah be upon you both from me forever
مَّا بَقِيْتُ وَ بَقِيَ اللَّيْلُ وَ النَّهَارُ 
as long as I am existent and as long as there are day and night.
وَ لَا جَعَلَهُ اللہُ آخِرَ الْعَهْدِ مِنْ زِيَارَتِكُمَا 
May Allah not decide this time of my visit to you both to be the last.
وَ لَا فَرَّقَ اللہُ بَيْنِي وَ بَيْنَكُمَا 
May Allah never separate me from you both.
اَللّٰهُمَّ اَحْيِنِيْ حَيَاةَ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ ذُرِّيَّتِهٖ 
O Allah, (please) make me live the same lifestyle that Mu¦ammad and his offspring lived,
وَ اَمِتْنِي مَمَاتَهُمْ 
make me die on the same faith on which they died,
وَ تَوَفَّنِيْ عَلٰى مِلَّتِهِمْ 
receive my soul while I am following their religion,
وَ احْشُرْنِيْ فِيْ زُمْرَتِهِمْ 
include me with their group,
وَ لَا تُفَرِّقْ بَيْنِيْ وَ بَيْنَهُمْ 
and never separate me from them
طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ اَبَدًا 
not for even a winking of any eye
فِي الدُّنْيَا وَ الْآخِرَةِ 
in this world and in the Hereafter.
يَا اَمِيرَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ 
O Commander of the Faithful!
وَ يَا اَبَا عَبْدِ اللہِ 
O Aba Abdillah!
اَتَيْتُكُمَا زَائِرًا 
I have come to you both to visit you,
وَ مُتَوَسِّلًا اِلَى اللہِ رَبِّي وَ رَبِّكُمَا 
making both of you to be my means to Allah your and my Lord,
مُتَوَجِّهًا اِلَيْهِ بِكُمَا 
turning my face to Him in your names,
وَ مُسْتَشْفِعًا بِكُمَا اِلَى اللہِ فِيْ حَاجَتِيْ هٰذِهٖ 
and seeking your intercession for me with Allah All-exalted to grant me this request of mine;
فَاشْفَعَا لِيْ 
so, intercede for me,
فَاِنَّ لَكُمَا عِنْدَ اللہِ الْمَقَامَ الْمَحْمُوْدَ 
since you both enjoy with Allah a praiseworthy position,
وَ الْجَاهَ الْوَجِيْهَ 
an admissible status,
وَ الْمَنْزِلَ الرَّفِيعَ وَ الْوَسِيلَةَ 
a lofty standing, and a means (of nearness to Him).
اِنِّي اَنْقَلِبُ عَنْكُمَا 
I will now leave you both,
مُنْتَظِرًا لِتَنَجُّزِ الْحَاجَةِ 
expecting my request to be granted,
وَ قَضَائِهَا وَ نَجَاحِهَا مِنَ اللہِ 
settled, and made successful by Allah
بِشَفَاعَتِكُمَا لِيْ اِلَى اللہِ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ 
on account of your intercession for me with Allah in that;
فَلَا اَخِيْبُ 
so, do not let me down
وَ لَا يَكُوْنُ مُنْقَلَبِيْ مُنْقَلَبًا خَائِبًا خَاسِرًا 
and do not make me leave with disappointment and loss;
بَلْ يَكُوْنُ مُنْقَلَبِيْ رَاجِحًا 
rather, make me leave with achievement,
مُفْلِحًا مُنْجِحًا مُسْتَجَابًا 
prosperity, success, and response (of my prayers)
بِقَضَاءِ جَمِيعِ حَوَائِجِيْ 
by having all my requests granted.
وَ تَشْفَعَا لِيْ اِلَى اللہِ 
And (please) intercede for me with Allah recurrently.
اِنْقَلَبْتُ عَلٰى مَا شَاءَ اللہُ 
I now leave on ‘whatever is willed by Allah shall come to pass’
وَ لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّةَ اِلَّا بِاللہِ 
and ‘there is neither might nor power except with Allah’,
مُفَوِّضًا اَمْرِيْ اِلَى اللہِ 
relegating all my affairs to Allah,
مُلْجِئًا ظَهْرِي اِلَى اللہِ 
referring all my power to Allah,
مُتَوَكِّلًا عَلَى اللہِ 
depending upon Allah,
وَ اَقُولُ حَسْبِيَ اللہُ وَ كَفٰى 
and repeating, ‘Allah is only sufficient to me,’
سَمِعَ اللہُ لِمَنْ دَعَا 
and ‘May Allah respond to him who prays Him.’
لَيْسَ لِي وَرَاءَ اللہِ 
Other than Allah
وَ وَرَائَكُمْ يَا سَادَتِي مُنْتَهًى 
and other than you all, O my masters, I have nothing to put my hope in.
مَا شَاءَ رَبِّيْ كَانَ 
Only that which my Lord wills shall come to pass,
وَ مَا لَمْ يَشَأْ لَمْ يَكُنْ 
and whatever He does not will shall never be.
وَ لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّةَ اِلَّا بِاللہِ 
There is neither might nor power except with Allah.
اَسْتَوْدِعُكُمَا اللهَ 
I entrust you both with Allah.
وَ لَا جَعَلَهُ اللہُ آخِرَ الْعَهْدِ مِنِّي اِلَيْكُمَا 
May Allah never decide this time of my visit to you both to be the last.
انْصَرَفْتُ يَا سَيِّدِي يَا اَمِيرَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَ مَوْلَايَ 
May I now leave, O my master, O Commander of the faithful
وَ اَنْتَ يَا اَبَا عَبْدِ اللہِ يَا سَيِّدِيْ 
and you O Abu Abdullih, O my master.
وَ سَلَامِيْ عَلَيْكُمَا مُتَّصِلٌ 
My greetings to you both are as continuous
مَا اتَّصَلَ اللَّيْلُ وَ النَّهَارُ 
as night and day.
وَاصِلٌ ذٰلِكَ اِلَيْكُمَا 
May my greetings reach you both (all the time)
غَيْرُ مَحْجُوْبٍ عَنْكُمَاسَلَامِيْ  اِنْ شَاءَ اللہُ 
and my salutation never be screened from reaching you both, Allah willing.
وَ اَسْاَلُهٗ بِحَقِّكُمَا اَنْ يَشَاءَ ذٰلِكَ وَ يَفْعَلَ 
I also beseech Him in your names to determine and do that,
فَاِنَّهٗ حَمِيْدٌ مَجِيْدٌ 
for He is verily the owner of praise and the owner of glory.
انْقَلَبْتُ يَا سَيِّدِيْ عَنْكُمَا 
I am now leaving you both, O my masters,
تَائِبًا حَامِدًا لِلهِ 
repenting to and praising Allah,
شَاكِرًا رَاجِيًا لِلْاِجَابَةِ 
and thanking Him and hoping Him to respond to me;
غَيْرَ آيِسٍ وَ لَا قَانِطٍ 
I neither despair nor lose hope,
آئِبًا عَائِدًا رَاجِعًا اِلٰى زِيَارَتِكُمَا 
and I intend to come back, return, revisit you both,
غَيْرَ رَاغِبٍ عَنْكُمَا وَ لَا عَنْ زِيَارَتِكُمَا 
while I have never desired to leave you or to abandon visiting you;
بَلْ رَاجِعٌ عَائِدٌ اِنْ شَاءَ اللہُ 
rather, I shall return and come back, if Allah wills.
وَ لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّةَ اِلَّا بِاللہِ 
There is neither might nor power except with Allah.
يَا سَادَتِي رَغِبْتُ اِلَيْكُمَا وَ اِلٰى زِيَارَتِكُمَا 
O my masters, I do desire for both of you and for visiting you
بَعْدَ اَنْ زَهِدَ فِيْكُمَا وَ فِي زِيَارَتِكُمَا اَهْلُ الدُّنْيَا 
although the people of this world (may) abandon you both or abandon visiting you.
فَلَا خَيَّبَنِيَ اللہُ مِمَّا رَجَوْتُ وَ مَا اَمَّلْتُ فِي زِيَارَتِكُمَا 
May Allah never make me fail to attain what I have hoped and desired in visiting you both.
اِنَّهٗ قَرِيبٌ مُجِيبٌ.
Verily, He is All-nigh, All-responding.

E11.Title: Dua Yastasheer
E11.Data:
According to books Minhaj-un-Da’vaat and Misbah it is narrated by Hazrat Ameerul Momineen (a.s.) who said: Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) taught me this Dua and told me to recite it in the time of prosperity as well as adversity. He also told me that I should teach it to my successor and recite regularly until I go before God. He also told me that I should recite this Dua every morning and evening because this Dua is one of the treasure from the treasures of divine knowledge.
Abi Bine Ka’ab once requested the Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) to describe the excellence of this Dua The Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) said: ‘This Dua is so excellent that even a learned man cannot describe it, but I shall narrate something about it. Whenever anyone beings to recite this Dua heavenly mercy and blessings descend upon him. God bestows upon him peace and divine mercy surrounds him. The destination of this Dua is only Divine Throne. The sound of this Dua encircles the Divine Throne with a humming sound like that of the bees and God looks upon the reciter with mercy. He who recites this Dua three times shall (Insha Allah) get his any worldly or hereafter wish fulfilled. God will free him from the punishment of the grave and remove the narrowness of his mind. He will come on the day of resurrection riding a white pearly dromedary. He will stand before God and the Lord will confer on him great honour and respect and order him to stay in paradise wherever he likes. In paradise he will be given such miraculous gifts which nobody has seen, heard or imagined.’
Hearing this Janab Salmane Farsi (r.a.) requested to describe still more. The Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) continued: ‘By God! Who has conferred on me prophethood, if this Dua is recited on a mad person, his insanity will go. If a pregnant woman feels extreme difficulty during delivery, this Dua should be recited before her and the child will be born with ease. O Salman! By Him Who sent me rightfully, if anybody recites this Dua for forty Friday nights with intention to please God, his every sin will be forgiven. If anybody recites this Dua with a clean mind his worldly sorrows and internal sicknesses shall be removed and he shall recover, O Salman! If anybody recites this Dua and goes to sleep hoping for a divine reward. God will send one thousand most respected angels whose faces are brighter than the sun and the moon for every word of this Dua, to pray for the reciter.
Janab Salman said: ‘O Hazrat is there so much divine reward for this Dua?’ The Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) replied, ‘O Salman please don’t propagate the Divine reward of this Dua among ordinary people.’ Janab Salman (r.a.) asked: ‘O Holy one why do you command it to be concealed?’ The Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) replied: ‘O Salman! I fear that people will depend wholly upon this Dua and give up other forms of prayer. He then concluded saying that if anybody recites this Dua and dies on the very night or day he shall get the reward of a martyr. The Lord shall pardon all his sins even if he has not repented for them.’
It has been narrated by Sayyed Ibne Ta’oos (a.r.) in book named Mahjid Davaat from Hazrat Ameerul Momineen (a.s.) that Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) taught this Dua to him for removal of all troubles and worries. This Dua is recommended to be recited with ablution and may be recited every morning and evening. It is the one of the treasures of Arsh of Almighty God. Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) when requested to define the merits of this Dua. It was told by him that the merits of this Dua are many and can be seen in the above noted book.
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِیْ لاَ اِلٰہَ اِلاَّ ہُوَ الْمَلِکُ الْحَقُّ الْمُبِیْنُ 
ALHAMDO LILLAAHIL LAZEE LAA ELAAHA ILLAA HOWAL MALEKUL HAQQUL MOBEENUL 
All praise is due to Allah. There is no deity but He (who is) the Real King, the Just and Evident. 
الْمُدَبِّرُ بِلاَ وَزِیْرٍ وَّ لاَ خَلْقٍ مِّنْ عِبَادِہٖ یَسْتَشِیْرُ 
MODABBERO BELAA WAZEERINW WA LAA KHALQIM MIN E’BBADEHI YASTASHEERUL 
He is the Administrator of (all the worlds) without any Minister; and without consults not any of his slaves. 
الْاَوَّلُ غَیْرُ مَوْصُوْفٍ وَّالْبَاقِیْ بَعْدَ فَنَآءِ الْخَلْقِ الْعَظِیْمُ 
AWWALO GHAYRO MAWSOOFIN WAL BAAQEE BA’DA FANAAA-IL KHALQIL A’ZEEMUR 
He is the First, who cannot be described. He is Eternal and will continue to live (even) after the annihilation of all the creatures. He is the Greatest Cherisher 
الرُّبُوْبِیَّۃِ نُوْرُ السَّمٰوَتِ وَ الْاَرَضِیْنَ وَ فَاطِرُہُمَا 
ROBOOBIYYATE NOORUS SAMAAWAATE WAL ARAZEENA WA FAATEROHOMAA 
and Sustainer and the Light of the earths and heavens and their Creator 
وَ مُبْتَدِعُہُمَا بِغَیْرِ عَمَدٍ خَلَقَہُمَا وَ فَتَقَہُمَا فَتْقًا 
WA MUBTADE-O’HOMAA BE GHAYRE A’MADIN KHALAQAHOMAA WA FATAQAHOMAA FATQAN 
and Marker out of nothing. He created both of them and ripped them (from each other) a proper ripping. 
فَقَامَتِ السَّمٰوٰتُ طَائِعَاتٍ بِاَمْرِہٖ وَاسْتَقَرَّتِ الْاَرْضُوْنَ 
FA QAAMATIS SAMAAWAATO TAAA-E-A’ATIN BE AMREHI WAS-TAQARRATIL ARAZOONA 
The heavens became stable in obedience to his commandment and the earths became fixed on the surface of water 
بِاَوْتَادِہَا فَوْقَ الْمَآءِ ثُمَّ عَلاَ رَبُّنَا فِیْ السَّمٰوٰتِ الْعُلٰی 
BE AWTAADEHA FAWQAL MAAA-E SUMMA A’LAA RABBONAA FIS SAMAAWAATIL O’LAA
with their pegs. Then our Lord, the All-Merciful, subdued the high heavens 
اَلرَّحْمٰنُ عَلَی الْعَرْشِ اسْتَوٰی لَہٗ مَا فِی السَّمٰوَتِ وَمَا فِی الْاَرْضِ 
RAHMAANO A’LAL ARSHIS-TAWAA LAHU MAA FIS SAMAAWAATE WA MAA FIL ARZE 
and ruled from Arsh (the supreme throne in heavens). Every thing that is in heavens and in the earth 
وَ مَا بَیْنَہُمَا وَ مَا تَحْتَ الثَّرٰی فَاَنَا اَشْہَدُ بِاَنَّکَ 
WA MAA BAYNAHOMAA WA MAA TAHTAS SARAA FA-ANAA ASH-HADO BE-ANNAKA 
and in between them and what is below the earth belongs to him. So, I bear witness that verily 
اَنْتَ اللهُ لَا رَافِعَ لِمَا وَضَعَتْ وَ لاَ وَاضِعَ لِمَا رَفَعْتَ 
ANTALLAAHO LAA RAA-FE-A’ LEMAA WAZA’TA WA LAA WAAZE-A’ LEMAA RAFA’TA 
Thou art Allah (the only Deity). There is none to elevate what Thou hath lowered and none to lower that Thou hath elevated 
وَ لاَ مُعِزَّ لِمَنْ اَذْلَلْتَ وَ لاَ مُذِلَّ لِمَنْ اَعْزَزْتَ 
WA LAA MO-I’ZZA LEMAN AZLALTA WALAA MOZILLA LEMAN A-A’ZAZTA 
and no one to exalt him whom Thou leaveth in disgrace and no one to bring him into disgrace whom Thou exalteth 
وَ لاَ مَانِعَ لِمَنْ اَعْطَیْتَ وَ لاَ مُعْطِیَ لِمَا مَنَعْتَ 
WALAA MAANE-A’ LEMAN A-A’TAYTA WA LAA MO’TEYA LEMAA MANA’TA 
and no one to prevent him upon whom Thou bestoweth (Thou favour) and no one to bestow any thing which Thou hath withheld. 
وَ اَنْتَ اللهُ لاَ اِلٰہَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ کُنْتَ اِذْ لَمْ تَکُنْ سَمَآءٌ مَبْنِیَّۃٌ 
WA ANTALLAAHO LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTA KUNTA IZ LAM TAKUN SAMAAA-UM MABNIYYATUN 
Thou art Allah, there is no deity but Thou, existed when there was neither the stable sky 
وَّلاَ اَرْضٌ مَدْحِیَّۃٌ وَّلاَ شَمْسٌ مُضِیْٓئَۃٌ وَّلاَ لَیْلٌ مُظْلِمٌ 
WA LAA ARZUM MADHIYYATUN WALAA SHAMSUM MOZEE-ATUN WA LAA LAYLUM MUZLEMUN 
nor the (widely) spread up earth, nor the brilliant sun, nor the dark night, 
وَّلاَ نَہَارٌ مُضِیْئٌ وَّلاَ بَحْرٌ لُجِّیٌّ وَّلاَ جَبَلٌ رَاسٍ وَّلاَ نَجْمٌ سَارٍ 
WA LAA NAHAARUN MO-ZEEE-UN WA LAA BAHRUN LUJJIYUN WA LAA JAMALUN RAASIN WA LAA NAJMUN SAARIN 
nor the bright day, nor the vast and stormy sea, nor any sublime and stable mountain, nor any revolving planet 
وَّلاَ قَمَرٌ مُنِیْرٌ وَّلاَ رِیْحٌ تَہُبُّ وَلاَ سَحَابٌ یَسْکُبُ وَلاَ بَرْقٌ یَلْمَعُ 
WA LAA QAMARUM MONEERUN WA LAA REEHUN TAHUBBO WA LAA SAHAABUYN YASKOMO WA LAA BARQUN YALMA-O’
nor the luminous moon nor any blowing wind nor any raining cloud, nor flashing lightning, 
وَلاَ رَعْدٌ یُسَبِّحُ وَلاَ رُوْحٌ تَنَفَّسُ وَ لاَ طَآءِرٌ یَطِیْرُ 
WA LAA RA’DUN YOSABBEHO WA LAA ROOHUN TANAFFASO WA LAA TAAA-ERUN YATEERO 
nor any praising thunder, nor any breathing soul, nor any flying bird, 
وَلاَ نَارٌ تَتَوَقَّدُ وَلاَ مَآءٌ یَطَّرِدُ کُنْتَ قَبْلَ کُلِّ شَیْءٍ وَّ کَوَّنْتَ کُلَّ شَیْءٍ 
WA LAA NAARUN TATAWAQQADO WA LAA MAAA-UN YATTAREDO KUNTA QABLA KULLE SHAYIN 
nor any blazing fire, nor any flowing water. Thou existed before the existence of every thing 
وَّ قَدَرْتَ عَلٰی کُلِّ شَیءٍ وَّ ابْتَدَعْتَ کُلَّ شَیْءٍ وَّ اَغْنَیْتَ 
WA KAWWANTA KULLA SHAYIN WABTADA’TA KULLA SHAYIN WA AGHNAYTA 
and Thou created everything and controlled everything and originated everything. Thou enriched some (people) 
وَ اَفْقَرْتَ وَ اَمَتَّ وَ اَحْیَیْتَ وَ اَضْحَکْتَ وَ اَبْکَیْتَ 
WA AFQARTA WA AMATTA WA AHYAYTA WA AZHAKTA WA ABKAYTA 
and reduced others to poverty, caused to die some (creatures) and brought others to life and made some people laugh and others weep. 
وَ عَلَی الْعَرْشِ اسْتَوَیْتَ فَتَبَارَکْتَ یَا اللهُ وَ تَعَالَیْتَ 
WA A’LAL A’RSHIS TAWAYTA FA TABAARAKTA YAA ALLAAHO WA TA-A’ALAYTA 
Verily Thou ruled from Arsh (the supreme throne in heavens). Thou art of vast blessing O Allah! Thou art Great and Supreme. 
اَنْتَ اللهُ الَّذِیْ لاَ اِلٰہَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ الْخَلاَّقُ الْمُبِیْنُ اَمْرُکَ غَالِبٌ 
ANTALLAAHUL LAZEE LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTAL KHALLAAQUL MO-E’ENO AMROKA GHAALEBUN 
Thou art Allah and there is no deity other than Thee. Thou art the Creator and Supporter. Thy decree is overpowering 
وَ عِلْمُکَ نَافِدٌ وَ کَیْدُکَ غَرِیْبٌ وَّ وَعْدُکَ صَادِقٌ وَّ قَوْلُکَ حَقُّ 
WA I’LMOKA NAAFEZUN WA KAYDOKA GHAREEBUN WA WA’DOKA SAADEQUN WA QAWLOKA HAQQUN 
and Thy knowledge is operative. Thy strategy is wonderful; Thy promise is true; Thy word is right; 
وَّ حُکْمُکَ عَدْلٌ وَکَلٰمُکُ ہُدًی وَ وَحْیُکَ نُوْرٌ وَّ رَحْمَتُکَ وَاسِعَۃٌ 
WA HUKMOKA A’DLUN WA KALAAMOKA HODAN WA WAHYOKA NOORUN WA RAHMATOKA WAASE-A’TUN 
Thy command is just; Thy utterance is right guidance and Thy Vahee (Revelation) is light. Thy mercy is vast and abundant; 
وَّ عَفْوُکَ عَظِیْمٌ وَّ فَضْلُکَ کَثِیْرٌ وَّ عَطَآؤُکَ جَزِیْلٌ وَّ حَبْلُکَ مَتِیْنٌ 
WA A’FWOKA A’ZEEMUN WA FAZLOKA KASEERUN WA A’TAAA-OKA JAZEELUN WA HABLOKA MATEENUN 
Thy forgiveness is superb; Thy grace excessive; Thy gift is most respectable; Thy cord (rope) is strong; 
وَّ اِمْکَانُکَ عَتِیْدٌ وَّ جَارُکَ عَزِیْزٌ وَّ بَاْسُکَ شَدِیْدٌ وَّ مَکْرُکَ مَکِیْدٌ 
WA IMKAANOKA A’TEEDUN WA JAAROKA A’ZEEZUN WA BA-SOKA SHADEEDUN WA MAKROKA MAKEEDUN 
Thy might is ever ready; Thy protégé is powerful; Thy wrath is severe and Thy stratagem is entrapping. 
اَنْتَ یَا رَبِّ مَوْضِعُ کُلِّ شَکْوٰی حَاضِرُ کُلِّ مَلاآءٍ وَّ شَاہِدُ کُلِّ نَجْوٰی 
ANTA YAA RABBE MAW-ZE-O KULLE SHAKWAA HAAZERO KULLE MALAA-IN WA SHAAHEDO KULLE NAJWAA 
O Lord! With Thee are lodged all complaints. Thou art present in all gatherings and art the Witness (possessing first hand Knowledge) of all Secrets 
مُنْتَہٰی کُلِّ حَاجَۃٍ مُفَرِّجُ کُلِّ حُزْنٍ غِنٰی کُلِّ مِسْکِیْنٍ حِصْنُ کُلِّ ہَارِبٍ 
MUNTAHAA KULLE HAAJATIN MOFARREJO KULLE HUZNIN GHENAA KULLE MISKEENIN HISNO KULLE HAAREBIN 
and the ultimate goal of all supplications; the Expeller of all Sorrows; the affluence of every needy person; the stronghold for every refugee; 
اَمَانُ کُلِّ خَآءِفٍ حِرْزُ الضُّعَفَآءِ کَنْزُ الْفُقَرَآءِ مُفَرِّجُ الْغَمَّآءِ مُعِیْنُ الصَّالِحِیْنَ 
AMAANO KULLE KHAAA-EFIN HIRZUZ ZO-A’FAAA-E KANZUL FOQARAAA-E MOFARREJUL GHAMMAAA-E MO-E’ENUS SAALEHEENA 
Security for every terror-Stricken; a shield for the weak; a treasure for the indigent; the Destroyer of Grieves; the helper of the virtuous. 
ذٰلِکَ اللهُ رَبُّنَا لاَ اِلٰہَ اِلاَّ ہُوَ تَکْفِیْ مِنْ عِبَادِکَ مَنْ تَوَکَّلَ عَلَیْکَ 
ZAALEKALLAAHO RABBBONAA LAA ELAAHA ILLAA HOWA TAKFEE MIN 7E’BAADEKA MAN TAWAKKALA A’LAYKA 
Such is Allah, our Lord. There is no deity but He Thou Satisfieth such of Thy slaves as trust unto Thee. 
وَاَنْتَ جَارُ مَنْ لاَذَبِکَ وَ تَضَرَّعَ اِلَیْکَ عِصْمَۃُ مَنِ اعْتَصَمَ بِکَ نَاصِحُ 
WA ANTA JAARO MAN LAAZABEKA WA TAZARRA-A’ ELAYKA I’’SMATO MANE’TASAMA BEKA NAASEHO 
Thou art the Protector of him who is firmly attached to Thee and humiliates himself before Thee; a shield for him who seeks refuge with Thee; 
مَنِ انْتَصَرَ بِکَ تَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوْبَ لِمَنِ اسْتَغْفَرَکَ جَبَّارُ الْجَبَابِرَۃِ 
MANIN TASARA BEKA TAGHFERUZ ZONOOBA LEMANIS TAGHFARAKA JABBAARUL JABAABERATE 
the Helper of him who looks up to Thee for help; the Forgiver of sins for him who begs Thy pardon; the Compeller of the tyrant; the Grandest of the grand; 
عَظِیْمُ الْعُظَمَآءِ کَبِیْرُ الْکُبَرَآءِ سَیِّدُ السَّادَاتِ مَوْلَی الْمَوَالِیْ 
A’ZEEMUL O’ZAMAAA-E KABEERUL KUBRAAA-E SAYYEDUS SAADAATE MAWLAL MAWAALEE 
the Greatest of the great; the Master of masters; the Lord of lords; 
صَرِیْخُ الْمُسْتَصْرِخِیْنَ مُنَفِّسُ عَنِ الْمَکْرُوْبِیْنَ مُجِیْبُ دَعْوَۃِ الْمُضْطَرِّیْنَ
SAREEKHUL MUSTASREKHEENA MONAFFESUN A’NIL MAKROOBEENA MOJEEBO DA’WATIL MUZTARREENA
the Succour of the grieved; Responder to the call of the distressed; 
اَسْمَعُ السَّامِعِیْنَ اَبْصَرُ النَّاظِرِیْنَ اَحْکَمُ الْحَاکِمِیْنَ 
ASMA-U’S SAAME-E’EN ABSARUN NAAZEREEN AHKAMUL HAAKEMEEN 
the Best of all listeners; the Best of all observers; the Best of all Judges; 
اَسْرَعُ الْحَاسِبِیْنَ اَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِیْنَ خَیْرُ الْغَافِرِیْنَ 
ASRA-U’L HAASEBEEN ARHAMUR RAAHEMEEN KHAYRUL GHAAFEREEN 
the Quickest of all reckoners; the Most Merciful of all the merciful; the Best of all forgivers; 
قَاضِیْ حَوَآئِجِ الْمُؤْمِنِیْنَ مُغِیْثُ الصَّالِحِیْنَ 
QAAZEYO HAWAA-EJIL MO-MENEEN MOGHEESUS SAALEHEEN 
the Satisfier of the needs of the faithful and the Hearer of the appeals of the virtuous. 
اَنْتَ اللهُ لاَ اِلٰہَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِیْنَ 
ANTALLAAHO LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTA RABBUL A’ALAMEENA 
Thou art Allah. There is no deity but Thou. Thou art the Cherisher and Sustainer of all the worlds. 
اَنْتَ الْخَالِقُ وَ اَنَا الْمَخْلُوْقُ وَ اَنْتَ الْمَالِکُ وَ اَنَا الْمَمْلُوْکُ 
ANTAL KHAALEQO WA ANAL MAKHLOOQO WA ANTAL MALEKO WA ANAL MAMLOOK 
Thou art the Creator and I am the creature; Thou art the Master and I am a servant; 
وَ اَنْتَ الرَّبُّ وَ اَنَا الْعَبْدُ وَ اَنْتَ الرَّازِقُ وَ اَنَا الْمَرْزُوْقُ 
WA ANTAR RABBO WA ANAL A’BDO WA ANTAR RAAAZEQO WA ANAL MARZOOK 
Thou art the Lord and I am a slave; Thou art the Provider (of the means of livelihood) while I am provided with sustenance (by Thee); 
وَ اَنْتَ الْمُعْطِیْ وَ اَنَا السَّآئِلُ وَ اَنْتَ الْجَوَادُ وَ اَنَا الْبَخِیْلُ 
WA ANTAL MO’TEE WA ANAS SAAA-EL WA ANTAL JAWAADO WA ANAL BAKHEEL 
Thou art the Giver while I am a beggar! Thou art Generous while I am a miser; 
وَ اَنْتَ الْقَوِیُّ وَ اَنَا الضَّعِیْفُ وَ اَنْتَ الْعَزِیْزُ وَ اَنَا الذَّلِیْلُ 
WA ANTAL QAWIYYO WA ANAZ ZA-E’EFO WA ANTAL A’ZEEZO WA ANAZ ZALEEL 
Thou art the Mighty while I am weak; Thou art Noble while I am humble; 
وَ اَنْتَ الْغَنِیُّ وَ اَنَا الْفَقِیْرُ وَ اَنْتَ السَّیِّدُ وَ اَنَا الْعَبْدُ 
WA ANTAL GHANIYYO WA ANAL FAQEER WA ANTAS SAYYEDO WA ANAL A’BD 
Thou art Independent while I am needy; Thou art (my) Master while I am slave; 
وَ اَنْتَ الْغَافِرُ وَ اَنَا الْمُسِیْٓئُ وَ اَنْتَ الْعَالِمُ وَ اَنَا الْجَاہِلُ 
WA ANTAL GHAAFERO WA ANAL MO-SEEE-O WA ANTAL A’ALEMO WA ANAL JAAHEL 
Thou art the Forgiver of sins while I am sinful; Thou art the Omniscient while I am ignorant. 
وَ اَنْتَ الْحَلِیْمُ وَ اَنَا الْعَجُوْلُ وَ اَنْتَ الرَّحْمٰنُ وَ اَنَا الْمَرْحُوْمُ 
WA ANTAL HALEEMO WA ANAL A’ZOOL WA ANTAR RAHMAANO WA ANAL MAHROOM 
Thou art Forbearing while I am hasty; Thou art All-Merciful but I have been treated with mercy! 
وَ اَنْتَ الْمُعَافِیْ وَ اَنَا الْمُبْتَلٰی وَ اَنْتَ الْمُجِیْبُ وَ اَنَا الْمُضْطَرُّ 
WA ANTAL MO-A’AFEE WA ANAL MUBTALAA WA ANTAL MOJEEBO WA ANAL MUZTARRO 
Thou art the Provider of Safety but I am involved in suffering; Thou art the Responder and I am the distressed. 
وَ اَنَا اَشْہَدُ بِاَنَّکَ اَنْتَ اللهُ لاَ اِلٰہَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ اَلْمُعْطِیْ عِبَادَکَ بِلاَ سُؤَالٍ 
WA ANAA ASH-HADO BE ANNAKA ANTALLAAHO LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTAL MO’TEE E’BAADAKA BELAA SO-AAALIN 
And I bear witness that verily Thou art Allah. There is no deity but Thou. Thou bestoweth (favours) upon Thy slaves even without their asking; 
وَ اَشْہَدُ بِاَنَّکَ اَنْتَ اللهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْاَحَدُ الْمُتَفَرِّدُ الصَّمَدُ الْفَرْدُ 
WA ASH-HADO BE ANNAKA ANTALLAAHUL AHADUL MOTAFAR-REDUS SAMADUL FARDO 
and I bear witness that verily Thou art Allah, the One, the Peerless, the Unique, the Independent and the Single 
وَ اِلَیْکَ الْمَصِیْرُ وَ صَلَّی اللهُ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اَہْلِ بَیْتِہِ الطَّیِّبِیْنَ الطَّاہِرِیْنَ 
WA ELAYKAL MASEERO WA SALLALLAAHO A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AHLE BAYTEHIT TAYYEBEENAT TAAHEREENA 
and verily to Thee we must return. Blessings of Allah be upon Mohammad (s.a.w.a.) and his AhleBait (kinsfolk), the holy and pure. 
وَ اغْفِرْلِیْ ذُنُوْبِیْ وَاسْتُرْ عَلَیَّ عُیُوْبِیْ وَ افْتَحْ لِیْ مِنْ لَّدُنْکَ رَحْمَۃً 
WAGH-FIRLEE ZONOOBEE WASTUR A’LAYYA O’YOOBEE WAFTAH LEE MIN LADUNKA RAHMATAN 
And O Lord; forgive my sins and keep my faults concealed and extend to me Thy special mercy 
وَّ رِزْقًا وَّاسِعًا یَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِیْنَ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ رَبِّ الْعٰلَمِیْنَ 
WA RIZQAN WAASE-A’N YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEENA WAL HAMDO LILLAAHE RABBIL A’ALAMEENA 
and bounties of sustenance. O the All-Merciful! All the praise is due to Allah the Cherisher and Sustainer of all the worlds. 
وَحَسْبُنَا اللهُ وَ نِعْمَ الْوَکِیْلُ وَلاَ حَوْلَ وَ لاَ قُوَّۃَ اِلاَّ بِاللهِ الْعَلِیِّ الْعَظَیْمِ.
WA HASBONALLAAHO WA NE’MAL WAKEEL WA LAA HAWLA WALAA QUWWATA ILLAA BILLAHIL A’LIYYIL A’ZEEM.
And for us Allah is sufficient (helper) and the excellent Protector. There is neither might nor power but with Allah, the Great and High.

E12.Title: Dua of Imam Mehdi اَللّٰهُمَّ ادْفَعْ عَنْ وَلِيِّكَ۔۔۔

E14.Title: Hadeese Kisa
E14.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْم
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
عَن جَابِرِ ابْنِ عَبْدِ اللهِ الْاَنْصَارِىْ 
Jabir bin Abdullah Ansari (r.a.) narrates 
عَنْ فَاطِمَةَ الزَّاهْرَاءِ عَلَيْهَا السَّلَامُ 
A’N FAATEMATAZ ZAHRAAE A’LAIHAS SALAAMO 
from Janab-e-Fatemah al-Zahra (a.s.).
بِنْتِ رَسُوْلِ اللهِ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ اٰلِهٖ وَ سلَّمَ 
BINTE RASOOLIL LAAHE SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI WA SALLAMA 
the daughter of the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w.a.) is to have thus related:
قَالَ سَمِعْتُ فَاطِمَةَ اَنَّهَا قَالَتْ 
QAALA SAME'TO FAATEMATA ANNAHAA QAALAT
He (Jabir) said: I heard from Fatemah (s.a.) that she stated that
دَخَلَ عَلَىَّ اَبِىْ رَسُوْلُ اللهِ فِىْ بَعْضِ الْاَيَّامِ 
DAKHALA A’LAIYYA ABI RASOOLUL LAAHE FEE BA’ZIL AYYAAME.
one day, my father the Messenger of Allah came to me, 
فَقَالَ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكِ يَا فَاطِمَةُ 
FA QAALA ASSALAMO A’LAIKE YAA FATEMATO,
and said, ‘Peace be upon you, O Fatemah (s.a.)!’
فَقُلْتُ عَلَيْكَ السَّلَامُ 
FA-QULTO A’LAIKAS SALAAMO, 
So I said: ‘Peace be upon you also.’
قَالَ اِنِّىْٓ اَجِدُ فِىْ بَدَنِىْ ضُعْفًا 
QAALA INNEE AJEDO FEE BADANee ZO’FAN.
He said: ‘I am feeling weakness in my body.’
فَقُلْتُ لَهٗ اُعِيْذُكَ بِاللهِ يَآ اَبَتَاهُ مِنَ الضُّعْفِ 
FA-QULTO LAHU OE’EZOKA BIL-LAAHE YAA ABATAAHO MENAZ ZO’FE.
Then I said to him: ‘I seek refuge for you O father in Allah from weakness.’
فَقَالَ يَا فَاطِمَةُ اِيْتِيْنِىْ بِالْكِسَآءِ الْيَمَانِىْ فَغَطِّيْنِى بِهٖ
FA-QAALA YAA FATEMATO EETEENEE BILKESAAA-IL YAMAANEE FA-GHATTEENI BEHI.
Thus he said: ‘O Fatimah (a.s.) bring me Yemeni shawl and cover me with it.’
فَاَتَيْتُهٗ بِهٖ وَصِرْتُ اَنْظُرُ اِلَيْهِ وَ اِذَا وَجْهُهٗ
FA ATAYTOHU BEHI WA SIRTO ANZORO ELAYHE WA EZAA WAJH-HOHU
So I brought it and covered him with it. I looked at him his face 
يَتَلَالَؤُ كَاَنَّهُ الْبَدْرُ فِىْ لَيْلَةِ تَمَامِهٖ وَ كَمَالِهٖ. 
YATALA’LAO KA-ANNAHUL BADRO FEE LAYLATE TAMAAMEHI WA KAMAALEHI.
which was glittering like a moon at the night of its fullness and perfection.
فَمَا كَانَتْ اِلَّا سَاعَةً وَّ اِذَا بِوَلَدِىَ الْحَسَنِ قَدْ اَقْبَلَ 
FAMA KAANAT ILLAA SAA-A’TANW WA EZA BE WALADEYAL HASANE QAD AQBALA 
No more than a while passed when my son Hasan (a.s.) came in, 
وَ قَالَ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكِ يَآ اُمَّاهُ 
WA QAALA ASSALAAMO A'LAYKE YAA UMMAAHO.
and said: ‘Peace be upon you, O mother!’
فَقُلْتُ وَ عَلَيْكَ السَّلَامُ يَا قُرَّةَ عَيْنِىْ وَ ثَمَرَةَ فُؤَادِىْ 
FA-QULTO WA A'LAYKAS SALAAMO YA QURRATA A’YNI WA SAMARATA FOAADI 
I said: ‘Peace be upon you, too, O delight of my eye and fruit of my heart!’ 
فَقَالَ يَا اُمَّاهُ اِنِّىْٓ اَشُمُّ عِنْدَكِ رَآئِحَةً طَيِّبَةً 
FA-QAALA YAA UMMAAHO INNEE ASHUMMO I’NDAKE RAAA-EHATAN TAYYEBATAN 
He (Hasan [a.s.]) said: ‘O mother! I can smell a pure fragrance from you
كَاَنَّهَا رَآئِحَةُ جَدِّىْ رَسُوْلِ اللهِ 
KA-AN-NAHAA RAAA-EHATO JADDEE RASOOLIL LAAHE.
as the fragrance of my grandfather the Messenger of Allah.’
فَقُلْتُ نَعَمْ اِنَّ جَدَّكَ تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ 
FAQULTO NA-A’M INNA JADDAKA TAHTAL KESAAAE.
I said: ‘Yes, your grandfather is under the cloak.’
فَاَقْبَلَ الْحَسَنُ  نَحْوَ الْكِسَآءِ 
FA-AQBALAL HASANO NAHWAL KESAAA-E
Hasan (a.s.) moved towards the cloak 
وَ قَالَ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا جَدَّاهُ يَا رَسُوْلَ اللهِ 
WA QAALA ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YA JADDAAHO YAA RASOOLAL LAAHE 
and said, ‘Peace be upon you, O grandfather, O Messenger of Allah.
اَتَاْذَنُ لِىْ اَنْ اَدْخُلَ مَعَكَ تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ 
ATA’ZANO LEE A’N ADKHOLA MA-A’KA TAHTAL KESAAA-E.
Will you allow me to be with you under the cloak?’
فَقَالَ وَ عَلَيكَ السَّلَامُ يَا وَلَدِىْ 
FA QAALA “WA A’LAYKAS SALAAMO YAA WALADEE
Then he (Holy Prophet [s.a.w.a.]) said: ‘Peace be upon you too, my son 
وَ يَا صَاحِبَ حَوْضِىْ قَدْ اَذِنْتُ لَكَ 
WA YAA SAAHEBA HAUZI QAD AZINTO LAKA.
and O the owner of my Pond (Hauz-e-Kausar). I permit you.’
فَدَخَلَ مَعَهٗ تَحَتَ الِكِسَآءِ. 
FA DAKHALA MA-A’HU TAHTAL KESAAA-E.
So he (Hasan [a.s.]) entered under the cloak with him.
فَمَا كَانَتْ اِلَّا سَاعَةً وَّ اِذَا بِوَلَدِىَ الْحُسَيْنِ  قَدْ اَقْبَلَ 
FAMAA KAANAT ILLAA SAA-A’TAWN WA EZAA BE WALADEYAL HUSAYNE QAD AQBALA 
No more than a while passed when my son Husain (a.s.) came
وَ قَالَ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكِ يَآ اُمَّاهُ 
WA QAALA: “ASSALAAMO A’LAYKE YAA UMMAAHO”.
and said: ‘Peace be upon you, O mother!’
فَقُلْتُ وَ عَلَيْكَ السَّلَامُ يَا وَلَدِىْ 
FA-QULTO: “WA A'LAYKAS SALAAMO YAA WALADEE 
I said: ‘Peace be upon you also O my son
وَ يَا قُرَّةَ عَيْنِىْ وَ ثَمَرةَ فُؤَادِىْ 
WA YAA QURRATA A’YNI WA SAMARATA FOAADEE”.
O delight of my eye and fruit of my heart!’
فَقَالَ لِىْ يَآ اُمَّاهُ اِنِّىْٓ اَشُمُّ عِنْدَكِ رَآئِحَةً طَيِّبَةً 
FA-QAALA LEE “YAA UMMAAHO INNEE ASHUMMO I’NDAKE RAA-EHATAN TAYYEBATAN 
He said: ‘O mother! I can smell a pure fragrance from you
كَاَنَّهَا رَآئِحَةُ جَدِّىْ رسُوْلِ اللهِ  
KA-ANNAHAA RAAEHATO JADDEE RASOOLIL LAAHE”.
as the fragrance of my grandfather the Messenger of Allah.’
فَقُلْتُ نَعَمْ اِنَّ جَدَّكَ وَ اَخَاكَ تَحْتَ الْكِسَاءِ 
FA-QULTO: NA-A’M INNA JADDAKA WA AKHAAKA TAHTAL KESAAA-E”.
So I said: ‘Yes, your grandfather and your brother are under the cloak.’
فَدَنَى الْحُسَيْنُ نَحْوَ الْكِسَاءِ 
FADANAL HUSAYNO NAHWAL KESAAA-E 
Husain (a.s.) went towards the cloak 
وَ قَالَ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا جَدَّاهُ 
WA QAALA “ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA JADDAAHO 
and he said, ‘Peace be upon you, O grandfather, 
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا مَنِ اخْتَارَهُ اللهُ 
ASSALAAMO ALAYKA YAA MANIKHTAARAHUL LAAHO 
Peace be upon you, O chosen of Allah
اَتَاْذَنُ لِىْٓ اَنْ اَكُوْنَ مَعْكُمَا تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ؟ 
ATAAZANO-LEE A’N ADKHOLA MA-A’KOMA TAHTAL KESAAE?
Will you allow me to be with both of you under the cloak?’
فَقَالَ عَلَيْكَ السَّلَامُ يَا وَلَدِىْ 
FA QAALA A'LAYKAS SALAAMO YAA WALADEE
He said, ‘Peace be upon you too, O my son 
وَ يَا شَافِعَ اُمَّتِىْ قَدْ اَذِنْتُ لَكَ 
WA YAA SHAAFEA UMMATEE QAD AZINTO LAKA
And O the interceder of my ummah. Surely I allow you.’
فَدَخَلَ مَعَهُمَا تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ. 
FA-DAKHALA MA-A’HOMA TAHTAL KESAAAE.
so he (Husain [a.s.]) entered with both of them under the cloak.
فَاَقْبَلَ عِنْدَ ذٰلِكَ اَبُو الْـحَسَنِ 
FA-AQBALA I’NDA ZAALEKA ABUL HASANE 
Just then Abul Hasan (Ali [a.s.]) came,
عَلِىُّ بْنُ اَبِيْ طَالِبٍ وَ قَالَ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكِ 
A’LIYYUBNO ABEE TAALEBIN WA QAALA: “ASSALAAMO A’LAYKE 
Ali ibn Abi Talib (a.s.) said: ‘Peace be upon you, 
يَا بِنْتَ رَسُوْلِ اللهِ 
YAA BINTE RASOOLIL LAAHE”.
O daughter of the Messenger of Allah’.
فَقُلْتُ وَ عَلَيْكَ السَّلَامُ يَآ اَبَا الْحَسَنِ 
FA-QULTO “WA A’LAYKAS SALAAMO YAA ABAL HASANE 
I replied: ‘Peace be upon you also, O Abul Hasan 
وَ يَآ اَمِيْرَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ 
WA YAA AMEERAL MOMENEEN”.
and O Commander of the Faithful.’
فَقَالَ يَا فَاطِمَةُ اِنِّىْ اَشُمُّ عِنْدَكِ رَآئِحَةً طَيِّبَةً 
FA-QAALA “YAA FAATEMATO, INNI ASHUMMO I’NDAKE RAAEHATAN TAYYEBATAN 
He then said, ‘O Fatemah (s.a.)! I can smell a pure fragrance from you 
كَاَنَّهَا رَائِـحَةُ اَخِىْ وَ ابْنِ عَمِّىْ رَسُوْلِ اللهِ 
KA ANNAHAA RAAEHATO AKHEE WABNE AMMI RASOOLIL LAAHE”.
like that of my brother and cousin the Messenger of Allah.’
فَقُلْتُ نَعَمْ هَا هُوَ مَعَ وَلَدَيْكَ تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ 
FA-QULTO “NA-A’M HAA HOWA MA-A’ WALADAYKA TAHTAL KESAAA-E”, 
I said, ‘Yes, he is under the cloak with your two sons.’
فَاَقْبَلَ عَلِىٌّ نَحْوَ الْكِسَآءِ 
FA-AQBALA A’LIYYUN NAHWAL KESAAE, 
So Ali (a.s.) went towards the cloak 
وَ قَالَ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا رَسُوْلَ اللهِ 
WA QAALA “ASSALAAMO ALAYKA YAA RASOOLAL LAAHE, 
and said, ‘Peace be upon you, O Messenger of Allah! 
اَتَاْذَنُ لِىْ اَنْ اَكُوْنَ مَعَكُمْ تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ؟
ATA’ZANO LEE A’N AKOONA MA-A’KUM TAHTAL KESAAA-E?”
May I be with you (all) under the cloak?’
قَالَ لَهٗ وَ عَلَيْكَ السَّلَامُ يَآ اَخِىْ يَآ وَصِيِّىْ 
QAALA LAHU “WA ALAYKAS SALAAMO YAA AKHEE, WA YAA WASIYYEE 
He (Holy Prophet [s.a.w.a.]) replied, ‘Peace be upon you too, O my brother, my legatee, 
وَ خَلِيْفَتِىْ وَ صَاحِبَ لِوَآئِىْ قَدْ اَذِنْتُ لَكَ 
WA KHALIFATEE WA SAAHEBA LEWAAA-EE QAD AZINTO LAKA” 
my successor and my standard bearer, you are permitted.’
فَدَخَلَ عَلِىٌّ تَحَتَ الْكِسَآءِ. 
FA-DAKHALA A’LIYYUN TAHTAL KESAAA-E. 
So Ali (a.s.) entered the cloak.
ثُمَّ اَتَيْتُ نَحْوَ الْكِسَآءِ 
SUMMA ATAYTO NAHWAL KESAAA-E 
Then I (Fatemah [s.a.]) came towards the cloak 
وَ قُلْتُ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَآ اَبَتَاهُ يَا رَسُوْلَ اللهِ 
WA QULTO “ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA ABATAAHO, YAA RASOOLAL LAAHE 
and said, ‘Peace be upon you O father, O Messenger of Allah. 
اَتَأْذَنُ لِىْ اَنْ اَكُوْنَ مَعَكُمْ تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ؟
ATA’ ZANO LEE A’N AKOONA MA-A’KUM TAHTAL KESAAA-E?”
Am I allowed to be with you under the cloak?’
وَ قَالَ وَ عَلَيْكِ السَّلَامُ يَا بِنْتِىْ 
WA QAALA “WA A’LAYKIS SALAAMO YAA BINTEE 
He replied, ‘Peace be upon you also, O my daughter 
وَ يَا بِضْعَتِىْ قَدْ اَذِنْتُ لَكِ 
WA YAA BAZ-A’TEE QAD AZINTO LAKE”
and O my part, you are allowed.’
فَدَخْلتُ تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ. 
FA-DAKHALTO TAHTAL KESAAA-E.
So I entered the cloak.
فَلَمَّا اكْتَمَلْنَا جَمِيْعًا تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ 
FA-LAMMAK TAMALNAA JAMEE-A’N TAHTAL KESAAA-E 
When we (Panjatan Paak) all gathered under the cloak, 
اَخَذَ اَبِىْ رَسُوْلُ اللهِ بِطَرَفَىِ الْكِسَآءِ 
AKHAZA ABEE RASOOLIL LAAHE BE TARAFAYIL KESAAA-E, 
my father, the Messenger of Allah, held the two ends of the cloak 
وَ اَوْمَئَ بِيَدِهِ الْيُمْنٰى اِلَى السَّمَآءِ وَ قَالَ 
WA AWMA-A BE-YADEHIL YUMNA ELAS SAMAAE WA QAALA: 
and raised his right hand towards the heavens and said:
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنَّ هٰؤُلَآءِ اَهْلُ بَيْتِىْ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNA HAAAOOLAAE AHLO BAYTEE, 
O Allah, these are the people of my household (Ahle Bayt). 
وَ خَاصَّتِىْ وَ حَآمَّتِىْ 
WA KHAASSATEE, WA HAAMMATEE 
and my confidants and my supporters.
لَحْمُهُمْ لَحْمِىْ وَ دَمُهُمْ دَمِىْ 
LAHMOHUM LAHMI, WA DAMOHUM DAMEE
Their flesh is my flesh and their blood is my blood.
يُؤْلِمُنِىْ مَا يُؤْلِمُهُمْ وَ يَحْزُنُنِىْ مَا يَحْزُنُهُمْ 
YO’LEMONI MAA YO’LEMOHUM WA YAHZONONI MAA YAHZONOHUM, 
Whoever hurts them hurts me, whoever grieves them grieves me.
اَنَا حَرْبٌ لِّمَنْ حَارَبَهُمْ 
ANAA HARBUN LEMAN HAARABAHUM 
I am at war with those who wages war with them.
وَ سِلْمٌ لِّمَنْ سَالَمَهُمْ 
WA SILMUN LEMAN SAALAMAHUM, 
I am at peace with those at peace with them.
وَ عَدُوٌّ لِّمَنْ عَادَاهُمْ وَ مُحِبٌّ لِّمَنْ اَحَبَّهُمْ 
WA ADUWWUN LEMAN A’ADAAHUM WA MOHIBBUN LEMAN AHABBAHUM 
I am the enemy of their enemies and I am the friend of their friends.
اِنَّهُمْ مِنِّىْ وَ اَنَا مِنْهُمْ 
INNAHUM MINNI WA ANA MINHUM 
They are from me and I am from them.
فَاجْعَلْ صَلَوٰتِكَ وَ بَرَكَاتِكَ وَ رَحْمَتَكَ 
FAJ-A’L SALAWAATAKA WA BARAKAATAKA WA RAHMATAKA 
(O Allah!) Bestow Your Blessings, your Favour, and Your Grace 
وَ غُفْرَانَكَ وَ رِضْوَانَكَ عَلَىَّ وَ عَلَيْهِمْ 
WA GHUFRAANAKA WA RIZWANAKA A’LAYYA WA A’LAYHIM 
and Your Forgiveness and Your willingness upon me and upon them. 
وَ اَذْهِبْ عَنْهُمُ الرِّجْسَ وَ طَهِّرْهُمْ تَطْهِيْرًا. 
WA AZHIB ANHOMUR RIJSA WA TAHHIRHUM TATHEERAA.
And remove impurity from them and keep them thoroughly pure.” (Salawaat)
فَقَالَ اللهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ يَا مَلَآئِكَتِىْ 
FA-QAALAL LAAHO A'ZZA WA JALLA YAA MALAAA-EKATEE 
Then Allah – Mighty and Glorified be He – said: ‘O my angels! 
وَ يَاسُكَّانَ سَمٰوٰتِىْ 
WA YAA SUKKAANA SAMAAWAATEE 
and O the residents of my heavens, 
اِنِّىْ مَا خَلَقْتُ سَمَآءً مَّبْنِيَّةً وَّ لَا اَرْضًا مَّدْحِيَّةً
INNEE MAA KHALAQTO SAMAAA-A’M MABNIYYATAN WA LAA ARZAN MADHIYYATAN 
I have not created the high heaven and stretched earth, 
وَّ لَا قَمَرًا مُّنِيْرًا وَّ لَا شَمْسًا مُّضِيٓئَةً 
WA LAA QAMARAM MONEERAN WA LAA SHAMSAN MOZEE-A’TAN, 
and illuminating moon and shinning sun 
وَّ لَا فَلَكًا يَّدُوْرُ وَ لَا بَحْرًا يَّجْرِىْ 
WA LAA FALAKAN YADOORO WA LAA BAHRAYN YAJREE
and the rotating planets and the flowing rivers
وَ لَا فُلْكًا يَّسْرِىْٓ اِلَّا فِىْ مَحَبَّةِ هٰؤُلَآءِ الْخَمْسَةِ 
WA LAA FULKAN YASREE, ILLAA FEE MAHABBATE HAA-OOLAAA-IL KHAMSATIL 
and the sailing ships, but for the love of these five 
الَّذِيْنَ هُمْ تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ 
LAZEENA HUM TAHTAL KESAAA-E.
who are under the cloak.’
فَقَالَ الْاَمِيْنُ جَبْرَآئِيْلُ يَا رَبِّ 
FA QAALAL AMEENO JABRAEELO YAA RABBE 
Then Gabriel, the trusted angel, asked, ‘O my Lord! 
وَ مَنْ تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ؟ 
WA MAN TAHTAL KESAAA-E?
Who are those under the cloak?’
فَقَالَ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ هُمْ اَهْلُ بَيْتِ النُّبُوَّةِ 
FA-QAALA A'ZZA WA JALLA HUM AHLO BAYTIN NOBUWWATE 
The Mighty and Glorified answered, ‘They are the household of Prophethood 
وَ مَعْدِنُ الرِّسَالَةِ 
WA MA’DENUR RESAALATE 
and the mines of apostleship.
هُمْ فَاطِمَةُ وَ اَبُوْهَا وَ بَعْلُهَا وَ بَنُوْهَا. 
HUM FAATEMATO WA ABOOHA WA BA’LOHAA WA BANOOHAA. 
They are: Fatemah and her father and her spouse and her sons.’ (Salawaat)
فَقَالَ جَبْرَآئِيْلُ يَا رَبِّ اَتَأْذَنُ لِىْٓ 
FA QAALA JABRAAA-EELO YAA RABBE ATA’ZANO LEE 
Gabriel asked, ‘O my Lord! Do you permit me
اَنْ اَهْبِطَ اِلَىْ الْاَرْضِ لِاَكُوْنَ مَعَهُمْ سَادِسًا؟ 
A’N AHBETA ELAL ARZE LE-AKOONA MA-A’HUM SAADESAA. 
to descend to the earth that I be the sixth with them?’
فَقَالَ اللهُ نَعَمْ قَدْ اَذِنْتُ لَكَ 
FA QAALAL LAAHO NA-A’M QAD AZINTO LAKA.
Allah said, ‘Yes, you are permitted.’
فَهَبَطَ الْاَمِيْنُ جَبْرَآئِيْلُ 
FAHABATAL AMEENO JABRAAA-EELO 
So Gabriel the trusted Archangel descended, 
وَ قَالَ السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا رَسُوْلَ اللهِ 
WA QAALAS SALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA RASOOLAL LAAHE
And said, ‘Peace be upon you, O Messenger of Allah!’
اَلْعَلِىُّ الْاَعْلٰى يُقْرِئُكَ السَّلَامُ 
AL-A’LIYYUL A’ALAA YUQRE-OKAS SALAAMO 
‘The All-Highest (Allah) conveys to you His greeting, 
وَ يَخُصُّكَ بِالتَّحِيَّةِ وَالْاِكْرَامِ 
WA YAKHUS-SOKA BITTAHIYYATE WAL IKRAAME 
and expresses His special greeting and respect to you, 
وَ يَقُوْلُ لَكَ وَ عِزَّتِىْ وَ جَلَآلِىْ 
WA YAQOOLO LAKA WA I’ZZATEE WA JALAALI 
and says, ‘By my Honour and my Dignity
اِنِّىْ مَا خَلَقْتُ سَمَآءً مَّبْنِيَّةً 
INNEE MAA KHALAQTO SAMAA-AN MABNIYYATAN 
I have not created high heaven
وَّ لَا اَرْضًا مَّدْحِيَّةً وَّ لَا قَمَرًا مُّنِيْرًا 
WA LAA ARZAN MADHIYYATAN WA LAA QAMARAN MONEERAN 
and the stretched earth and the illuminated moon, 
وَّ لَا شَمْسًا مُّضِٓيْئَةً وَّ لَا فَلَكًا يَّدُوْرُ 
WA LAA SHAMSAM MOZEE-ATANW WA LAA FALAKAN YADOORO 
and the bright sun, and the rotating planet, 
وَ لَا بَحْرًا يَّجْرِىْ وَ لَا فُلْكًا يَّسْرِىْ 
WA LAA BAHRAN YAJRI WA LAA FULKAN YASREE
and flowing ocean, and the sailing ships, 
اِلَّا لِاَجْلِكُمْ وَ مَحَبَّتِكُمْ 
ILLAA LE-AJLEKUM WA MAHABBATEKUM 
but for your sake and your love.’
وَ قَدْ اَذِنَ لِىْ اَنْ اَدْخُلَ مَعَكُمْ 
WA QAD AZENA LEE A’N ADKHOLA MA-A’KUM 
And indeed He (Allah) has given me permission to enter the cloak with you.
فَهَلْ تَاْذَنُ لِىْ يَا رَسُوْلَ اللهِ 
FA-HAL TA’ZANO LEE YAA RASOOLAL LAAHE. 
So, O Messenger of Allah! Do you permit me? 
فَقَالَ رَسُوْلُ اللهِ وَعَلَيْكَ السَّلَامُ 
FA QAALA RASOOLAL LAAHE WA ALAYKAS SALAAMO 
The Messenger of Allah replied: ‘And peace be on you also,
يَآ اَمِيْنَ وَحْىِ اللهِ اِنَّهٗ نَعَمْ قَدْ اَذِنْتُ لَكَ 
YAA AMEENA WAHYIL LAAHE INNAHU NA-A’M QAD AZINTO LAKA, 
O trustee of Allah’s revelation! I permit you.’
فَدَخَلَ جَبْرَآئِيْلُ مَعَنَا تَحَتَ الْكِسَآءِ 
FA-DAKHALA JABRAAA-EELO MA-A’NA TAHTAL KESAAA-E.
So, Gabriel entered the cloak with us. 
فَقَالَ لِاَبِىْ اِنَّ اللهَ قَدْ اَوْحىٰٓ اِلَيْكُمْ 
FA-QAALA LE-ABI INNAL LAAHA QAD AWHAA ELAYKUM 
Then said to my father, ‘Certainly Allah has revealed for you 
يَقُوْلُ ’اِنَّمَا يُرِيْدُ اللهُ لِيُذْهِبَ عَنْكُمُ الرِّجْسَ اَهْلَ الْبَيْتِ وَ يُطَهِّرَكُمْ تَطْهِيْراً‘ 
YAQOOLO, “INNAMAA YOREEDUL LAAHO LE-YUZHEBA A’NKOMUR RIJSA AHLAL BAYTE WA YOTAHHERAKUM TATHEERAA.” 
saying, ‘Allah only desires to keep away the uncleanness from you, O people of the House, and to purify you a thorough purifying.’” (Salawaat)
فَقَالَ عَلِىٌّ لِاَبِىْ يَا رَسُوْلَ اللهِ 
FA QAALA A’LIYYUN LE-ABEE YAA RASOOLAL LAAHE 
Then Ali (a.s.) said to my father, ‘O Messenger of Allah! 
اَخْبِرْنِى مَا لِـجُلُوْسِنَا هٰذَا تَحْتَ الْكِسَآءِ مِنَ الْفَضْلِ عِنْدَ اللهِ 
AKHBIRNI MAA LEJOLOOSENA HAAZA TAHTAL KESAAA-E MENAL FAZLE I’NDAL LAAHE.
Inform me what merits has Allah given for our getting together underneath this cloak?’
فَقَالَ النَّبِىُّ وَ الَّذِىْ بَعَثَنِىْ بِالْحَقِّ نَبِيًّا 
FA QAALAN NABIYYO WAL-LAZEE BA-A’SANI BIL HAQQE NABBIYYAN 
Then the Prophet (s.a.w.a.) replied: ‘By Him Who rightfully sent me a Prophet
وَّاصْطَفَانِىْ بِالرِّسَالَةِ نَجِيًّا مَّا ذُكِرَ خَبَرُنَا هٰذَا 
WASTAFAANI BIR RESAALATE NAJIYYAN MAA ZOKERA KHABARONA HAAZA 
and chose me for apostleship for the salvation (of mankind), whenever the event of this gathering of us 
فِىْ مَحْفِلٍ مِّنْ مَحَافِلِ اَهْلِ الْاَرْضِ 
FEE MAHFELIM MIN MAHAAFELE AHLIL ARZE, 
is mentioned in an assembly of the people of the earth 
وَ فِيْهِ جَمْعٌ مِّنْ شِيْعَتِنَا وَ مُحِبِّيْنَا 
WA FEEHE JAM-U’M MIN SHEEA’TENAA WA MOHIBBEENA 
in which a group of our followers and lovers are present, 
اِلَّا وَ نَزَلَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ الرَّحْمَةُ 
ILLAA WA NAZALAT A’LAYHEMUR RAHMATO 
the (divine) mercy shall be poured down on them 
وَحَفَّتْ بِهِمُ الْمَلَآئِكَةُ 
WA HAFFAT BEHEMUL MALAAA-EKATO 
and the angels shall encircle them, 
وَاسْتَغْفَرَتْ لَهُمْ اِلٰى اَنْ يَّتَفَرَّقُوْا 
WAS-TAGHFARAT LAHUM ELAA AYN YATAFARRAQOO.
asking forgiveness for them until they depart.’ (Salawaat)
فَقَالَ عَلِىٌّ اِذًا وَّ اللهِ فُزْنَا وَ فَازَ شِيْعَتُنَا وَ رَبِّ الْكَعْبَةِ
FA QAALA A’LIYYUN A’LAYHIS SALAAMO EZAN WAL LAAHE FUZNAA WA FAAZA SHEEA’TONA WA RABBIL KAA’BATE. 
Then Ali (a.s.) said: ‘Verily, by Allah; we and our followers have succeeded by the Lord of Kabah.’
فَقَالَ النَّبِىُّ ثَانِيًا يَا عَلِىُّ 
FA QAALAN NABIYYO SAANEYAN YAA A’LIYYO 
Then the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w.a.) said for the second time: ‘O Ali!
وَ الَّذِىْ بَعَثَنِىْ بِالْحَقِّ نَبِيًّا 
WAL LAZEE BA-A’SANI BIL HAQQE NABIYYAN 
I swear by Him Who rightfully sent me as a Prophet
وَّاصْطَفَانِىْ بِالرِّسَالَةِ نَجِيًّا مَّا ذُكِرَ خَبَرُنَا هٰذَا 
WAS TAFAANEE BIR-RESAALATE NAJIYYAN MAA ZOKERA KHABARONA HAAZA 
And chose me a Messenger for the salvation of the mankind, whenever the event of this gathering of us is mentioned 
فِىْ مَحْفِلٍ مِّنْ مَحَافِلِ اَهْلِ الْاَرْضِ 
FEE MAHFELIM MIN MAHAAFELE AHLIL ARZE 
in an assembly of the people of the earth 
وَ فِيْهِ جَمْعٌ مِّنْ شِيْعَتِنَا وَ مُحِبِّيْنَا 
WA FEEHE JAM-U’M MIN SHEEA’TENA WA MOHIBBEENA 
in which a group of our followers and lovers are present 
وَ فِيْهِمْ مَهْمُوْمٌ اِلَّا وَ فَرَّجَ اللهُ هَمَّهٗ 
WA FEEHIM MAHMOOMUN ILLAA WA FAR-RAJAL LAAHO HAMMAHU 
there shall remain none grieved but Allah will remove his grief 
وَ لَا مَغْمُوْمٌ اِلَّا وَ كَشَفَ اللهُ غَمَّهٗ 
WA LAA MAGHMOOMUN ILLAA WA KASHAFAL LAAHO GHAMMAHU 
there shall remain none distressed but Allah will dispel his distress 
وَ لَا طَالِبُ حَاجَةٍ اِلَّا وَ قَضَى اللهُ حَاجَتَهٗ 
WA LAA TAALEBO HAAJATIN ILLAA WA QAZAL LAAHO HAAJATAHU.
there shall remain none wish-seeker but Allah will grant his wish. (Salawaat)
فَقَالَ عَلِيٌّ اِذًا وَّ اللهِ فُزْنَا وَ سُعِدْنَا 
FA-QAALA A’LIYYUN EZAN WAL LAAHE FUZNA WA SOI’DNAA 
Then Ali (a.s.) said: ‘Verily, by Allah; we 
وَ كَذٰلِكَ شِيْعَتُنَا فَازُوْا وَ سُعِدُوْا فِى الدُّنْيَا 
WA KAZAALEKA SHEEA’TONAA FAAZU WA SOE’DOO FID DUNYAA 
and our followers have achieved success and felicity in the world 
وَ الْاٰخِرَةِ وَ رَبِّ الْكَعْبَةِ.
WAL AAKHERAH WA RABBIL KA’BATE.
and the hereafter by the Lord of the Kabah. (Salawaat)

E15.Title: Dua e Hazeen
E15.Data:
Dua-e-Hazeen
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ. 
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful. 
اُنَاجِیْکَ یَا مَوْجُوْدًا فِیْ کُلِّ مَکَانٍ 
ONAAJEEKA YAA MAWJOODO FEE KULLE MAKAANIN 
I whisper unto You O One Who is present in every place
لَعَلَّکَ تَسْمَعُ نِدَآئِیْ 
LA-A’LLAKA TASMA-O NEDAAA-EE 
so that You may hear my call 
فَقَدْ عَظُمَ جُرْمِیْ وَ قَلَّ حَیَآئِیْ 
FAQAD A’ZOMA JURMEE WA QALLA HAYAA-EE 
for surely my sin is excessive and my shame is less 
مَوْلَایَ یَا مَوْلَایَ اَیَّ الْاَھْوَالِ اَتَذَکَّرُ 
MAWLAAYA YAA MAWLAAYA AYYAL AHWAALE ATAZAKKARO 
My Master, O my Master which of the terrifying states shall I remember 
وَ اَیَّھَا اَنْسٰی وَ لَوْ لَمْ یَکُنْ اِلَّا الْمَوْتُ لَکَفٰی 
WA AYYAHA ANSAA WA LAW LAM YAKUN ILLAL MAWTO LAKAFAA 
and which of them shall I forget for if there was nothing except death it would be enough 
کَیْفَ وَمَا بَعْدَ الْمَوْتِ اَعْظَمُ وَ اَدْھٰی 
KAYFA WA MAA BA’DAL MAWTE A-A’ZAMO WA ADHAA 
then what about after death greater and much worse?
مَولَایَ یَا مَوْلَایَ حَتّٰی مَتٰی وَ اِلٰي مَتٰي 
MAWLAAYA YAA MAWLAAYA HATTAA MATAA WA ELAA MATAA 
My master O my Master up to when and till when will I say, 
اَقُوْلُ لَکَ الْعُتْبٰی مَرَّۃً بَعْدَ اُخْرٰی 
AQOOLO LAKAL UTBAA MARRATAN BA’DA UKHRAA 
I am to blame, again and again, 
ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ عِنْدِیْ صِدْقًا وَ لَا وَفَآءً 
SUMMA LAA TAJEDO I’NDEE SIDQAN WALAA WAFAAA-AN 
but then You do not find any truth or loyalty in me? 
فَیَاغَوْثَاہُ ثُمَّ وَاغَوْثَاہُ بِکَ یَا اَللّٰہُ 
FA YAA GHAWSAA-HO SUMMA WAA GHAWSAA-HO BEKA YAA ALLAAHO 
I call for help and I call for help, O Allah 
مِنْ ھَوًی قَدْ غَلَبَنِیْ وَ مِنْ عَدُوٍّ قَدِ اسْتَکْلَبَ عَلَیَّ 
MIN HAWAN QAD GHALABANEE WA MIN A’DUWWIN QADIS TAKLABA A’LAYYA 
from desires which have overpowered me and from the enemy which has pounced on me 
وَ مِنْ دُنْیَا قَدْ تَزَیَّنَتْ لِیْ 
WA MIN DUNYAA QAD TAZAYYANAT LEE 
and from the world which attracts me 
وَ مِنْ نَفْسٍ اَمَّارَۃٍ بِالسُّوٓءِ اِلَّا مَا رَحِمَ رَبِّیْ 
WA MIN NAFSIN AMMAARATIN BIS-SOOO-E ILLAA MAA RAHEMA RABBEE 
and from the soul that leads towards evil except that on which my Lord has mercy (12:53)
مَوْلَایَ یَا مَوْلَایَ اِنْ کُنْتَ رَحِمْتَ مِثْلِی فَارْحَمْنِیْ 
MAWLAAYA YAA MAWLAAYA IN KUNTA RAHIMTA MISLEE FARHAMNEE 
My master O my master if You have had mercy on the likes of me then have mercy on me 
وَ اِنْ کُنْتَ قَبِلْتَ مِثْلِیْ فَاقْبَلْنِیْ 
WA IN KUNTA QABILTA MISLEE FA AQBALNEE 
and if You have accepted from the likes of me then accept from me 
یَا قَابِلَ السَّحَرَۃِ اِقْبَلْنِیْ 
YAA QAABELAS-SAHARATE IQBALNEE 
O One Who accepts the early morning prayer accept me,
یَا مَنْ لَمْ اَزَلْ اَتَعَرَّفُ مِنْہُ الْحُسْنٰی 
YAA MAN LAM AZAL ATA-A’RRAFO MINHUL HUSNAA 
O One who, I still know only good from Him 
یَا مَنْ یُغَذِّیْنِیْ بِالنِّعَمِ صَبَاحًا وَ مَسَآءً 
YAA MAN YOGAZZEENEE BIN NEA’ME SABAAHAN WA MASAAHAN 
O One who nourishes me with blessings morning and evening 
اِرْحَمْنِیْ یَوْمَ اٰتِیْکَ فَرْدًا شَاخِصًا اِلَیْکَ بَصَرِیْ 
IRHAMNEE YAWMAA AATEEKA FARDAN SHAAKHESAN ELAYKA BASAREE 
have mercy on me when I come to You alone, my glance fixed on You 
مُقَلَّدًا عَمَلِیْ قَدْ تَبَرَّءَ جَمِیْعُ الْخَلْقِ مِنِّیْ 
MOQALLADAN A’MALEE QAD TABARRA-A JAMEE-U’L KHALQE MINNEE 
my actions carried on my neck When all of creation will withdraw away from me 
نَعَمْ وَ اَبِیْ وَ اُمِّیْ وَ مَنْ کَانَ لَہٗ کَدِّیْ وَ سَعْیِیْ 
NA-A’M WA ABEE WA UMMEE WA MAN KAANA LAHU QADDEE WA SA’YEE 
yes, even my father and mother and those for whom I worked and struggled 
فَاِنْ لَمْ تَرْحَمْنِیْ فَمَنْ یَرْحَمُنِیْ 
FA-IN LAM TARHAMNEE FA MAN YARHAMONEE 
then if You will not have mercy on me who will have mercy on me
وَ مَنْ یُوْنِسُ فِیْ الْقَبْرِ وَحْشَتِیْ 
WA MAN YOONESO FIL QABRE WAHSHATEE 
who will give me solace from the loneliness of the grave 
وَ مَنْ یُنْطِقُ لِسَانِیْ اِذَا خَلَوْتُ بِعَمَلِیْ 
WA MAN YUNTEQO LESAANEE EZAA KHALAWTO BE A’MALEE 
and who will make me speak when I am alone with my deeds 
وَ سَائَلْتَنِیْ عَمَّا اَنْتَ اَعْلَمُ بِہٖ مِنِّیْ 
WA SAA-ALTANEE A’MMAA ANTA A-A’LAMO BEHI MINNI
and when You will ask me about what You know better than me? 
فَاِنْ قُلْتُ نَعَمْ فَاَیْنَ الْمَحْرَبُ مِنْ عَدْلِکَ 
FA-IN QULTO NA-A’M FA-AYNAL MAHRABO MIN A’DLEKA 
Then if I say yes (to my sins) where will be the escape from Your Justice? 
وَ اِنْ قُلْتُ لَمْ اَفْعَلْ قُلْتَ اَلَمْ اَکُنِ الشَّاھِدَ عَلَیْکَ
WA IN QULTO LAM AF-A’L QULTA ALAM AKANISH SHAAHEDA A’LAYKA 
And if I say I did not commit it You will say was I not a witness over you? 
فَعَفْوُکَ عَفْوُکَ یَا مَوْلَایَ قَبْلَ سَرَابِیْلِ الْقَطِرَانِ 
FA A’FWOKA A’FWOK YAA MAWLAAYA QABLA SARAABEELIL QATERAANE 
So (I beseech) Your Forgiveness Your Pardon O my master before the wearing of the clothes of Hell 
عَفْوُکَ عَفْوُکَ یَا مَوْلَایَ قَبْلَ جَھَنَّمَ وَ النِّیْرَانِ 
A’FWOKA A’FWOK YAA MAWLAAYA QABLA JAHANNAMA WAN NEERAAN
Your Forgiveness Your Pardon O my Master before the Hell and the Fire 
عَفْوُکَ عَفْوُکَ یَا مَوْلَایَ قَبْلَ اَنْ تُغَلَّ الْاَیْدِیْ اِلٰی الْاَعْنَاقِ 
A’FWOKA A’FWOK YAA MAWLAAYA QABLA AN TOGHALLAL AYDEE ELAL A-A’NAAQE 
Your Forgiveness Your Forgiveness O my Master before the hands are tied to the necks 
یَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِیْنَ وَ خَیْرَ الْغَافِرِیْنَ.
YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEEN WA KHAYRAL GHAAFEREEN.
O the most Merciful and the best of Forgivers.

E16.Title: Dua during the Occultation of Imam Mahdi (a) - SHORT اَللّٰهُمَّ عَرِّفْنِىْ نَفْسَكَ

E17.Title: Dua during the Occultation of Imam Mahdi (a) - LONG اَللّٰهُمَّ عَرِّفْنِيْ نَفْسَكَ

E18.Title: Dua e Ahad
E18.Data:
Dua-e-Ahad
It is narrated from Hazrat Imam Jaffer Sadiq (a.s.) that whoever recites the following ‘Dua-e-Ahad’ for 40 days after namaz-e-subah (morning prayer), he will be included amongst the companion of Sahebul-Asr-e-waz-Zaman (a.s.). If he dies before the occulation of the Imam (a.s.), Allah (s.w.t.) will raise him from the grave so that he can be with the Imam (a.s.). Allah (s.w.t.) will give him reward (sawab) of 1000 good deeds for each word of this dua and his 1000 sins will be forgiven.
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اَللّٰهُمَّ رَبَّ النُّوْرِ الْعَظِيْمِ وَرَبَّ الْكُرْسِىِّ الرَّفِيْعِ 
ALLAAHUMMA RABBAN NOORIL A’ZEEM WA RABBAL KURSIYYIR RAFEE-E’ 
O Allah! Lord of the Great Light, Lord of the Elevated Throne, 
وَرَبَّ الْبَحْرِ الْمَسْجُوْرِ وَمُنْزِلَ التَّوْرٰيةِ وَالْاِنْجِيْلِ وَالزَّبُوْرِ 
WA RABBAL BAHRIL MASJOORE WA MUNZELAT TAWRAATE WAL INJEELE WAZ ZABOORE 
Lord of the tumultuous seas, and the revealer of the Tawrah, Injeel, and Zaboor, 
وَرَبَّ الظِّلِّ وَالْحَرُوْرِ وَمُنْزِلَ الْقُرْاٰنِ الْعَظِيْمِ 
WA RABBAZ ZILLE WAL HAROORE WA MUNZELAL QUR-AANIL A’ZEEME 
Lord of the shadows and the warmth’s, And the revealer of the Great Quran. 
وَرَبَّ الْمَلٰٓئِكَةِ الْمُقَرَّبِيْنَ وَالْاَنْبِيَآءِ وَالْمُرْسَلِيْنَ 
WA RABBAL MALAAA-EKATIL MOQARRABEENA WAL AMBEYAAA-E WAL MURSALEENA 
Lord of the proximate angels and prophets and messengers.
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّىْ اَسْئَلُكَ بِوَجْهِكَ الْكَرِيْمِ وَبِنُوْرِ وَجْهِكَ الْمُنِيْرِ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA BE-WAJHEKAL KAREEME WA BE-NOORE WAJHEKAL MONEERE 
O Allah! I beseech thee, for the sake of Your Nobel Visage. And for the sake of Your Enlightening Visage,
وَبِمُلْكِكَ الْقَدِيْمِ يَا حَىُّ يَا قَيُّوْمُ اَسْئَلُكَ بِاسْمِكَ الَّذِىْ 
WA MULKEKAL QADEEME YAA HAYYO YAA QAYYOOMO AS-ALOKA BISMEKAL LAZEE 
and Your ever existing kingdom. O Ever Living! O Controller! I beseech Thee in Your Name 
اَشْرَقَتْ بِهٖ السَّمٰوَاتُ وَالْاَرْضُوْنَ 
ASHRAQAT BEHIS SAMAAWAATO WAL ARAZOONA 
which lits the heavens and the earths; 
وَبِاسْمِكَ الَّذِىْ يَصْلَحُ بِهٖ الْاَوَّلُوْنَ وَالْآخِرُوْنَ 
WA BISMEKAL LAZEE YASLAHO BEHIL AWWALOONA WAL AAKHEROONA 
and in Your Name, by which the ancient and the latter ones become upright. 
يَا حَيًّا قَبْلَ كُلِّ حَىٍّ وَيَا حَيًّا بَعْدَ كُلِّ حَىٍّ 
YAA HAYYAN QABLA KULLE HAYYIN WA YAA HAYYAN BA’-DA KULLE HA’YYIN 
O Ever living who has before every living being. O Ever Living Who shall (exist) after every living being. 
وَيَا حَيًّا حِيْنَ لاَ حَىَّ يَا مُحْيِىَ الْمَوْتٰى وَمُمِيْتَ الْاَحْيَآءِ يَا حَىُّ لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اَنْتَ 
WA YAA HAYYAN HEENA LAA HAYYA YAA MOHYEYAL MAWTAA WA MOMEETAL AHYAAA-E YAA HAYYO LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTA
O Ever Living Who existed when there was no life. O Giver of life to dead. O One Who causes death to the living one. O Ever Living. There is no god except Thou. 
اَللّٰهُمَّ بَلِّغْ مَوْلاَنَا الْاِمَامَ الْهَادِىَ الْمَهْدِىَّ الْقَآئِمَ بِاَمْرِكَ 
ALLAAHUMMA BALLIGH MAWLAANA EMAAMAL HAADEYAL MAHDIYYAL QAAA-EMA BE-AMREKA 
O Allah! Send our master the leader, the guide, the guided, the upriser with Your command. 
صَلَوَاتُ اللهِ عَلَيْهِ وَعَلٰى اٰبَآئِهِ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ 
SALAWAATULLAAHE A’LAYHE WA A’LAA AABAAA-EHIT TAAHEREEN 
Blessings of Allah be on him and his pure forefathers 
عَنْ جَمِيْعِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ فِىْ مَشَارِقِ الْاَرْضِ وَمَغَارِبِهَا 
A’N JAMEEL-I’L MOMINEENA WAL MOMINAATE FEE MASHAAREQIL ARZE WA MAGHAAREBEHAA 
from all the believing men and believing women. In the easts of the earth and it’s wests, 
سَهْلِهَا وَجَبَلِهَا وَبَرِّهَا وَبَحْرِهَا وَعَنِّىْ وَعَنْ وَالِدَىَّ مِنَ الصَّلَوَاتِ 
SAHLEHAA WA JABALEHAA WA BARREHAA WA BAHREHAA WA A’NNEE WA A’N WAALEDAYYA MENAS SALAWAATE 
in its plains and its mountains, its lands and its seas, from me and my parents. Blessings, 
زِنَةَ عَرْشِ اللهِ وَمِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِهٖ وَمَا اَحْصَاهُ عِلْمُهٗ وَاَحَاطَ بِهٖ كِتَابُهٗ 
ZENATA A’RSHILLAAHE WA MEDAADA KALEMAATEHI WA MAA AHSAAHO I’LMOHU WA AHAATA BEHI KETAABOHU 
which are the weight of Allah’s throne and ink of His words, and whatever His knowledge enumerates and His book encompasses. 
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّىْ اُجَدِّدُ لَهٗ فِىْ صَبِيْحَةِ يَوْمِىْ هٰذَا وَمَا عِشْتُ مِنْ اَيَّامِىْ عَهْدً ا
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE OJADDEDO LAHU FEE SABEEHATE YAWMEE HAAZAA WA MAA I’SHTO MIN AYYAAMEE A’HDAN 
O Allah! Renew for him my covenant, pledge 
وَعَقْدًا وَبَيْعَةً لَهٗ فِىْ عُنُقِىْ لاَ اَحُوْلُ عَنْهَا وَلاَ اَزُوْلُ اَبَدًا 
WA A’QDAN WA BAY-A’TAN LAHU FEE O’NOQEE LAA AHULO A’NHAA WA LAA AZOOLO ABADAN 
and allegiance on my neck in the morning of this day of mine and whatever days (of my life) I live. I shall never turn away from it nor let it ever vanish. 
اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِىْ مِنْ اَنْصَارِهٖ وَاَعْوَانِهٖ وَالذَّابِّيْنَ عَنْهُ 
ALLAAHUMMAJ-A’LNEE MIN ANSAAREHI WA AA’-WAANEHI WAZ-ZAAAB-BEENA A’NHO 
O Allah! Appoint me among his helpers, aides, and his protectors. 
وَالْمُسَارِعِيْنَ اِلَيْهِ فِىْ قَضَآءِ حَوَآئِجِهٖ وَالْمُمْتَثِلِيْنَ لِاَوَامِرِهٖ 
WAL MOSAARE-E’ENA ELAYHE FEE QAZAAA-E HAWAA-EJEHEE WAL MUMTASLEENA LE-AWAAMEREHI 
Those who hasten to fulfill his commands and obey his orders. 
وَالْمُحَامِيْنَ عَنْهُ وَالسَّابِقِيْنَ اِلٰى اِرَادَتِهٖ وَالْمُسْتَشْهَدِيْنَ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ 
WAL MOHAAMMEENA A’NHO WAS SAABEQEENA ELAA ERAADATEHI WAL MUSTASH-HADEENA BAYNA YADAYHE 
Those who are his supporters and compete with each other to (fulfill) his intention and seek martyrdom in his presence. 
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنْ حَالَ بَيْنِىْ وَبَيْنَهُ الْمَوْتُ الَّذِىْ جَعَلْتَهٗ عَلٰى عِبَادِكَ 
ALLAAHUMMA IN HAALA BAYNEE WA BAYNAHUL MAWTUL LAZEE JA-A’LTAHU A’LAA E’BAADEKA 
O Allah! If death occurs between me and him (before the reappearance) (death) which you have made obligatory and decreed for your servants, 
حَتْمًا مَّقْضِيًّا فَاَخْرِجْنِىْ مِنْ قِبْرِىْ مُؤْتَزِرًا كَفَنِىْ شَاهِرًا سَيْفِىْ 
HATMAN MAQZIYYAN FA-AKHRIJNEE MIN QABREE MOA-TAZERAN KAFANEE SHAAHERAN SAYFEE 
then raise me from my grave, wrapped in my shroud, my sword unsheathed, 
مُجَرِّدًا قَنَاتِىْ مُلَبِّيًا دَعْوَةَ الدَّاعِىْ فِى الْحَاضِرِ وَالْبَادِىْ 
MOJARREDAN QANAATEE MOLABBEYAN DAA’-WATAD DAA-E’E FIL HAAZERE WAL BAADEE 
my spear bared, answering the call of the caller in cities as well as deserts. 
اَللّٰهُمَّ اَرِنِى الطَّلْعَةَ الرَّشيْدَةَ وَالْغُرَّةَ الْحَمِيْدَةَ 
ALLAAHUMMA ARENIT TAL-A’TAR RASHEEDATA WAL GHURRATAL HAMEEDATA 
O Allah! Show me the rightly guided face of (Imam a.s.), the praiseworthy moon (referring to the face of Imam a.s.) 
وَاكْحُلْ نَاظِرِىْ بِنَظْرَةٍ مِّنِّىْ اِلَيْهِ وَعَجِّلْ فرَجَهٗ 
WAK-HUL NAAZEREE BE-NAZRATIN MINNEE ELAYHE WA A’JJIL FARAJAHU 
and enlighten my vision by looking at him. And hasten his reappearance, make his arrival smooth, 
وَسَهِّلْ مَخْرَجَهٗ وَ اَوْسِعْ مَنْهَجَهٗ وَاسْلُكْ بِىْ مَحَجَّتَهٗ 
WA SAHHIL MAKHRAJAHU WA AWSEA’-MANHAJAHU WASLUK BEE MAHAJJATAHU 
vasten his path, make me tread on his way 
وَاَنْفِذْ اَمْرَهٗ وَاشْدُدْ اَزْرَهٗ وَاعْمُرِ اللّٰهُمَّ بِهٖ بِلاَدَكَ وَاَحْىِ بِهٖ عِبَادَكَ 
WANFIZ AMRAHU WASHDUD AZRAHU WA’-MURIL LAAHUMMA BEHI BELAADAKA WA AHYE BEHI E’BAADAKA 
and implement his authority and strengthen his back. O Allah! Inhabit Your cities through him and give life to Your servants 
فَاِنَّكَ قُلْتَ وَقَوْلُكَ الْحَقُّ ظَهَرَ الْفَسَادُ فِىْ الْبَرِّ وَالْبَحْرِ 
FA-INNAKA QULTA WA QAWLOKAL HAQQO ZAHARAL FASAADO FIL BARRE WAL BAHRE 
due to him for surely You have said and Your word is truth, “Corruption will become rampant in land and on sea 
بِمَا كَسَبَتْ اَيْدِى النَّاسِ فَاَظْهِرِ اللّٰهُمَّ لَنَا وَلِيَّكَ وَابْنَ بِنْتِ نَبِيِّكَ 
BEMAA KASABAT AYDIN NAASE FA-AZHERILLAAHUMMA LANAA WALIYYAKA WABNA BINTE NABIYYEKAL 
because of the evil which men’s hand have earned” Then O Allah! Manifest for us Your slave and the son of Your Prophet’s daughter, 
الْمُسَمّٰى بِاسْمِ رَسُوْلِكَ حَتّٰى لاَ يَظْفَرَ بِشَىْءٍ مِّنَ الْبَاطِلِ اِلاَّ مَزَّقَهٗ 
MOSAMMAA BISME RASOOLEKA HATTA LAA YAZFARA BESHAY-IN MENAL BAATELE ILLAA MAZZAQAHU 
whose name is the same as that of Your messenger, so that nothing from falsehood is victorious except that he tears them (falsehood) to pieces, 
وَيُحِقَّ الْحَقَّ وَيُحَقِّقَهٗ وَاجْعَلْهُ اللّٰهُمَّ مَفْزَعًا لِمَظْلُوْمِ عِبَادِكَ 
WA YOHIQQAL HAQQA WA YOHAQQEQAHU WAJ-A’LHUL LAAHUMMA MAFZA-A’N LE-MAZLOOME E’BAADEKA 
establishes the truth and the truth confirms him. And O Allah! Appoint him as a refuge for Your oppressed servants 
وَ نَاصِرًا لِمَنْ لاَ يَجِدُ لَهٗ نَاصِرًا غَيْرَكَ وَمُجَدِّدًا لِمَا عُطِّلَ مِنْ اَحْكَامِ كِتَابِكَ 
WA NAASERAN LEMAN LAA YAJEDO LAHOO NAASERAN GHAYRAKA WA MOJADDEDAN LEMAA U’TTELA MIN AHKAAME KETAABEKA 
and a helper for the one who does not find any helper for himself except You and the renewer of all the laws of Your book 
وَ مُشَيِّدًا لِمَا وَرَدَ مِنْ اَعْلاَمِ دِيْنِكَ وَسُنَنِ نَبِيِّكَ 
WA MOSHAYYEDAN LEMAA WARADA MIN AA’-LAAME DEENEKA WA SONANE NABIYYEKA 
which have been tampered with and the rebuilder of the science of Your religion and the traditions of Your Prophet 
صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهٖ وَاجْعَلْهُ اللّٰهُمَّ مِمَّنْ حَصَّنْتَهٗ مِنْ بَاْسِ الْمُعْتَدِيْنَ 
SALLALLAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI WAJ-A’LHUL LAAHUMMA MIMMAN HASSANTAHU MIN BAASIL MOA’TADEENA 
(peace of Allah be on him and his progeny) and O Allah! Make him among those whom you have protected from the evils of the adversaries. 
اَللّٰهُمَّ وَ سُرَّ نَبِيَّكَ مُحَمَّدًا صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَاٰلِهٖ بِرُؤْيَتِهٖ 
ALLAAHUMMA WA SURRA NABIYYAKA SALLALLAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI BE-ROAYATEHI 
O Allah! And provide joy to Your Prophet Mohammed (peace be on him and his progeny) by his vision 
وَمَنْ تَبِعَهٗ عَلٰى دَعْوَتِهٖ وَارْحَمِ اسْتِكَانَتَنَا بَعْدَهٗ 
WA MAN TABE-A’HU A’LAA DA’-WATEHI WARHAMIS- TAKAANATANAA BA’-DAHU 
and (the vision of) the one who follows him on his call and have mercy on our poverty after his arrival 
اَللّٰهُمَّ اكْشِفْ هٰذِهِ الْغُمَّةَ عَنْ هٰذِهِ الْاُمَّةِ بِحُضُوْرِهٖ 
ALLAAHUMMAK-SHIF HAAZEHIL GHUMMATA A’N HAAZEHIL UMMATE BE-HOZOOREHI 
O Allah! Remove his sorrow (of occultation) from this nation with his presence 
وَعَجِّلْ لَنَا ظُهُوْرَهٗ اِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهٗ بَعِيْدًا وَّنَرٰيهُ قَرِيْبًا 
WA A’JJIL LANAA ZOHOORAHU INNAHUM YARAWNAHU BA-E’EDAN WA NARAAHO QAREEBAN 
and hasten for us his reappearance. They (the disbelievers) consider it to be distant while we consider it to be near. 
بِرَحْمَتِكَ يَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ.
BE-RAHMATEKA YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEENA.
For the sake of Your mercy, O the most Merciful of all Mercifuls. 
Then strike your hand on your thice 3 times and say’.
اَلْعَجَلَ الْعَجَلَ يَا مَوْلاىَ يَا صَاحِبَ الزَّمَانِ.
AL-A’JAL AL-A’JAL YAA MAWLAAYA YAA SAAHEBAZ ZAMAANE
Hasten! Hasten! O my Master, O Master of the era.

E19.Title: Dua e Faraj اَللّٰهُمَّ كُنْ لِوَلِيِّكَ

E20.Title: Dua e Faraj - Ilahi Azomal Bala اِلٰهِيْ عَظُمَ الْبَلَاۤءُ
E20.Data:
Dua-e-Elaahi Azomal Balaa
اِلٰہِیْ عَظُمَ الْبَلآءُ وَ بَرِحَ الْخَفَآءُ وَ انْکَشَفَ الْغِطَآءُ 
O Allah, terrible was the calamity, and its evil consequences are visible, the covering has been removed,
وَ انْقَطَعَ الرَّجَاءُ وَ ضَاقَتِ الْاَرْضُ وَ مُنِعَتِ السَّمَآءُ 
 (all) hopes have been cut off, the (plentiful) earth has shrunk (with very little to spare), the heavenly blessings have been withheld. 
وَ اَنْتَ الْمُسْتَعَانُ وَ اِلَیْکَ الْمُشْتَکٰی 
You alone can help, we refer our grief and sorrow to You, 
وَ عَلَیْکَ الْمُعَوَّلُ فِی الشِّدَّۃِ وَ الرَّخَآءِ 
we have full faith in You, in the time of distress, as well as in good fortune. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّاٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
O Allah, send blessings on Muhammad and on the children of Muhammad, 
اُوْلِی الْاَمْرِ الَّذِیْنَ فَرَضْتَ عَلَیْنَا طَاعَتَہُمْ 
The ‘Ulil Amr’ (authority), obedience to whom has been made obligatory
وَ عَرَّفْتَنَا بِذٰلِکَ مَنْزِلَتَہُمْ 
through which we become aware of their rank and status, 
فَفَرِّجْ عَنَّا بِحَقِّہِمْ فَرَجًا عَاجِلًا قَرِیْبًا 
Therefore let there be joy after sorrow for us, for their sake, right away, 
کَلَمْحِ الْبَصَرِ اَوْہُوَ اَقْرَبُ 
in the twinkle of an eye, more rapidly than that. 
یَا مُحَمَّدُ یَا عَلِیُّ یَا عَلِیُّ یَا مُحَمَّدُ 
O Muhammad, O Ali, O Ali, O Muhammad, 
اِکْفِیَا نِیْ فَاِنَّکُمَا کَافِیَانِ 
Give me enough, because both of you provide sufficiently. 
وَانْصُرَانِ فَاِنَّکُمَا نَاصِرَانِ 
Help me, because both of you help and protect.
یَا مَوْلَانَا یَاصَاحِبَ الزَّمَانِ 
O our master, O the living Imam, 
الْغَوْثَ الْغَوْثَ الْغَوْتَ اَدْرِکْنِیْ اَدْرِکْنِیَ اَدْرِکْنِیَ 
HELP! HELP! HELP! Reach me! Reach me! Reach me!
السَّاعَۃَ السَّاعَۃَ السَّاعَۃَ الْعَجَلَ الْعَجَلَ الْعَجَلَ 
At once, in this hour. Be quick, be quick, be quick, 
یَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِیْنَ بِحَقِّ مُحَمَّدٍ وَّاٰلِہِ الطَّاہِرِیْنَ.
O the most merciful, for the sake of Muhammad and his pure children.

E21.Title: Dua e Ghareeq
E21.Data:
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
یَا اَﷲُ یَا رَحْمٰنُ یَا رَحِیْمُ 
YAA ALLAAHO YAA RAHMAANO YAA RAHEEMO 
O Allah! O Beneficent! O Merciful.
یَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوْبِ 
YAA MOQALLEBAL QOLOOBE 
O One who changes the hearts (of people)
ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِیْ عَلٰی دِیْنِکَ
SABBIT QALBEE A’LAA DEENEKA.
Give me steadfastness upon Your religion

E22.Title: Dua e Hifz e Imaan رَضِيْتُ بِاللّٰهِ رَبًّا

E24.Title: Dua Tawassul
E24.Data:
According to Allamah Majlisi (r.a.) some reliable books mention that Mohammad Ibne Babwaih traced through authentic sources this Dua-e-Tawassul, which means entreaty or supplication to the Holy Imams (a.s.) and that whenever he recited this Dua he invariably found it to be effective for quick satisfaction of his needs and prompt fulfilment of his desires. When recitation of the Dua is over entreat Allah the All-Merciful for fulfilment of your desires.
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّىْ اَسْئَلُكَ وَ اَتَوَجَّهُ اِلَيْكَ بِنَبِيِّكَ نِبِىِّ الرَّحْمَةِ. 
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE ASALOKA WA ATAWAJJAHO ELAYKA BE NABIYYEKA NABIYYIR RAHMATE 
O Allah, I beseech You, and turn towards You, through Your Prophet, the Prophet of Mercy, 
مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ اَلِهٖ. 
MOHAMMADIN SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI 
Muhammad, may Allah Bless him and his Progeny, and grant them peace.
يَا اَبَا الْقَاسِمِ يَا رَسُوْلَ اللهِ  يَا اِمَامَ الرَّحْمَةِ. 
YAA ABAL-QAASEME YAA RASOOLAL LAAHE YAA EMAMAR RAHMATE 
O Abul-Qasim, O Messenger of Allah O guide of mercy, 
يَا سَيِّدِنَا وَ مَوْلٰينَا اِنَّا تَوَجَّهْنَا. 
YAA SAYYEDANA WA MAWLAANA INNAA TAWAJJAHNA 
O intercessor of the community, O our chief! O our master! we turn towards thee,
