‘O my Chiefs and my Masters! I turn to Allah through you, my Imams 
وَ عُدَّتِىْ لِيَوْمِ فَقْرِىْ وَ حَاجَتِىْ اِلَى اللهِ. 
WA U’DDATI LE YAWME FAQRI WA HAAJATI ELAL LAAHE 
my supporters on the days of my destitution. 
وَ تَوَسَّلْتُ بِكُمْ اِلَى اللهِ، وَ اسْتَشْفَعْتُ بِكُمْ اِلىَ اللهِ. 
WA TAWASSALTO BEKUM ELLAL LAAHE, WAS TASHFA’TO BEKUM ELAL LAAHE 
I seek your advocacy before Allah, I request you to speak in my favour before Allah, 
فَاشْفَعُوْ لِىْ عِنْدَ اللهِ، وَ اسْتَنْقِذُوْنِىْ مِنْ ذُنُوْبِىْ عِنْدَ اللهِ، 
FASH-FA-OO’LEE I’NDAL LAAHE VASTANQEZOONI MIN ZONOOBI I’NDAL LAAHE 
obtain pardon for me from Allah, and deliver me from my sins, 
فَاِنَّكُمْ وَسِيْلَتِىْ اِلَى اللهِ وَ بِحُبِّكُمْ وَ بِقُرْبِكُمْ. 
FA INNAKUM WASILATI ELAL LAAHE WA BEHUBBEKUM WA BEQURBEKUM 
for you are my pleaders before Allah, through my love of you and to your nearness to Him
اَرْجُوْ نَجَاةً مِّنَ اللهِ، فَكُوْنُوْا عِنْدَ اللهِ رَجَائِىْ. 
ARJOO NAJAATAN MENAL LAAHE FAKOOMOO I’NDAL LAAHE RAJAAA-E’E 
I pin the hope of my deliverance from sins by Allah. So; please be the repository of my hope with Allah. obtain deliverance (for me) from Allah.
يَا سَادَاتِىْ يَا اَوْلِيَآءَ اللهُ، صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَ. 
YAA SAADATI YAA AWLEYAAA-AL LAAHE SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHIM AJMA-E’EN 
O my chiefs, O close friends of Allah, may Allah bless all of them, 
وَ لَعْنَ اللهُ اَعْدَاءَ اللهِ ظَالِمِيْهِمْ مِنَ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ وَ الْآخِرِيْنَ. 
WA LA’-NAL LAAHO A’DAA-AL LAAHE ZAALEMEEHIM MENAL AWWALEENA WAL AAKHEREENA 
and curse the enemies of Allah who have oppressed them from the beginning to the end.
آمِيْنَ رَبَّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ.
AAMEEN RABBAL A’ALAMEEN.
so be it, O Lord of the worlds.

E26.Title: Dua Simat
E26.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اَللّٰہُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْئَلُکَ بِاسْمِکَ الْعَظِیْمِ الْاَعْظَمِ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA BISMEKAL A’ZEEMIL A-A’ZAMIL 
O’ Allah! I beseech You through Your Name, the great, the most great,
الْاَعَزِّ الْاَجَلِّ الْاَکْرَمِ 
A-A’ZZIL AJALLIL AKRAMIL
the most majestic, the most magnificent and the most noble.
الَّذِیْ اِذَا دُعِیْتَ بِہٖ عَلٰی مَغَالِقِ اَبْوَابِ السَّمَآءِ لِلْفَتْحِ بِالرَّحْمَۃِ انْفَتَحَتْ 
LAZEE EZAA DO-EE’TA BEHI A’LAA MAGHAALEQE ABWAABIS SAMAAA-E LIL FATHE BIR-RAHMATIN FATAHAT 
If You are requested therewith to open the closed doors of the sky these will open with Your mercy.
وَ اِذَا دُعِیْتَ بِہٖ عَلٰی مَضَآئِقِ اَبْوَابِ الْاَرْضِ لِلْفَرَجِ انْفَرَجَتْ 
WA EZAA DO-EE’TA BEHI A’LAA MAZAAA-EQE ABWAABIL ARZE LILFARAJIN FARAJAT, 
If You are requested thereby to remove the narrowness of the doors of the earth, they will be opened wide.
وَ اِذَا دُعِیْتَ بِہٖ عَلَی الْعُسْرِ لِلْیُسْرِ تَیَسَّرَتْ 
WA EZAA DO-EE’TA BEHI A’LAL U’SRE LIL-YUSRE TAYASSARAT, 
If You are requested thereby to make easy the difficulty, it will be made easy.
وَ اِذَا دُعِیْتَ بِہٖ عَلَی الْاَمْوَاتِ لِلنُّشُوْرِ انْتَشَرَتْ 
WA EZAA DO-EE’TA BEHI A’LAL AMWAATE LIN-NOSHOORIN TASHARAT,
If You are requested thereby to restore the dead to life, they will rise from their graves.
وَ اِذَا دُعِیْتَ بِہٖ عَلٰی کَشْفِ الْبَاْسَآءِ وَ الضَّرَّآءِ انْکَشَفَتْ
WA EZAA DO-EE’TA BEHI A’LAA KASHFIL BAA-SAAA-E WAZ-ZARRAAA-E INKASHAFAT, 
If You are requested thereby to remove misery and adversity, it will be removed.
وَ بِجَلَالِ وَجْہِکَ الْکَرِیْمِ 
WA BE JALAALE WAJHEKAL KAREEME 
I beseech You through the Majesty of Your person,
اَکْرَمِ الْوُجُوْہِ 
AKRAMIL WOJOOHE 
the Most Generous
وَ اَعَزِّ الْوُجُوْہِ
WA A-A’ZZIL WOJOOHIL 
and the Most Honoured One,
الَّذِیْ عَنَتْ لَہُ الْوُجُوْہُ 
LAZE A’NAT LAHUL WOJOOHO 
before Whom everybody bows down in submission
وَ خَضَعَتْ لَہُ الرِّقَابُ 
WA KHAZA-A’T LAHUR REQAABO 
and all necks bend down in reverence
وَ خَشَعَتْ لَہُ الْاَصْوَاتُ 
WA KHASHA-A’T LAUL ASWAATO 
and all voices become humbled
وَ وَجِلَتْ لَہُ الْقُلُوْبُ مِنْ مَخَافَتِکَ 
WA WAJELAT LAHUL QOLOOBO MIN MAKHAAFATEKA, 
and all hearts tremble; through Your fear
وَ بِقُوَّتِکَ الَّتِیْ بِہَا تُمْسِکُ السَّمَآءَ اَنْ تَقَعَ عَلَی الْاَرْضِ اِلَّا بِاِذْنِکَ 
WA BE QUWWATEKAL LATEE BEHAA TUMSEKUS SAMAAA-A AN TAQA-A’ A’LAL ARZE ILLAA BE-IZNEKA, 
and I beseech You through Your Might, which prevents the heaven from falling on the earth except with Your permission,
وَ تُمْسِکُ السَّمٰوَاتِ وَ الْاَرْضَ اَنْ تَزُوْلَا
WA TUMSEKUS SAMAAWAATE WAL ARZA AN TAZOOLAA, 
and which controls all the heavens and the earth so closely that they cannot move away from their positions;
وَ بِمَشِیَّتِکَ الَّتِیْ دَانَ لَہَا الْعَالَمُوْنَ 
WA BEMASHIYYATEKAL LATEE DAANA (KAANA) LAHAL A’AALAMOONA, 
and I beseech You through Your Will, which the whole world obeys,
وَ بِکَلِمَتِکَ الَّتِیْ خَلَقْتَ بِہَا السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضَ 
WA BEKALEMAATEKAL LATEE KALAQTA BEHAS SAMAAWAATE WAL-ARZA, 
and through Your Word. By which You have created the heaven and the earth,
وَ بِحِکْمَتِکَ الَّتِیْ صَنَعْتَ بِہَا الْعَجَآئِبَ 
WA BEHIKMATEKAL LATEE SANA’TA BEHAL A’JAAA-EBA 
and through Your Wisdom, with which You have created the wonders,
وَ خَلَقْتَ بِہَا الظُّلْمَۃَ 
WA KHALAQTA BEHAZ ZULMATA 
and with which You created Darkness
وَ جَعَلْتَہَا لَیْلًا 
WA JA-A’LTAHAA LAILAN 
and made it Night,
وَّجَعَلْتَ اللَّیْلَ سَکَنًا 
WA JA-A’LTAL LAYLA SAKANAN 
and made night the time of quiet and rest;
وَّ خَلَقْتَ بِہَا النُّوْرَ 
WA KHALAQTA BEHAN NOORA 
and with which You created Light
وَ جَعَلْتَہٗ نَہَارًا 
WA JA-A’LTAHU NAHAARAN 
and made it Day,
وَّ جَعَلْتَ النَّہَارَ نُشُوْرًا مُبْصِرًا 
WA JA-A’LTAN NAHAARA NOSHOORAN MUBSERAN, 
and made day the time of movement and observation;
وَّ خَلَقْتَ بِہَا الشَّمْسَ 
WA KHALAQTA BEHASH SHAMSA 
and with which You have created the Sun,
وَ جَعَلْتَ الشَّمْسَ ضِیَآءً 
WA JA-ALTASH SHAMSA ZEYAAA-AN, 
and made the sun gleam
وَّ خَلَقْتَ بِہَا الْقَمَرَ 
WA KHALAQTA BEHAL QAMARA 
And with which You have created the Moon,
وَ جَعَلْتَ الْقَمَرَ نُوْرًا 
WA JA-A’LTAL QAMARA NOORAN, 
and made the moon light;
وَّ خَلَقْتَ بِہَا الْکَوَاکِبَ 
WA KHALAQTA BEHAL KAWAAKEBA 
and with which You have created heavenly bodies,
وَ جَعَلْتَہَا نُجُوْمًا وَّ بُرُوْجًا 
WA JA-A’LTAHAA NOJOOMAN WA BOROOJAN 
and made them fixed stars and planets,
وَّ مَصَابِیْحَ وَ زِیْنَۃً وَّ رُجُوْمًا 
WA MASAABEEHA WA ZEENATAN WA ROJOOMAN, 
and lamps for guidance at night, and as a means of decoration, and missiles for driving away devils,
وَّ جَعَلْتَ لَہَا مَشَارِقَ وَ مَغَارِبَ 
WA JA-ALTA LAHAA MASHAAREQA WA MAGHAAREBA 
and have created for them east and west,
وَ جَعَلْتَ لَہَا مَطَالِعَ وَ مَجَارِیَ 
WA JA-A’LTA LAHAA MATAALE-A’ WA MAJAAREYA, 
and have created for them the places of ascendancy and orbits,
وَ جَعَلْتَ لَہَا فَلَکًا وَّ مَسَابِحَ 
WA JA-A’LTA LAHAA FALAKAN WA MASAABEHA 
and created for them a firmament and sphere,
وَ قَدَّرْتَہَا فِی السَّمَآءِ مَنَازِلَ 
WA QADDARTAHAA FIS SAMAAA-E MANAAZELA 
and fixed for them stages in the heaven
فَاَحْسَنْتَ تَقْدِیْرَہَا 
FA-AHSANTA TAQDEERAHAA, 
and how beautiful the stages
وَ صَوَّرْتَہَا فَاَحْسَنْتَ تَصْوِیْرَہَا 
WA SAWWARTAHAA FA-AHSANTA TASWEERAHAA 
and shaped the stars and how beautiful the shapes
وَ اَحْصَیْتَہَا بِاَسْمَآئِکَ اِحْصَآءً 
WA AH-SAYTAHAA BE-ASMAAA-EKA EHSAAA-AN 
and made them stable through Your Name;
وَّ دَبَّرْتَہَا بِحِکْمَتِکَ تَدْبِیْرًا 
WA DABBARTAHAA BE HIKMATEKA TADBEERAN 
and from Your Wisdom You designed a system for them
فَاَحْسَنْتَ تَدْبِیْرَہَا 
FA-AHSANTA TADBEERAHAA 
and what a good system,
وَ سَخَّرْتَہَا بِسُلْطَانِ اللَّیْلِ 
WA SAKHKHARTAHAA BE-SULTAANIL LAYLE 
and controlled the heavenly bodies through the king of the night
وَ سُلْطَانِ النَّہَارِ 
WA SULTAANIN NAHAARE 
and the king of day,
وَ السَّاعَاتِ وَ عَدَدِ السِّنِیْنَ وَ الْحِسَابِ 
WAS-SAA-A’ATE WA A’DADAS SENEENA WAL-HESAABE, 
and through hours, making them a means for the reckoning of years and counting,
وَ جَعَلْتَ رُؤْیَتَہَا لِجَمِیْعِ النَّاسِ مَرْئًی وَّاحِدًا 
WA JA-A’LTA ROA-YATAHAA LE JAMEE-I’N NAASE MAR-AN WAAHEDAN 
making appearance of heavenly bodies regular and universal.
وَّ اَسْأَلُکَ اللّٰہُمَّ بِمَجْدِکَ الَّذِیْ کَلَّمْتَ بِہٖ عَبْدَکَ وَ رَسُوْلَکَ 
WA AS-ALOKAL LAAHUMMA BE MAJDEKAL LAZE KALLAMTA BEHI A’BDAKA WA RASOOLAKA 
And I beseech You, O Allah, through Your Glory, with which You addressed Your slave and Your Messenger,
مُوْسَی ابْنَ عِمْرَانَ عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ 
MOOSABNA I’MRAANA A’LAYHIS SALAAMO 
Moosa son of Imran peace be on him,
فِی الْمُقَدَّسِیْنَ 
FIL MOQADDASEENA 
while he was in the company of angels
فَوْقَ اِحْسَاسِ الْکَرُوْبِیْنَ 
FAWQA EHSAASIL KARROOBEENA 
which address even the favourite cherubin could not ever hear,
فَوْقَ غَمَآئِمِ النُّوْرِ 
FAWQA GHAMAAA-EMIN NOORE 
above the clouds of light,
فَوْقَ تَابُوْتِ الشَّہَادَۃِ 
FAWQA TAABOOTISH SHAHAADATE 
above the box of evidence,
فِیْ عَمُوْدِ النَّارِ 
FI A’MOODIN NAAARE 
within the pillar of fire
وَ فِیْ طُوْرِ سَیْنَآءَ 
WA FEE TOORE SAYNAAA-A 
on Mount Sinai,
وَ فِیْ جَبَلِ حُوْرِیْثَ 
WA FEE JABALE HOOREESA 
and on Mount Hurees
فِی الْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ 
FIL WAADIL MOQADDASE 
in the Holy Valley
فِی الْبُقْعَۃِ الْمُبَارَکَۃِ 
FIL BUQ-A’TIL MOBAARAKATE 
in the sacred tract of land
مِنْ جَانِبِ الطُّوْرِ الْاَیْمَنِ مِنَ الشَّجَرَۃِ 
MIN JAANEBIT TOORIL AYMANE MENASH-SHAJARATE 
to the right of Toor Mountain-through a tree;
وَ فِیْ اَرْضِ مِصْرِ 
WA FEE ARZE MISRA 
and again addressed him on the soil of Egypt,
بِتِسْعِ اٰیَاتٍ بَیِّنَاتٍ 
BE-TIS-E’ AAYAATIN BAYYENAATIN, 
after showing nine clear signs
وَ یَوْمَ فَرَقْتَ لِبَنِیْ اِسْرَآئِیْلَ الْبَحْرَ 
WA YAWMA FARAQTA LE-BANI ISRAAA-EELAL BAHRA 
and on the day You split the sea for the Children of Israel,
وَ فِیْ الْمُنْبَجِسَاتِ الَّتِیْ صَنَعْتَ بِہَا الْعَجَائِبَ 
WA FIL MUNBAJESAATIL LATEE SA-NA’TA BEHAL A’JAAA-EBA 
and caused springs to flow from a stone, thereby displaying wonders of Your might
فِیْ بَحْرِ سُوْفٍ 
FEE BAHRE SOOF, 
in a deep sea;
وَ عَقَدْتَ مَآءَ الْبَحْرِ فِیْ قَلْبِ الْغَمْرِ کَالْحِجَارَۃِ 
WA A’QADAT MAAA-AL BAHRE FEE QALBIL GHAMRE KAL-HAJAARATE, 
and on the day when You solidified the water of the sea in the midst of the storm,
وَ جَاوَزْتَ بِبَنِیْ اِسْرَآئِیْلَ الْبَحْرَ 
WA JAA-WAZTA BE BANI ISRAAEELAL BAHRA 
and caused the Children of Israel to pass by it,
وَ تَمَّتْ کَلِمَتُکَ الْحُسْنٰی عَلَیْہِمْ بِمَا صَبَرُوْا 
WA TAMMAT KALEMATOKAL HUSNAA A’LAYHIM BEMAA SABAROO 
and fulfilled Your excellent promises made to them because of their calmly endurance,
وَ اَوْرَثْتَہُمْ مَشَارِقَ الْاَرْضِ وَ مَغَارِبَہَا 
WA AWRASTAHUM MASHAAREQAL ARZE WA MAGHAAREBAHAL 
and made them the inheritors of the East and the West in the earth,
الَّتِیْ بَارَکْتَ فِیْہَا لِلْعَالَمِیْنَ 
LATEE BAARAKTA FEEHAA LIL-A’ALAMEENA, 
wherein there are blessings for all the worlds;
وَ اَغْرَقْتَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَ جُنُوْدَہٗ وَ مَرَاکِبَہٗ فِی الْیَمِّ 
WA AGHRAQTA FIRAWNA WA JONOODAHU WA MARAAKEBAHU FIL YAMME, 
and You drowned Firawn and his armies and boats in the water.
وَ بِاسْمِکَ الْعَظِیْمِ الْاَعْظَمِ 
WA BISMEKAL A’ZEEMIL A-A’ZAMIL 
And (I beseech You) through Your name, which is the most great,
الْاَعَزِّ الْاَجَلِّ الْاَکْرَمِ 
A-A’ZZIL AJALLIL AKRAME 
the most majestic, the most magnificent, the most noble;
وَ بِمَجْدِکَ الَّذِیْ تَجَلَّیْتَ بِہٖ لِمُوْسٰی کَلِیْمِکَ عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ فِیْ طُوْرِ سَیْنَآءَ 
WA BEMAJDEKAL LAZE TAJALLAYTA BEHI LE MOOSA KALEEMAKE A’LAYHIS SALAAMO FEE TORE SAYNAA-A, 
and through Your glory, with which You revealed light to Moosa, Your addressee, peace be on him, on Mount Sinai;
وَ لِاِبْرَاہِیْمَ عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ خَلِیْلِکَ مِنْ قَبْلُ فِیْ مَسْجِدِ الْخَیْفِ 
WA LE-IBRAAHEEMA A’LAYHIS SALAAMO KHALEELEKA MIN QABLO FEE MASJEDIL KHEEFE, 
and earlier radiated the light for Ibrahim, Your sincere friend peace be on him, in the mosque of al-Khayf;
وَ لِاِسْحَاقَ صَفِیِّکَ عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ فِیْ بِئْرِ شِیَعٍ 
WALE ISHAAQA SAFIYYEKA A’LAYHIS SALAAMO FEE BEA-RE SHEE-I’N 
and for Ishaaq, Your chosen Prophet, peace be on him, in the well of sheya’,
وَ لِیَعْقُوْبَ نَبِیِّکَ عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ فِیْ بَیْتِ اِیْلٍ 
WA LE YAA’QOOBA NABIYYEKA A’LAYHIS SALAAMO FEE BAYTE EELIN, 
and for Your Prophet Yaqoob, peace be on him, in Bayt Eel
وَ اَوْفَیْتَ لِاِبْرَاہِیْمَ عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ بِمِیْثَاقِکَ 
WA AWFAYTA LE-IBRAAHEEMA A’LAYHIS SALAAMO BE MEESHAAQEKA 
and through Your Glory, with which You fulfilled Your promise to Ibrahim, peace be on him;
وَ لِاِسْحَاقَ بِحَلَفِکَ 
WA LE-ISHAAQA BE HALFEKA 
and through Your Oath in favour of Ishaaq;
وَ لِیَعْقُوْبَ بِشَہَادَتِکَ 
WA LE YAA’QOOBA BE SHAHADATEKA 
and through Your witnessing favouring Yaqoob;
وَ لِلْمُؤُمِنِیْنَ بِوَعْدِکَ 
WA LIL-MOA-MENEENA BE WA’DEKA 
and through the fulfillments of Your promise to the faithful:
وَ لِلدَّاعِیْنَ بِاَسْمَآئِکَ فَاَجَبْتَ 
WA LIDDAA-EE’NA BE ASMAAEKA FA-AJABTA, 
and through Your Names with which You accepted the prayers of supplications;
وَ بِمَجْدِکَ الَّذِیْ ظَہَرَ لِمُوْسَی ابْنِ عِمْرَانَ عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ
WA BE MAJDEKAL LAZEE ZAHARA LE MOOSABNE I’MRAANA A’LAYHIS SALAAMO 
and through Your Glory, which appeared to Moosa, son of Imran, peace be upon him
عَلٰی قُبَّۃِ الرُّمَّانِ 
A’LAA QUBBATIR RUMMAANE 
in Qubbat al-Rumman;
وَ بِاٰیٰتِکَ الَّتِیْ وَقَعَتْ عَلٰی اَرْضِ مِصْرَ 
WA BE-AAYAATEKAL LATEE WA QA-A’T A’LAA ARZE MISRA 
and through Your Signs, which appeared on the soil of Egypt
بِمَجْدِ الْعِزَّۃِ وَ الْغَلَبَۃِ 
BE-MAJDIL I’ZZATE WAL-GHALABATE 
with great might and victory,
بِاٰیٰتٍ عَزِیْزَۃٍ وَّ بِسُلْطَانِ الْقُوَّۃِ 
BE-AAYAATE A’ZEEZATE WA BE SULTAANIL QUWWATE 
with powerful signs and with the display of full command
وَ بِعِزَّۃِ الْقُدْرَۃِ 
WA BE-I’ZZATIL QUDRATE 
and great power;
وَ بِشَاْنِ الْکَلِمَۃِ التَّآمَّۃِ 
WA BE-SHAANIL KALEMATIT TAAMMATE, 
and with the affair of the perfect word;
وَ بِکَلِمَاتِکَ الَّتِیْ تَفَضَّلْتَ بِہَا عَلٰی اَہْلِ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ 
WA BE KALEMAATEKAL LATEE TAFAZZALTA BEHAA A’LAA AHLIS SAMAAWAATE WAL ARZE 
and with Your words with which You do a favour for the people of the heavens and the earth
وَ اَہْلِ الدُّنْیَا وَ اَہْلِ الْاٰخِرَۃِ 
WA AHLID DUNYAA WA AHLIL AAKHERATE, 
and the people of this world and the hereafter;
وَ بِرَحْمَتِکَ الَّتِیْ مَنَنْتَ بِہَا عَلٰی جَمِیْعِ خَلْقِکَ 
WA BE RAHMATEKAL LATEE MANANTA BEHAA A’LAA JAMEE-E’ KHALQEKA, 
and through Your Mercy with which You bestow upon all Your creatures:
وَ بِاسْتِطَاعَتِکَ الَّتِیْ اَقَمْتَ بِہَا عَلَی الْعَالَمِیْنَ 
WA BIS-TETAA-A’TEKAL LATEE AQAMTA BEHAA A’LAL A’ALAMEENA, 
and through Your Power with which You dominate the worlds;
وَ بِنُوْرِکَ الَّذِیْ قَدْ خَرَّ مِنْ فَزَعِہٖ طُوْرُ سَیْنَآءَ 
WA BE NOOREKAL LAZEE QAD KHARRA MIN FAZA-E’HI TOORO SAYNAAA-A, 
and (I beseech You) through Your Light, through fear of which Mount Sinai collapsed,
وَ بِعِلْمِکَ وَ جَلَالِکَ وَ کِبْرِیَآئِکَ وَ عِزَّتِکَ وَ جَبَرُوْتِکَ 
WA BE-I’LMEKA WA JALAALEKA WA KIBREYAAA-EKA WA I’ZZATEKA WA JABAROOTEKAL 
through Your Knowledge, and Your Greatness and Majesty, and Your Unique Magnificence and Your Honour and (through) Your might,
الَّتِیْ لَمْ تَسْتَقِلَّہَا الْاَرْضُ 
LATEE LAM TASTAQILLAHAL ARZO 
which the earth could not bear,
وَ انْخَفَضَتْ لَہَا السَّمٰوٰتُ 
WAN-KHAFAZAT LAHAS SAMAAWAATO 
and, for which the heavens bent down,
وَ انْزَجَرَ لَہَا الْعُمْقُ الْاَکْبَرُ 
WAN-ZAJARA LAHAL U’MQUL AKBARO, 
and the great depths restrained themselves,
وَ رَکَدَتْ لَہَا الْبِحَارُ وَ اْلَانْہَارُ 
WA RAKADAT LAHAL BEHAARO WAL ANHAARO, 
and the seas and rivers became stable,
وَ خَضَعَتْ لَہَا الْجِبَالُ 
WA KHAZA-A’T LAHAL JEBAALO 
and to which the mountains made submission,
وَ سَکَنَتْ لَہَا الْاَرْضُ بِمَنَاکِبِہَا 
WA SAKANAT LAHAL ARZO BE MANAAKEBEHAA, 
and due to which the earth became firm on its shoulders,
وَ اسْتَسْلَمَتْ لَہَا الْخَلَآئِقُ کُلُّہَا 
WAS-TASLAMAT LAHAL KHALAA-EQO KULLOHAA, 
and to which all creatures submitted,
وَ خَفَقَتْ لَہَا الرِّیَاحُ فِیْ جَرَیَانِہَا 
WA KHAFAQAT LAHAR REYAAHO FI JARAYAANEHAA, 
and due to which the winds breathed,
وَ خَمَدَتْ لَہَا النِّیْرَانُ فِیْ اَوْطَانِہَا 
WA KHAMADAT LAHAN NEERAANO FEE AWTAANEHAA, 
and the flaming fires were extinguished in their places.
وَبِسُلْطَانِکَ الَّذِیْ عُرِفَتْ لَکَ بِہِ الْغَلَبَۃُ دَہْرَ الدُّہُوْرِ 
WA BE SULTAANEKAL LAZE O’REFAT LAKA BEHIL GHALABATO DAHRAD DOHOORE 
And I beseech You through Your might, through which You have been known to be All-powerful for ever and ever,
وَ حُمِدْتَ بِہٖ فِی السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِیْنَ 
WA HOMID-TA BEHI FIS SAMAAWAATE WAL ARAZEENA, 
and for which You have been praised in the heavens and the earth;
وَ بِکَلِمَتِکَ کَلِمَۃِ الصِّدْقِ الَّتِیْ سَبَقَتْ لِاَبِیْنَا آدَمَ عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ وَ ذُرِّیَّتِہٖ بِالرَّحْمَۃِ 
WA BEKALEMATEKA KALEMATIS SIDQIL LATEE SABAQAT LE-ABEENAA AADAMA A’LAYHIS SALAAMO WA ZURRIYYATEHI BIR-RAHMATE 
and I beseech You through Your word, the Word of Truth, which became a blessing for our father Adam and his generation;
وَ اَسْئَلُکَ بِکَلِمَتِکَ الَّتِیْ غَلَبَتْ کُلَّ شَیْءٍ 
WA AS-ALOKA BE KALEMATEKAL LATEE GHALABAT KULLA SHAY-IN, 
and I beseech You through Your word, by which You overcame everything;
وَّ بِنُوْرِ وَجْہِکَ الَّذِیْ تَجَلَّیْتَ بِہٖ لِلْجَبَلِ 
WA BE NOORE WAJHEKAL LAZEE TAJALLAYTA BEHI LIL JABALE 
and I beseech You through the light of Your Face, which when it flased on Mount Sinai
فَجَعَلْتَہٗ دَکًّا 
FA-JA-A’LTAHU DAKKAA 
crushed it to pieces,
وَّ خَرَّ مُوْسٰی صَعِقًا 
WA KHARRA MOOSAA SA-E’QAA, 
whereby Moosa fainted and fell down,
وَ بِمَجْدِکَ الَّذِیْ ظَہَرَ عَلٰی طُوْرِ سَیْنَآءَ 
WA BE MAJDEKAL LAZEE ZAHARA A’LAA TORE SAYNAAA-A 
and through Your Glory, which appeared on Mount Sinai,
فَکَلَّمْتَ بِہٖ عَبْدَکَ وَ رَسُوْلَکَ مُوْسَی ابْنَ عِمْرَانَ 
FA-KALLAMTA BEHI A’BDAKA WA RASOOLAKA MOOSABNE I’MRAANA, 
and through which You addressed Your slave and Your Mesenger; Moosa, son of Imran,
وَ بِطَلْعَتِکَ فِیْ سَاعِیْرَ 
WA BE TAL-A’TEKA FEE SAA-E’ERA 
and through Your appearance in Sa'ir
وَ ظُہُوْرِکَ فِیْ جَبَلِ فَارَانَ 
WA ZOHOOREKA FEE JABALE FAARAANA 
and on Mount Faran
بِرَبَوَاتِ الْمُقَدَّسِیْنَ 
BE-RABAWAATIL MOQADDASEENA 
near Rabawat, which are clean and holy places,
وَ جُنُوْدِ الْمَلآئِکَۃِ الصَّافِّیْنَ 
WA JONOODIL MALAAA-EKATIS SAAF-FEENA 
when troops of heavenly angels were in rows,
وَ خُشُوْعِ الْمَلآئِکَۃِ الْمُسَبِّحِیْنَ 
WA KHOSHOO-E’L MALAAA-EKATIL MOSABBEHEENA, 
and with the submissiveness of the angels praising You,
بِبَرَکَاتِکَ الَّتِیْ بَارَکْتَ فِیْہَا عَلٰی اِبْرَاہِیْمَ خَلِیْلِکَ عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ 
WA BE-BARAKAATEKAL LATEE BAARAKTA FEEHAA A’LAA IBRAAHEEMA KHALEELEKA A’LAYHIS SALAAMO 
and with Your blessings with which You honoured Abraham, Your sincere friend, peace be upon him,
فِیْ اُمَّۃِ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّی اللہُ عَلَیْہِ وَ اٰلِہٖ 
FEE UMMATE MOHAMMADIN SALLAL LAAHO A'LAYHE WA AALEHI
among the followers of Muhammad, Your blessings be upon him and his Progeny
وَ بَارَکْتَ لِاِسْحَاقَ صَفِیِّکَ 
WA BAARAKTA LE-ISHAAQA SAFIYYEKA 
and You honoured Ishaaq, Your chosen prophet,
فِیْ اُمَّۃِ عِیْسٰی عَلَیْہِمَا السَّلَامُ 
FEE UMMATE E’ESAA A’LAYHEMAS SALAAMO, 
among the followers of Eesaa, peace be on them both,
وَ بَارَکْتَ لِیَعْقُوْبَ اِسْرٰئِیْلِکَ 
WA BAARAKTA LE YA’QOOBA ISRAAA-EELEKA 
and honoured Yaqoob, Your favoured slave,
فِیْ اُمَّۃِ مُوْسَی عَلَیْہِمَا السَّلَامُ 
FEE UMMATE MOOSAA A’LAYHEMAS SALAAMO, 
among the followers of Moses, peace be on them both,
وَ بَارَکْتَ لِحَبِیْبِکَ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّي اللہُ عَلَیْہِ وَ اٰلِہٖ 
WA BAARAKTA LE HABIBEKA MOHAMMADIN SALLALLAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI 
and honoured Your intimate friend Muhammad, may the blessings of Allah be upon him and his Progeny,
فِیْ عِتْرَتِہٖ وَ ذُرِّیَّتِہٖ وَ اُمَّتِہٖ 
FEE I’TRATEHI WA ZURRIYYATEHI WA UMMATEHI, 
among his offspring and progeny, and his followers
اَللّٰہُمَّ وَ کَمَا غِبْنَا عَنْ ذٰلِکَ وَ لَمْ نَشْہَدْہُ 
ALLAAHUMMA WA KAMAA GHIBNAA A’N ZAALEKA WA LAM NASH-HAD-HO 
O Allah! Just as were absent and didn’t witness these manifestations of Your glory,
وَ اٰمَنَّا بِہٖ وَ لَمْ نَرَہٗ صِدْقًا وَّ عَدْلًا 
WA AAMANNAA BEHI WA LAM NARAHU SIDQAN WA A’DLAA 
yet we believed in their truth and justice, without having been eyewitnesses,
اَنْ تُصَلِّیَ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
AN TOSALLEYA A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN 
So we beseech You to send Your blessings upon Muhammad and the Progeny of Muhammad,
وَّ اَنْ تُبَارِکَ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
WA A’N TOBAAREKA A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN 
and honour Muhammad and the Progeny of Muhamamad,
وَّ تَرَحَّمَ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّاٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
WA TARAHHAMA A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN 
and have mercy on Muhammad and the Progeny of Muhammad,
کَاَفْضَلِ مَا صَلَّیْتَ وَ بَارَکْتَ وَ تَرَحَّمْتَ 
KA-AFZALE MAA SALLAYTA WA BAARAKTA WA TARAHHAMTA
with the blessings, honour, and mercy
عَلٰی اِبْرَاحِیْمَ وَ اٰلِ اِبْرَاہِیْمَ 
A’LAA IBRAAHEEMA WA AALE IBRAAHEEMA 
you sent and bestowed on Abraham and the progeny of Abraham.
اِنَّکَ حَمِیْدٌ مُّجِیْدٌ 
INNAKA HAMEEDUM MAJEEDUN 
Surely You are Praiseworthy, Glorious,
فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا تُرِیْدُ 
FA-A’ALUL LEMAA TOREEDO 
the Doer of what You will.
وَ اَنْتَ عَلٰی کُلِّ شَیْءٍ قَدِیْرٌ.
WA ANTA A’LAA KULLE SHAY-IN QADEERUN.
You are Powerful over all things

Now one should express his legitimate desire and beseech Allah to fulfill it, then recite the following:
یَا حَنَّانُ یَا مَنَّانُ 
YAA HANNAANO YAA MANNAANO 
O Compassionate, O Kind
یَا بَدِیْعَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَ الْاَرْضِ 
YAA BADEE-A’S SAMAAWAATE WAL ARZE 
O Original Designer of Heavens and Earth
یَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَ الْاِکْرَامِ یَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِیْنَ 
YAA ZAL-JALAALE WAL IKRAAME YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEENA 
O Lord of Glory and Honour O most Merciful of all the merciful.
اَللّٰہُمَّ بِحَقِّ ہٰذَا الدُّعَآءِ 
ALLAAHUMMA BEHAQQE HAAZAD DO-A’AA-E 
O Allah, for the sake of this prayer, 
وَ بِحَقِّ ہٰذِہِ الْاَسْمَآءِ 
WA BE HAQQE HAAZEHIL ASMAAA-IL 
and for the sake of these Names 
الَّتِیْ لَا یَعْلَمُ تَفْسِیْرَہَا وَ لَا یَعْلَمُ بَاطِنَہَا غَیْرُکَ 
LATEE LAA YA’LAMO TAFSEERAHAA WA LAA TAAWEELOHAA WA LAA BAATENAHAA WA LAA ZAAHERAHAA GHAIROKA 
which no one can interpret, the inner meaning of which no one other than Yourself knows.
صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN 
Send Your blessing upon Muhammad and the Progeny of Muhammad; 
وَّ افْعَلْ بِیْ مَا اَنْتَ اَہْلُہٗ وَ لَا تَفْعَلْ بِیْ مَا اَنَا اَہْلُہٗ 
WAF-A’L BEE MAA ANTA AHLOHU WA LAA TAF-A’L BEE MAA ANAA AHLOHU 
and do to me what suits You and do not do to me what I deserve
وَ اغْفِرْ لِیْ مِنْ ذُنُوْبِیْ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِنْہَا وَ مَا تَاَخَّرَ 
WAGHFIRLEE MIN ZONOOBI MAA TAQADDAMA MINHAA WA MAA TA-AKH-KHARA 
and forgive my sins past and future, 
وَ وَسِّعْ عَلَیَّ مِنْ حَلَالِ رِزْقِکَ 
WA WASSE’ A’LAYYAA MIN HALAALE RIZQEKA 
and increase Your lawful sustenance for me,
وَ اکْفِنِیْ مَؤُنَۃَ اِنْسَانِ سَوْءٍ وَّ جَارِ سَوْءٍ 
WAK-FENEE MAOONATA INSAANE SAW-IN WA JAARE SAW-INW 
and save me from the help of wicked men, wicked neighbours, 
وَّ قَرِیْنِ سَوْءٍ وَّ سُلْطَانِ سَوْءٍ 
WA QAREENE SAW-INW WA SULTAANE SAW-INW 
wicked companions, and wicked rulers
اِنَّکَ عَلٰی مَا تَشَآءُ قَدِیْرٌ 
INNAKA A'LAA MAA TASHAA-O QADEERUN.
Verily You are able to do whatever You will, 
وَ بِکُلِّ شَیْءٍ عَلِیْمٌ 
WA BE-KULLE SHAY-IN A'LEEM.
and You know everything. 
اٰمِیْنَ رَبَّ الْعَالَمِیْنَ.
AAMEEN RABBAL A'ALAMEEN.
Aameen, O Lord of the worlds.

Al-Majlisi (r.a.) narrated from Sayed Ibn Baqi’s ‘Al-Misbah’ that one should say after reciting Dua al-Simaat:
اَللّٰہُمَّ بِحَقِّ ہٰذَا الدُّعَآءِ 
ALLAAHUMMA BEHAQQE HAAZAD DO-A’AA-E 
O Allah For the sake of this prayer,
وَ بِحَقِّ ہٰذِہِ الْاَسْمَآءِ 
WA BE HAQQE HAAZEHIL ASMAAA-IL 
and for the sake of these Names
الَّتِیْ لَا یَعْلَمُ تَفْسِیْرَہَا وَ لَا تَاْوِیْلَہَا 
LATEE LAA YA’LAMO TAFSEERAHAA WA LAA TAAWEELOHAA 
which no one can interpret,
وَلَا بَاطِنَہَا وَ لَا ظَاہِرَہَا غَیْرُکَ 
WA LAA BAATENAHAA WA LAA ZAAHERAHAA GHAIROKA 
the inner and outer meaning of which no one other than Your self knows.
اَنْ تُصَلِّیَ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
AN TOSALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN 
Send Your blessing upon Muhammad and the Progeny of Muhammad;
وَ اَنْ تَرْزُقَنِیْ خَیْرَ الدُّنْیَا وَ الْاٰخِرَۃِ.
WA AN TARZOQANEE KHARAD DUNYAA WAL AAKHERAH
and give me the good of this world and the hereafter;
وَ افْعَلْ بِیْ مَا اَنْتَ اَہْلُہٗ 
WAF-A’L BEE MAA ANTA AHLOHU 
and do to me what suits You
وَ لَا تَفْعَلْ بِیْ مَا اَنَا اَہْلُہٗ 
WA LAA TAF-A’L BEE MAA ANAA AHLOHU 
and do not do to me what I deserve
وَ انْتَقِمْ لِیْ مِنْ...
WANTAQIM LEE MIN…
Name your enemy than say:
وَ اغْفِرْ لِیْ مِنْ ذُنُوْبِیْ 
WAGHFIRLEE MIN ZONOOBI 
and forgive my sins
مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِنْہَا وَ مَا تَاَخَّرَ 
MAA TAQADDAMA MINHAA WA MAA TA-AKH-KHARA 
past and future,
وَ لِوَالِدَیَّ وَ لِجَمِیْعِ الْمُؤْمِنِیْنَ وَ اْلمُؤْمِنَاتِ 
WA LE WAALEDAYYAA WA LE JAMEE-I’L MO-MENEENA WAL MOMENAATE 
and forgive my parents and all faithful men and women,
وَ وَسِّعْ عَلَیَّ مِنْ حَلَالِ رِزْقِکَ 
WA WASSE’ A’LAYYAA MIN HALAALE RIZQEKA 
and increase Your lawful sustenance for me,
وَ اکْفِنِیْ مَؤُنَۃَ اِنْسَانِ سَوْءٍ 
WAK-FENEE MAOONATA INSAANE SAW-IN 
and save me from the help of wicked men,
وَّ جَارِ سَوْءٍ وَّ سُلْطَانِ سَوْءٍ 
WA JAARE SAW-INW WA SULTAANE SAW-INW 
wicked neighbours, wicked rulers,
وَّ قَرِیْنِ سَوْءٍ وَّ یَوْمِ سَوْءٍ وَّ سَاعَۃِ سَوْءٍ 
WA QAREENE SAW-INW WA YAWME SAW-INW WA SAA-A’TE SAW-IN 
wicked companions, and evil days, and evil hours,
وَ انْتَقِمْ لِیْ مِمَّنْ یَکِیْدُنِیْ 
WANTAQIM LEE MIMMAN YAKEEDONEE 
and exact vengeance for me on everyone who hatches secret plots against me,
وَ مِمَّنْ یَبْغِیْ عَلَیَّ وَ یُرِیْدُ بِیْ وَ بِاَہْلِیْ 
WA MIMMAN YABGHEE A’LAYYA WA YOREEDO BEE WA BE AHLEE 
and on everyone who oppresses me and seeks to do to me or my family
وَ اَوْلَادِیْ وَ اِخْوَانِیْ 
WA AWLAADEE WA IKHWAANEE 
or my children or my brothers
وَ جِیْرَانِیْ وَ قَرَابَاتِیْ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِیْنَ وَ الْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ظُلْمًا
WA JEERAANI WA QARAABATI MENAL MOMENEENA WAL MOMENAATE ZULMAN 
or my neighbours or my relations among faithful men and women. (seeks to do) injustice
اِنَّکَ عَلٰی مَا تَشَآءُ قَدِیْرٌ 
INNAKA A’LAA MAA TASHAAA-O QADEERUN 
Verily You are able to do whatever You will,
وَّ بِکُلِّ شَیْءٍ عَلِیْمٌ 
WA BE KULLE SHAY’IN A’LEEMUN 
and You know everything.
اٰمِیْنَ رَبَّ الْعٰلَمِیْنَ. 
AAMEEN RABBAL A’AALAMEEN
Aameen, O Lord of the worlds.

Then say:
اَللّٰہُمَّ بِحَقِّ ہٰذَا الدُّعَآءِ 
ALLAAHUMMA BEHAQQE HAAZAD DO-A’AA-E 
O Allah! For the sake of this prayer,
تَفَضَّلْ عَلٰی فُقَرَآءِ الْمُؤْمِنِیْنَ وَ الْمُؤْمِنَاتِ بِالْغِنٰی وَ الثَّرْوَۃِ 
TAFAZZAL A’LAA FOQARAAA-IL MOMENEENA WAL MOMENAATE BIL GHENAA WAS SARWATE 
grant wealth and affluence to indigent faithful men and women,
وَ عَلٰی مَرْضَی الْمُؤْمِنیْنَ وَ الْمُؤْمِنَاتِ بِالشِّفَآءِ وَ الصِّحَّۃِ
WA A’LAA MARZAL MOMENEENA WAL MOMENAATE BISH-SHEFAA-E WAS-SEHATE 
and recovery and sound health to the sick faithful men and women,
وَ عَلٰی اَحْیَآءِ الْمُؤْمِنِیْنَ وَ الْمُؤْمِنَاتِ بِاللُّطْفِ وَ الْکَرَامَۃِ
WA A’LAA AHYAAA-IL MOMENEENA WAL MOMENAATE BIL-LUTFE WAL KARAAMATE 
and bliss and clemency to the living faithful men and women,
وَ عَلٰی اَمْوَاتِ الْمُؤْمِنِیْنَ وَ الْمُؤْمِنَاتِ بِالْمَغْفِرَۃِ وَ الرَّحْمَۃِ
WA A’LAA AMWAATIL MOMENEENA WAL MOMENAATE BIL MAGHFERATE WAR-RAHMATE 
and remit the sins of, and have mercy on, the deceased faithful men and women,
وَ عَلٰی مُسَافِرِی الْمُؤْمِنِیْنَ وَ الْمْؤْمِنَاتِ بِالرَّدِّ اِلٰی اَوْطَانِہِمْ سَالِمِیْنَ غَانِمِیْنَ 
WA A’LAA MOSAAFERIL MOMENEENA WAL MOMENAATE BIR-RADDE ELAA AWTAANEHIM SAALEMEENA GHAANEMEENA 
and arrange the return home of all faithful travellers with safety and gain.
بِرَحْمَتِکَ یَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِیْنَ 
BE RAHMATEKA YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEENA 
Through Your mercy, O Most Merciful of all the merciful.
وَ صَلَّی اللهُ عَلٰی سَیِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ خَاتَمِ النَّبِیِّیْنَ 
WA SALLALLAAHO A’LAA SAYYEDENAA MOHAMMADIN KHAATAMIN NABIYYEENA 
May Allah’s blessings be upon our master Muhammad, the seal of the prophets,
وَ عِتْرَتِہِ الطَّاہِرِیْنَ 
WA I’TRATEHIT TAAHERAANA 
and his Progeny, the purified.
وَ سَلَّمَ تَسْلِیْمًا کَثِیْرًا.
WA SALLAMA TASLEEMAN KASEERAN
and His peace be upon them plentifully

Sheikh Ibn Fahad narrates that it is recommended after reciting Dua al-Semaat to recite the following:
 اَللّٰہُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْئَلُکَ بِحُرْمَۃِ ہٰذَا الدُّعَآءِ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA BE HURMATE HAAZEID-DO-A’AAA-E 
O Allah I ask you for the sake of this prayer
وَ بِمَا فَاتَ مِنْہُ مِنَ الْاَسْمَآءِ 
WA BEMAA FAATA MINHO MENAL AS-MAAA-E 
and what was mentioned in it from names
وَ بِمَا یَشْتَمِلُ عَلَیْہِ مِنَ التَّفْسِیْرِ وَ التَّدْبِیْرِ 
WA BEMAA YASHTAMELO A’LAYHE MENAT-TAFSEERE WAT-TADBEERIL 
and what it contains from meanings and design
الَّذِیْ لَا یُحِیْطُ بِہٖ اِلَّا اَنْتَ 
LAZEE LAA YOHEETO BEHI ILLAA ANTA 
which none other than You comprehend fully
اَنْ تَفْعَلَ بِیْ...
AN TAF-A’LA BEE...
that you do to me …
mention your legitimate needs.

E27.Title: Dua Mashlool
E27.Data:
Dua-e-Mashlool
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEME 
In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
اَللّٰہُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْئَلُکَ بِاسْمِکَ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA BISMEKA 
O Allah, verily I beseech You by Your Name:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ 
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEME 
In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
یَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَ الْاِکْرَامِ 
YAA ZALJALAALE WAL IKRAAME 
O Lord of majesty and honor!
یَا حَیُّ یَا قَیُّوْمُ 
YAA HAYYO YAA QAYYOMO 
O Ever-living! O Self-subsistent!
یَا حَیُّ لَا اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اَنْتَ 
YAA HAYYO LAA ILAAHA ILLAA ANTA 
O Ever-Living! There is no god but You!
یَا ہُوَ یَا مَنْ لَّا یَعْلَمُ مَا ہُوَ 
YAA HOWA YAA MALLAA YA’LAMO MAA HOWA 
O He Whom none knows what He is,
وَ لَا کَیْفَ ہُوَ 
WA LAA KAIFA HOWA 
وَ لَا اَیْنَ ہُوَ 
WA LAA AYNA HOWA 
nor where He is,
وَ لَا حَیْثُ ہُوَ اِلَّا ہُوَ 
WA LAA HAYSO HOWA ILLAA HOWA 
nor in what respect He is, but He!
یَا ذَا الْمُلْکِ وَ الْمَلَکُوْتِ 
YAA ZALMULKE WAL MALAKOOTE 
O Possessor of dominion and kingdom!
یَا ذَا الْعِزَّۃِ وَ الْجَبَرُوْتِ 
YAA ZAL IZZATE WAL JABAROOTE 
O Possessor of might and invincibility!
یَا مَلِکُ یَا قُدُّوْسُ یَا سَلَامُ 
YAA MALEKO YAA QUDDOOSE YAA SALAAMO 
O King! O All-holy! O Giver of peace!
یَا مُؤْمِنُ یَا مُہَیْمِنُ 
YAA MOMENO YAA MOHAIMO 
O Granter of security! O All-preserver!
یَا عَزِیْزُ یَا جَبَّارُ یَا مُتَکَبِّرُ 
YAA A'ZEEZO YAA JABBAARO YAA MUTAKABBERO 
O Almighty! O All-compeller! O All-sublime!
یَا خَالِقُ یَا بَارِءُ یَا مُصَوِّرُ 
YAA KHAALEQO YAA BARE-O YAA MUSAWWERO 
O Creator! O Maker! O Shaper!
یَا مُفِیْدُ یَا مُدَبِّرُ 
YAA MUFEEDO YAA MUDABBERO 
O grantor of Benefits! O Director!
یَا شَدِیْدُ یَا مُبْدِءُ 
YAA SHADEEDO YAA MUBDEO 
O Severe (in punishing the evildoers)! O Originator!
یَا مُعِیْدُ یَا مُبِیْدُ 
YAA MO-E’EEDO YAA MUBEEDO 
O Returner! O Destroyer!
یَا وَدُوْدُ یَا مَحْمُوْدُ یَا مَعْبُوْدُ 
YAA WADOODO YAA MAHMOODO YAA MA’BOODO 
O All-loving! O All-praiseworthy! O All-worshipped!
یَا بَعِیْدُ یَا قَرِیْبُ 
YAA BA-E’EEDO YAA QAREEBO 
O Far! O Nigh!
یَا مُجِیْبُ یَا رَقِیْبُ یَا حَسِیْبُ 
YAA MUJEEBO YAA RAQEEBO YAA HASEEBO 
O Responder! O Watcher! O Reckoner!
یَا بَدِیْعُ یَا رَفِیْعُ 
YAA BADEE-O YAA RAFEE-O' 
O Innovator! O Exalter!
یَا مَنِیْعُ یَا سَمِیْعُ 
YAA MANEE-O' YAA SAMEE-O'
O Inaccessible! O All-hearing!
یَا عَلِیْمُ یَا حَلِیْمُ یَا کَرِیْمُ 
YAA A’LEEMO YAA HALEEMO YAA KAREEMO 
O All-knowing! O All-clement! O All-generous!
یَا حَکِیْمُ یَا قَدِیْمُ 
YAA HAKEEMO YAA QADEEMO 
O All-wise! O Eternal!
یَا عَلِیُّ یَا عَظِیْمُ 
YAA A’LEEYO YAA A’ZEEMO 
O All-high! O All-tremendous!
یَا حَنَّانُ یَا مَنَّانُ 
YAA HANNAANO YAA MANNAANO 
O All-commiserating! O All-gracious!
یَا دَیَّانُ یَا مُسْتَعَانُ 
YAA DAYYAANO YAA MUSTA’AANO 
O Condemner! O Recourse!
یَا جَلِیْلُ یَا جَمِیْلُ 
YAA JALEELO YAA JAMEELO 
O All-majestic! O All-handsome!
یَا وَکِیْلُ یَا کَبِیْلُ 
YAA WAKEELO YAA KAFEELO 
O Guardian! O Surety!
یا مُقِیْلُ یَا مُنِیْلُ 
YAA MUQEELO YAA MUNEELO 
O Annuller! O Bestower!
یَا نَبِیْلُ یَا دَلِیْلُ 
YAA NABEELO YAA DALEELO 
O All-noble! O Leader!
یَا ہَادِیُ یَا بَادِیُ 
YAA HAADEE YAA BAADEE 
O Guide! O All-Apparent!
یَا اَوَّلُ یَا آخِرُ 
YAA AWWALO YAA AAKHERO 
O First! O Last!
یَا ظَاہِرُ یَا بَاطِنُ 
YAA ZAAHERO YAA BAATENO 
O Outward! O Inward!
یَا قَآئِمُ یَا دَآئِمُ 
YAA QAAEMO YAA DAAEMO 
O All-steadfast! O Everlasting!
یَا عَالِمُ یَا حَاکِمُ 
YAA A’AALEMO YAA HAAKEMO 
O Knower! O Decider!
یَا قَاضِیْ یَا عَادِلُ 
YAA QAAZEE YAA A’AADELO 
O Judge! O Just!
یَا فَاصِلُ یَا وَاصِلُ 
YAA FAASELO YAA WAASELO 
O Separator! O Joiner!
یَا طَاہِرُ یَا مُطَہِّرُ 
YAA TAAHERO YAA MOTAHHERO 
O Pure! O Purifier!
یَا قَادِرُ یَا مُقْتَدِرُ 
YAA QAADERO YAA MUQTADERO 
O All-powerful! O All-able!
یَا کَبِیْرُ یَا مُتَکَبِّرُ 
YAA KABEERO YAA MOTAKABBERO 
O All-great! O All-sublime!
یَا وَاحِدُ یَا اَحَدُ یَا صَمَدُ 
YAA WAAHEDO YAA AHADO YAA SAMADO 
O One! O Unique! O eternally Besought of all!
یَا مَنْ لَّمْ یَلِدْ وَ لَمْ یُوْلَدْ 
YAA MAN LAM YALID WALAM YOOLAD 
O He Who begets not and was not begotten,
وَ لَمْ یَکُنْ لَّہٗ کُفُوًا اَحَدٌا 
WA LAM YAKUL LAHU KOFO-WAN AHADUN 
equal to Whom is none,
وَ لَمْ یَکُنْ لَّہٗ صَاحِبَۃٌ 
WA LAM YAKUL LAHU SAAHEBATUN 
Who has no consort,
وَ لَا کَانَ مَعَہٗ وَزِیْرٌ 
WA LAA KAANA MA’AHOO WAZEERUN 
with Him is no aide
وَلَا اتَّخَذَ مَعَہٗ مُشِیْرًا 
WA LAT-TAKHAZA MA’AHOO MUSHEERAN 
nor has He taken any adviser,
وَ لَا احْتَاجَ اِلٰی ظَہِیْرٍ 
WA LAAH TAAJA ELAA ZAHEERIN 
nor needs He any assistant,
وَّ لَا کَانَ مَعَہٗ مِنْ اِلٰہٍ غَیْرُہٗ 
WA LAA KAANAA MAHOO MIN ILAAHIN GHAIROHU
nor with Him is any god but He—
لَا اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اَنْتَ 
LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTA 
there is no god but You.
فَتَعَالَیْتَ عَمَّا یَقُوْلُ الظَّالِمُوْنَ عُلُوًّا کَبِیْرًا 
FATA’AALAYTA A’MMAA YAQOOLUZ ZAALEMOONA U’LOOWAN KABEERAN 
So exalted are You above what the evildoers say, a great exaltation!
یَا عَلِیُّ یَا شَامِخُ یَا بَاذِخُ 
YAA A’LEEYO YAA SHAAMEKHO YAA BAAZEKHO 
O All-high! O All-lofty! O All-towering!
یَا فَتَّاحُ یَا نَفَّاحُ یَا مُرْتَاحُ 
YAA FATTAAHO YAA NAFFAAHO YAA MURTAAHO 
O All-opener! O All-diffuser! O All-restful!
یَا مُفَرِّجُ یَا نَاصِرُ یَا مُنْتَصِرُ 
YAA MUFARREJO YAA NAASERO YAA MUNTASERO 
O Bestower of relief! O Helper! O Giver of victory!
یَا مُدْرِکُ یَا مُہْلِکُ یَا مُنْتَقِمُ 
YAA MUDREKO YAA MUHLEKO YAA MUNTAQEMO 
O Comprehender! O Destroyer! O Avenger!
یَا بَاعِثُ یَا وَارِثُ 
YAA BAA-E’SO YAA WAARESO 
O Upraiser! O Inheritor!
یَا طَالِبُ یَا غَالِبُ 
YAA TAALEBO YAA GHAALEBO 
O Seeker! O Vanquisher!
یَا مَنْ لَّا یَفُوْتُہٗ ہَارِبٌ 
YAA MAL LAA YAFOOTOHU HAAREBUN 
O He from Whom no fugitive can escape!
یَا تَوَّابُ یَا اَوَّابُ یَا وَہَّابُ 
YAA TAWWAABO YAA AWWAABO YAA WAHHAABO 
O All-relenting! O All-forbearing! O All-bestower!
یَا مُسَبِّبَ الْاَسْبَابِ 
YAA MOSABBEBAL ASBAABE 
O Originator of all means!
یَا مُفَتِّحَ الْاَبْوَابِ 
YAA MUFATTEHAL ABWAABE 
O Opener of all doors!
یَا مَنْ حَیْثُ مَا دُعِیَ اَجَابَ 
YAA MAN HAISO MAA DO-E’YA AJAABA 
O He Who answers wherever He is called upon!
یَا طَہُوْرُ یَا شَکُوْرُ 
YAA TAHOORO YAA SHAKOORO 
O All-Pure! O All-thankful!
یَا عَفُوُّ یَا غَفُوْرُ 
YAA A’FOO-O YAA GHAFOORO 
O Exempter! O Forgiver!
یَا نُوْرَ النُّوْرِ 
YAA NOORAN NOORE 
O Light of light!
یَا مُدَبِّرَ الْاُمُوْرِ 
YAA MUDABBERAL OMOORE 
O Director of all affairs!
یَا لَطِیْفُ یَا خَبِیْرُ 
YAA LADEEFO YAA KHABEERO 
O All-subtle! O All-aware!
یَا مُجِیْرُ یَا مُنِیْرُ 
YAA MOJEERO YAA MONEERO 
O Protector! O Illuminator!
یَا بَصِیْرُ یَا ظَہِیْرُ یَا کَبِیْرُ 
YAA BASEERO YAA ZAHEERO YAA KABEERO 
O All-seeing! O All-aiding! O All-great!
یَا وِتْرُ یَا فَرْدُ 
YAA WITRO YAA FARDO 
O Alone! O Solitary!
یَا اَبَدُ یَا سَنَدُ یَا صَمَدُ 
YAA ABADO YAA SANADO YAA SAMADO 
O Eternity without end! O Support! O Everlasting Refuge!
یَا کَافِیْ یَا شَافِیْ 
YAA KAAFEE YAA SHAAFEE 
O All-sufficient! O All-healing!
یَا وَافِیْ یَا مُعَافِیْ 
YAA WAAFEE YAA MO-A’AFEE 
O All-fulfilling! O All-relieving!
یَا مُحْسِنُ یَا مُجْمِلُ 
YAA MOHSENO YAA MUJMELO 
O All-kind! O All-gracious!
یَا مُنْعِمُ یَا مُفْضِلُ 
YAA MUN-E’MO YAA MUFZELO 
O All-benevolent! O All-bountiful!
یَا مُتَکَرِّمُ یَا مُتَفَرِّدُ 
YAA MOTAKARREMO YAA MOTAFARREDO 
O All-beneficent! O All-solitary!
یَا مَنْ عَلَا فَقَہَرَ 
YAA MAN A’LAA FAQAHARA 
O He Who is exalted and dominates!
یَا مَنْ مَلَکَ فَقَدَرَ 
YAA MAN MALAKA FAQADARA 
O He Who is master and exercises power!
یَا مَنْ بَطَنَ فَخَبَرَ 
YAA MAN BATANA FAKHABARA 
O He Who is inward and aware!
یَا مَنْ عُبِدَ فَشَکَرَ 
YAA MAN O’BEDA FA-SHAKARA 
O He Who is worshipped and thankful!
یَا مَنْ عُصِیَ فَغَفَرَ 
YAA MAN O’SEYA FAGHAFARA 
O He Who is disobeyed and forgives!
یَا مَنْ لَّا تَحْوِیْہِ الْفِکَرُ 
YAA MAL LAA TAHVEEHIL FEKARO 
O He Who is not encompassed by thoughts,
وَ لَا یُدْرِکُہٗ بَصَرٌ 
WA LAA YUDREKOHU BASARUN 
nor perceived by vision,
وَ لَا یَخْفٰی عَلَیْہِ اَثَرٌ 
WA LAA YAKHFAA A’LAYHE ASARUN 
and from Whom no trace remains hidden!
یَا رَازِقَ الْبَشَرِ 
YAA RAAZEQAL BASHARE 
O Provider of mankind!
یَا مُقَدِّرَ کُلِّ قَدَرٍ 
YAA MUQADDERA KULLE QADARIN 
O Determiner of every lot!
یَا عَالِیَ الْمَکَانِ 
YAA A’ALEYAL MAKAANE 
O Lofty in place!
یَا شَدِیْدَ الْاَرْکَانِ 
YAA SHADEEDAL ARKAANE 
O Firm in supports!
یَا مُبَدِّلَ الزَّمَانِ 
YAA MUBADDELAZ ZAMAANE 
O Transformer of times!
یَا قَابِلَ الْقُرْبَانِ 
YAA QAABELAL QURBAANE 
O Accepter of sacrifices!
یَا ذَا الْمَنِّ وَ الْاِحْسَانِ 
YAA ZAL MANNE WAL EHSAANE 
O Lord of graciousness and benevolence!
یَا ذَا الْعِزَّۃِ وَ السُّلْطَانِ 
YAA ZAL I'ZZATE WAS SULTAANE 
O Lord of might and force!
یَا رَحِیْمُ یَا رَحْمٰنُ 
YAA RAHEEMO YAA RAHMAANO
O All-compassionate! O All-merciful!
یَا مَنْ ہُوَ کُلَّ یَوْمٍ فِیْ شَاْنٍ 
YAA MAN HOWA KULLE YAWMIN FEE SHANIN 
O He Who is every day upon some labor!
یَا مَنْ لَّا یَشْغَلُہٗ شَاْنٌ عَنْ شَاْنٍ 
YAA MAN LAA YASHGHALOHU SHANUN A’N SHANIN

یَا مَنْ قَبِلَ قُرْبَانَ ہَابِیْلَ 
YAA MAN QABELA QURBAANA HAABEELA 
O He Who accepted the sacrifice of Haabeel
وَ جَعَلَ الَّعْنَۃَ عَلٰی قَابِیْلَ 
WA JA’ALAL LA’NATA A’LAA QAABEELA 
and placed a curse upon Qaabeel!
یَا ہَازِمَ الْاَحْزَابِ لِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّی اللهُ عَلَیْہِ وَ اٰلِہٖ 
YAA HAAZEMAL AHZAABE LE MOHAMMADIN SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHE WAA AALEHI 
O He Who routed the parties for Muhammad, may Allah bless him and his Household!
صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN 
Bless Muhammad, the household of Muhammad,
وَّ عَلٰی جَمِیْعِ الْمُرْسَلِیْنَ وَ مَلَآئِکَتِکَ الْمُقَرَّبِیْنَ 
WA A’LAA JAMEE-IL MURSALEENA WA MALAA-EKATEKAL MOQARRABEENA 
all the messengers, Your archangels,
وَ اَہْلِ طَاعَتِکَ اَجْمَعِیْنَ 
WA AHLE TAA-ATEKA AJMA-E'ENA 
and all those who obey You!
وَ اَسْئَلُکَ بِکُلِّ مَسْئَلَۃٍ سَئَلَکَ بِہَا اَحَدٌ 
WA ASALOKA BEKULLE MAS-ALATIN SA-ALAKA BEHAA AHADUM 
I beseech You the supplication of every one who has besought you
مِّمَّنْ رَضِیْتَ عَنْہُ فَحَتَمْتَ لَہٗ عَلَی الْاِجَابَۃِ 
MIMMAN RAZEETA A'NHO FAHATAMTA LAHO A’LAL EJAABATE 
and with whom You have been pleased and thus decided to grant his request.
یَا اَللهُ یَا اَللهُ یَا اَللهُ 
YAA ALLAAHO YAA ALLAAHO YAA ALLAAHO 
O Allah! O Allah! O Allah!
یَا رَحْمٰنُ یَا رَحْمٰنُ یَا رَحْمٰنُ 
YAA RAHMAANO YAA RAHMAANO YAA RAHMAANO 
O All-merciful! O All-merciful! O All-merciful!
یَا رَحِیْمُ یَا رَحِیْمُ یَا رَحِیْمُ 
YAA RAHEEMO YAA RAHEEMO 
O All-compassionate! O All-compassionate! O All-compassionate!
یَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَالْاِکْرَامِ یَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَ الْاِکْرَامِ یَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَ الْاِکْرَامِ 
YAA ZALJALAALE WAL IKRAAME YAA ZALJALAALE WAL IKRAAME 
YAA ZAL JALAALE WAL IKRAAME 
O Lord of majesty and honor! O Lord of majesty and honor! O Lord of majesty and honor!
بِہٖ بِہٖ بِہٖ بِہٖ بِہٖ بِہٖ بِہٖ 
BEHI BEHI BEHI BEHI BEHI BEHI BEHI
By Him! By Him! By Him! By Him! By Him! By Him! By Him!
اَسْئَلُکَ بِکُلِّ اسْمٍ سَمَّیْتَ بِہٖ نَفْسَکَ 
ASALOKA BEKULLE ISMIN SAMMAYTA BEHI NAFSAKA 
I beseech You by every Name with which You have named Yourself
اَوْ اَنْزَلْتَہٗ فِیْ شَیْءٍ مِنْ کُتُبِکَ 
AW ANZALTAHU FEE SHAY-IN MIN KOTOBEKA 
or which You have sent down in one of Your scriptures
اَوِاسْتَاْثَرْتَ بِہٖ فِیْ عِلْمِ الْغَیْبِ عِنْدَکَ 
AWISTASARTA BEHI FEE I’LMIL GHAIBE I’NDAKA 
or kept for Yourself in the knowledge of the Unseen with You,
وَ بِمَعَاقَدِ الْعِزِّ مِنْ عَرْشِکَ 
WA BEMAAQEDIL I’ZZE MIN A'RSHEKA 
by the junctures of might for Your Throne,
وَ بِمُنْتَہَی الرَّحْمَۃِ مِنْ کِتَابِکَ 
WA BE MUNTAHAR RAHMATE MIN KETAABEKA 
by the utmost limit of mercy from Your Book,
وَ بِمَا لَوْ اَنَّ مَا فِی الْاَرْضِ مِنْ شَجَرَۃٍ اَقْلَامٌ 
WA BEMAA LAW ANNA MAA FIL ARZE MIN SHAJARATIN AQLAAMUN
by the fact that, “though all the trees in the earth were pens
وَّ الْبَحْرُ یَمُدُّہٗ مِنْ بَعْدِہٖ سَبْعَۃُ اَبْحُرٍ
WAL BAHRO YAMUDDAHU MIN BA’DAHI SAB-ATO ABHORIM 
and the sea - seven seas after it to replenish it,
مَّا نَفِدَتْ کَلِمَاتُ اللهِ 
MAA NAFEDAT KALEMAATUL LAAHE 
yet the words of Allah not be spent.
اِنَّ اللهَ عَزِیْزٌ حَکِیْمٌ 
INNAL LAAHA A’ZEEZUN HAKEEMUN 
Allah is All-mighty, All-wise.”
وَّ اَسْئَلُکَ بِاَسْمَآئِکَ الْحُسْنَی 
WA AS-ALOKA BE-ASMAA-EKAL HUSNAL 
And I beseech You by Your Most Excellent Names
الَّتِیْ نَعَتَّہَا فِیْ کِتَابِکَ فَقُلْتَ 
LATEE NA-ATTAHAA FEE KETAABEKA FAQULTA 
that You have described in Your book thus saying,
وَ لِلّٰہِ الْاَسْمَآءُ الْحُسْنٰی فَادْعُوْہُ بِہَا 
WA LILLAAHIL AS-MAA-UL HUSNAA FAD-OO’HO BEHAA 
“To Allah belong the Most Excellent Names, so call Him by them!”
وَ قُلْتَ اُدْعُوْنِیْ اَسْتَجِبْ لَکُمْ 
WA QULTA AD-OO’NEE ASTAJIB LAKUM 
And You said: “Call upon Me and I will answer you.”
وَ قُلْتَ وَ اِذَا سَئَلَکَ عِبَادِیْ عَنِّیْ فَاِنِّیْ قَرِیْبٌ 
WA QULTA WA EZAA SA-ALAKA E’BAADEE A’NNEE FA-INNEE QAREEBUN 
And You said: “And when My servants ask you concerning Me, then surely I am very near;
اُجِیْبُ دَعْوَۃَ الدَّاعِ اِذَا دَعَانِ 
UJEEBO DA’WATADDAAE’ EZAA DA’AANE 
I answer the prayer of the suppliant when he calls on Me.”
وَقُلْتَ یَا عِبَادِیَ الَّذِیْنَ اَسْرَفُوْا عَلٰی اَنْفُسِہِمْ 
WA QULTA YAA E’BAADEYAL LAZEENA ASRAFOO A’LAA ANFOSEHIM 
And You said: “Say: O My servants who have been prodigal against yourselves;
لَا تَقْنَطَوُاْ مِنْ رَّحْمَۃِ اللهِ 
LAA TAQNATOO MIR RAHMATIL LAAHE 
do not despair of Allah's mercy.
اِنَّ اللهَ یَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوْبَ جَمِیْعًا 
INNAL LAAHA YAGHFERUZ ZONOOBA JAMEE-A'N 
Surely, Allah forgives all sins.
اِنَّہٗ ہُوَ الْغَفُوْرُ الرَّحِیْمُ 
INNAHU HOWAL GHAFOORUR RAHEEMO 
Surely, He is the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate.”
وَ اَنَا اَسْئَلُکَ یَا اِلٰہِیْ 
WA ANAA AS-ALOKA YAA ILAAHEE 
And I ask You, O my God,
وَ اَدْعُوْکَ یَا رَبِّ 
WA AD-O'OKA YAA RABBE 
I call You, O my Lord,
وَ اَرْجُوْکَ یَا سَیِّدِی 
WA ARJOOKA YAA SAYYEDEE 
I please You, O my Master,
وَ اَطْمَعُ فِیْ اِجَابَتِیْ یَا مَوْلَایَ کَمَا وَعَدْتَنِیْ 
WA ATMA-O' FEE EJAABATEE YAA MAWLAAYA KAMAA WA A’DTANEE 
and I desire for You to respond to me, O my Protector, just as You have promised me—
وَ قَدْ دَعَوْتُکَ کَمَا اَمَرْتَنِیْ 
WA QAD DA-A’WTOKA KAMAA AMARTANEE 
for I have called You just as You have commanded me.
فَافْعَلْ بِیْ مَا اَنْتَ اَہْلُہٗ یَا کَرِیْمُ 
FAF-A’L BEE MAA ANTA AHLAHU YAA KAREEMO 
So, do to me what is worthy of You, O All-generous!
وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ رَبِّ الْعَالِمَیْنَ 
WAL HAMDO LILLAAHE RABBIL A'ALAMEENA 
All praise be to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds.
وَ صَلَّی اللهُ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِہٖ اَجْمَعِیْنَ.
WA SALLAAHO A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WAA AALEHI AJMA-E'ENA.
May Allah bless Muhammad and his entire Household.

E28.Title: Dua Mujeer
E28.Data:
In our religion, there are hundreds of big and small duas. Dua-e-Mojeer is one of them. It has lots of ‘sawab’. This dua contains pious names of Allah with which safety from the fire of hell is desired.
Just by understanding the meaning of one sentence, most of the meanings of this dua could be understood.
بِسْمِ اللّٰہِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْم
سُبْحَانَکَ یَا اللہُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَارَحْمٰنُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا رَحِیْمُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا کَرِیْمُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا مَلِکُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مَالِکُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا قُدُّوْسُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا سَلاَمُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَا نَکَ یَا مُؤْمِنُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مُہَیْمِنُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَا نَکَ یَا عَزِیْزُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا جَبَّارُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا مُتَکَبِّرُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مُتَجَبِّرُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَا نَکَ یَا خَالِقُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا بَارِئُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَا نَکَ یَا مُصَوِّرُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مُقَدِّرُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا ہَادِیْ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا بَاقِیْ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا وَہَّابُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا تَوَّابُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا فَتَّاحُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مُرْتَاحُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا سَیِّدِیْ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا یَامَوْلاَیَ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا قَرِیْبُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا رَقِیْبُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا مُبْدِئُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مُعِیْدُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا حَمِیْدُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مَجِیْدُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا قَدِیْمُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا عَظِیْمُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا غَفُوْرُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا شَکُوْرُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا شَاہِدُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا شَہِیْدُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا حَنَّانُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مَنَّانُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا بَاعِثُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا وَارِثُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا مُحْیِیْ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مُمِیْتُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا شَفِیْقُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا رَفِیْقُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا اَنِیْسُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مُوْنِسُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا جَلِیْلُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا جَمِیْلُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا خَبِیْرُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا بَصِیْرُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا حَفِیُّ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مَلِیُّ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا مَعْبُوْدُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مَوْجُوْدُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا غَفَّارُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا قَہَّارُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا مَذْکُوْرُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مَشْکُوْرُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا جَوَادُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مَعَاذُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا جَمَلُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا جَلاَلُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا سَابِقُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا رَازِقُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا صَادِقُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا فَالِقُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا سَمِیْعُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا سَرِیْعُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا رَفِیْعُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا بَدِیْعُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا فَعَّالُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا مُتَعَالُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا قَاضِیْ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا رَاضِیْ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا قَاہِرُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا طَاہِرُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا عَالِمُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا حَاکِمُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا مُجِیْرُ سُبْحَانَکَ یَا دَآئِمُ تَعَالَیْتَ یَا قَآئِمُ اَجِرْنَا مِنَ النَّارِ یَا E29.Title: Dua Jawshan al Kabir
E29.Data:
Jawshan means “chain armour”, worn to protect the body against weapons.
In one of the early wars the Almighty Allah sent the text of this dua to the Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) from that day he discarded the armour and used to recite this dua in every battlefield.
Kafa’mee has mentioned this dua in his books “Balaadul Ameen” and “Misbah”, on the authority of Imam Ali bin Husain Al Zaynul A’abideen (a.s.) who learned it from his father, Imam Husain (a.s.), the grandson of the Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.).
It is a many-sided all-purpose dua. For and on behalf of him who recites Jawshan Kabeer in the beginning of the Holy month of Ramazan, an army of seventy thousand Angels sing praises of the Almighty Allah, earning (for him) due recompense and reward.
If recited 3 times during the Holy month of Ramazan (particularly on “Shab-e-Qadr” nights) fire of Hell will refuse to burn the reciter and as a result the gates of paradise will be thrown open for him, because as soon as it is recited Almighty Allah takes him under his protection and keeps him safe from the onslaught of sinful temptations.
The Holy Prophet (s.a.w.a.) advised Imam Ali (a.s.), Bibi Faatemah (s.a.), Imam Hasan (a.s.), and Imam Husain (a.s.) to learn it by heart and recite again and again because it contains “Ism-e-A’azam” (the Great name of Allah), and make sure to tell people to write this dua on the cloth of shroud before a dead faithful person is buried as it is the best defence against all types of punishments and penalties; above all the fire of Hell will not dare to touch him.
At the time of war it is the most reliable defence for the faithfuls.
Recite it before going on a journey to come back safe and successful.
If written text is kept in the house it is a safe insurance against fire, theft, loot and arson.
If written text is kept on person as Taweez it drives away misfortunes, keeps clear of accidents and brings prosperity.
This dua, in addition to the Holy month of Ramazan, should be recited on Fridays.
Recite this dua once a month or at any time during a year if you are a “very busy person”, and even if that is not possible for reasons beyond your control, recite it at least once in your lifetime.
In all there are 100 sections in this Dua; and, in each section, 10 names or attributes of Almighty Allah are mentioned, except section 55, in which 11 attributes are recited.
At the end of each section recite the following:
SUBHAANAKA YAA LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTAL GAUSAL GAUS KHALLISNAA MENAN NAARE YAA RAB.
سُبْحَانَكَ يَا لَا اِلٰهَ اِلَّا اَنْتَ الْغَوْثَ الْغَوْثَ خَلِصَّنَا مِنَ النَّارِ يَا رَبْ.
Glory be to Thee, O “there is no god save Thou”, Help! Help! Keep away the Fire from us, O Lord,
 
(1) For Success in Difficult Works:
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA BISMEKA YAA ALLAAHO, YAA RAHMAAN, YAA RAHEEMO, YAA KAREEMO, YAA MOQEEMO, YAA A’ZEEMO, YAA QADEEMO, YAA A’LEEMO, YAA HALEEMO, YAA HAKEEMO.

O He for Whom is glory and beauty, O He for Whom is authority and perfection, O He for Whom is kingdom and majesty, O He Who is Powerful and supreme, O He Who raises the heavy clouds, O He Who is firm in strategy, O He Who is severe in punishment, O He Who is alert in reckoning, O He Who gives excellent reward, O He Who has “Ummul Kitab’ (the Mother Book).

YAA MAN LAA YURJAA ILLA FAZLAHU, YAA MAN LAA YUS-A’LO ILLAA A’FWOHU, YAA MAN LAA YUNZARO ILLAA BIRROHU, YAA MAN LA YOKHAAFO ILLAA A’DLOHU, YAA MAN LA YADOOMO ILLAA MULKAHU, YAA MAN LAA SULTAANA ILLA SULTAANOHU, YAA MAN WASE-A’T KULLA SHAY-IN RAHMATOHU, YAA MAN SABAQAT RAHMATOHU GHAZABAHU, YAA MAN AHAATA BE-KULLE SHAY-IN I’LMOHU, YAA MAN LAYSA AHADUNN MISLOHU.
یَا مَنْ لَا یُرْجٰی اِلَّا فَضْلُہٗ یَا مَنْ لَا یُسْئَلُ اِلَّا عَفْوُہٗ یَا مَنْ لَا یُنْظَرُ اِلَّا بِرُّہٗ یَا مَنْ لَا یُخَافُ اِلَّا عَدْلُہٗ یَا مَنْ لَا یَدُوْمُ اِلَّا مُلْکُہٗ یَا مَنْ لَا سُلْطَانَ اِلَّا سُلْطَانُہٗ یَا مَنْ وَسِعَتْ کُلَّ شَیْءٍ رَحْمَتُہٗ یَا مَنْ سَبَقَتْ رَحْمَتُہٗ غَضَبَہٗ یَا مَنْ اَحَاطَ بِکُلِّ شَیْءٍ عِلْمُہٗ یَا مَنْ لَیْسَ اَحَدٌ مِثْلَہٗ.
O He from whom nothing but favor is expect¬ed, O He from Whom nothing but pardon is obtained, O He from Who nothing but good comes out, O He Who is not feared but for His justice, O He Whose Kingdom alone (and nothing) is eternal, O He Whose Sovereignty alone (and nothing) is prevailing, O He Whose Mercy encompasses ev¬erything, O He Whose compassion gets the better of His wrath, O He Whose wisdom comprehends everything, O He Who has no equal.
(20) To Disperse Worries 
YAA FAAREJAL HAMME, YAA KAASHEFAL GHAMME, YAA GHAAFERAZ ZAMBE, YAA QAABELAT TAWBE, YAA KHAALEQAL KHALQE, YAA SAADEQAL WA’DE YAA MOOFEYAL A’HDE YAA A’ALEMAS SIRRE, YAA FAALEQAL HABBE, YAA RAAZEQAL ANAAME.
یَا فَارِجَ الْہَمِّ یَا کَاشِفَ الْغَمِّ یَا غَافِرَ الذَّنْبِ یَا قَابِلَ التَّوْبِ یَا خَالِقَ الْخَلْقِ یَا صَادِقَ الْوَعْدِ یَا مُوْفِیَ الْعَہْدِ یَا عَالِمَ السِّرِّ یَا فَالِقَ الْحَبِّ یَا رَازِقَ الْاَنَامِ.
O Disperser of worry, O Mitigator of sorrow, O Forgiver of Sins, O Acceptor of repentance, O Creator of creation, O Sincere Fulfiller of promis¬es, O Accomplisher of covenants, O Knower of secrets, O Splitter of seed, O Sustainer of mankind.
(21) To Plead For Forgiveness Of Sins
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA BISMEKA YAA A’LIYYO, YAA WAFIYYO, YAA GHANIYYO, YAA MALIYYO, YAA KHAFIYYO, YAA RAZIYYO, YAA ZAKIYYO, YAA BADIYYO, YAA QAWIYYO, YAA WALIYYO.
اَللّٰہُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْئَلُکَ بِاسْمِکَ یَا عَلِیُّ یَا وَفِیُّ یَا غِنِیُّ یَا مَلِیُّ یَا حَفِیُّ یَا رِضِیُّ یَا زَکِیُّ یَا بَدِیُّ یَا قَوِیُّ یَا وَلِیُّ.
O Allah I beseech Thee in Thy name, O High, O Perfect, O Independent, O Rich, O Hidden, O Assenter, O Intelligent, O First, O Mighty, O Guardian.
(22) To Increase Livelihood
YAA MAN AZHARAL JAMEEL WA YAA MAN SATARAL QABEEHA WA YAA MAN LAM YO-AAKHIZ BIL JARIRATE WA YAA MAN LAM YAHTEKIS SITRA, YAA A’ZEEMAL A’FVE YAA HASANAT TAJAAWOZE, YAA WAASE-A’L MAGHFERATE, YAA BAASETAL YADAYNE BIRRAHMATE, YAA SAAHEBA KULLE NAJWAA, YAA MUNTAHAA KULLE SHAKWAA.
یَا مَنْ اَظْہَرَ الْجَمِیْلَ وَ يَا مَنْ سَتَرَ الْقَبِیْحَ وَ یَا مَنْ لَّمْ یُؤَاخِذُ بِالْجَرِیْرَۃِ وَ یَا مَنْ لَّمْ یَہْتِکِ السِّتْرَ یَا عَظِیْمَ الْعَفْوِ یَا حَسَنَ التَّجَاوُزِ یَا وَاسِعَ الْمَغْفِرَۃِ یَا بَاسِطَ الْیَدَیْنِ بِالرَّحْمَۃِ یَا صَاحِبَ کُلِّ نَجْوٰی یَا مُنْتَہٰی کُلِّ شَکْوٰی.
O He Who exposes beauty, O He Who con¬ceals ugliness, O He Who does not call to account for transgressions, O He Who does not withdraw protection, O. The Great Forgiver, O Dispensator of fair treatment, O Boundless forgiver, O Spread¬er of unlimited mercy, O Sharer of mutual secrets, O Last Resort of all complaints.
(23) To Get More Beneficence
YAA ZAN NE-A’MATIS SAABEGHATE, YAA ZARRAHMATIL WAASE-A’TE, YAA ZALMINNATIS SAABEQATE, YAA ZAL HIKMATIL BAALEGHATE, YAA ZAL QUDRATIL KAAMELATE, YAA ZAL HUJJATIL QAATE-A’TE, YAA ZAL KARAAMATIZ ZAAHERATE, YAA ZAL I’ZZATID DAA-EMATE, YAA ZAL QUWWATIL MATEENATE, YAA ZAL A’ZAMATIL MANEE-A’TE.
یَا ذَا النِّعْمَۃِ السَّابِغَۃِ یَا ذَالرَّحْمَۃِ الْوَاسِعَۃِ یَا ذَا الْمِنَّۃِ السَّابِقَۃِ یَا ذَا الْحِکْمَۃِ الْبَالِغَۃِ یَا ذَا الْقُدْرَۃِ الْکَامِلَۃِ یَا ذَا الْحُجَّۃِ الْقَاطِعَۃِ یَا ذَا الْکَرَامَۃِ الظَّاہِرَۃِ یَا ذَا الْعِزَّۃِ الدَّآئِمَۃِ یَا ذَا الْقُوَّۃِ الْمَتِیْنَۃِ یَا ذَا الْعَظَمَۃِ الْمَنِیْعَۃِ.
O Master of abundant bounties, O Master of plenteous mercy, O Master of incomparable kind¬ness, O Master of penetrating wisdom, O Master of absolute power, O Master of conclusive argument, O Master of evident generosity, O Master of everlasting dignity, O Master of strong might, O Master of impregnable greatness.
(24) To Receive Allah’s Bliss
YAA BADEEA’S SAMAAWAATE, YAA JAA-E’LAZ ZOLOMAATE, YAA RAAHEMAL ABARAATE, YAA MOQEELAL ASARAATE, YAA SAATERAL AWRAATE, YAA MOH-YEYAL AMWAATE, YAA MUNZELAL-AAYAATE, YAA MOZA’-E’FAL HASANAATE, YAA MAAHEYAS SAYYE-AATE, YAA SHADEEDAN NAQEMAATE.
یَا بَدِیْعَ السَّمٰوٰتِ یَا جَاعِلَ الظُّلُمَاتِ یَا رَاحِمَ الْعَبَرَاتِ یَا مُقِیْلَ الْعَثَرَاتِ یَا سَاتِرَ الْعَوْرَاتِ یَا مُحْیِیَ الْاَمْوَاتِ یَا مُنْزِلَ الْاٰیاَتِ یَا مُضَعِّفَ الْحَسَنَاتِ یَا مَاحِیَ السَّیِّئَاتِ یَا شَدِیْدَ النَّقَمَاتِ.
O Creator of heavens, O Activator of Dark¬ness, O Pitier of tears, O Ignorer of errors, O Concealer of ignominy, O Revivifier of the dead, O Revealer of signs, O Multiplier of virtues, O Obliterator of vices, O Severe Reckoner,
(25) To Dispel Ill Luck And Seek Fortune
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA BISMEKA, YAA MOSAWWERO, YAA MOQADDERO, YAA MODABBERO, YAA MOTAH-HERO, YAA MONAWWERO YAA MOYASSERO, YAA MOBASH-SHERO, YAA MONAZ-ZERO, YAA MOQAD-DEMO, YAA MO-A’KH-KHERO.
اَللّٰہُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْئَلُکَ بِاسْمِکَ یَا مُصَوِّرُ یَا مُقَدِّرُ یَا مُدَبِّرُ یَامُطَہِّرُ یَا مُنَوِّرُ یَا مُیَسِّرُ یَا مُبَشِّرُ یَا مُنْذِرُ یَا مُقَدِّمُ یَا مُؤَخِّرُ.
O Allah I beseech Thee in Thy name, O Fashioner, O Pre-Ordainer, O Statesman, O Puri¬fier, O Illuminator, O Sufficer, O Communicator of glad tidings, O Warner, O Foremost, O Postponer.
(26) To Get Rid Of Fever
YAA RABBAL BAYTIL HARAAME, YAA RABBASH SHAHRIL HARAAME, YAA RABBAL BALAADIL HARAAME,YAA RABBAR-RUKNE WAL MAQAAME, YAA RABBAL MASH-A’RIL HARAAME, YAA RABBAL MASJEDIL HARAAME, YAA RABBAL HILLE WAL HARAAME, YAA RABBAN NOORE WAZ ZALAAME, YAA RABBAT TAHIYYATE WAS SALAAME, YAA RABBAL QOODRATE FIL ANAAME.
یَا رَبَّ الْبَیْتِ الْحَرَامِ یَا رَبَّ الشَّہْرِ الْحَرَامِ یَا رَبَّ الْبَلَدِ الْحَرَامِ یَا رَبَّ الرُّکْنِ وَالْمَقَامِ یَا رَبَّ الْمَشْعَرِ الْحَرَامِ يَا رَبَّ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ یَا رَبَّ الْحِلِّ وَالْحَرَامِ یَا رَبَّ النُّوْرِ وَالظَّلاَمِ یَا رَبَّ التَّحِیَّۃِ وَ السَّلاَمِ یَا رَبَّ الْقُدْرَۃِ فِی الْاَنَامِ.
O Lord of the Holy House, O Lord of the Holy month, O Lord of the Holy city, O Lord of Rukn (Trust) and Maqaam (Dignity), O Lord of Mashril Haraam, (Place where Hajis pray and offer sacri¬fice), O Lord of the Holy Mosque, O Lord (Ordainer) of Hill (Lawful) and Haraam (Unlawful), O Lord of light and darkness, O Lord of life (Keeping alive) and peace, O Lord of might over created beings.
(27) To Dismiss Fear Of Rulers (Recite 20 times)
YAA AHKAMAL HAAKEMEENA YAA A-A’DALAL A’ADELEENA, YAA ASDAQAS SAADEQEENA, YAA ATHARAT TAAHEREENA, YAA AHSANAL KHAALEQEENA, YAA ASRA-A’L HAASEBEENA, YAA ASMA-A’S SAAME-E’ENA, YAA ABSARAN NAAZEREENA, YAA ASHFA-A’SH SHAAFE-E’ENA, YAA AKRAMAL AKRAMEENA.
یَآ اَحْکَمَ الْحَاکِمِیْنَ یَآ اَعْدَلَ الْعَادِلِیْنَ یَآ اَصْدَقَ الصَّادِقِیْنَ یَآ اَطْہَرَ الطَّاہِرِیْنَ یَآ اَحْسَنَ الْخَالِقِیْنَ یَآ اَسْرَعَ الْحَاسِبِیْنَ یَا اَسْمَعَ السَّامِعِیْنَ یَآ اَبْصَرَ النَّاظِرِیْنَ یَآ اَشْفَعَ الشَّافِعِیْنَ یَآ اَکْرَمَ الْاَکْرَمِیْنَ.
O The Wisest of all rulers, O The Most equi¬table of all judges, O The Truest of the true, O The Purest of the pure, O The Best of all creators, O The Quickest of all reckoner, O The Best of all hearers, O The Best of all observers, O The Best of all intercessors, O The Most Noble of all nobles.
(28) To Cure Migraine
YAA E’MAADA MAN LAA E’MAADA LAHU, YAA SANADA MAN LAA SANADA LAHU, YAA ZUKHRA MAN LAA ZUKHRA LAHU, YAA HIRZA MAN LA HIRZA LAHU, YAA GHEYAASA MAN LAA GHEYAASA LAHU, YAA FAKHRA MAN LAA FAKHRA LAHU, YAA I’ZZA MAN LA I’ZZA LAHU, YAA MO-E’ENA MAN LAA MO-E’ENA LAHU, YAA ANEESA MAN LAA ANEESA LAHU, YAA AMAANA MAN LAA AMANA LAHU.
یَاعِمَادَ مَنْ لَا عِمَادَ لَہٗ یَا سَنَدَ مَنْ لَا سَنَدَ لَہٗ یَا ذُخْرَ مَنْ لَا ذُخْرَلَہٗ یَا حِرزَ مَنْ لَا حِرْزَلَہٗ یَا غِیَاثَ مَنْ لَا غِیَاثَ لَہٗ یَا فَخْرَ مَنْ لَا فَخْرَ لَہٗ یَا عِزَّ مَنْ لَا عِزَّ لَہٗ یَا مُعِیْنَ مَنْ لَا مُعِیْنَ لَہٗ یَآ اَنِیْسَ مَنْ لَا اَنِیْسَ لَہٗ یَآ اَمَانَ مَنْ لَا اَمَانَ لَہٗ.
O Support of him who has no support, O Surety of him who has nothing to lean upon, O Repository of him who has no provision, O Protection of him who has no protection, O Succourer of him who has been forsaken, O Pride of him who has nothing to be proud of, O Glory of him who has no distinction, O Help of him who is helpless, O Companion of him who has no com¬rade, O Refuge of him who has no shelter. 
(29) To Build Up Defense
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA BISMEKA YAA A’ASEMO, QAA-EMO, YAA DAA-E’MO, YAA RAAHEMO, YAA SAALEMO YAA HAKEMO, A’ALEMO, YAA QAASEMO, YAA QAABEZO, YAA BAASETO.
اَللّٰہُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْئَلُکَ بِاسْمِکَ یَا عَاصِمُ یَا قَآئِمُ یَا دَآئِمُ یَا رَاحِمُ یَا سَالِمُ یَاحَاکِمُ یَا عَالِمُ یَا قَاسِمُ یَا قَابِضُ یَا بَاسِطُ.
O Allah I beseech Thee in Thy name, O Defender, O Ever-Lasting, O Ever-Living, O Mer¬ciful, O Dependable, O Ruler, O Knower, O Dis¬tributor, O Seizer, O Expansive.
(30) To Win War
YAA A’ASEMA MANIS TA’SAMAHU, YAA RAAHEMA MANIS TARHAMAHU, YAA GHAAFERA MANIS TAGHFERAHU, YAA NAASERA MANIS TANSARAHU, YAA HAAFEZA MANIS TAHFAZAHU YAA MUKREMA MANIS TAKRAMAHU, YAA MURSHEDA MANIS TARSHADAHU, YAA SAREEKHA MANIS TASRAKHAHU, YAA MO-E’ENA MANIS TA-A’ANAHU, YAA MOGHEESA MANIS TAGHASAHU.
یَا عَاصِمَ مَنِ اسْتَعْصَمَہٗ یَا رَاحِمَ مَنِ اسْتَرْحَمَہٗ یَا غَافِرَ مَنِ اسْتَغْفَرَہُ یَا نَاصِرَ مَنِ اسْتَنْصَرَہٗ یَا حَافِظَ مَنِ اسْتَحْفَظَہٗ یَا مُکْرِمَ مَنِ اسْتَکْرَمَہٗ یَا مُرْشِدَ مَنِ اسْتَرْشَدَہٗ یَا صَرِیْخَ مَنِ اسْتَصْرَخَہٗ یَا مُعِیْنَ مَنِ اسْتَعَانَہٗ یَا مُغِیْثَ مَنِ اسْتَغَاثَہٗ.
O Defender of him who seeks His aid, O Pitier of him who seeks His mercy, O Pardoner of him who seeks His pardon, O Rescuer of him who seeks His aid, O Protector of him who seeks His protection, O Favourer of him who seeks His favour, O Leader of him who seeks His guidance, O Succourer of him who seeks His succour, O Helper of him who seeks His help, O Supporter of him who seeks His support.
(31) To Cure Eye Disease
YAA A’ZEEZAN LAA YOZAAMO, YAA LATEEFAL LAA YORAAMO, YAA QAYYOOMAL LAA YANAAMO, YAA DAA-EMAL LAA YAFOOTO, YAA HAYYAN LAA YAMOOTO, YAA MALEKAL LAA YAZOOLO, YAA BAAQEYAL LAA YAFNA YAA A’ALEMAL LAA YAJHALO, YAA SAMADAL LAA YUT-A’MO, YAA QAWIYYAL LAA YUZ-A’FO.
یَا عَزِیْزًا لَّا یُضَامُ یَا لَطِیْفًا لَّا یُرَامُ یَا قَیُّوْمًا لَّا یَنَامُ یَا دَآئِمًا لَّا یَفُوْتُ یَا حَیًّا لَّا یَمُوْتُ یَا مَلِکًا لَّا یَزُوْلُ یَا بَاقِیًا لَّا یَفْنٰی یَا عَالِمًا لَّا یَجْہَلُ یَا صَمَدًا لَّا یُطْعَمُ یَآ قَوِیًّا لَّا یَضْعُفُ.
O Great Who is never humbled, O Subtle Who is unperceivable, O Durable Who slumbers not, O Ever-Lasting Who is indestructible, O Ever-Liv¬ing Who is not mortal, O Master Who never loses control, O Eternal Who is never non-existent, O Knower Who is never ignorant, O Endurer Who needs no sustenance, O Mighty Who is never undermined.
(32) To Subdue Enemies
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA BISMEKA, YAA AHADO, YAA WAAHEDO, YAA SHAAHEDO , YAA MAAJEDO, YAA HAAMEDO YAA RAASHEDO, YAA BAA-ESO, YAA WAARESO, YAA ZAARRO, YAA NAAFE-O’.
اَللّٰہُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَسْئَلُکَ بِاسْمِکَ یَآ اَحَدُ یَا وَاحِدُ یَا شَاہِدُ یَا مَاجِدُ یَا حَامِدُ یَا رَاشِدُ یَا بَاعِثُ یَا وَارِثُ یَا ضَآرُّ یَا نَافِعُ.
O Allah I beseech Thee in Thy name, O Single, O One, O Witness, O Praised, O Glorious, O Guide, O Author, O Possessor, O Punisher, O Benefactor.
(33) To Have Courage To Face Rulers
YAA A-A’ZAMA MIN KULLE A’ZEEMIN, YAA AKRAMA MIN KULLE KAREEMIN, YAA ARHAMA MIN KULLE RAHEEMIN, YAA A-A’LAMA MIN KULLE A’LEEMIN YAA AHKAMA MIN KULLE HAKEEMIN, YAA AQDAMA MIN KULLE QADEEMIN, YAA AKBARA MIN KULLE KABEERIN, YAA ALTAFA MIN KULLE LATEEFIN, YAA AJALLA MIN KULLE JALEELIN, YAA A-A’ZZA MIN KULLE A’ZEEZIN.
يَا اَعْظَمَ مِنْ كُلِّ عَظِيْمٍ يَا اَكْرَمَ مِنْ كُلِّ كَرِيْمٍ يَا اَرْحَمَ مِنْ كُلِّ رَحِيْمٍ يَا اَعْلَمَ مِنْ كُلِّ عَلِيْمٍ يَا اَحْكَمَ مِنْ كُلِّ حَكِيْمٍ يَا اَقْدَمَ مِنْ كُلِّ قَدِيْمٍ يَا اَكْبَرَ مِنْ كُلِّ كَبِيْرٍ يَا اَلْطَفَ مِنْ كُلِّ لَطِيْفٍ يَا اَجَلَّ مِنْ كُلِّ جَلِيْلٍ يَا اَعَزَّ مِنْ كُلِّ عَزِيْزٍ.
O The Supreme among (all) the chiefs, O The Most Generous among (all) the generous, O The Most Merciful among (all) the Merciful, O the Most Learned among (all) the learned, O The Wisest among (all) the wise, O The Foremost among (all) the formers, O The Greatest among (all) the greats, O The Most Subtle among (all) the refined, O The Most Sublime among (all) the magnificent, O The Mightiest among (all) the mighty.

YAA MAN LAA YASH-GHOLOHU SAM-U’N A’N SAM-I’N, YAA MAN LAA YAMNA-O’HU FEA’LUN A’N FEA’LIN, YAA MAN LAA YULHEEHE QAWLUN A’N QAWLIN, YAA MAN LAA YOGHALLETOHU SO-A’LUN A’N SO-A’LIN, YAA MAN LAA YAHJOBOHU SHAY-IN A’N SHAY-IN YAA MAN LAA YUBREMOHU ILHAAHUL MOLEHHEENA YAA MAN HOWA GHAAYATO MORAADIL MOREEDEENA, YAA MAN HOWA MUNTAHAA HEMAMIL A’AREFEENA, YAA MAN HOWA MUN-TAHAA TALABIT TAALEBEENA, YAA MAN LAA YAKHFA A’LAYHE ZARRATUN FIL A’ALAMEENA.
یَا مَنْ لَّا یَشْغَلُہٗ سَمْعٌ عَنْ سَمْعٍ یَا مَنْ لَّا یَمْنَعُہٗ فِعْلٌ عَنْ فِعلٍ یَا مَنْ لَّا یُلْہِیْہِ قَوْلٌ عَنْ قَوْلٍ یَا مَنْ لَّا یُغَلِّطُہٗ سُؤَالٌ عَنْ سُؤَالٍ یَا مَنْ لَّا یَحْجُبُہٗ شَیْءٌ عَنْ شَیْءٍ یَا مَنْ لَّا یُبْرِمُہٗ اِلحَاحُ الْمُلِحِّیْنَ یَا مَنْ ہُوَ غَایَۃُ مُرَادِ الْمُرِیْدِیْنَ یَا مَنْ ہُوَ مُنْتَہٰی ہِمَمِ الْعَارِفِیْنَ یَا مَنْ ہُوَ مُنْتَہٰی طَلَبِ الطَّالِبِیْنَ یَا مَنْ لَا یَخْفٰی عَلَیْہِ ذَرَّۃٌ فِی الْعَالَمِیْنَ.
O He Whom one audience does not keep away from hearing another, O He Whom one action does not prevent from executing another, O He Whom one address does not prevent from delivering another, O He Whom one question does not draw apart from another, O He for Whom one object does not get in the way of another, O He Whom importunity of intimidators does not make ill-tempered, O He Who is the Last resort of the wishes of the devotees, O He Who is the ultimate goal of the aspirations of the intelligent, O He Who is the ultimate means of fulfilment of the beseechers, O He from Whom not even the minutest unit matter is hidden.
(100) To Cure Thigh Pain
YAA HALEEMAN LAA YA’JALO, YAA JAWAADAN LAA YABKHALO, YAA SAADEQAN LAA YUKHLEFO, YAA WAHHAABAN LAA YAMALLO, YAA QAAHERAN LAA YUGHLABO, YAA A’ZEEMAN LAA YOOSAFO, YAA A’DLAN LAA YAHEEFO, YAA GHANIYYAN LAA YAFTAQERO YAA KABEERAN LAA YASGHORO YAA HAAFEZAN LAA YAGHFOLO.
یَا حَلِیْمًا لَا یَعْجَلُ یَا جَوَادًا لَا یَبْخَلُ یَا صَادِقًا لَا یُخْلِفُ یَا وَہَّابًا لَا یَمَلُّ یَاقَاہِرًا لَا یُغْلَبُ یَا عَظِیْمًا لَا یُوْصَفُ یَا عَدْلاً لَا یَحِیْفُ یَا غَنِیًّا لَا یَفْتَقِرُ یَا کَبِیْرًا لَا یَصْغُرُ یَا حَافِظًا لَّا یَغْفُلُ.
O Forbearing Who does not make haste, O Liberal Bestower Who never supplies sparingly, O Truthful Who never turns away, O Awarder Who never regrets, O Dominant Who is never overpow¬ered, O Sublime Who cannot be described, O Just Who does not oppress, O Rich Who cannot be rendered poor, O Great Who cannot be rendered small, O Guardian Who does not neglect.

E30.Title: Dua Jawshan al Sagir
E30.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اِلٰهِيْ كَمْ مِنْ عَدُوٍّ انْتَضٰى عَلَيَّ سَيْفَ عَدَاوَتِهٖ 
O my God, many an enemy unsheathed the sword of his hostility against me,
وَ شَحَذَ لِيْ ظُبَةَ مُدْيَتِهٖ 
honed his dagger's edge against me, 
وَ اَرْهَفَ لِيْ شَبَا حَدِّهٖ 
sharpened the heads of his weapons against me,
وَ دَافَ لِيْ قَوَاتِلَ سُمُوْمِهٖ 
mixed for me his deadly poisons,
وَ سَدَّدَ نَحْوِيْ صَوَائِبَ سِهَامِهٖ 
leveled at me his hitting arrow,
وَ لَمْ تَنَمْ عَنِّيْ عَيْنُ حِرَاسَتِهٖ 
kept a sleepless eye on me,
وَ اَضْمَرَ اَنْ يَسُوْمَنِي الْمَكْرُوْهَ 
and decided secretly to target harm to me
وَ يُجَرِّعَنِيْ ذُعَافَ مَرَارَتِهٖ 
and to make me taste the deadly poison of his bitterness.
فَنَظَرْتَ اِلٰى ضَعْفِيْ عَنِ احْتِمَالِ الْفَوَادِحِ 
Then [Amid all that] You considered that I am too weak to bear hardships,
وَ عَجْزِيْ عَنِ الْاِنْتِصَارِ مِمَّنْ قَصَدَنِيْ بِمُحَارَبَتِهٖ 
I am too short to have aid against him who aimed at attacking me,
وَ وَحْدَتِيْ فِيْ كَثِيْرِ مَنْ نَاوَانِيْ وَ اِرْصَادِهِمْ لِيْ
and You perceived my loneliness to confront many of those who incurred my hostility and laid in wait for me,
فِيْمَا لَمْ اُعْمِلْ فِيْهِ فِكْرِيْ فِيْ الْاِرْصَادِ لَهُمْ بِمِثْلِهٖ
while I have not been ready to give any thought to sitting in ambush and retaliating.
فَاَيَّدْتَنِيْ بِقُوَّتِكَ 
So, You came to stand by me with Your might,
وَ شَدَدْتَ اَزْرِيْ بِنَصْرِكَ 
made me strong through Your support,
وَ فَلَلْتَ لِيْ شَبَا حَدِّهٖ 
notched his sharpness against me,
وَ خَذَلْتَهٗ بَعْدَ جَمْعِ عَدِيْدِهٖ وَ حَشْدِهٖ
disappointed him although he concentrated all his troops and crowds,
وَ اَعْلَيْتَ كَعْبِيْ عَلَيْهِ 
You gave me the upper hand over him,
وَ وَجَّهْتَ مَا سَدَّدَ اِلَيَّ مِنْ مَكَايِدِهٖ‏ اِلَيْهِ 
directed toward him the same traps that he had laid for me,
وَ رَدَدْتَهٗ عَلَيْهِ 
and caused him to be engaged with his own traps.
وَ لَمْ يَشْفِ غَلِيْلَهٗ 
Thus, he could not quench his thirst,
وَ لَمْ تَبْرُدْ حَرَارَاتُ غَيْظِهٖ 
did not assuage the fury of his anger,
وَ قَدْ عَضَّ عَلَيَّ اَنَامِلَهٗ 
bit his thumb [out of his malice toward me],
وَ اَدْبَرَ مُوَلِّيًا قَدْ اَخْفَقَتْ سَرَايَاهُ 
and turned his back fleeing after his pennons had failed.
فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ يَا رَبِّ 
So, all praise be to You, O Lord;
مِنْ مُقْتَدِرٍ لَا يُغْلَبُ 
You are invulnerably Omnipotent
وَ ذِي اَنَاةٍ لَا يَعْجَلُ 
and prudently Forbearing.
صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
Bless Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad, 
وَ اجْعَلْنِيْ لِاَنْعُمِكَ مِنَ الشَّاكِرِيْنَ 
and include me with those who are thankful for Your bounties
وَ لِآلَائِكَ مِنَ الذَّاكِرِيْنَ 
and those who permanently mention Your graces.
اِلٰهِيْ وَ كَمْ مِنْ بَاغٍ 
O my God, many a tyrannical oppressor
بَغَانِيْ بِمَكَايِدِهٖ 
made me the target of his oppressive trickeries,
وَ نَصَبَ لِيْ اَشْرَاكَ مَصَايِدِهٖ 
set the traps of his hunting for me,
وَ وَكَّلَ بِيْ تَفَقُّدَ رِعَايَتِهٖ 
continuously spied on me,
وَ اَضْبَاَ اِلَيَّ اِضْبَاءَ السَّبُعِ لِطَرِيْدَتِهِ 
and waylaid me like a beast waylaying its prey
انْتِظَارًا لِانْتِهَازِ فُرْصَتِهٖ
in waiting for seizing the best opportunity [to catch me],
وَ هُوَ يُظْهِرُ لِيْ بَشَاشَةَ الْمَلَقِ 
While he was showing me happy mien flatteringly
وَ يَبْسُطُ لِيْ وَجْهًا غَيْرَ طَلِقٍ 
and displaying an uncheerful face.
فَلَمَّا رَاَيْتَ دَغَلَ سَرِيْرَتِهٖ 
So, when You saw ill intention of his inner self
وَ قُبْحَ مَا انْطَوٰى عَلَيْهِ لِشَرِيْكِهٖ فِيْ مُلَبِّهٖ
and the ugliness of his determination against his partner in religion,
وَ اَصْبَحَ مُجْلِبًا اِلَيَّ فِيْ بَغْيِهٖ 
and he became resolute in tyranny against me,
اَرْكَسْتَهٗ لِاُمِّ رَاْسِهٖ 
You threw him down headlong
وَ اَتَيْتَ بُنْيَانَهٗ مِنْ اَسَاسِهٖ 
and demolished his structure from its foundation.
فَصَرَعْتَهٗ فِيْ زُبْيَتِهٖ 
So, You knocked him down while he was in loftiness,
وَ اَرْدَيْتَهٗ فِيْ مَهْوٰى حُفْرَتِهٖ 
made him fall in the bottomless depth of his hole,
وَ جَعَلْتَ خَدَّهٗ طَبَقًا لِتُرَابِ رِجْلِهٖ 
caused his face to be a cover of his foot’s dust,
وَ شَغَلْتَهٗ فِي بَدَنِهٖ وَ رِزْقِهٖ 
caused him to be engaged with his body and his earnings,
وَ رَمَيْتَهٗ بِحَجَرِهٖ 
hurled him with his own stone,
وَ خَنَقْتَهٗ بِوَتَرِهٖ 
suffocated him with his own rope,
وَ ذَكَّيْتَهٗ بِمَشَاقِصِهٖ 
slaughtered him with his own arrowhead,
وَ كَبَبْتَهٗ لِمِنْخَرِهٖ 
overturned him to his nose,
وَ رَدَدْتَ كَيْدَهٗ فِي نَحْرِهٖ 
turned his plot to his own neck,
وَ وَثَقْتَهٗ بِنَدَامَتِهٖ 
lassoed him with his remorse,
وَ فَثَاْتَهٗ بِحَسْرَتِهٖ 
and stretched him with is regret.
فَاسْتَخْذَاَ وَ اسْتَخْذَلَ وَ تَضَائَلَ بَعْدَ نَخْوَتِهٖ 
So, he became lowly and dwindled after his arrogance,
وَ انْقَمَعَ بَعْدَ اسْتِطَالَتِهٖ 
was crushed after his haughtiness;
ذَلِيْلًا مَاْسُوْرًا فِيْ رِبْقِ حَبَائِلِهِ 
humble and captured in the lasso of his trap
الَّتِي كَانَ يُؤَمِّلُ اَنْ يَرَانِيْ فِيْهَا يَوْمَ سَطْوَتِهٖ 
in which he expected to see me in the days of his influence.
وَ قَدْ كِدْتُ يَا رَبِّ لَوْ لَا رَحْمَتُكَ 
In fact, O my Lord, I was – had it not been for Your mercy –
اَنْ يَحُلَّ بِيْ مَا حَلَّ بِسَاحَتِهٖ 
about to encounter the same as he had encountered.
فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ يَا رَبِّ 
So, all praise be to You, O Lord;
مِنْ مُقْتَدِرٍ لَا يُغْلَبُ 
You are invulnerably Omnipotent
وَ ذِي اَنَاةٍ لَا تَعْجَلُ 
and prudently Forbearing.
صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
Bless Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad
وَ اجْعَلْنِيْ لِنَعْمَائِكَ مِنَ الشَّاكِرِيْنَ 
and include me with those who are thankful for Your bounties
وَ لِآلَائِكَ مِنَ الذَّاكِرِيْنَ
and those who permanently mention Your graces.
اِلٰهِيْ وَ كَمْ مِنْ حَاسِدٍ شَرِقَ بِحَسَدِهٖ 
O my God, many an envier choked with his jealousy
وَ عَدُوٍّ شَجِيَ بِغَيْظِهٖ 
and an enemy became grieved out of his fury,
وَ سَلَقَنِيْ بِحَدِّ لِسَانِهٖ 
smit me with his sharp tongue,
وَ وَخَزَنِيْ بِمُوْقِ عَيْنِهٖ 
pricked me with the inner corner of his eye,
وَ جَعَلَنِيْ غَرَضاً لِمَرَامِيْهِ 
made me the object of his intentions,
وَ قَلَّدَنِيْ خِلَالًا لَمْ تَزَلْ فِيْهِ 
and gird me with dispositions that are still his.
فَنَادَيْتُكَ يَا رَبِّ مُسْتَجِيْرًا بِكَ 
Therefore, I called upon You, O my Lord, seeking Your shelter,
وَاثِقًا بِسُرْعَةِ إِجَابَتِكَ 
having full confidence in the immediateness of Your response,
مُتَوَكِّلًا عَلٰى مَا لَمْ اَزَلْ اَتَعَرَّفُهٗ 
trusting in that which I am still receiving from You;
مِنْ حُسْنِ دِفَاعِكَ 
namely, the excellence of Your defense of me,
عَالِمًا اَنَّهٗ لَا يَضْطَهِدُ مَنْ آوٰى اِلٰى ظِلِّ كَنَفِكَ 
having full knowledge that whoever harbors under the shade of Your protection will never be persecuted,
وَ لَنْ تَقْرَعَ الْحَوَادِثُ مَنْ لَجَاَ اِلٰى مَعْقِلِ الْاِنْتِصَارِ بِكَ
and whoever takes refuge in the fortress of the seeking of Your support will never be exposed to the strikes of misfortunes.
فَحَصَّنْتَنِيْ مِنْ بَاْسِهٖ بِقُدْرَتِكَ 
So, You safeguarded me from his prowess with Your omnipotence.
فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ يَا رَبِّ 
So, all praise be to You, O Lord;
مِنْ مُقْتَدِرٍ لَا يُغْلَبُ 
You are invulnerably Omnipotent
وَ ذِيْ اَنَاةٍ لَا يَعْجَلُ 
and prudently Forbearing.
صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
Bless Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad
وَ اجْعَلْنِيْ لِنَعْمَائِكَ مِنَ الشَّاكِرِيْنَ 
and include me with those who are thankful for Your bounties
وَ لِآلَائِكَ مِنَ الذَّاكِرِيْنَ
and those who permanently mention Your graces.
اِلٰهِيْ وَ كَمْ مِنْ سَحَائِبِ مَكْرُوْهٍ جَلَّيْتَهَا 
O my God, many clouds of misfortune You have dispersed,
وَ سَمَاءِ نِعْمَةٍ مَطَرْتَهَا 
much rain of bliss You have poured,
وَ جَدَاوِلِ كَرَامَةٍ اَجْرَيْتَهَا
many streams of conferral You have made flow,
وَ اَعْيُنِ اَحْدَاثٍ طَمَسْتَهَا
many springs of troubles You have effaced,
وَ نَاشِئَةِ رَحْمَةٍ نَشَرْتَهَا
many launches of mercy You have spread,
وَ جُنَّةِ عَافِيَةٍ اَلْبَسْتَهَا
many armors of wellbeing You have adorned [us with],
وَ غَوَامِرِ كُرُبَاتٍ كَشَفْتَهَا 
many overwhelming calamities You have removed,
وَ اُمُوْرٍ جَارِيَةٍ قَدَّرْتَهَا
and many continual events of goodness You have decided.
لَمْ تُعْجِزْكَ اِذْ طَلَبْتَهَا 
They would never render You impotent when You determined them to happen,
وَ لَمْ تَمْتَنِعْ مِنْكَ اِذْ ‏ اَرَدْتَهَا
and could never stop responding to You when You wanted them to be.
فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ يَا رَبِّ 
So, all praise be to You, O Lord;
مِنْ مُقْتَدِرٍ لَا يُغْلَبُ
You are invulnerably Omnipotent
وَ ذِيْ اَنَاةٍ لَا يَعْجَلُ
and prudently Forbearing.
صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
Bless Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad
وَ اجْعَلْنِيْ لِنَعْمَائِكَ مِنَ الشَّاكِرِيْنَ
and include me with those who are thankful for Your bounties
وَ لِآلَائِكَ مِنَ الذَّاكِرِيْنَ.
and those who permanently mention Your graces.
اِلٰهِيْ وَ كَمْ مِنْ ظَنٍّ حَسَنٍ حَقَّقْتَ 
O my God, many an excellent hope You have achieved,
وَ مِنْ كَسْرِ اِمْلَاقٍ جَبَرْتَ
many breaking poverty You have set,
وَ مِنْ مَسْكَنَةٍ فَادِحَةٍ حَوَّلْتَ 
many gross neediness You have shunted,
وَ مِنْ صَرْعَةٍ مُهْلِكَةٍ نَعَشْتَ 
many destructive blows You have revived (me from them),
وَ مِنْ مَشَقَّةٍ اَزَحْتَ 
and many hardships You have relieved (me of them).
لَا تُسْاَلُ عَمَّا تَفْعَلُ 
You cannot be questioned concerning that which You do
وَ هُمْ يُسْاَلُوْنَ 
and they shall be questioned.
وَ لَا يَنْقُصُكَ مَا اَنْفَقْتَ 
That which You spend never decreases You.
وَ لَقَدْ سُئِلْتَ فَاَعْطَيْتَ
When You have been besought, You gave;
وَ لَمْ تُسْاَلْ فَابْتَدَاْتَ
and although You have not been besought, You took the initiative to give.
وَ اسْتُمِيْحَ بَابُ فَضْلِكَ فَمَا اَكْدَيْتَ
When the door of Your favoring was knocked, You have not withheld.
اَبَيْتَ اِلَّا اِنْعَامًا وَ امْتِنَانًا
You have insisted on nothing but favoring and bestowal
وَ اِلَّا تَطَوُّلًا يَا رَبِّ وَ اِحْسَانًا
and You, O my Lord, have also insisted on giving generously and beneficently.

وَ اجْعَلْنِيْ لِنَعْمَائِكَ مِنَ الشَّاكِرِيْنَ 
and include me with those who are thankful for Your bounties
وَ لِآلَائِكَ مِنَ الذَّاكِرِيْنَ 
and those who permanently mention Your graces;
وَ ارْحَمْنِيْ بِرَحْمَتِكَ 
and have mercy upon me, by Your mercy,
يَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ.
O most Merciful of all those who show mercy;
وَ عِزَّتِكَ يَا كَرِيْمُ 
and by Your might; O All-generous.
لَاَطْلُبَنَّ مِمَّا لَدَيْكَ
I will insistently ask for that which is with You,
وَ لَاُلِحَّنَّ عَلَيْكَ 
persist on You,
وَ لَاَمُدَّنَّ يَدِيْ نَحْوَكَ 
and extend my hand towards You,
مَعَ جُرْمِهَا اِلَيْكَ 
although it has committed offenses against You.
يَا رَبِّ فَبِمَنْ اَعُوْذُ 
O my Lord, whose protection should I seek
وَ بِمَنْ اَلُوْذُ
and whose refuge should I take?
لَا اَحَدَ لِيْ اِلَّا اَنْتَ
None can stand for me save You.
اَ فَتَرُدَّنِيْ وَ اَنْتَ مُعَوَّلِيْ 
Will You reject me while You are my one and only confidence
وَ عَلَيْكَ مُتَّكَلِيْ
and upon You alone do I rely?
اَسْاَلُكَ بِاسْمِكَ الَّذِيْ وَضَعْتَهٗ عَلَى السَّمَاءِ فَاسْتَقَلَّتْ
I thus beseech You in the name of Your Name that when You put it on the heavens, they raised,
وَ عَلَى الْاَرْضِ فَاسْتَقَرَّتْ
when You put it on the earth, it settled down,
وَ عَلَى الْجِبَالِ فَرَسَتْ
when You put it on the mountains, they became firm,
وَ عَلَى اللَّيْلِ فَاَظْلَمَ
when You put it on the night, it darkled,
وَ عَلَى النَّهَارِ فَاسْتَنَارَ
and when You put it on the daylight, it lit up,
اَنْ تُصَلِّيَ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
[I beseech You] to bless Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad,
وَ اَنْ تَقْضِيَ لِيْ حَوَائِجِيْ كُلَّهَا 
satisfy all my wants,
وَ تَغْفِرَ لِيْ ذُنُوْبِيْ كُلَّهَا 
forgive all my sins,
صَغِيْرَهَا وَ كَبِيْرَهَا
the trivial and the significant,
وَ تُوَسِّعَ عَلَيَّ مِنَ الرِّزْقِ 
and expand my sustenance
مَا تُبَلِّغُنِيْ بِهٖ شَرَفَ الدُّنْيَا وَ الْآخِرَةِ 
to the scope that I can attain the honor of this world and the Hereafter.
يَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ
O most Merciful of all those who show mercy!
مَوْلَايَ بِكَ اسْتَعَنْتُ 
My Master, Your help do I seek;
فَصَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اَعِنِّيْ
so, bless Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad and help me!
وَ بِكَ اسْتَجَرْتُ فَاَجِرْنِيْ
Your protection do I seek; so, (please) protect me.
وَ اَغْنِنِيْ بِطَاعَتِكَ عَنْ طَاعَةِ عِبَادِكَ
Through my obedience to You, (please) suffice me from obedience to Your servants.
وَ بِمَسْاَلَتِكَ عَنْ مَسْاَلَةِ خَلْقِكَ 
Through my entreaty to You; (please) suffice me from beseeching Your creatures.
وَ انْقُلْنِيْ مِنْ ذُلِّ الْفَقْرِ اِلٰى عِزِّ الْغِنٰى
Transfer me from the humiliation of poverty to the honor of richness
وَ مِنْ ذُلِّ الْمَعَاصِي اِلٰى عِزِّ الطَّاعَةِ
and from the humiliation of acts of disobedience to You to the honor of obedience to You.
فَقَدْ فَضَّلْتَنِيْ عَلٰى كَثِيْرٍ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ 
You have really given me preference over many of Your creatures
جُوْدًا مِنْكَ وَ كَرَمًا
out of Your magnanimity and generosity,
لَا بِاسْتِحْقَاقٍ مِنِّيْ.
although I do not deserve it.
اِلٰهِي فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ عَلٰى ذٰلِكَ كُلِّهٖ 
My God, all praise be to You for all that.
صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
(Please) send blessings to Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad
وَ اجْعَلْنِيْ لِنَعْمَائِكَ مِنَ الشَّاكِرِيْنَ 
and include me with those who are thankful for Your bounties
وَ لِآلَائِكَ مِنَ الذَّاكِرِيْنَ.
and those who permanently mention Your graces.
You should then prostrate yourself and say the following:
سَجَدَ وَجْهِيَ الذَّلِيْلُ 
My lowly face is humbly prostrating
لِوَجْهِكَ الْعَزِيْزِ الْجَلِيْلِ
before Your All-majestic and Almighty Face.
سَجَدَ وَجْهِيَ الْبَالِي الْفَانِيْ 
My rotten, mortal face is prostrating
لِوَجْهِكَ الدَّائِمِ الْبَاقِيْ
before Your Everlasting, Eternal Face.
سَجَدَ وَجْهِيَ الْفَقِيْرُ 
My poor face is prostrating
لِوَجْهِكَ الْغَنِيِّ الْكَبِيْرِ
before Your All-dependent and All-great Face.
سَجَدَ وَجْهِيْ وَ سَمْعِيْ وَ بَصَرِيْ 
Prostrating are my face, my hearing, my sight,
وَ لَحْمِيْ وَ دَمِيْ وَ جِلْدِيْ 
my flesh, my blood, my skin,
