وَ عَظْمِيْ وَ مَا اَقَلَّتِ الْاَرْضُ مِنِّيْ 
my bones, and whatever part of me that is carried by the earth
لِلهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ
before Allah, the Lord of the Worlds.
اَللّٰهُمَّ عُدْ عَلٰى جَهْلِيْ بِحِلْمِكَ
O Allah, return upon my ignorance with Your indulgence,
وَ عَلٰى فَقْرِيْ بِغِنَاكَ
upon my neediness with Your self-sufficiency,
وَ عَلٰى ذُلِّيْ بِعِزِّكَ وَ سُلْطَانِكَ
upon my humiliation with Your Almightiness and Authority,
وَ عَلٰى ضَعْفِيْ بِقُوَّتِكَ
upon my powerlessness with Your omnipotence,
وَ عَلٰى خَوْفِيْ بِاَمْنِكَ 
upon my fearfulness with Your security,
وَ عَلٰى ذُنُوبِيْ وَ خَطَايَايَ بِعَفْوِكَ وَ رَحْمَتِكَ 
and upon my sins and offenses with Your pardon and mercy.
يَا رَحْمَنُ يَا رَحِيْمُ
O All-beneficent! O All-merciful!
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّيْ اَدْرَاُ بِكَ فِي نَحْرِ 
O Allah, I seek You to protect me against…
Mention the name of your enemy. Then say:
وَ اَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهٖ 
I seek Your protection against his evils;
فَاكْفِنِيْهِ بِمَا كَفَيْتَ بِهٖ اَنْبِيَائَكَ 
so, (please) save me from him just as You have saved Your Prophets,
وَ اَوْلِيَائَكَ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ  وَ صَالِحِ عِبَادِكَ 
Your intimate servants among Your creatures, and Your righteous servants
مِنْ فَرَاعِنَةِ خَلْقِكَ 
against the tyrants amongst Your creatures,
وَ طُغَاةِ عُدَاتِكَ 
and the oppressors amongst Your enemies
وَ شَرِّ جَمِيْعِ خَلْقِكَ 
and against the evil of all Your creatures.
بِرَحْمَتِكَ يَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ
[I ask You] in the name of Your mercy; O most Merciful of all those who show mercy!
اِنَّكَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ قَدِيْرٌ 
Verily, You have power over all things.
وَحَسْبُنَا اللهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيْلُ
Sufficient unto us is Allah; He is the best protector.

E31.Title: Dua Kumayl
E31.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنّي اَسْاَلُكَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ الَّتِيْ وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ 
O My God! I beseech You through (the medium of) Your Mercy which encompasses all things,
وَ بِقُوَّتِكَ الَّتِيْ قَهَرْتَ بِها كُلَّ شَيْءٍ وَ خَضَعَ لَها كُلُّ شَيْءٍ 
and through (the medium of) Your Might which overpowers all things, to which all things submit and compared to which all things are humble,
وَ ذَلَّ لَها كُلُّ شَيْءٍ وَ بِجَبَرُوْتِكَ الَّتِيْ غَلَبْتَ بِها كُلَّ شَيْءٍ 
and through (the medium of) Your Power through which You have conquered all things,
وَ بِعِزَّتِكَ الَّتِيْ لَا يَقُومُ لَهَا شَيْءٌ وَ بِعَظَمَتِكَ الَّتِيْ مَلَاَتْ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ 
and through (the medium of) Your Greatness against which nothing can stand up (or can rise), and through (the medium of) Your Grandeur which prevails upon all things,
وَ بِسُلْطانِكَ الَّذي عَلٰي كُلَّ شَيْءٍ وَ بِوَجْهِكَ الْبَاقِيْ بَعْدَ فَنَاءِ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ 
and through (the medium of) Your Own self which will continue existing when all things will pass away (cease to exist),
وَ بِاَسْمَائِكَ الَّتِيْ مَلَاَتْ اَرْكَانَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَ بِعِلْمِكَ الَّذِيْ اَحَاطَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ 
and through (the medium of) Your Names (attributes) which manifest Your Power over all things,
وَ بِنُوْرِ وَجْهِكَ الَّذِيْ اَضَاءَ لَهٗ كُلُّ شَيْءٍ 
and through (the medium of) Your Knowledge which pervades all things,
يَا نُوْرُ يَا قُدُّوْسُ يَا اَوَّلَ اْلَاوَّلِيْنَ وَ يَا آخِرَ اْلآخِرِيْنَ 
O You (who are) the Light, O You (who are) the most Holy, O You who existeth before the foremost things (from time without beginning), O You who shalt exist after the last things will cease to exist (You are Eternal – no beginning and no end).
اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيَ الذُّنُوْبَ الَّتِيْ تَهْتِكُ الْعِصَمَ 
O my Lord! forgive my such sins as would disgrace virtue;
اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِـرْ لِيَ الذُّنُوْبَ الَّتِيْ تُنْزِلُ النِّقَمَ 
O my Lord! forgive my such sins as would bring down retribution (from the Heavens);
اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيَ الذُّنُوْبَ الَّتِيْ تُغَيِّـرُ النِّعَمَ 
O my Lord! forgive my such sins as would change prosperity and happiness (into afflictions and sorrows);
اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيَ الذُّنُوْبَ الَّتِيْ تَحْبِسُ الدُّعَاءَ 
O my Lord! forgive my such sins as would intercept my invocations and prayers;
اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيَ الذُّنُوْبَ الَّتِيْ تَقْطَعُ الرَّجَآءَ 
O my Lord! forgive my such sins as would suppress hope;
اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيَ الذُّنُوْبَ الَّتِيْ تُنْزِلُ الْبَلَاءَ 
O my Lord! Forgive my such sins as would bring down afflictions;
اَللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ كُلَّ ذَنْبٍ اَذْنَبْتُهٗ وَ كُلَّ خَطِيْئَة اَخْطَاْتُهَا 
O my Lord! forgive all the sins that I have committed and all the vices that I am guilty of.
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّيْ اَتَقَرَّبُ اِلَيْكَ بِذِكْرِكَ وَ اَسْتَشْفِعُ بِكَ اِلٰى نَفْسِكَ 
O my Lord! I endeavour to achieve Your favour through Your praises and invocations to You; I pray to You to intercede Yourself on my behalf;
وَ اَسْاَلُكَ بِجُوْدِكَ اَنْ تُدْنِيَنِيْ مِنْ قُرْبِكَ 
I entreat of Thine benevolence to grant me Your nearness, 
وَ اَنْ تُوْزِعَنِيْ شُكْرَكَ وَ اَنْ تُلْهِمَنِيْ ذِكْرَكَ 
to bestow on me the quality of feeling (truly) grateful to You and to inspire me to keep on remembering and invoking You.
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنّي اَسْاَلُكَ سُؤَالَ خَاضِعٍ مُتَذَلِّلٍ خَاشِعٍ 
O my Lord! I entreat You begging submissively, humbly and meekly 
اَنْ تُسَامِحَنِيْ وَ تَرْحَمَنِيْ وَ تَجْعَلَنِيْ بِقِسْمِكَ رَاضِيَا قَانِعًا 
to treat me mercifully, to take pity on me, to make me contented, satisfied and pleased with what is allotted to me by You, 
وَ فِيْ جَمِيْعِ اْلَاحْوَالِ مُتَوَاضِعًا اَللّٰهُمَّ وَ اَسْاَلُكَ سُؤَالَ مَنِ اشْتَدَّتْ فَاقَتُهٗ 
and to keep me gentle and modest in all circumstances (in all phases of life). Lord! I beg You as one who is passing through extreme privations 
وَ اَنْزَلَ بِكَ عِنْدَ الشَّدَائِدِ حَاجَتَهٗ وَ عَظُمَ فِيْمَا عِنْدَكَ رَغْبَتُهٗ
and in his misery supplicates his needs to You, and (as one) whose cravings are great for the things which are Thine.
اَللّٰهُمَّ عَظُمَ سُلْطَانُكَ وَ عَلَا مَكَانُكَ وَ خَفِيَ مَكْرُكَ وَ ظَهَرَ اَمْرُكَ 
Lord! Great is Your Kingdom, exalted is Your Place, inscrutable are Your Ways, evident is Your Authority, 
وَ غَلَبَ قَهْرُكَ وَ جَرَتْ قُدْرَتُكَ وَ لَا يُمْكِنُ الْفِرَارُ مِنْ حُكُومَتِكَ 
overwhelming is Your Might, ever-operating (acting) is Your Power and no escape is possible from Your Domain.
اَللّٰهُمَّ لَا اَجِدُ لِذُنُوْبِيْ غَافِرًا وَ لَا لِقَبَائِحِيْ سَاتِرًا 
Lord! except You I do not find any one (so kind as) to pardon my sins, to conceal my degradations (despicable actions) 
وَ لَا لِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عَمَلِيَ الْقَبِيْحِ بِالْحَسَنِ مُبَدِّلًا غَيْرَكَ 
and to divert me (my mind) from vices to virtues.
لَا اِلٰـهَ اِلَّا اَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ وَ بِحَمْدِكَ ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِيْ 
There is no God but You, Glory and praise be to You, I have harmed myself (by foul deeds), 
وَ تَجَرَّأْتُ بِجَهْلِيْ وَ سَكَنْتُ اِلٰى قَدِيْمِ ذِكْرِكَ لِيْ وَ مَنِّكَ عَلَيَّ 
I have boldly taken to sins and vices as I was ignorant (of Your Wrath and Power) and confident of my past prayers and invocations and Your (constant) mercies and blessings on me (which I took for granted).
اَللّٰهُمَّ مَوْلَايَ كَمْ مِنْ قَبِيْحٍ سَتَرْتَهٗ وَ كَمْ مِنْ فَادِحٍ مِنَ الْبَلَاءِ اَقَلْتَهٗ 
My God! O my Lord! How many of my vices have You covered (from public gaze), how many calamities (descending upon me) have You reduced the severity of; 
وَ كَمْ مِّنْ عِثَارٍ وَّ قَيْتَهٗ وَ كَمْ مِّنْ مَكْرُوْهٍ دَفَعْتَهٗ 
how many of my mistakes have You corrected, how many misfortunes have You averted (from me), 
وَ كَمْ مِّنْ ثَنَآءٍ جَمِيْلٍ لَّسْتُ اَهْلًا لَهٗ نَشَرْتَهٗ 
how many elegant praises have You allowed to be propagated about me which I did not merit!
اَللّٰهُمَّ عَظُمَ بَلَآئِيْ وَ اَفْرَطَ بِيْ سُوْٓ ءُ حَالِيْ وَ قَصُرَتْ بِيْ اَعْمَالِيْ 
O my Lord! my trials and misfortunes are great, and my sorrows and sufferings are intense, and my good deeds are few, 
وَ قَعَدَتْ بِيْ اَغْلَالِىْ وَ حَبَسَنِيْ عَنْ نَفْعِيْ بُعْدُ اَمَلِيْ 
and my manacles (liabilities and responsibilities) lie heavily upon me. And inordinate (remote) desires keep me away even from lawful gains.
وَ خَدَعَتْنِيْ الدُّنْيَا بِغُرُوْرِهَا وَ نَفْسِيْ بِجِنَايَتِهَا وَ مِطَالِيْ 
The world has deceived me with its vanities and my mind has deceived me with dishonesty and procrastination.
يَا سَيِّدِيْ فَاَسْاَلُكَ بِعِزَّتِكَ اَنْ لَا يَحْجُبَ عَنْكَ دُعَآئِيْ سُوْٓءُ عَمَلِيْ وَ فِعَالِيْ 
Therefore, my Lord, I implore You in the name of Your greatness not to let my sins and vices hinder my prayers from access to Your realm, 
وَ لَا تَفْضَحْنِيْ بِخَفِيِّ مَا اطَّلَعْتَ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ سِرِّىْ 
and not to disgrace me by exposing my (hidden) sins and vices of which You have knowledge, 
وَ لَا تُعَاجِلْنِيْ بِالْعُقُوْبَةِ عَلٰى مَا عَمِلْتُهُ فِيْ خَلَوَاتِيْ 
and not to hasten Your retribution for the vice’s I have committed secretly 
مِنْ سُوْٓ ءِ فِعْلِيْ وَ اِسَآئَتِيْ وَ دَوَامِ تَفْرِيْطِيْ وَ جَهَالَتِيْ 
and which were due to evil-mindedness, sinfulness, ignorance, 
وَ كَثْرَةِ شَهْوَاتِيْ وَ غَفْلَتِيْ وَ كُنِ اللّٰهُمَّ بِعِزَّتِكَ لِيْ فِيْ كُلِّ اْلَاحْوَالِ رَؤُوْفًا 
lustfulness and negligence. So my Lord (I crave You) for the sake of Your greatness under all (those) circumstances before giving 
وَّ عَلَيَّ فِيْ جَمِيْعِ اْلاُمُوْرِ عَطُوْفًا 
and under all conditions be merciful unto me.
اِلٰهِيْ وَ رَبِّيْ مَنْ لِيْ غَيْرُكَ اَسْاَلُهٗ كَشْفَ ضُرِّيْ وَ النَّظَرَ فِيْ اَمْرِيْ 
O my God! have I any one besides You, O my Lord! to whom can I turn in my hour of afflictions to relieve me of my sorrows and to put my affairs in order!
اِلٰهِيْ وَ مَوْلَايَ اَجْرَيْتَ عَلَيَّ حُكْمًا نِاتَّبَعْتُ فِيْهِ هَوٰى نَفْسِيْ 
My God! My Master! Your commandments came into force for me (to obey) but I followed (evil) intentions of my (warped) mind, 
وَ لَمْ اَحْتَرِسْ فِيْهِ مِنْ تَزْيِيْنِ عَدُوِّيْ فَغَرَّنِيْ بِمَا اَهْوٰى 
and I heeded not those commandments) on account of allurements staged by my enemy who deceived me through my passions (evil desires), and my ill luck also favoured him (my enemy) in this.
وَ اَسْعَدَهٗ عَلٰى ذٰلِكَ الْقَضَآءُ فَتَجَاوَزْتُ بِمَا جَرٰى عَلَيَّ مِنْ ذٰلِكَ 
Thus I transgressed some of the bonds set by You (for human freedom) 
بَعْضَ حُدُوْدِكَ وَ خالَفْتُ بَعْضَ اَوَامِرِكَ 
and I disobeyed some of Your commands.
فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ عَلَيَّ فِيْ جَمِيْعِ ذٰلِكَ وَ لَا حُجَّةَ لِيْ فِيْمَا جَرٰى عَلَيَّ فِيْهِ قَضَآؤُكَ 
Praise be to You, my Lord! You have proof against me in all these matters, and I have no argument (no reasoning) to protest against Your Judgement 
وَ اَلْزَمَنِيْ حُكْمُكَ وَ بَلَآؤُكَ وَ قَدْ اَتَيْتُكَ 
and Your Orders and Afflictions (sent down by You).
يَآ اِلٰهِيْ بَعْدَ تَقْصِيْرِيْ وَ اِسْرَافِيْ عَلٰى نَفْسِيْ مُعْتَذِرًا نَادِمًا مُنْكَسِرًا 
I return to You, my Lord, after having committed the sins of omission and commission against myself apologetic, repentant, 
مُسْتَقِيْلًا مُسْتَغْفِرًا مُنِيْبًا مُقِرًّا مُّذْعِنًا مُعْتَرِفًا 
broken-hearted, imploring forgiveness, begging pardon (for my sins) confessing (my vices), submissive and admitting (my faults).
لَّا اَجِدُ مَفَرًّا مِمَّا كَانَ مِنِّيْ وَ لَا مَفْزَعًا اَتَوَجَّهُ اِلَيْهِ فِيْ اَمْرِيْ 
I see no escape from that which has been done by me, and I find no refuge to which I may turn 
غَيْرَ قَبُوْلِكَ عُذْرِيْ وَ اِدْخَالِكَ اِيَايَ فِيْ سَعَةِ رَحْمَتِكَ 
except that You mayest (kindly) accept my excuse (plea). And allow me to enter the realm of Your Mercy.
اَللّٰهُمَّ فَاقْبَلْ عُذْرِيْ وَ ارْحَمْ شِدَّةَ ضُرِّيْ وَ فُكَّنِيْ مِنْ شَدِّ وَثَاقِيْ 
O my Lord! Accept my apology, and have pity on my intense sufferings, and set me free from the strong fetters (put on by my evil deeds).
يَا رَبِّ ارْحَمْ ضَعْفَ بَدَنِيْ وَ رِقَّةَ جِلْدِيْ وَدِقَّةَ عَظْمِيْ 
Lord! Have mercy on the weakness of my body, and on the tenderness of my skin and on the brittleness of my bones.
يَا مَنْۢ بَدَاَ خَلْقِيْ وَ ذِكْرِيْ وَ تَرْبِيَتِيْ وَ بِرِّىْ وَ تَغْذِيَتِيْ هَبْنِيْ 
O You! Who originated my creation (and then) granted me fame and honour, (Who) arranged for my upbringing and ensured my welfare and made provisions for my food, as You have been generous to me
لِاِبـْتِدَآءِ كَرَمِكَ وَ سَالِفِ بِرِّكَ بِيْ 
from the very beginning of my life, please continue Your Favours and Blessings as before.
يَا اِلٰهِيْ وَسَيِّدِيْ وَ رَبِّيْ اَ تُرَاكَ مُعَذِّبِيْ بِنَارِكَ بَعْدَ تَوْحِيْدِكَ 
O my God! O my Master! Will You see me punished in Your hell after I have faithfully believed in Your Unity?
وَ بَعْدَ مَا انْطَوٰى عَلَيْهِ قَلْبِيْ مِنْ مَعْرِفَتِكَ 
And when my heart has been truly and loyally filled with knowledge about You?
وَ لَهِجَ بِهٖ لِسَانِيْ مِنْ ذِكْرِكَ وَ اعْتَقَدَهُ ضَمِيْرِيْ مِنْ حُبِّكَ 
And when my tongue has persistently praised You and repeated Your name, and I have conscientiously, faithfully, and constantly loved You, 
وَ بَعْدَ صِدْقِ اعْتِرَافِيْ وَ دُعَآئِيْ خَاضِعًا لِرُبُوْبِيَّتِكَ 
and after sincere confessions (of my sins and vices) and after the moving and humble entreaties made by me?
هَيْهَاتَ اَنْتَ اَكْرَمُ مِنْ اَنْ تُضَيِّعَ مَنْ رَّبَّيْتَهٗ 
No, My Lord! such an action is far from You, You are far too kind and generous to lay waste one whom You have nourished, maintained and supported, 
اَوْ تُبَعِّدَ مَنْ اَدْنَيْتَهٗ اَوْ تُشَرِّدَ مَنْ اٰوَيْتَهٗ 
or drive away from Yourself one whom You have kept under Your protection. Or to scare away one whom You have given shelter,
اَوْ تُسَلِّمَ اِلَى الْبَلَآءِ مَنْ كَفَيْتَهٗ وَرَحِمْتَهٗ 
or to abandon one to afflictions and trials whom You have protected and have shown Kindness and Mercy.
وَ لَيْتَ شِعْرِىْ يَا سَيِّدِيْ وَ اِلٰهِيْ وَ مَوْلَايَ 
O my Master! My God and my Lord! I can never believe 
اَ تُسَلِّطُ النَّارَ عَلٰى وُجُوْهٍ خَرَّتْ لِعَظَمَتِكَ سَاجِدَةً 
that You will empower the fire (of hell) to burn faces which have submissively bowed in prostration before Your Greatness.
وَّ عَلٰى اَلْسُنٍ نَطَقَتْ بِتَوْحِيْدِكَ صَادِقَةً وَ بِشُكْرِكَ مَادِحَةً
And (You will burn in the fire of hell) the tongues which have sincerely declared Your Unity and have been always thankful (for kindness and Mercy).
وَّ عَلٰى قُلُوْبٍ نِاعْتَرَفَتْ بِاِلٰهِيَّتِكَ مُحَقِّقَةً 
And (You will permit the fires of hell to consume) the hearts which have acknowledge Your Divinity with conviction.
وَّ عَلٰى ضَمَآئِرَ حَوَتْ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ بِكَ حَتّٰى صَارَتْ خَاشِعَةً 
And (you will allow to be cremated in hell) the minds which have gathered such knowledge about You as to feel humble and submissive before You.
وَّ عَلٰى جَوَارِحَ سَعَتْ اِلٰى اَوْطَانِ تَعَبُّدِكَ طَآئِعَةً وَ اَشَارَتْ بِاِسْتِغْفَارِكَ مُذْعِنَةً
And (You will consent to consumption by fire in hell) of bodies whose endeavours, wherever they lived, were directed towards obedience and service to You and which have exerted themselves with deserving humility to seek Your Forgiveness. 
مَا هٰكَذَا الظَّنُّ بِكَ وَ لَآ اُخْبِرْنَا بِفَضْلِكَ عَنْكَ يَا كَرِيْمُ 
Such an attitude can never be expected of You (O my God), nor Your Kindness and Grace will allow me to hold such a belief, O Generous One!
يَا رَبِّ وَ اَنْتَ تَعْلَمُ ضَعْفِيْ عَنْ قَلِيْلٍ مِّنْۢ بَلَآءِ الدُّنْيَا وَ عُقُوْبَاتِهَا 
O Lord! You are aware of my weakness to bear even minor afflictions and calamities of this world or their consequences, 
وَ مَا يَجْرِيْ فِيْهَا مِنَ الْمَكَارِهِ عَلٰى اَهْلِهَا عَلٰى اَنَّ ذٰلِكَ بَلَآءٌ وَ مَكْرُوْهٌ قَلِيْلٌ مَّكْثُهٗ يَسِيْرٌ بَقَاؤُهٗ قَصِيْرٌ مُّدَّتُهٗ 
and also of adversities which befall men inhabiting this world, though all those trials and afflictions are momentary, short lived and transient.
فَكَيْفَ احْتِمَالِيْ لِبَلَآءِ اْلآخِرَةِ وَ جَلِيْلِ وُقُوْعِ الْمَكَارِهِ فِيْهَا 
(Lord!) How can I bear the retributions and the punishments of the hereafter which are enormous 
وَ هُوَ بَلَآءٌ تَطُوْلُ مُدَّتُهٗ وَ يَدُوْمُ مَقَامُهٗ وَ لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْ اَهْلِهٖ 
and of intensive sufferings, of prolonged period or of perpetual duration, and which shall never be reduced or alleviated 
لِاَنَّهٗ لَا يَكُوْنُ اِلَّا عَنْ غَضَبِكَ وَ اْنتِقَامِكَ وَ سَخَطِكَ 
for those who deserve these punishments; because those retributions will be the result of Your Wrath, Your Punishment and Your Anger 
وَ هٰذَا مَا لَا تَقُوْمُ لَهُ السَّمٰوَاتُ وَ اْلَارْضُ 
which neither the heavens nor the earth can withstand and bear.
يَا سَيِّدِيْ فَكَيْفَ لِيْ وَ اَنَا عَبْدُكَ الضَّعِيْـفُ الـذَّلِيْـلُ الْحَقِيْـرُ الْمِسْكِيْـنُ الْمُسْتَكِيْنُ 
O my Lord! How can I, a weak, insignificant, humble, poor and destitute creature of You bear them?
يَا اِلٰهِيْ وَ رَبِّيْ وَ سَيِّدِيْ وَ مَوْلَايَ لِاَيِّ اْلاُمُوْرِ اِلَيْكَ اَشْكُوْ 
O my God! My Lord! My King! and my Master! about how many things (of hell) shall I complain to You and about how many shall I bewail and weep;
وَ لِمَا مِنْها اَضِجُّ وَ اَبْكِيْ لِاَلِيْمِ الْعَذَابِ وَ شِدَّتِهٖ 
About the pain and pangs of punishment and its intensity or about the prolongation of sufferings and their duration.
اَمْ لِطُوْلِ الْبَلَآءِ وَ مُدَّتِه فَلَئِنْ صَيَّرْتَنِىْ لِلْعُقُوْبَاتِ مَعَ اَعْدَائِكَ 
Because, my Lord! if You will submit me to the penalties (of Hell!) together with Your enemies 
وَ جَمَعْتَ بَيْنِيْ وَ بَيْنَ اَهْلِ بَلَآئِكَ وَ فَرَّقْتَ بَيْنِيْ وَ بَيْنَ اَحِبَّآئِكَ وَ اَوْلِيَآئِكَ 
and cast me with those who deserved those punishments, and if You will separate me from Your friends and from those who love You,
فَهَبْنِيْ يَا اِلٰـهِىْ وَ سَيِّدِيْ وَ مَوْلَايَ وَ رَبِّيْ صَبَرْتُ عَلٰى عَذَابِكَ فَكَيْفَ اَصْبِرُ عَلٰى فِرَاقِكَ
I realise that You have the right to do so, but my God, my Lord and my master! (please let me submit that) though I may patiently bear thy punishments, how can I calmly accept the separation from You (Your Grace and Mercy?)
وَ هَبْنِيْ (يَا اِلٰهِيْ) صَبَرْتُ عَلٰى حَرِّ نَارِكَ 
 (And) please Lord, let me submit that though I may patiently endure the scorching fire of Your hell, 
فَكَيْفَ اَصْبِرُ عَنِ النَّظَرِ اِلٰى كَرَامَتِكَ 
yet how can I resign myself to the denial of Your pity and clemency; 
اَمْ كَيْفَ اَسْكُنُ فِي النَّارِ وَ رَجَآئِيْ عَفْوُكَ 
how can I remain in the fire (of hell) while I have hopes of Your forgiveness?
فَبِعِزَّتِكَ يَا سَيِّدِىْ وَ مَوْلَايَ اُقْسِمُ صَادِقًا لَّئِنْ تَرَكْتَنِيْ نَاطِقًا 
Truly do I swear by Your honour, O my Lord and O my Master that, if You will allow my power of speech to be retained by me, 
لَاَضِجَّنَّ اِلَيْكَ بَيْنَ اَهْلِهَا ضَجِيْجَ اْلآمِلِيْنَ 
I will, from amongst the inmates (of hell), cry out unto You with the cry of those who have faith in Your Kindness and Compassion.
وَ لَاَصْرُخَنَّ اِلَيْكَ صُرَاخَ الْمَسْتَصْرِخِيْنَ 
And I shall loudly beseech You for help and mercy with the voice of those who shriek for succour, 
وَ لَاَبْكِيَنَّ عَلَيْكَ بُكَاءَ الْفَاقِدِيْنَ وَ لَاُنَادِيَنَّكَ 
and I shall lament like those who are desperately in need of Your help, and I shall keep on calling unto You; 
اَيْنَ كُنْتَ يَا وَلِيَّ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ يَا غَايَةَ آمَالِ الْعَارِفِيْنَ يَا غِيَاثَ الْمُسْتَغِيْثِيْنَ 
“Where are You, O Friend of the believers! O (You who are) the last hope and resort of those who have faith in Your Clemency and Kindness; O the Helper of those who seek Your help! 
يَا حَبِيْبَ قُلُوْبِ الصَّادِقِيْنَ وَ يَا اِلٰهَ الْعَالَمِيْنَ اَفَتُرَاكَ
O (You who are) dear to the hearts of those who truly believe in You! and O (You who are) the Lord of the Universe.”
سُبْحانَكَ يَا اِلٰهِىْ وَ بِحَمْدِكَ تَسْمَعُ فِيْهَا صَوْتَ عَبْدٍ مُسْلِمٍ 
See You my plight, O my Lord! Glory and Praise be unto You, You will be hearing from inside hell the voice of Your humble creature (myself) 
سُجِنَ فِيْهَا بِمُخَالَفَتِهٖ وَ ذَاقَ طَعْمَ عَذَابِهَا بِمَعْصِيَتِهٖ
who is thrown in there in punishment for his disobedience and who tastes the chastisements (of hell) for his sins, 
وَ حُبِسَ بَيْنَ اَطْبَاقِهَا بِجُرْمِهٖ وَ جَرِيْرَتِهٖ
and who is confined within its layers because of his crimes and vices 
وَ هُوَ يَضِجُّ اِلَيْكَ ضَجِيْجَ مُؤَمِّلِ لِرَحْمَتِكَ 
and who cries to You (my Lord) with the voice of one who has faith in Your Mercy 
وَ يُنَادِيْكَ بِلِسَانِ اَهْلِ تَوْحِيْدِكَ وَ يَتَوَسَّلُ اِلَيْكَ بِرُبُوْبِيَّتِكَ 
and calls out to You in the language of those who believes in Your Unity, and who seeks Your Grace and Help (with a firm belief) in Your Authority and Lordship.
يَا مَوْلَايَ فَكَيْفَ يَبْقٰى فِي الْعَذَابِ وَ هُوَ يَرْجُوْ مَا سَلَفَ مِنْ حِلْمِكَ 
O My Lord! How could he remain in the abode of chastisement who puts his confidence in Your past Forbearance and Clemency?
اَمْ كَيْفَ تُؤْلِمُهُ النَّارُ وَ هُوَ يَامُلُ فَضْلَكَ وَ رَحْمَتَكَ 
How could the fire of hell hurt him who has hope in Your Kindness and Compassion?
اَمْ كَيْفَ يُحْرِقُهٗ لَهِيْبُهَا وَ اَنْتَ تَسْمَعُ صَوْتَهٗ وَ تَرٰى مَكَانَهٗ 
How could the flames of hell burn anybody while You hearest his voice and seest his plight?
اَمْ كَيْفَ يَشْتَمِلُ عَلَيْهِ زَفِيْرُهَا وَ اَنْتَ تَعْلَمُ ضَعْفَهٗ 
How could the roaring (fires) of hell terrify anyone whose weaknesses You are aware of?
اَمْ كَيْفَ يَتَقَلْقَلُ بَيْنَ اَطْبَاقِهَا وَ اَنْتَ تَعْلَمُ صِدْقَهٗ 
How can he, whose sincerity is known to You, be tossed into the layers of hell?
اَمْ كَيْفَ تَزْجُرُهٗ زَبَانِيَتُهَا وَ هُوَ يُنَادِيْكَ يَا رَبَّهٗ 
How can the flames of hell torture him who keeps on calling You as his Lord?
اَمْ كَيْفَ يَرْجُوْ فَضْلَكَ فِيْ عِتْقِهِ مِنْهَا فَتَتْرُكُهٗ فِيْهَا 
How is it possible that while a person has faith in Your Kindness and Mercy to set him free from hell, You shouldst abandon him there?
هَيْهَاتَ مَا ذٰلِكَ الظَّنُ بِكَ وَ لَا الْمَعْرُوْفُ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ 
No, my Lord! nobody can believe You to be thus, neither Your Grace has such a reputation; nor have You through Goodness 
وَ لَا مُشْبِهٌ لِّمَا عَامَلْتَ بِهِ الْمُوَحِّدِيْنَ مِنْ بِرِّكَ وَ اِحْسَانِكَ 
and Clemency ever dealt in this way with those who have faith in Your Unity.
فَبِالْيَقِيْنِ اَقْطَعُ لَوْلَا مَا حَكَمْتَ بِهٖ مِنْ تَعْذِيْبِ جَاحِدِيْكَ 
I am positively certain (my Lord) that have You not ordained punishment for those who disbelieve in You, 
وَ قَضَيْتَ بِهٖ مِنْ اِخْلَادِ مُعَانِدِيْكَ لَجَعَلْتَ النَّارَ كُلَّهَا بَرْدًا وَّ سَلَامًا 
and have You not decreed Your enemies to remain in hell, You would have turned the fire of hell cold and pleasant, 
وَّ مَا كَانَتْ لِاَحَدٍ فِيْهَا مَقَرًّا وَّ لَا مُقَامًا لٰكِنَّكَ تَقَدَّسَتْ اَسْمَآؤُكَ 
and it (the burning and blazing hell) would never have become an abode of or a halting place for any one.
اَقْسَمْتَ اَنْ تَمْلَاَهَا مِنَ الْكَافِرِيْنَ مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَ النَّاسِ اَجْمَعينَ 
But, sanctified be Your names, You have worn to fill hell with all the disbelievers from amongst the Jinns and mankind 
وَ اَنْ تُخَلِّدَ فِيْهَا الْمُعَانِدِيْنَ وَ اَنْتَ جَلَّ ثَنَآؤُكَ قُلْتَ مُبْتَدِئًا 
and to throw in it (hell) all Your enemies (and to keep them there) forever. You, exalted be Your praise, hath said in the beginning 
وَّ تَطَوَّلْتَ بِاْلاِنْعَامِ مُتَكَرِّمًا اَفَمَنْ كَانَ مُؤْمِنًا كَمَنْ كَانَ فَاسِقًا لَّا يَسْتَوُؤْنَ 
and out of Your Generosity and Kindness, hath come to the generous decision that faithful followers (of Your Orders) can never be (treated) like those who are sinners.
اِلٰهِىْ وَ سَيِّدِىْ فَاَسْاَلُكَ بِالْقُدْرَةِ الَّتِىْ قَدَّرْتَهَا 
My Lord! My Master! I, therefore, implore You by that Power 
وَ بِالْقَضِيَّةِ الَّتِيْ حَتَمْتَهَا وَ حَكَمْتَهَا وَ غَلَبْتَ مَنْ عَلَيْهِ اَجْرَيْتَهَا 
and Might which You possesses and by that faith of Thine (not to treat alike the good and bad) which You have finalised and ordained and thereby hath overpowered those upon whom You have imposed it, 
اَنْ تَهَبَ لِىْ فِىْ هٰذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ وَ فِيْ هٰذِهِ السَّاعَةِ كُلَّ جُرْمٍ اَجْرَمْتُهٗ 
to forgive tonight and during this very hour all the transgressions that I am guilty of.
وَ كُلَّ ذَنْۢبٍ اَذْنَبْتُهٗ وَ كُلَّ قَبِيْحٍ اَسْرَرْتُهٗ وَ كُلَّ جَهْلٍ عَمِلْتُهٗ 
All the sins that I have committed, all the vices that I have kept secret and all the evil deeds that I have done, 
كَتَمْتُهٗ اَوْ اَعْلَنْتُهٗ اَخْفَيْتُهٗ اَوْ اَظْهَرْتُهٗ 
which I may have done secretly or openly, and which I may have tried to keep hidden or may have committed publicly, 
وَ كُلَّ سَيِّئَةٍ اَمَرْتَ بِاِثْبَاتِهَا الْكِرَامَ الْكَاتِبِيْنَ الَّذِيْنَ وَكَّلْتَهُمْ 
and all my evil actions that You have ordered the two immaculate (and accurate) Scribes to note down, they are appointed by You to keep a correct record of all of my actions 
بِحِفْظِ مَا يَكُوْنُ مِنِّيْ وَ جَعَلْتَهُمْ شُهُوْدًا عَلَيَّ مَعَ جَوَارِحِيْ 
and to act along with the limbs of my body as witnesses to all of my doings arid beside them all You (my Lord) does, keep a watch over me.
وَ كُنْتَ اَنْتَ الرَّقِيْبَ عَلَيَّ مِنْ وَّرَآئِهِمْ وَ الشَّاهِدَ لِمَا خَفِيَ عَنْهُمْ 
And You knows the things which have been hidden from them, but have through Your Mercy kept my vices secret (from everybody)
وَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ اَخْفَيْتَهٗ وَ بِفَضْلِكَ سَتَرْتَهٗ وَ اَنْ تُوَفِّرَ حَظِّيْ مِنْ كُلِّ خَيْرٍ اَنْزَلْتَهٗ 
and through Your Kindness drawn a curtain over them. And I pray to You (my Lord) to increase my share in all the good that You do bestow;
اَوْ اِحْسَانٍ فَضَّلْتَهٗ اَوْ بِرٍّ نَشَرْتَهٗ اَوْ رِزْقٍ بَسَطْتَهٗ اَوْ ذَنْۢبٍ تَغْفِرُهٗ 
and in all the favours that You do grant; all the virtues that You do allow to be known everywhere; all the sustenance and livelihood that You do Distribute (in greater and greater quantities); 
اَوْ خَطَأٍ تَسْتُرُهٗ يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ 
All the sins that You do forgive and all the vices that You do cover up.
يَا اِلٰهِيْ وَ سَيِّدِيْ وَ مَوْلَايَ وَ مَالِكَ رِقِّى، يَا مَنْۢ بِيَدِهٖ نَاصِيَتِىْ 
O Lord! O Lord! O Lord! O my God! my Lord! my King! O master of my freedom! O You! who holds my destiny 
يَا عَلِيْمًا بِضُرِّىْ وَ مَسْكَنَتِىْ يَا خَبِيْرًا بِفَقْرِىْ وَ فَاقَتِىْ 
and are aware of my sufferings and my poverty, O You! who knows my destitution and starvation, 
يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ اَسْاَلُكَ بِحَقِّكَ وَ قُدْسِكَ وَ اَعْظَمِ صِفَاتِكَ وَ اَسْمَآئِكَ 
O Lord! O Lord! O Lord! I beseech You by Your Glory and Your Honour, by Your Supremely high attributes and Your Names 
اَنْ تَجْعَلَ اَوْقَاتِيْ مِنَ اللَّيْلِ وَ النَّهَارِ بِذِكْرِكَ مَعْمُوْرَةً 
to make me busy day and night with Your Remembrance, 
وَّ بِخِدْمَتِكَ مَوْصُولَةً وَّ اَعْمَالِىْ عِنْدَكَ مَقْبُوْلَةً 
engaged in serving You (Your Cause) and to let my deeds be such as to be acceptable to You, 
حَتّٰى تَكُوْنَ اَعْمَالِيْ وَ اَوْرَادِىْ كُلُّهَا وِرْدًا وَّاحِدًا 
so much so that all my actions and offerings (prayers) may be transformed into one continuous and sustained effort 
وَّ حَالِىْ فِىْ خِدْمَتِكَ سَرْمَدًا يَا سَيِّدِيْ يَا مَنْ عَلَيْهِ مُعَوَّلِيْ 
and my life may take the form of constant and perpetual service to You (Your Cause). O My Master! O You! on whom I rely,
يَا مَنْ اِلَيْهِ شَكَوْتُ اَحْوَالِيْ يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ 
O You! unto whom I supplicate about (the miseries and sufferings of) my life. O my Lord! my Lord! my Lord!
قَوِّ عَلٰى خِدْمَتِكَ جَوَارِحِىْ وَ اشْدُدْ عَلَى الْعَزِيْمَةِ جَوَانِحِيْ 
Strengthen my limbs for Your service and sustain my strength and perseverance to continue it.
وَ هَبْ لِيَ الْجِدَّ فِيْ خَشْيَتِكَ وَ الدَّوَامَ فِيْ اْلاِتِّصَالِ بِخِدْمَتِكَ 
(Lord) Grant me that I may continuously endeavour to keep Your fear (in my mind) and to be occupied constantly in Your service, 
حَتّٰى اَسْرَحَ اِلَيْكَ فِيْ مَيَادِيْنِ السَّابِقِيْنَ وَ اُسْرِعَ اِلَيْكَ فِي الْبَارِزِيْنَ 
till I can successfully compete (with those striving) to reach You (Your Grace) faster and quicker than the ones who are in the first rank; 
وَ اَشْتَاقَ اِلٰى قُرْبِكَ فِي الْمُشْتَاقِيْنَ وَ اَدْنُوَ مِنْكَ دُنُوَّ الْمُخْلِصِيْنَ 
and I may hasten with those who eagerly surge to be near You, so that I may be as close to You as those sincere ones who have attained Your Nearness, 
وَ اَخَافَكَ مَخَافَةَ الْمُوْقِنِيْنَ وَ اَجْتَمِعَ فِىْ جِوَارِكَ مَعَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ 
and I may keep on fearing You like those sincere believers who constantly keep Your fear in their minds and thus I may join the assemblage of the faithful (gathered) near You.
اَللّٰهُمَّ وَ مَنْ اَرَادَنِيْ بِسُوْٓءٍ فَاَرِدْهُ وَ مَنْ كَادَنِيْ فَكِدْهُ 
O Allah, (please) let ill befall on him who, wishes me ill, (please) bring distress to him who plots against me.
وَ اجْعَلْنِيْ مِنْ اَحْسَنِ عَبِيْدِكَ نَصِيْبًا عِنْدَكَ وَ اَقْرَبِهِمْ مَنْزِلَةً مِنْكَ 
And assign unto me a place in Your Presence with the best of Your servants whose place is nearest to You, 
وَ اَخَصِّهِمْ زُلْفَةً لَدَيْكَ فَاِنَّهٗ لَا يُنَالُ ذٰلِكَ اِلَّا بِفَضْلِكَ 
for verily that position cannot be attained except through Your Favour.
وَجُدْ لِيْ بِجُوْدِكَ وَ اعْطِفْ عَلَيَّ بِمَجْدِكَ وَ احْفَظْنِيْ بِرَحْمَتِكَ 
Lord! Please treat me benevolently and through Your Greatness extend Your Favour towards me, 
وَ اجْعَلْ لِّسَانِىْ بِذِكْرِكَ لَهِجًا وَّ قَلْبِيْ بِحُبِّكَ مُتَـيَّمًا 
and through Your Mercy protect me and let my tongue be constantly busy in Your Remembrance and let my heart be filled with Your Love 
وَّ مُنَّ عَلَيَّ بِحُسْنِ اِجابَتِكَ وَ اَقِلْنِيْ عَثْرَتِيْ وَ اغْفِرْ زَلَّتِيْ 
and be kind to me with Gracious acceptance (of my service and prayers), and weaken the force and intensity of my vices and forgive my evil doings.
فَاِنَّكَ قَضَيْتَ عَلٰى عِبَادِكَ بِعِبَادَتِكَ وَ اَمَرْتَهُمْ بِدُعَآئِكَ 
For verily, You have ordained that Your creatures should obey You 
وَ ضَمِنْتَ لَهُمُ اْلاِجَابَةَ فَاِلَيْكَ يَا رَبِّ نَصَبْتُ وَجْهِيْ وَ اِلَيْكَ يَا رَبِّ مَدَدْتُ يَدِيْ 
and have bidden them to pray unto You and have assured their acceptance. So, my Lord! I have fixed my gaze upon You and my Lord! I have extended my hands (in supplications) towards You.
فَبِعِزَّتِكَ اسْتَجِبْ لِيْ دُعَآئِيْ وَ بَلِّغْنِيْ مُنَايَ وَ لَا تَقْطَعْ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ رَجَآئِيْ 
Therefore, for the sake of Your Honour accept my prayers and allow me to attain my objective; and by Your Favour (I implore You) do not frustrate my hopes, 
وَ اكْفِنِيْ شَرَّ الْجِنِّ وَ اْلاِنْسِ مِنْ اَعْدَآئِيْ 
and throughly protect me from the enmity and malice of my foes, from among the Jinns and mankind.
يَا سَرِيْعَ الرِّضَا اِغْفِرْ لِمَنْ لَّا يَمْلِكُ اِلَّا الدُّعَآءَ فَاِنَّكَ فَعَّالٌ لِمَا تَشَآءُ 
O You! Who are readily pleased, forgive one who owes nothing but prayers, verily You does what You will.
يَا مَنِ اسْمُهٗ دَوَآءٌ وَ ذِكْرُهٗ شِفَآءٌ وَ طَاعَتُهٗ غِنًى 
O You! Whose name is the remedy (for all ills) and whose Remembrance is a sure cure for all ailments, and whose obedience will make one independent of all, 
اِرْحَمْ مَنْ رَأْسُ مَالِهِ الرَّجَآءُ وَ سِلَاحُهُ الْبُكَآءُ 
have Mercy on one whose only asset is his hope (in Your Kindness and Mercy) and whose only armament is supplication to You.
يَا سَابِـغَ النِّعَمِ يَا دَافِعَ النِّقَمِ يَا نُوْرَ الْمُسْتَوْحِشِيْنَ فِي الظُّلَمِ 
O You! Who bestoweth cure and happiness, who granteth remedy and blessings and who wardeth off misfortunes, O Light Who illuminateth those who are in darkness (of sins and sorrows), 
يَا عَالِمًا لَّا يُعَلَّمُ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
O Omniscient! Who knows without (acquisition of) learning, bless Muhammad and descendant’s of Muhammad 
وَّ افْعَلْ بِيْ مَا اَنْتَ اَهْلُهٗ وَ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلٰى رَسُوْلِهٖ 
and do that unto me which befitts You (Your Mercy, Kindness and Grace). And my Lord! bless Muhammad and the blessed leaders amongst his descendants 
وَ اْلَائِمَّةِ الْمَيَامِيْنَ مِنْ آلِهِ وَ سَلَّمَ تَسْلِيْمًا كَثِيْرًا.
and bestow upon them peace and tranquility to the utmost extent that You can.

E33.Title: Dua e Noor
E33.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيمِ
بِسْمِ اللهِ النُّوْرِ بِسْمِ اللهِ نُوْرِ النُّوْرِ بِسْمِ اللهِ نُوْرٌ عَلٰى نُوْرٍ بِسْمِ اللهِ الَّذِيْ هُوَ مُدَبِّرُ الْأُمُوْرِ بِسْمِ اللهِ خَالِقِ النُّوْرِ مِنَ النُّوْرِ اَلْحَمْدُ لِلهِ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَ النُّوْرَ مِنَ النُّوْرِ وَ أَنْزَلَ النُّوْرَ عَلَى الطُّوْرِ فِيْ كِتَابٍ مَّسْطُوْرٍ فِيْ رَقٍّ مَّنْشُوْرٍ بِقَدَرٍ مَّقْدُوْرٍ عَلٰى نَبِيٍّ مَحْبُوْرٍ اَلْحَمْدُ لِلهِ الَّذِيْ هُوَ بِالْعِزِّ مَذْكُوْرٌ وَ بِالْفَخْرِ مَشْهُوْرٌ وَ عَلَى السَّرَّاءِ وَ الضَّرَّاءِ مَشْكُوْرٌ وَ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلٰى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِهِ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ.

E34.Title: Dua e Nudbah
E34.Data:
“Say: My lord would not care for you were it not your prayer.”
One of the true and authentic feelings of mankind which has an innate root in the nature of man is paying attention to Dua and spiritual relation with the unseen world and the origin of creation.
This is a matter which even the famous psychologists have not neglected it. Although the necessity of Dua is present in the nature of man hut it manifests itself more during calamities and misfortunes from materialistic forces. Human being, without any will and option turns himself towards the All-Powerful Allah with all his might and energy; And he asks His help and protection. Dua is the weapon of a Mo’min. It lightens the pressures of misfortunes and difficulties and above all, it showers upon the human being the boundless mercy of the All-Truth (Allah).
Like other matters, even in the method of Dua, human being is in need of reasonable and rational guidance so that this natural feeling which is necessary for the soul does not mislead him. And it does not become a means and pretext for the cheaters and imposters. With the correct method of its usage, the thirst of the conscience of man gets quenched and finds his intended destination.
When the radiating sun of Islam glittered the Earth and the curtains of superstition were ripped off, its rich resources altered all aspects of individual, social, spiritual, material, and moral affairs of human life. Dua was also amongst the things which were covered by this transformation. Its program is so laid that can be understood as worthy of the affairs of every progressive human being and the true worshipper of Allah.
Islamic Duas and Ziaraat other than their sacred, holy and divine aspects are the big and comprehensive treasures full of humanistic concepts. Invocating them like attending a training course leaves a very deep and good impression on our personality, the reason being that their interesting meaningful texts are narrated directly from our prophet (s.a.w.a.) and his infallible progeny in which they have taught various lessons about the sublime learning of Monotheism, Resurrection, Prophethood, Wilayat, moral sense, laws and ethics. Indeed, the school of Dua is one of the high schools which is having a great effect in the development of human thinking, spiritual and social growth, of course if it is correctly used. Till the Muslims do not pass this school, their Islamic personality will not become perfect. The school is day and night open for everybody and the repetition of its lessons will always make the person ascend from one stage to another.
One of these treasures which, always the believers and those anxious for the reappearance of the righteous and universal Government of Hazrat Baqi-at-Allah (May Allah hasten his Reappearance), have set it as their slogan is the glorious Dua-e-Nudba. They renew their allegiance with their Master during fixed occasions and establish emotional gatherings for reading it.
Nudba (lamentation) and wailing for visiting his Holiness, the coming to an end of his Occultation, pray for hastening his reappearance and expressing regret upon the prevalent turbulent and oppressive condition of today’s world (the Period of Occultation) is a lesson which the Shias have learnt from their Imams (a.s.) and their behaviour is a pattern for their partisans.
Sudair-e-Sairafi, a distinguished companion of Imam Jafar-e-Sadiq (a.s.) says that along with three other companions, they visited Imam (a.s.). They saw Imam (a.s.) in a very sad and sorrowful condition sitting on the ground. Like a mother who has lost her dear son and with a painful heart, Imam (a.s.) was crying, wailing, Moaning and saying:
“My master, your occultation has snatched away sleep from my eyes, has taken my concentration and has deprived tranquillity from my heart.
My master, your occultation has surrounded with a tragic suffering due to which I can never find sympathy and consolation. Due to the loss of friends one after the other, our gathering is breaking.
Calamities, hardships, difficulties and disasters have so much pained my heart that I do not feel the tears of my eyes and the yelling’s and crying’s of my heart. Yet other severe and unbearable sufferings are imagined that one more difficult and fragile than the previous one.” Sudair says:
Calamity struck us and our hearts became full of sadness and sorrow for Imam (a.s.). We presumed that an unpleasant event has made Imam (a.s.) – this mountain of patience and forbearance in such a lamenting and mournful condition. We said:
“O Son of the best mankind, May Allah not make you cry. For what circumstances are you weeping in such a manner His holiness heaved a sad sigh from his afflicted heart and said:
“This morning, when I was looking at “the book of Jafr”, the book of knowledge of various predicts, until Qiyamat, which has been assigned and made exclusive to Hazrat Mohammad (s.a.w.a.) and his successors (a.s.). It contains the birth, occultation, delay in reappearance, longevity of Hazrat Mahdi (a.t.f.s.), sufferings of believers during occultation, doubts and uncertainties which arise in their hearts due to the prolongation of Occultation , a majority of them leave aside Islam and our wilayat and do not mind about religion. Due to thinking on these things grief and sadness has overpowered me.
Therefore, with considering the behaviour of Imam (a.s.) regarding the Occultation of Hazrat Mahdi (a.s.), we should also become sad and depressed; and express our wish and interest in his reappearance by seeking shelter .towards Allah and reciting Dua, bearing in mind that if
He (Allah) wishes, He can rectify the Occultation of Imam (a.s.) in one night itself.
Dua-e-Nudba is one of the most important and famous authentic Duas of Shia. It’s stability in text, vocabulary and meaningful subjects increase the credibility of its document. This Dua has been narrated by the great Sayyed, the late Razi-ud-Din Ali Ibn-e-Taoos who was from amongst the great Shia scholars of the seventh century. He has narrated in his great books of “Iqbal” pp. 295-299 and the seventh chapter of ‘Misbaah-uz-Zaaer’. Before him, the great sheikh, Mohammad Ibn-e-Jafar-e- Mashadi Haeri who was amongst the great Shia scholars of the sixth century. He has narrated it in his book of ‘Mazaar’ Dua number 107. Prior to these two, Qutb-e- Rawandi who was also amongst the great Shia scholars of the fifth century has written this Dua in his book of ‘Mazaar’. And before all these three persons, the great Shaikh, Mohammad ibn-e-Ali-Ibn-e-Abi Qirra who also was amongst the great Shia scholars of the fifth century has brought it in his book. This book was used by the later scholars. He narrates it from the great and honourable Shaikh, Mohammad Ibn-e-Husain-e-Bazoofari, one of the former learned teacher from whom Shaikh Mufeed was narrating. Bazoofari in his own chain of narrations does not quote its narrators due to its fame and great reputation, he has narrated the Dua from Imam Zaman (a.t.f.s.). He has declared its recitation as a ‘Mustahab Dua’ on four Idds; Jumah, Fitr, Qurban and Ghadeer. Allama Majilisi (May Allah he satisfied with him) also has narrated this Dua in his book of ‘Behaar-ul-Anwaar’ and ‘Zaad-ul-Maad’ from Sayyed Ibn-e-Taoos from the book of Mazaar-e-Mashadi, from Ibn-e-Abu Qirra, from Mohammad Ibn-e-Husain Bazoofari. He testifies to the credibility of its document.
Therefore, it is necessary that on Friday mornings which is considered as one of the four Idds and the time for the recitation of this great Dua, and during the other mentioned days, in a mass and bewail, with concentrating our mind, asking forgiveness and reciting Salawat, We wash away our sins and remove the obstacles which has stopped the granting of our Duas. Then with a full attention, weeping and moaning state, we call Imam (a.s.) in the same way as Sudair has narrated it from our Sixth Imam, Hazrat Sadiq (a.s.). We cry and recite Nudbah upon the occultation and being far away from Imam (a.s.). We request Allah to hasten his reappearance and thus ends the corruption, persecution and injustice which is reigning in this world due to the absence of Imam (a.s.). May the Almighty Allah has mercy upon our Nudba and moaning. He may have mercy upon a weeping from amongst the weeping’s and will remove the chastisement of Occultation from amongst us. Thus, He may give us the grace and favour of the presence of Imam (a.s.) once more.
With His Grace and Benevolence May Allah desire so. 

بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
BISMIL LAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ 
ALHAMDO LILLAAHE RABBIL A’ALAMEENA 
Praise be to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds
وَ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلٰى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ نَبِيِّهٖ وَ اٰلِهٖ وَ سَلَّمَ تَسْلِيْمًا 
WA SALLAL LAAHO A’LAA SAYYEDENAA MOHAMMADIN NABIYYEHI WA AALEHI WA SALLAMA TASLEEMAN 
And Blessings of Allah be upon our master, Mohammad (s.a.w.a.) His Prophet and on his progeny be greetings of Salutation
اَللّٰهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ عَلٰى مَا جَرٰى بِهٖ قَضَآءُكَ فِىْ اَوْلِيَآئِكَ 
ALLAAHUMMA LAKAL HAMDO A’LAA MAA JARAA BEHI QAZAAA-OKA FEE AWLEYAAA-EKAL 
O Allah (All) Praise is for you: for all the matters concerning which your Decree was issued regarding your friends
الَّذِيْنَ اسْتَخْلَصْتَهُمْ لِنَفْسِكَ وَ دِيْنِكَ 
LAZEENAS TAKHLASTAHUM LENAFSEKA WA DEENEKA 
Those whom you have chosen for Yourself and for Your religion
اِذِ اخْتَرْتَ لَهُمْ جَزِيْلَ مَا عِنْدَكَ مِنَ النَّعِيْمِ الْمُقِيْمِ الَّذِىْ لَا زَوَالَ لَهٗ وَلَا اضْمِحْلَالَ 
EZIKH TARTA LAHUM JAZEELA MAA I’NDAKA MENAN NA-E’EMIL MOQEEMIL LAZEE LAA ZAWAALA LAHU WA LAZ-MEHLAALA 
Since You have decided to bestow on them the choicest of Your everlasting favours, which neither declines nor decreases
بَعْدَ اَنْ شَرَطْتَ عَلَيْهِمُ الزُّهْدَ فِىْ دَرَجَاتِ هٰذِهِ الدُّنْيَا الدَّنِيَّةِ وَ زُخْرُفِهَا وَ زِبْرِجِهَا 
BA’DA AN SHARATTA A’LAYHEMUZ ZOHDA FEE DARAJAATE HAAZEHID DUNYAD DANIYYATE WA ZUKHROFEHAA WA ZIBREJEHAA 
After you took promise from them to renounce all the stages of this despicable world and its superficial attractions and allurements.
فَشَرَطُوْا لَكَ ذٰلِكَ وَ عَلِمْتَ مِنْهُمُ الْوَفَآءَ بِهٖ
FA-SHARATOO LAKA ZAALEKA WA ‘ALIMTA MINHOMUL WAFAAA-A BEHI 
Then they accepted the promise and You did know their fulfillment towards it (promise)
فَقَبِلتَهُمْ وَ قَرَّبْتَهُمْ وَ قَدَّمْتَ لَهُمُ الذِّكْرَ الْعَلِىَّ وَ الثَّنَآءَ الْجَلِىَّ 
FAQABILTAHUM WA QARRABTAHUM WA QADDAMTA LAHOMUZ ZIKRAL A’LIYYA WAS SANAAA-AL JALIYYA 
So, You accepted them and brought them near to Yourself and accorded for them the exalted remembrance and a glowing praise
وَ اَهْبَطْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ مَلٰئِكَتَكَ وَ كَرَّمْتَهُمْ بِوَحْيِكَ 
WA AHBATTA A’LAYHIM MALAAA-EKATAKA WA KARRAMTAHUM BE-WAH-YEKA 
And You sent down Your angels on them; and honoured them by Your inspirations.
وَ رَفَدْتَهُمْ بِعِلْمِكَ 
WA RAFADTAHUM BE-I’LMEKA 
And helped them with Your knowledge
وَ جَعَلْتَهُمُ الذَّرِيْعَةَ اِلَيْكَ وَالْوَسِيْلَةَ اِلٰى رِضْوَانِكَ 
WA JA-A’LTAHOMUZ ZAREE-A’TA ELAYKA WAL WASEELATA ELAA RIZWAANEKA 
And appointed them as the means of approach to You, and the means towards Your satisfaction.
فَبَعْضٌ اَسْكَنْتَهٗ جَنَّتَكَ اِلٰى اَنْ اَخْرَجْتَهٗ مِنْهَا 
FA-BA’-ZUN ASKANTAHU JANNATAKA ELAA AN AKHRAJTAHU MINHAA 
Then You made some  of them dwell in Your Garden, until You sent them out there from.
وَ بَعْضٌ حَمَلْتَهٗ فِىْ فُلْكِكَ وَ نَجَّيْتَهٗ 
WA BA’-ZUN HAMALTAHU FEE FULKEKA WA NAJJAYTAHU 
And You carried one of them in Your Ark  and rescued him 
وَ مَنْ اٰمَنَ مَعَهٗ مِنَ الْهَلَكَتِ بِرَحْمَتِكَ 
WA MAN AAMANA MA-A’HU MENAL HALAKATE BERAHMATEKA 
and one who believed with him, by Your Mercy, from destruction.
وَ بَعْضٌ اِتَّخَذْتَهٗ لِنَفْسِكَ خَلِيْلًا 
WA BA’-ZUN ITTAKHAZTAHU LENAFSEKA KHALEELAN 
And you selected for yourself one of them as Your friend.  
وَ سَئَلَكَ لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِى الْاٰخِرِيْنَ فَاَجَبْتَهٗ 
WA SA-ALAKA LESAANA SIDQIN FIL AAKHEREENA FA-AJABTAHU 
And he requested you to grant him a tongue of truth in the last epoch of the time. 
وَ جَعَلْتَ ذٰلِكَ عَلِيًّا 
WA JA-A’LTA ZAALEKA A’LIYYAN 
Then You granted his wish and You appointed that elevated one.
وَ بَعْضٌ كَلَّمْتَهٗ مِنْ شَجَرَةٍ تَكْلِيْمًا 
WA BA’-ZUN KALLAMTAHU MIN SHAJARATIN TAKLEEMAN 
And to one of them,  You spoke from a tree a speaking 
وَ جَعَلْتَ لَهٗ مِنْ اَخِيْهِ رِدْئًا وَّ وَزِيْرًا 
WA JA-A’LTA LAHU MIN AKHEEHE RID-AN WA WAZEERAN 
and appointed his brother  his supporter and Vizier
وَ بَعْضٌ اَوْلَدْتَهٗ مِنْ غَيْرِ اَبٍ وَ اٰتَيْتَهُ الْبَيِّنَاتِ 
WA BA’-ZUN AWLADTAHU MIN GHAYRE ABIN WA AATAYTAHUL BAYYENAATE 
And You did cause one  of them to be born without a father and You gave him the clear signs 
وَ اَيَّدْتَهٗ بِرُوْحِ الْقُدُسِ 
WA AYYADTAHU BE-ROOHIL QODOSE 
and supported him with the Holy Spirit.
وَ كُلٌّ شَرَعْتَ لَهٗ شَرِيْعَةً وَ نَهَجْتَ لَهٗ مِنْهَاجًا 
WA KULLUN SHARA’-TA LAHU SHAREE-A’TAN WA NAHAJTA LAHU MINHAAJAN 
And for each one You did enact a religious law and You assigned a path for him
وَ تَخَيَّرْتَ لَهٗ اَوْصِيَآءَ مُسْتَحْفِظًا بَعْدَ مُسْتَحْفِظٍ 
WA TAKHAYYARTA LAHU AWSEYAAA-A MUSTAHFEZAN BA’-DA MUSTAHFEZIN 
And You selected successors  for him A protector after a protector 
مِنْ مُدَّةِ اِلٰى مُدَّةٍ اِقَامَةً لِدِيْنِكَ 
MIN MUDDATIN ELAA MUDDATIN EQAAMATAN LE-DEENEKA 
for a definite period. For establishing You religion
وَ حُجَّةً عَلٰى عِبَادِكَ وَ لِئَلَّا يَزُوْلَ الْحَقُّ عَنْ مَقَرِّهٖ 
WA HUJJATAN A’LAA E’BAADEKA WA LE-ALLAA YAZOOLAL HAQQO A’N MAQARREHI 
And a proof upon Your servants, lest the truth wanes from its place 
وَ يَغْلِبَ الْبَاطِلُ عَلٰى اَهْلِهٖ 
WA YAGHLEBAL BAATELO A’LAA AHLEHI 
and falsehood overpowers his progeny
وَ لَا يَقُوْلُ اَحَدٌ لَوْلَا اَرْسَلْتَ اِلَيْنَا رَسُوْلًا مُّنْذِرًا 
WA LAA YAQOOLA AHADUN LAWLAA ARSALTA ELAYNAA RASOOLAN MUNZERAN 
And none can say: Why had You not sent unto us a warning messenger  
وَ اَقَمْتَ لَنَا عَلَمًا هَادِيًا 
WA AQAMTA LANAA A’LAMAN HAADEYAN 
and appointed for us a flag of guidance. 
فَنَتَّبِعَ اٰيَاتِكَ مِنْ قَبْلِ اَنْ نَذِلَّ وَ نَخْزٰى 
FANATTABE-A’ AAYAATEKA MIN QABLE AN NAZILLA WA NAKHZAA 
Then we would have followed Your signs before suffering failure and disgrace
اِلٰى اَنِ انْتَهَيْتَ بِالْاَمْرِ اِلٰى حَبِيْبِكَ وَ نَجِيْبِكَ 
ELAA ANIN TAHAYTA BIL-AMRE ELAA HABEEBEKA WA NAJEEBEKA 
Till You ended the affair  towards Your beloved and Your noble 
مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ اٰلِهٖ 
MOHAMMADIN SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI 
Mohammad, May the peace of Allah be upon him and his progeny
فَكَانَ كَمَا انْتَجَبْتَهٗ سَيِّدَ مَنْ خَلَقْتَهٗ 
FA-KAANA KAMAN TAJABTAHU SAYYEDA MAN KHALAQTAHU 
Then, he was as You had selected him, the leader of whom You have created him 
وَ صَفْوَةَ مِنَ اصْطَفَيْتَهٗ 
WA SAFWATA MANIS- TAFAYTAHU 
and the excellent one of Your selected one; 
وَ اَفْضَلَ مَنِ اجْتَبَيْتَهٗ 
WA AFZALA MANIJ TABAYTAHU 
and the best one whom You have selected him 
وَ اَكْرَمَ مَنِ اعْتَمَدْتَهٗ 
WA AKRAMA MANEA’ TAMADTAHU 
and the most honoured whom You have relied on him
قَدَّمْتَهٗ عَلٰى اَنْبِيَآئِكَ وَ بَعَثْتَهٗ اِلٰى الثَّقَلَيْنِ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ 
QADDAMTAHU A’LAA AMBEYAAA-EKA WA BA-A’STAHU ELAS-SAQALAYNE MIN E’BAADEKA 
You gave him precedence upon Your prophets and have sent him to the thaqalain  (Jinns and Men) from (among) Your servants. 
وَ اَوْطَاْتَهٗ مَشَارِقَكَ وَ مَغَارِبَكَ 
WA AW-TAATAHU MASHAAREQAKA WA MAGHAAREBAKA 
And made Your Easts and Wests  come under his feet; 
وَ سَخَّرْتَ لَهُ الْبُرَاقَ 
WA SAKHKHARTA LAHUL BORAAQA 
and harnessed for him the Buraq.  
وَ عَرَجْتَ بِرُوْحِهٖ اِلٰى سَمَآئِكَ 
WA A’RAJTA BE ROOHE-HI ELAA SAMAAA-EKA 
And did make him ascend (with his soul) towards Your heavens
وَ اَوْدَعْتَهٗ عِلْمَ مَا كَانَ وَ مَا يَكُوْنُ اِلَى انْقِضَآءِ خَلْقِكَ 
WA AWDA’-TAHU I’LMA MAA KAANA WA MAA YAKOONO ELAN QEZAAA-E KHALQEKA 
And You entrusted in him the knowledge of the past and future till the end of Your creation
ثُمَّ نَصَرْتَهُ بِالرُّعْبِ 
SUMMA NASARTAHU BIR ROA’-BE 
Then You helped him with awe 
وَ حَفَفْتَهٗ بِجَبْرَئِيْلَ وَ مِيْكَائِيْلَ 
WA HAFAFTAHU BE-JABRA-EELA WA MEEKAA-EELA 
and You surrounded him with Jibraeel and Michaeel 
وَالْمُسَوِّمِيْنَ مِنْ مَّلٰئِكَتِكَ 
WAL MOSAWWEMEENA MIN MALAAA-EKATEKA 
and the distinguished angels. 
وَ وَعَدْتَهٗ اَنْ تُظْهِرَ دِيْنَهٗ عَلَى الدِّيْنِ كُلِّهٖ 
WA WA-AZTAHU AN TUZHERA DEENAHU A’LAD DEENE KULLEHI 
And You promised him that You would make his religion triumphant over all the religions 
وَ لَوْكَرِهَ الْمُشْرِكُوْنَ 
WA LAW-KAREHAL MUSHREKOONA 
though the polytheists may be averse  (to it)
وَ ذٰلِكَ بَعْدَ اَنْ بَوَّئْتَهٗ مُبَوَّ ءَصِدْقٍ مِنْ اَهْلِهٖ 
WA ZAALEKA BA’-DA AN BAWWA-TAHU MOBAWWA-A SIDQIN MIN AHLEHI 
And this is after You appointed some of his kindered as his Successor
وَ جَعَلْتَ لَهٗ وَ لَهُمْ اَوَّلَ بَيْتٍ وُّضِعَ لِلنَّاسِ 
WA JA-A’LTA LAHU WA LAHUM AWWALA BAYTIN WOZE-A’ LIN-NAASE 
And You appointed for him and them a First house which has been established for the mankind. 
لَلَّذِىْ بِبَكَّةَ مُبَارَكًا وَّ هُدًى لِّلْعَالَمِيْنَ 
LAL-LAZEE BE-BAKKATA MOBAARAKAN WA HODAL LIL A’ALAMEENA 
The one which is at Makkah, a blessing and a guidance for the worlds
فِيْهِ اٰيَاتٌ بَيِّنَاتٌ مَّقَامُ اِبْرَاهِيْمَ وَ مَنْ دَخَلَهٗ كَانَ اٰمِنًا 
FEEHE AAYAATUN BAYYENAATUN MAQAAMO IBRAAHEEMA WA MAN DAKHALAHU KAANA AAMENAN 
In it (are) clear sings; place of Ibrahim and whoever entered it in was safe. 
وَ قُلْتَ اِنَّمَا يُرِيْدُ اللهُ لِيُذْهِبَ عَنْكُمُ الرِّجْسَ اَهْلَ الْبَيْتِ وَ يُطَهِّرَكُمْ تَطْهِيْرًا 
WA QULTA INNAMAA YOREEDUL LAAHO LE-YUZHEBA A’NKOMUR RIJSA AHLAL BAYTE WA YOTAHHERAKUM TATHEERAA 
And You said: Verily Allah intends to keep off from you every kind of uncleanliness. And to purify you people of the House with a thorough purification. 
ثُمَّ جَعَلْتَ اَجْرَ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَوَاتُكَ عَلَيْهِ وَ اٰلِهٖ 
SUMMA JA-A’LTA AJRA MOHAMMADIN SALAWAATOKA A’LAYHE WA AALEHI
Then You assigned rewards of Mohammad, Your peace be upon him and his progeny (with) 
مَوَدَّتَهُمْ فِىْ كِتَابِكَ فَقُلْتَ 
MAWADDATAHUM FEE KETAABEKA FA-QULTA 
their love (the love of progeny) in Your Book. Then You said:
قُلْ لَّا اَسْئَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ اَجْرًا اِلَّا الْمَوَدَّةَ فِى الْقُرْبٰى 
QUL LAA AS-ALOKUM A’LAYHE AJRAN ILLAL MAWADDATA FIL QURBAA 
 “Say I demand not, of you any reward for it” (the toils of preaching except the love of my relations. 
وَ قُلْتَ مَا سَئَلْتُكُمْ مِنْ اَجْرٍ فَهُوَ لَكُمْ 
WA QULTA MAA SA-ALTOKUM MIN AJRIN FAHOWA LAKUM 
And you said: “Whatever reward I have asked you  it is for yourself.”
وَ قُلْتَ مَا اَسْئَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ اَجْرٍ اِلَّا مَنْ شَآءَ 
WA QULTA MAA AS-ALOKUM A’LAYHE MIN AJRIN ILLAA MAN SHAAA-A 
And you said: “I ask you not any reward for it except that one who wishes, 
اَنْ يَّتَّخِذَ اِلٰى رَبِّهِ سَبِيْلًا 
ANY YATTAKHEZA ELAA RABBEHI SABEELAN 
may adopt the path of His Lord. 
فَكَانُوْا هُمُ السَّبِيْلَ اِلَيْكَ وَ الْمَسْلَكَ اِلٰى رِضْوَانِكَ 
FA-KAANOO HOMUS SABEELA ELAYKA WAL MASLAKA ELAA RIZWAANEKA 
Then, they [Ahlul Bait (a.s.)] are the path towards You and the way towards Your satisfaction.
فَلَمَّا انْقَضَتْ اَيَّامُهٗ 
FALAMMAN QAZAT AYYAAMOHU 
When his (Holy Prophet) days passed.
اَقَامَ وَلِيَّهِ عَلِىَّ بْنَ اَبِىْ طَالِبٍ صَلَوٰتُكَ عَلَيْهِمَا وَ اٰلِهِمَا هَادِيًا 
AQAAMA WALIYYAHU A’LIYYABNA ABEE TAALEBIN SALAWAATOKA A’LAYHEMAA WA AALEHEMAA HAADEYAN 
Be appointed his successor Ali, son of Abu Talib as a Guide. Your peace be upon them and their progeny. 
اِذْ كَانَ هُوَ الْمُنْذِرَ وَ لِكُلِّ قَوْمٍ هَادٍ 
IZ KAANA HOWAL MUNZERA WA LE-KULLE QAWMIN HAADIN 
As he was a warner – and a Guide for every nation. 
فَقَالَ وَالْمَلَاءُ اَمَامَهٗ 
FA-QAALA WAL MALA-O AMAAMAHU 
Then he (Holy Prophet) said before a huge gathering
مَنْ كُنْتُ مَوْلَاهُ فَعَلِىٌّ مَوْلَاهُ 
MAN KUNTO MAWLAAHO FA-A’LIYYUN MAWLAAHO 
 “Whomsoever I am his Master, then Ali, is his Master
اَللّٰهُمَّ وَ آلِ مَنْ وَالَاهُ وَ عَادِ مَنْ عَادَاهُ 
ALLAAHUMMA WAALE MAN WAALAAHO WA A’ADE MAN A’ADAAHO 
O Allah Be a friend of one who is his friend and be the enemy of one who is his enemy; 
وَانْصُرْ مَنْ نَصَرَهٗ وَاخْذُلْ مَنْ خَذَلَهٗ 
WAN-SUR MAN NASARAHU WAKH-ZUL MAN KHAZALAHU 
and help one who helps him and disgrace one who disgraces him” 
وَ قَالَ مَنْ كُنْتُ اَنَا نَبِيَّهٗ فَعَلِىٌّ اَمِيْرُهٗ 
WA QAALA MAN KUNTO ANAA NABIYYAHU FA-A’LIYYUN AMEEROHU 
And he said: “Of whomsoever I am his Prophet, then Ali is his Chief” 
وَ قَالَ اَنَا وَ عَلِىٌّ مِّنْ شَجَرَةٍ وَاْحِدَةٍ 
WA QAALA ANAA WA A’LYYUN MIN SHAJARATIN WAAHEDATIN 
وَ سَائِرُ النَّاسِ مِنْ شَجَرَةٍ شَتّٰى 
WA SAA-IRUN NAASO MIN SHAJARIN SHATTAA 
and the other people are from different trees.” 
وَ اَحَلَّهٗ مَحَلَّ هَارُوْنَ مِنْ مُوْسٰى فَقَالَ لَهٗ 
WA AHALLAHU MAHALLA HAAROONA MIN MOOSAA FA QAALA LAHU 
And he placed him [Ali (a.s.)] in a position, as Haroon had with Moosa. Then he said to him,
اَنْتَ مِنِّىْ بِمَنْزِلَةِ هَارُوْنَ مِنْ مُوْسٰى اِلَّا اَنَّهٗ لَا نَبِىَّ بَعْدِىْ 
ANTA MINNEE BE-MANZELATE HAAROONA MIN MOOSAA ILLAA ANNAHU LAA NABIYYA BA’-DEE 
“your position to me is as Haroon had with Moosa, except that there will be no Prophet after me.” 
وَ زَوَّجَهُ ابْنَتَهٗ سَيِّدَةَ نِسَآءِ الْعَالَمِيْنَ 
WA ZAWWAJAHUB-NATAHU SAYYEDATA NESAAA-IL A’ALAMEENA 
And he got him married with his daughter, chief of the ladies of the Worlds. 
وَ اَحَلَّ لَهٗ مِنْ مَسْجِدِهٖ مَا حَلَّ لَهٗ 
WA AHALLA LAHU MIN MASJEDEHI MAA HALLA LAHU 
And he made for him lawful [Ali (a.s.)] whatever was lawful for himself in his mosque.
وَ سَدَّ الْاَبْوَابَ اِلَّا بَابَهٗ 
WA SADDAL ABWAABA ILLAA BAABAHU 
And he closed all the doors (leading to the mosque) except the door of his house. 
ثُمَّ اَوْدَعَهٗ عِلْمَهٗ وَ حِكْمَتَهِ فَقَالَ:
SUMMA AWDA-A’HU I’LMAHU WA HIKMATAHU FA-QAALA:
Then he (Holy Prophet) entrusted to him his knowledge and his wisdom. Then he said,
اَنَا مَدِيْنَةُ الْعِلْمِ وَ عَلِىٌّ بَابُهَا 
ANAA MADEENATUL I’LME WA A’LIYYUN BAABOHAA 
“I am the city of knowledge and Ali is its gate. 
فَمَنْ اَرَادَ الْمَدِيْنَةَ وَ الْحِكْمَةَ فَلْيَاْتِهَا مِنْ بَابِهَا 
FAMAN ARAADAL MADEENATA WAL HIKMATA FALYAATEHAA MIN BAABEHAA 
Then, one who wishes (to enter) the city (of knowledge) and wisdom, then he should enter from its gate.” 
ثُمَّ قَالَ اَنْتَ اَخِىْ وَ وَصِيِّىْ وَ وَارِثِىْ 
SUMMA QAALA ANTA AKHEE WA WASIYYEE WA WAARESEE 
Then, he said, “you are my brother and successor and inheritor.”
لَحْمُكَ مِنْ لَحْمِىْ وَ دَمُكَ مِنْ دَمِىْ 
LAHMOKA MIN LAHMEE WA DAMOKA MIN DAMEE 
Your flesh is from my flesh And your blood from my blood
وَ سِلْمُكَ سِلْمِىْ وَ حَرْبُكَ حَرْبِىْ 
WA SILMOKA SILMEE WA HARBOKA HARBEE 
And peace with you is peace with me and fight with you is fight with me.
وَ الْاِيْمَانُ مُخَالِطٌ لَحْمَكَ وَ دَمَكَ كَمَا خَالَطَ لَحْمِىْ وَدَمِىْ 
WAL EEMAANO MOKHAALETUN LAHMAKA WA DAMAKA KAMAA KHAALATA LAHMEE WA DAMEE 
And the faith is mixed with your flesh and your blood as it is mixed with my flesh and my blood
وَ اَنْتَ غَدًا عَلَى الْحَوْضِ خَلِيْفَتِىْ 
WA ANTA GHADAN A’LAL HAWZE KHALEEFATEE 
And tomorrow, you will be my successor at the Cistern Kausar Pond (Hawz of Kausar)
وَ اَنْتَ تَقْضِىْ دَيْنِىْ وَ تُنْجِزُ عِدَاتِىْ 
WA ANTA TAQZEE DAYNEE WA TUNJEZO E’DAATEE 
And you will repay my debt and you will fulfill my promises
وَ شِيْعَتُكَ عَلٰى مَنَابِرَ مِنْ نُوْرٍ 
WA SHEE-A’TOKA A’LAA MANAABERA MIN NOORIN 
And your shias (followers) will be (sitting) on the pulpits of light; 
مُبْيَضَّةً وُجُوْهُهُمْ حَوْلِىْ فِى الْجَنَّةِ وَ هُمْ جِيْرَانِىْ 
MUBYAZZATAN WOJOOHOHUM HAWLEE FIL JANNATE WA HUM JEERAANEE 
with bright faces surrounding me in the Heaven and they will be my neighbours. 
وَ لَوْلَا اَنْتَ يَا عَلِىُّ لَمْ يُعْرَفِ الْمُؤْمِنُوْنَ بَعْدِىْ 
WA LAW-LAA ANTA YAA A’LIYYO LAM YOA’-RAFIL MO-MINOONA BA’-DEE 
And (he said), “O Ali, had you not been there, the believer would not have been recognized after me” 
وَ كَانَ بَعْدَهٗ هُدًى مِّنَ الضَّلَالِ وَ نُوْرًا مِّنَ الْعَمٰى 
WA KAANA BA’-DAHU HODAN MENAZ ZALAALE WA NOORAN MENAL A’MAA 
And he was a guidance (to prevent people) from deviation after him (the Holy Prophet) and a light from the blindness
وَ حَبْلَ اللهِ الْمَتِيْنَ وَ صِرَاطَهُ الْمُسْتَقِيْمَ 
WA HABLALLAAHIL MATEENA WA SERAATAHUL MUSTAQEEMA 
And the strong rope of Allah and His Right Path. 
وَلَا يُسْبَقُ بِقَرَابَةٍ فِىْ رَحِمٍ 
LAA YUSBAQO BEQARAABATIN FEE RAHEMIN 
Neither his Proximity in the ties of relationship (with the Holy Prophet) can be preceded (by anyone)
وَ لَا بِسَابِقَةٍ فِىْ دِيْنٍ 
WA LAA BE-SAABEQATIN FEE DEENIN 
Nor his preceding in religion
وَ لَا يُلْحَقُ فِىْ مَنْقَبَةٍ مِنْ مَنَاقِبِهٖ 
WA LAA YULHAQO FEE MANQABATIN MIN MANAAQEBEHI 
And (no one) can overtake any virtues from amongst his (prophet) virtues. 
يَحْذُوْ حَذْوَ الرَّسُوْلِ 
YAHZOO HAZWAR RASOOLE 
He (Ali) follows the path of the Messenger 
صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِمَا وَ اٰلِهِمَا 
SALLALLAAHU A’LAYHEMAA WA AALEHEMAA 
May the blessings of Allah be upon both of them and their progeny.
وَ يُقَاتِلُ عَلَى التَّاْوِيْلِ 
WA YOQAATELO A’LAT TAAWEELE 
And he fights on (the basis of) interpretation 
وَ لَا تَاخُذُهٗ فِى اللهِ لَوْمَتُ لَآئِمٍ 
WA LAA TAA-KHOZOHU FILLAAHE LAWMATO LAAA-EMIN 
And he cares not for any blame of any rebuker in the way of Allah
قَدْ وَتَرَ فِيْهِ صَنَادِيْدَ الْعَرَبِ 
QAD WATARA FEEHE SANAADEEDAL A’RABE 
and killed their valiant fighters and attacked their wolves.
وَ قَتَلَ اَبْطَالَهُمْ وَ نَاوَشَ ذُؤْبَانَهُمْ 
WA QATALA ABTAALAHUM WA NAAWASHA ZOA-BAANAHUM 
Indeed, he has spilled the blood of the heroes of Arabia, 
فَاَوْدَعَ قُلُوْبَهُمْ اَحْقَادًا بَدْرِيَّةً وَّ خَيْبَرِيَّةً وَّ حُنَيْنِيَّةً وَ غَيْرَ هُنَّ 
FA-AWDA-A’ QOLOOBAHUM AHQAADAN BADRIYYATAN WA KHAYBARIYYATAN WA HONAYNIYYATAN WA GHAYRA HUNNA 
Then he filled the hearts of them (fighters) of Badr, Khaibar, Hunain and of others  with a hatred and malice.
فَاَضَبَّتْ عَلٰى عَدَاوَتِهٖ وَ اَكَبَّتْ عَلٰى مُنَابَذَتِهٖ 
FA-AZABBAT A’LAA A’DAAWATEHI WA AKABBAT A’LAA MONAABAZATEHI 
Then, (they) rose in enmity, against him, and (they) attacked to fight against him.
حَتّٰى قَتَلَ النَّاكِثِيْنَ وَ الْقَاسِطِيْنَ وَ الْمَارِقِيْنَ 
HATTAA QATALAN NAAKESEENA WAL QAASETEENA WAL MAAREQEENA 
Till (such time) that he killed the oath breakers of allegiance,  the unjust,  and the (Maareqeen) Renegades. 
وَ لَمَّا قَضٰى نَحْبَهٗ وَ قَتَلَهٗ اَشْقَى الْاٰخِرِيْنَ يَتْبَعُ اَشْقَى الْاَوَّلِيْنَ 
WA LAMMAA QAZAA NAHBAHU WA QATALAHU ASHQAL AAKHEREENA YATBA-O’ ASHQAL AWWALEENA 
And when his term of life expired, a wretched person among those of the last epoch, following the path of those of the earlier period killed him. 
لَمْ يُمْتَثَلْ اَمْرُ رَسُوْلِ اللهِ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ اٰلِهٖ 
LAM YUMTASAL AMRO RASOOLILLAAHE SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI 
(the) order of the Messenger of Allah, peace of Allah be upon him and his Progeny, 
فِى الْهَادِيْنَ بَعْدَ الْهَادِيْنَ 
FIL HAADEENA 
was not obeyed about the leaders (Imams) one after the other.
وَ الْاُمَّةُ مُصِرَّةٌ عَلٰى مَقْتِهٖ مُجْتَمِعَةٌ عَلٰى قَطِيْعَةِ رَحِمِهٖ 
BA’-DAL HAADEENA WAL UMMATO MOSIRRATUN A’LAA MAQTEHI MUJTAME-A’TUN A’LAA QATEE-A’TE RAHEMEHI 
And the Ummah was insistent on bearing enmity against him. They joined together to cut off his ties of relations (Holy Prophet) 
وَاِقْصَآءِ وُلْدِهٖ 
WA IQSAA-E WULDEHI
and throwing away his children (from successorship).
اِلَّا الْقَلِيْلَ مِمَّنْ وَفٰى لِرِعَايَةِ الْحَقِّ فِيْهِمْ 
ILLAL QALEELA MIMMAN WAFAA LE-RE-A’A-YATIL HAQQE FEEHIM 
Except a few from then (believers) who remained faithful in observing their (Ahl-e-Bait’s) rights
فَقُتِلَ مَنْ قُتِلَ 
FA-QOTELA MAN QOTELA 
Then some of them were killed 
وَ سُبِىَ مَنْ سُبِىَ 
WA SOBEYA MAN SOBEYA 
And some were taken into captivity 
وَ اُقْصِىَ مَنْ اُقْصِىَ 
WA UQSEYA MAN UQSEYA 
And some were exiled. 
وَ جَرَى الْقَضَآءُ لَهُمْ بِمَا يُرْجٰى لَهٗ حُسْنُ الْمَثُوْبَةِ
WA JARAL QAZAAA-O LAHUM BEMAA YURJAA LAHU HUSNUL MASOOBATE 
And the decree was to pass from them, with this hope that the best reward is in it.
اِذْ كَانَتِ الْاَرْضُ لِلّٰهِ يُوْرِثُهَا مَنْ يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهٖ 
IZ KAANATIL ARZO LILLAAHE YOORESOHAA MAN YASHAAA-O MIN E’BAADEHI 
Since the Earth belongs to Allah. He gives to whomsoever He wishes from amongst His servants. 
وَ الْعَاقِبَةُ لِلْمُتَّقِيْنَ 
WAL A’AQEBATO LIL-MUTTAQEENA 
And the end is (only) for those who guard against evil. 
وَ سُبْحَانَ رَبِّنَا اِنْ كَانَ وَعْدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفْعُوْلًا 
WA SUBHAANA RABBENAA IN KAANA WA’DO RABBENAA LA MAFOOLAN 
And glorious in our Lord, Verily the promise of our Lord is certainly to be fulfilled.  
وَ لَنْ يُّخْلِفَ اللهُ وَعْدَهٗ وَ هُوَ الْعَزِيْزُ الْحَكِيْمُ 
WA LANY YUKHLEFAL LAAHO WA’-DAHU WA HOWAL A’ZEEZUL HAKEEMO 
And Allah never goes against His promise; and He is the All-Mighty, All-Wise. 
فَعَلَى الْاَطَائِبِ مِنْ اَهْلِ بَيْتِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ عَلِىٍّ  
FA-A’LAL ATAA-EBE MIN AHLE BAYTE MOHAMMADIN WA A’LIYYIN 
The upon the purified ones of the purified ones of the progeny of Mohammad and Ali 
صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِمَا وَ اٰلِهِمَا فَلْيَبْكِ الْبَاكُوْنَ 
SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHEMAA WA AALEHEMAA FAL-YABKIL BAAKOONA 
May the peace of Allah be upon both of them and their progeny. The believers should cry.
وَ اِيَّاهُمْ فَلْيَنْدُبِ النَّادِبُوْنَ 
WA IYYAAHUM FAL-YANDOBIN NAADEBOONA 
And the wailers should wail upon them.
وَ لِمِثْلِهِمْ فَلْتُذْرَفِ الدُّمُوْعُ 
WA LE-MISLEHIM FAL-TUZ-RAFID DOMOO-O’ 
And for such people like them, then the tears should flow
وَ الْيَصْرُخِ الصَّارِخُوْنَ 
WAL YASROKHIS SAAREKHOONA 
And the clamourers should clamour 
وَ يَضِجَّ الضَّآجُّوْنَ وَ يَعِجُّ الْعَآجُّوْنَ 
WA YAZIJJAZ ZAAAJJOONA WA YA-I’JJAL A’AAJJOONA 
and the mourners should mourn in a heart rending manner:
اَيْنَ الْحَسَنُ اَيْنَ الْحُسَيْنُ اَيْنَ اَبْنَآءُ الْحُسَيْنِ؟
AYNAL HASANO AYNAL HUSAYNO AYNA ABNAAA-UL HUSAYNE 
Where is Hasan? Where is Husain? Where are the children of Husain?
صَالِحٌ بَعْدَ صَالِحٍ وَ صَادِقٌ بَعْدَ صَادِقٍ 
SAALEHUN BA’-DA SAALEHIN WA SAADEQUN BA’-DA SAADEQIN 
The Righteous after righteous and truthful after truthful.
اَيْنَ السَّبِيْلُ بَعْدَ السَّبِيْلِ؟
AYNAS SABEELO BA’-DAS SABEELE 
Where is the path after the path (of righteousness)?
اَيْنَ الْخِيَرَةُ بَعْدَ الْخِيَرَةِ ؟
AYNAL KHEYARATO BA’-DAL KHEYARATE 
Where are the virtuous people after the virtuous ones?
اَيْنَ الشُّمُوْسُ الطَّالِعَةُ ؟
AYNASH SHOMOOSUT TAALE-A’TO 
Where are the rising suns?
اَيْنَ الْاَقْمَارُ الْمُنِيْرَةُ؟
AYNAL AQMAARUL MONEERATO 
Where are the luminous Moons?
اَيْنَ الْاَنْجُمُ الظَّاهِرَةُ؟
AYNAL ANJOMUZ ZAAHERATO 
Where are the brilliant stars?
اَيْنَ اَعْلَامُ الدِّيْنِ وَ قَوَاعِدُ الْعِلْمِ؟
AYNA AA’-LAAMUD DEENE WA QAWAA-E’DUL I’LME 
Where are the Emblems of the Faith and the Basis of knowledge?
اَيْنَ بَقِيَّةُ اللهِ الَّتِىْ لَا تَخْلُوْ مِنَ الْعِتْرَةِ الْهَادِيَةِ ؟
AYNA BAQIYYATULLAAHIL LATEE LAA TAKHLOO MENAL I’TRATIL HAADEYATE 
Where is the Baqi-at-Allah?  Which (the world) cannot be devoid from (the presence of) guided progeny? 
اَيْنَ الْمُعَدُّ لِقَطْعِ دَابِرِ الظَّلَمَةِ ؟
AYNAL MO-A’DDO LE-QAT-E’ DAABERIZ ZALAMATE 
Where is the one ready to annihilate the oppressors? 
اَيْنَ الْمُنْتَظَرُ لِاِقَامَةِ الْاَمْتِ وَ الْعِوَجَ؟
AYNAL MUNTAZARO LE-EQAAMATIL AMTE WAL E’WAJE 
Where is the Awaited one for straightening the crookedness and dishonesty?
اَيْنَ الْمُرْتَجٰى لِاِزَالَةِ الْجَوْرِ وَ الْعُدْوَانِ؟
AYNAL MURTAJAA LE-EZAALATIL JAWRE WAL U’DWAANE 
Where is the Expected (Imam Mahdi) for abolishing the oppression and transgression?
اَيْنَ الْمُدَّخَرُ لِتَجْدِيْدِ الْفَرَائِضِ وَالسُّنَنِ؟
AYNAL MUDDAKHARO LE-TAJDEEDIL FARAA-EZE WAS SONANE 
Where is the one stored for reviving the obligatory command and the Sunnah (of the Holy Prophet)?
اَيْنَ الْمُتَخَيَّرُ لِاِعَادَةِ الْمِلَّةِ وَ الشَّرِيْعَةِ ؟
AYNAL MOTAKHAYYARO LE-E-A’ADATIL MILLATE WASH SHAREE-A’T 
Where is the selected one for resuscitating (the reality) of the nation and the religion?
اَيْنَ الْمُؤَمَّلُ لِاِحْيَآءِ الْكِتَابِ وَ حُدُوْدِهٖ؟
AYNAL MO-AMMALO LE-EHYAAA-IL KETAABE WA HODOODEHI 
Where is the expected one for enlivening the Book and its limits?
اَيْنَ مُحْيِىْ مَعَالِمِ الدِّيْنِ وَ اَهْلِهٖ؟
AYNA MOHYEE MA-A’ALEMID DEENE WA AHLEHI 
Where is the Enlivener of the precepts of religion and its adherents?
اَيْنَ قَاصِمُ شَوْكَةِ الْمُعْتَدِيْنَ؟
AYNA QAASEMO SHAWKATIL MOA’-TADEENA 
Where is the breaker of the might of the transgressors?
اَيْنَ هَادِمُ اَبْنِيَّةِ الشِّرْكِ وَ النِّفَاقِ؟
AYNA HAADEMO ABNIYYATISH SHIRKE WAN NEFAAQE 
Where is the demolisher of the edifices of polytheism and hypocrisy?
اَيْنَ مُبِيْدُ اَهْلِ الْفُسُوْقِ وَ الْعِصْيَانِ وَ الطُّغْيَانِ؟
AYNA MOBEDO AHLIL FOSOOQE WAL I’SYAANE WAT TUGH-YAANE 
Where is the destroyer of the followers of transgression, disobedience and rebellion?
اَيْنَ حَاصِدُ فُرُوْعِ الْغَىِّ وَ الشِّقَاقِ؟
AYNA HAASEDO FUROO-I’L GHAYYE WASH SHEQAAQE 
Where is the Eradicator of branches of errors and disputes?
اَيْنَ طَامِسُ اٰثَارِ الزَّيْغِ وَ الْاَهْوَآءِ؟
AYNA TAAMESO AASAARIZ ZAYGHE WAL AHWAAA-E 
Where is the Destroyer of the signs of (evil) disease and egoistic tendencies?
اَيْنَ قَاطِعُ حَبَآئِلِ الْكِذْبِ وَ الْاِفْتِرَاءِ؟
AYNA QAATE-O’ HABAAA ELIL KIZBE WAL IFTERAAA-E 
Where is the severer of the cords of falsehood and calumniation?
اَيْنَ مُبِيْدُ الْعُتَاةِ وَ الْمَرَدَةِ؟
AYNA MOBEEDUL O’TAATE WAL MARADATE 
Where is the Destroyer of the vicious and disobedient people?
اَيْنَ مُسْتَاْصِلُ اَهْلِ الْعِنَادِ وَ التَّضْلِيْلِ وَالْاِلْحَادِ؟
AYNA MUSTAA-SELU AHLIL E’NAADE WAT TAZLEELE WAL ILHAADE 
Where is the Eradicator of the followers of obstinacy and misguidance and the renegade?
اَيْنَ مُعِزُّ الْاَوْلِيَآءِ وَ مُذِلُّ الْاَعْدَاءِ؟
AYNA MO-I’ZZUL AWLEYAAA-E WA MOZILLUL AA’-DAA-E 
Where is the one who honours the friends and Debases the enemy?
اَيْنَ جَامِعُ الْكَلِمَةِ عَلَى التَّقْوٰى؟
AYNA JAAME-U’L KALEMATE A’LAT TAQWAA 
Where is the Accumulator of the words of piety?
اَيْنَ بَابُ اللهِ الَّذِىْ مِنْهُ يُؤْتٰى؟
AYNA BAABUL LAAHIL LAZEE MINHO YOATAA 
Where is the Gate of Allah through which all should enter? 
اَيْنَ وَجْهُ اللهِ الَّذِىْ اِلَيْهِ يَتَوَجَّهُ الْاَوْلِيَآءُ؟
AYNA WAJHUL LAAHIL LAZEE ELAYHE YATAWAJJAHUL AWLEYAAA-O 
Where is the Countenance of Allah through which the friends attend towards him?
اَيْنَ السَّبَبُ الْمُتَّصِلُ بَيْنَ الْاَرْضِ وَ السَّمَآءِ؟
AYNAS SABABUL MUTASSELO BAYNAL ARZE WAS SAMAAA-E 
Where is the Means which is stretching from the Earth to the sky?
اَيْنَ صَاحِبُ يَوْمِ الْفَتْحِ وَ نَاشِرُ رَايَةِ الْهُدٰى؟
AYNA SAAHEBO YAWMIL FATHE WA NAASHERO RAAYATIL HODAA 
Where is the Master of the Day of Victory and the one who will spread the flag of Guidance?
اَيْنَ مُؤَلِّفُ شَمْلِ الصَّلَاحِ وَ الرِّضَا؟
AYNA MO-ALLEFO SHAMLIS SALAAHE WAR REZAA 
Where is the uniter of the companions of virtue and divine pleasure?
اَيْنَ الطَّالِبُ بِذُحُوْلِ الْاَنْبِيَآءِ وَ اَبْنَآءِ الْاَنْبِيَآءِ؟
AYNAT TAALEBO BE-ZOHOOLIL AMBEYAAA-E WA ABNAAA-IL AMBEYAAA-E 
Where is the Avenger of the blood of prophets and the children of the prophets? 
اَيْنَ الطَّالِبُ بِدَمِ الْمَقْتُوْلِ بِكَرْبَلَاءَ؟
AYNAT TAALEBO BE-DAMIL MAQTOOLE BE-KARBALAA-A 
Where is the seeker of revenge for the blood of the Martyred ones of Karbala? 
اَيْنَ الْمَنْصُوْرُ عَلٰى مَنِ اعْتَدٰى عَلَيْهِ وَافْتَرٰى؟
AYNAL MANSOORO A’LAA MANEA’-TADAA A’LAYHE WAF-TARAA 
Where is the Truimphant one (who will overcome) over one who transgressed against him and maligned him?
اَيْنَ الْمُضْطَرُّ الَّذِىْ يُجَابُ اِذَا دَعَا؟
AYNAL MUZTARRUL LAZEE YOJAABO EZAA DA-A’A 
Where is the distressed one who will be answered when he supplicates?
اَيْنَ صَدْرُ الْخَلَايقِ ذُوالْبِرِّ وَ التَّقْوٰى؟ 
AYNA SADRUL KHALAAA-EQE ZUL BIRRE WAT TAQWAA 
Where is the President of all creatures, who is both the beneficent and God fearing?
اَيْنَ ابْنُ النَّبِىِّ الْمُصْطَفٰى؟
AYNABNUN NABIYYENIL MUSTAFAA 
Where is the son of the chosen (Al-Mustafa) prophet
وَابْنُ عَلِىٍّ الْمُرْتَضٰىَ؟
WABNO A’LIYYENIL MURTA-ZAA 
And the son of Ali al-Murtaza?
وَ ابْنُ خَدِيْجَةَ الْغَرَّآءِ؟
WABNO KHADEEJATAL GHARRAAA-E 
And the son of Khadijat-ul-Gharra (The Luminous)
وَابْنُ فَاطِمَةَ الْكُبْرٰى؟
WABNO FAATEMATAL KUBRAA 
And the son of Fatematul-Kubra (the Great)?
بِاَبِىْ اَنْتَ وَ اُمِّىْ وَ نَفْسِىْ لَكَ الْوِقَآءُ وَ الْحِمٰى
BE-ABEE ANTA WA UMMEE WA NAFSEE LAKAL WEQAAA-O WAL HEMAA 
May my father and my mother and my self be sacrificed for your safety and protection
يَابْنَ السَّادَةِ الْمُقَرَّبِيْنَ 
YABNAS SAADATIL MOQARRABEENA 
O son of the masters, the favourite ones. 
يَابْنَ النُّجَبَآءِ الْاَكْرِمِيْنَ 
YABNAN NOJABAAA-IL AKRAMEENA 
O son of the noble ones, the honoured ones.
يَابْنَ الْهُدَاةِ الْمَهْدِيِّيْنَ 
YABNAL HODAATIL MAHDIYYEENA 
O son of the guides and the divinely guided ones
يَابْنَ الْخِيَرَةِ الْمُهَذَّبِيْنَ 
YABNAL KHIYARATIL MOHAZZABEENA 
O son of the preferred refined ones.
يَابْنَ الْغَطَارِفَةِ الْاَنْجَبِيْنَ 
YABNAL GHATAAREFATIL ANJABEENA 
O son of the Magnanimous ones of the purest descent.
يَابْنَ الْاَطَائِبِ الْمُطَهَّرِيْنَ 
YABNAL ATAA-EBIL MOTAHHAREENA 
O son of the most righteous.
يَابْنَ الْخَضَارِمَةِ الْمُنْتَجَبِيْنَ 
YABNAL KHAZAAREMATIL MUNTAJABEENA 
O son of the benevolent selected ones.
يَابْنَ الْقَمَاقِمَةِ الْاَكْرَمِيْنَ 
YABNAL QAMAAQEMATIL AKRAMEENA 
O son of the generous honoured ones.
يَابْنَ الْبُدُوْرِ الْمُنِيْرَةٍ يَابْنَ السُّرُجِ الْمُضِيْئَةِ 
YABNAL BODOORIL MONEERATE YABNAS SOROJIL MOZEEE-ATE 
O son of the luminous moons. O son of the shinning lights.
يَابْنَ الشُّهُبِ الثَّاقِبَةِ يَابْنَ الْاَنْجُمِ الزَّاهِرَةِ 
YABNASH SHOHOBIS SAAQEBATE YABNAL ANJOMIZ ZAAHERATE 
O son of the piercing meteors. O son of the bright starts.
يَابْنَ السُّبُلِ الْوَاضِحَةِ يَابْنَ الْاَعْلَامِ الْلَائِحَةِ 
YABNAS SOBOLIL WAAZIHATE YABNAL AA’-LAAMIL LAA-EHATE 
O son of the clear paths. O son of the clear sings.
يَابْنَ الْعُلُوْمِ الْكَامِلَةِ يَابْنَ السُّنَنِ الْمَشْهُوْرَةِ 
YABNAL O’LOOMIL KAAMELATE YABNAS SONANIL MASH-HOORATE 
O son of the perfect knowledge. O son of the well-known examples of conduct.
يَابْنَ الْمَعَالِمِ الْمَاْثُوْرَةِ يَابْنَ الْمُعْجِزَاتِ الْمَوْجُوْدَةِ 
YABNAL MA-A’ALEMIL MAASOORATE YABNAL MOA’-JEZAATIL MAWJOODATE 
O son of the recorded knowledges. O son of the living miracles.
يَابْنَ الدَّلَائِلِ الْمَشْهُوْدَةِ 
YABNAL DALAAA-ELIL MASH-HOODATE 
O son of the obvious proofs.
يَابْنَ الصِّرَاطِ الْمُسْتَقِيْمِ 
YABNAS SERAATIL MUSTAQEEME 
O son of the straight path.
يَابْنَ النَّبَاءِ الْعَظِيْمِ 
YABNAN NABA-IL A’ZEEME 
O son of the mighty tidings. 
يَابْنَ مَنْ هُوَ فِىْ اُمِّ الْكِتَابِ لَدَى اللهِ عَلِىٌّ حَكِيْمٌ 
YABNA MAN HOWA FEE UMMIL KETAABE LADALLAAHE A’LIYYUN HAKEEMUN 
O son of the one who is pronounced the most exalted. The most wise in Ummul-kitab by Allah. 
يَابْنَ الْآيَاتِ وَ البَيِّنَاتِ 
YABNAL AAYAATE WAL BAYYENAATE 
O son of the signs and the clear proofs.
يَابْنَ الدَّلَائِلِ الظَّاهِرَاتِ 
YABNAD DALAAA-ELIZ ZAAHERAATE 
O son of the apparent proofs.
يَابْنَ الْبَرَاهِيْنِ الْوَاضِحَاتِ الْبَاهِرَاتِ 
YABNAL BARAAHEENIL WAAZEHAATIL BAAHERAATE 
O son of the brilliant and clear proofs.
يَابْنَ الْحُجَجِ الْبَالِغَاتِ 
YABNAL HOJAJIL BAALEGHAATE 
O son of the conclusive evidences.
يَابْنَ النِّعَمِ السَّابِغَاتِ 
YABNAN NE-A’MIS SAABEGHAATE 
O son of the abundant bounties.
يَابْنَ طٰهٰ وَ الْمُحْكَمَاتِ 
YABNA TAA-HAA WAL MOHKAMAATE 
O son of Ta-ha and the clear verses.
يَابْنَ يٰسٓ وَ الذَّارِيَاتِ 
YABNA YAA-SEEN WAZ ZAAREYAATE
O son of Ya-Sin  (Holy Prophet and his infallible progeny) and Zariyat  (the Scatterers)
يَابْنَ الطُّوْرِ وَ الْعَادِيَاتِ 
YABNAT TOORE WAL A’ADEYAATE 
O son of the Tur (mount) and Aadiyat (the charger).
يَابْنَ مَنْ دَنٰى فَتَدَلّٰى فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ اَوْ اَدْنٰى 
YABNA MAN DANAA FATADALLAA FAKAANA QAABA QAWSAYNE AW ADNAA 
O son of the one who drew near, ten he suspended, so he was the measure of two bows or closer still.
دُنُوًّا وَ اقْتِرَابًا مِّنَ الْعَلِىِّ الْاَعْلٰى 
DONUWWAN WAQTERAABAN MENAL A’LIYYIL AA’-LAA 
This is the nearest position to the All-High.
لَيْتَ شِعْرِىْ اَيْنَ اسْتَقَرَّتْ بِكَ النَّوٰى 
LAYTA SHEA’REE AYNAS TAQARRAT BEKAN NAWAA
Would that I know where your state of being far is settled.
بَلْ اَىُّ اَرْضٍ تُقِلُّكَ اَوْ ثَرٰى 
BAL AYYO ARZIN TOQILLOKA AW SARAA 
Or which, earth of soil has embraced you;
اَبِرَضْوٰى اَوْ غَيْرِهَا اَمْ ذِىْ طُوٰى؟
A-BE RAZWAA AW GHAYREHAA AM ZEE TOWAA 
Is it in the mountain of Razwa or the other (mountain) or in Zee-Towaa?
عَزِيْزٌ عَلَىَّ اَنْ اَرَى الْخَلْقَ وَ لَا تُرٰي 
A’ZEEZUN A’LAYYA AN ARAL KHALQA WA LAA TORAA
It is intolerable for me that I see the people but do not see you.
وَ لَا اَسْمَعُ لَكَ حَسِيْسًا وَّ لَا نَجْوٰى 
WA LAA ASMA-O’ LAKA HASEESAN WA LAA NAJWAA
And, neither do I hear a sigh of breath nor (any) whispering from you.
عَزِيْزٌ عَلَىَّ اَنْ تُحِيْطَ بِكَ دُوْنَىِ الْبَلْوٰى 
A’ZEEZUN A’LAYYA AN TOHEETA BEKA DOONAYIL BALWAA 
It is intolerable for me that you are surrounded by calamities 
وَلَا يَنَالُكَ مِنِّىْ ضَجِيْجٌ وَلَا شَكْوٰى 
WA LAA YANAALOKA MINNEE ZAJEEJUN WA LAA SHAKWAA 
and that neither my plaintive cry nor my complaint reaches you.
بِنَفْسِىْ اَنْتَ مِنْ مُّغَيَّبٍ لَمْ يَخْلُ مِنَّا 
BE-NAFSEE ANTA MIN MOGHAYYABIN LAM YAKH-LO MINNAA
May (I) myself by sacrificed for you who seems to be concealed (physically), but not away from us.
بِنَفْسِىْ اَنْتَ مِنْ نَازِحٍ مَا نَزَحَ عَنَّا 
BE-NAFSEE ANTA MIN NAAZEHIN MAA NAZAHA A’NNAA
May (I) myself be sacrificed for you who seems to be emigrant (but) not far from us.
بِنَفْسِىْ اَنْتَ اُمْنِيَّةُ شَآئِقٍ يَتَمَنّٰى مِنْ مُؤْمِنٍ وَ مُؤْمِنَةٍ ذَكَرٰى فَحَنَّا 
BE-NAFSEE ANTA UMNIYYATO SHAA-EQIN YATAMANNAA MIN MOMININ WA MOMINATIN ZIKARAA FA-HANNAA
May (I) myself be sacrificed for you who is the goal or aspirations of every faithful man and woman who desires you, remembers you and moans for you.
بِنَفْسِىْ اَنْتَ مِنْ عَقِيْدِ عِزٍّ لَا يُسَامٰى 
BE-NAFSEE ANTA MIN A’QEEDE IZZIN LAA YOSAAMAA
May (I) myself be sacrificed for you who is bound to lofty honour which can never be reached (by anyone).
بِنَفْسِىْ اَنْتَ مِنْ اَثِيْلِ مَجْدٍ لَا يُجَارٰى 
BE-NAFSEE ANTA MIN ASEELE MAJDIN LAA YOJAARAA
May (I) myself be sacrificed for you whose original eminence cannot be equalled.
بِنَفْسِىْ اَنْتَ مِنْ تِلَادِ نِعَمٍ لَا تُضَاهٰى 
BE-NAFSEE ANTA MIN TELAADE NE-A’MIN LAA TOZAAHAA 
May (I) myself by sacrificed for you who is the ancestral bounty which cannot be resembled.
بِنَفْسِىْ اَنْتَ مِنْ نَصِيْفِ شَرَفٍ لَا يُسَاوٰى 
BE-NAFSEE ANTA MIN NASEEFE SHARAFIN LAA YOSAAWAA 
May (I) myself be sacrificed for you, the partaker of nobility, the like of which is not possible.
اِلٰى مَتٰى اَحَارُ فِيْكَ يَا مَوْلَايَ؟
ELAA MATAA A-HAARO FEEKA YAA MAWLAAYA 
How long am I to bewail for you, O my Master!
وَ اِلٰى مَتٰى وَ اَىُّ خِطَآبٍ اَصِفُ فِيْكَ وَ اَىُّ نَجْوٰى؟
WA ELAA MATAA WA AYYA KHETAABIN ASEFO FEEKA WA AYYA NAJWAA 
And how long and with which word should I praise you, and what secret talk (should I adopt with you).
عَزِيْزٌ عَلَىَّ اَنْ اُجَابَ دُوْنَكَ وَ اُنَاغٰى 
A’ZEEZUN A’LAYYA AN OJAABA DOONAKA WA ONAAGHAA 
It is intolerable for me to talk and receive a reply from persons than you.
عَزِيْزٌ عَلَىَّ اَنْ اَبْكِيَكَ وَ يَخْذُلَكَ الْوَرٰى 
AZEEZUN A’LAYYA AN ABKEYAKA WA YAKHZOLAKAL WARAA
It is intolerable for me that I cry for you while all others forsake you.
عَزِيْزٌ عَلَىَّ اَنْ يَجْرِىَ عَلَيْكَ دُوْنَهُمْ مَا جَرٰى 
AZEEZUN A’LAYYA AN YAJREYA A’LAYKA DOONAHUM MAA JARAA 
It is intolerable for me that this (isolation) befalls you instead of befalling others.
هَلْ مِنْ مُعِيْنٍ فَاُطِيْلَ مَعَهُ الْعَوَيْلَ وَ الْبُكَاءَ؟
HAL MIN MO-E’ENIN FA-OTEELA MA-A’HUL A’WEELA WAL BOKAAA-A
Is there any helper with whom I may prolong my lamentation and weeping.
هَلْ مِنْ جَزُوْعٍ فَاُسَاعِدَ جَزَعَهٗ اِذَا خَلَا؟
HAL MIN JAZOO-I’N A-OSAA-E’DA JAZA-A’HU EZAA KHALAA
Is there any mourner with whom I may join when he mourns alone.
هَلْ قَذِيَتْ عَيْنٌ فَسَاعَدَتْهَا عَيْنِىْ عَلَى الْقَذٰى؟
HAL QAZEYAT A’YNUN FASAA-A’DAT-HAA A’YNEE A’LAL QAZAA 
Is there any eye weeping of a thorn, that my eye may sympathise with it.
هَلْ اِلَيْكَ يَابْنَ اَحْمَدَ سَبِيْلٌ فَتُلْقٰى؟
HAL ELAYKA YABNA AHMADA SABEELUN FATULQAA 
O the son of Ahmad! Is there a way through which you may be met.
هَلْ يَتَّصِلُ يَوْمُنَا مِنْكَ بِعِدَةِ فَنَحْظٰى؟ 
HAL YATTASELO YAWMONAA MINKA BE-E’DATIN FA-NAHZAA
May our day (of separation) join the day of reappearance by which we enjoy?
مَتٰى نَرِدُ مَنَاهِلَكَ الرَّوِيَّةَ فَنَرْوٰى؟
MATAA NAREDO MANAAHELAKAR RAWIYYATA FA-NARWAA 
When shall we arrive at your streams for drink, with which to quench our thirst for you?
مَتٰى نَنْتَقِعُ مِنْ عَذْبِ مَآئِكَ فَقَدْ طَالَ الصَّدٰى؟
MATAA NANTAQE-O’ MIN A’ZBE MAAA-EKA FAQAD TAALAS SADAA
When shall we get benefit of your sweet water, for already the thirst has lasted too long?
مَتٰى نُغَادِيْكَ وَ نُرَاوِحُكَ فَنُقِرُّ عَيْنًا؟
MATAA NOGHAADEEKA WA NORAA-WEHOKA FA-NOQIRRO A’YNAN
When shall we spend morning and evening with you to delight our eyes with a glance (at you)?
مَتٰى تَرَانَا وَ نَرَاكَ وَ قَدْ نَشَرْتَ لِوَآءَ النَّصْرِ تُرٰى؟
MATAA TARAANAA WA NARAAKA WA QAD NASHARTA LEWAAA-AN NASRE TORAA 
When shall you see us and we shall see you; then you shall be seen unfurling the flag of victor.
اَتَرَانَا نَحُفُّ بِكَ وَ اَنْتَ تَاُمُّ الْمَلَاَ وَ قَدْ مَلَاْتَ الْاَرْضَ عَدْلًا 
A-TARAANAA NAHUFFO BEKA WA ANTA TA-UMMUL MALA-AWA QAD MALAA-TAL ARZA A’DLAN 
Will you see us gathered around you and you are leading all the people. Then already you have filled the earth with justice 
وَ اَذَقْتَ اَعْدَآئَكَ هَوَانًا وَ عِقَابًا
WA AZAQTA AA’-DAAA-EKA HAWAANAN WA E’QAABAN
and have made your enemies taste the disgrace (of defeat) and retribution.
وَ اَبَرْتَ الْعُتَاةَ وَ جَحَدَةِ الْحَقِّ وَ قَطَعْتَ دَابِرَ الْمُتَكَبِّرِيْنَ 
WA ABARTAL O’TAATA WA JAHADATAL HAQQE WA QATA’-TA DAABERAL MOTAKABBEREENA
And you have destroyed rebels and deniers of the truth. And you have annihilated the last remains of the arrogant 
وَ اجْتَثَثْتَ اُصُوْلَ الظَّالِمِيْنَ 
WAJ TASASTA OSOOLAZ ZAALEMEENA
and uprooted the foundation of the unjust people.
وَ نَحْنُ نَقُوْلُ ’اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ‘
WA NAHNO NAQOOLO ‘AL-HAMDO LILLAAHE RABBIL A’ALAMEENA;
Then we say: Praise be to Allah, Lord of the Worlds.
اَللّٰهُمَّ اَنْتَ كَشَّافُ كُرَبِ وَ الْبَلْوٰى 
ALLAAHUMMA ANTA KASHSHAAFUL KURBI WAL BALWAA
O Allah You are the Remover of agonies and calamities.
وَ اِلَيْكَ اَسْتَعْدِىْ فَعِنْدَكَ الْعَدْوٰى 
WA ELAYKA ASTA’-DEE FA-I’NDAKAL A’DWAA
And You are the one from whom I seek help; then with you is the sanctuary.
وَ اَنْتَ رَبُّ الْاٰخِرَةِ وَ الدُّنْيَا 
WA ANTA RABBUL AAKHERATE WAD DUNYAA
And You are Lord of the Hereafter and this World;
فَاَغِثْ يَا غِيَاثَ الْمُسْتَغِيْثِيْنَ عُبَيْدَكَ الْمُبْتَلٰى 
FA-AGHIS YAA GHEYAASAL MUSTAGHEESEENA O’BAYDAKAL MUBTALAA
So help O helper of those who seek help, your poor afflicted servant.
وَ اَرِهٖ سَيِّدَهٗ يَا شَدِيْدَ الْقُوٰى 
WA AREHI SAYYEDAHU YAA SHADEEDAL QOWAA
And show him his Master; O Severer of strength
وَاَزِلْ عَنْهُ بِهِ الْاَسٰى وَ الْجَوٰى 
WA AZIL A’NHO BEHIL ASAA WAL JAWAA
And through him (Imam a.s.) remove his (Your servant’s) grief and sorrow.
وَ بَرِّدْ غَلِيْلَهٗ يَا مَنْ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ اسْتَوٰى 
WA BARRID GHALEELAHU YAA MAN A’LAL A’RSHIS-TAWAA 
And cool the burning of his hurt, O You who is firm in the Heavenly throne of power 
وَ مَنْ اِلَيْهِ الرُّجْعٰى وَالْمُنْتَهٰى 
WA MAN ELAYHIR RUJ-A’A WAL MUNTAHAA
and towards Whom is the return and ultimate end.
اَللّٰهُمَّ وَ نَحْنُ عَبِيْدُكَ التَّائِقُوْنَ اِلٰى وَلِيِّكَ الْمُذَكِّرِ بِكَ وَ بِنَبِيِّكَ 
ALLAAHUMMA WA NAHNO A’BEEDOKAT TAAA-EQOONA ELAA WALIYYEKAL MOZAKKERE BEKA WA BE-NABIYYEKA 
O Allah! We are Your enamoured servants of Your appointed regent who reminds us of You and Your Prophet (s.a.w.a.).
