خَلَقْتَهٗ لَنَا عِصْمَةً وَّ مَلَاذًا وَ اَقَمْتَهٗ لَنَا قِوَامًا وَ مَعَاذًا 
KHALAQTAHU LANAA I’SMATAN WA MALAAZAA WA AQAMTAHOO LANAA QEWAAMAN WA MA-A’AZAN
He whom You created for us as our saviour and defender, and set him for us as a protector and refuge.
وَ جَعَلْتَهٗ لِلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ مِنَّا اِمَامًا 
WA JA-A’LTAHU LIL MOMINEENA MINNAA EMAAMAN
And appoint him a leader (Imam) for the true believers amongst us.
فَبَلِّغْهُ مِنَّا تَحِيَّةً وَّ سَلَامًا 
FA-BALLIGHHO MINNAA TAHIYYATAN WA SALAAMAN
So convey to him our greetings and salutations.
وَ زِدْنًا بِذٰلِكَ يَا رَبِّ اِكْرَامًا 
WA ZIDNAA BE ZAALEKA YAA RABBE IKRAAMAN
And increase honour because of this (greeting) O Lord.
وَاجْعَلْ مُسْتَقَرَّهٗ لَنَا مُسْتَقَرًّا وَ مُقَامًا 
WAJ-A’L MUSTAQARRAHU LANAA MUSTAQARRAN WA MOQAAMAN
And make his abode (in paradise) also a home and lasting place for us.
وَ اَتْمِمْ نِعْمَتَكَ بِتَقْدِيْمِكَ اِيَّاهُ اَمَامَنَا 
WA ATMIM NEA’-MATAKA BE-TAQDEEMEKA IYYAAHO AMAAMANAA 
And complete Your favours by appointing him as our guide. 
حَتّٰى تُوْرِدَنَا جِنَانَكَ وَ مُرَافَقَةِ الشُّهَدَآءِ مِنْ خُلَصَآئِكَ 
HATTAA TOOREDANAA JENAANAKA WA MORAAFAQATASH SHO-HADAAA-E MIN KHOLASAAA-EKA
Till you make us enter Your Paradise; and (bestow on us) the companionship of the martyrs from amongst those of our adorers.
اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
ALLAAHUMMA SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN 
O Allah! Bestow your blessings upon Mohammad and the progeny of Mohammad.
وَصَلِّ عَلٰى مَحَمَّدٍ جَدِّهِ وَ رَسُوْلِكَ السَّيِّدِ الْاَكْبَرِ 
WA SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN JADDEHI WA RASOOLEKAS SAYYEDIL AKBARE 
And bless his grandfather Mohammad and Your Messenger the elder Master.
وَعَلٰى اَبِيْهِ السَّيِّدِ الْاَصْغَرِ 
WA A’LAA ABEEHIS SAYYEDIL ASGHARE
And upon his father (Ali) the younger Master.
وَ جَدَّتِهِ الصِّدِّيْقَةِ الْكُبْرٰى فَاطِمِةَ بِنْتِ مَحَمَّدٍ 
WA JADDATEHIS SIDDEEQATIL KUBRAA FAATEMATA BINTE MOHAMMADIN
And his grandmother, the great truthful daughter of Mohammad (s.a.w.a.)
وَ عَلٰى مَنِ اصْطَفَيْتَ مِنْ اٰبَآئِهِ الْبَرَرَةِ 
WA A’LAA MANIS TAFAYTA MIN AABAAA-EHIL BARARATE
And upon whom you have selected from among his virtuous ancestors.
وَ عَلَيْهِ اَفْضَلَ وَ اَكْمَلَ وَ اَتَمَّ وَ اَدْوَمَ وَ اَكْثَرَ وَ اَوْفَرَ 
WA A’LAYHE AFZALA WA AKMALA WA ATAMMA WA ADWAMA WA AKSARA WA AWFARA 
And on him (Imam a.s.) (bestow) the best, the plentiful, the most perfect, the everlasting, the most and the numerous (blessings)
مَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلٰى اَحَدٍ مِّنْ اَصْفِيَآئِكَ وَ خِيَرَتِكَ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ 
MAA SALLAYTA A’LAA AHADIN MIN ASFEYAAA-EKA WA KHEYARATEKA MIN KHALQEKA
 (as) whatever you bestowed on any of Your virtuous and chosen ones from among our creatures.
وَ صَلِّ عَلَيْهِ صَلوٰةً لَا غَايَةَ لِعَدَدِهَا 
WA SALLE A’LAYHE SALAATAN LAA GHAAYATA LE-A’DADEHAA 
And favour him with endless count of blessings
وَلَا نِهَايَةَ لِمَدَدِهَا وَ لَا نَفَادَ لِاَمَدِهَا 
WA LAA NEHAAYATA LE-MADADEHAA WA LAA NAFAADA LE-AMADEHAA
which never gets end nor limitation.
اَللّٰهُمَّ وَ اَقِمْ بِهِ الْحَقَّ 
ALLAAHUMMA WA AQIM BEHIL HAQQA
O Allah! And through him set up the truth
وَ اَدْحِضْ بِهِ الْبَاطِلَ وَ اَدِلْ بِهٖ اَوْلِيَآئَكَ 
WA ADHIZ BEHIL BAATELA WA ADIL BEHI AWLEYAAA-AKA
And make the falsehood vanished through him. And prepare the victory of Your friends,
وَ اَذْلِلْ بِهٖ اَعْدَآئَكَ 
WA AZLIL BEHI AA’-DAAA-AKA
And disgrace Your enemies through him.
وَ صِلِ اللّٰهُمَّ بَيْنَنَا وَ بَيْنَهٗ وُصْلَةً تُؤَدِّىْ اِلٰى مُرَافَقَتِ سَلَفِهٖ 
WA SELIL LAAHUMMA BAYNANAA WA BAYNAHU WUSLATAN TO-ADDEE ELAA MORAAFAQATE SALAFEHI
O Allah, set a relationship between us and him that grants us the honour of the company of his ancestors.
وَاجْعَلْنَا مِمَّنْ يَاْخُذُ بِحُجْزَتِهِمْ وَ يَمْكُثُ فِىْ ظِلِّهِمْ 
WAJ-A’LNAA MIMMAN YAA-KHOZO BE-HUJZATEHIM WA YAMKOSO FEE ZILLEHIM 
And let us be of those who seek their company and reside in their shelter.
وَ اَعِنَّا عَلٰى تَاْدِيَةِ حُقُوْقِهٖ اِلَيْهِ وَالْاِجْتِهَادِ فِىْ طَاعَتِهٖ 
WA A-I’NNAA A’LAA TAA-DEYATE HOQOOQEHI ELAYHE WAL IJTEHAADE FEE TAA-A’TEHI 
And help us in fulfilling our dues to him and in striving hard to his obedience 
وَاجْتِنَابِ مَعْصِيَتِهٖ 
WAJ TENAABE MA’-SEYATEHI
and to avoid disobeying him.
وَامْنُنْ عَلَيْنَا بِرِضَاهُ وَ هَبْ لَنَا رَاْفَتَهٗ وَ رَحْمَتَهٗ وَ دُعَآئَهٗ وَ خَيْرَهٗ 
WAM-NUN A’LAYNAA BE-REZAAHO WA HAB LANAA RAA-FATAHU WA RAHMATAHU WA DO-A’AA-AHU WA KHAYRAHU
And grant us his pleasure and bestow on us his affection and his compassion and his supplication and his goodness
مَا نَنَالُ بِهٖ سَعَةً مِّنْ رَحْمَتِكَ وَ فَوْزًا عِنْدَكَ 
MAA NANAALO BEHI SA-A’TAN MIN RAHMATEKA WA FAWZAN I’NDAKA
Whereby through him we may receive the vastness of Your Mercy and Success with You
وَاجْعَلْ صَلٰوتَنَا بِهٖ مَقْبُوْلَةً 
WAJ-A’L SALAATANAA BEHI MAQBOOLATAN
And for his sake let our prayers be accepted
وَ ذُنُوْبَنَا بِهٖ مَغْفُوْرَۃً
WA ZONOOBANAA BEHI MAGHFOORATAN
And for his sake let our sins be forgiven
وَ دُعَآئَنَا بِهٖ مُسْتَجَابًا 
WA DO-A’AA-ANAA BEHI MUSTAJAABAN
And for his sake let our requests be granted
وَاجْعَلْ اَرْزَاقَنَا بِهٖ مَبْسُوْطَةً 
WAJ-A’L ARZAAQANAA BEHI MABSOOTATAN
And for his sake let our sustenance be abundant
وَ هُمُوْمَنَا بِهٖ مَكْفِيَّةً 
WA HOMOOMANAA BEHI MAKFIYYATAN
And for his sake let our sadness be relieved
وَ حَوَآئِجَنَا بِهٖ مَقْضِيَّةً 
WA HAWAAA-EJANAA BEHI MAQZIYYATAN
And for his sake let our wants be granted
وَ اَقْبِلْ اِلَيْنَا بِوَجْهِكَ الْكَرِيْمِ 
WA AQBIL ELAYNAA BE-WAJHEKAL KAREEME
And Your turn to us through Your Honoured face
وَاقْبَلْ تَقَرُّبَنَا اِلَيْكَ 
WAQ-BAL TAQARROBANAA ELAYKA
And accept our proximity with you.
وَانْظُرْ اِلَيْنَا نَظْرَةً رَحِيْمَةً 
WAN-ZUR ELAYNAA NAZRATAN RAHEEMATAN 
And cast upon us Your merciful look, 
نَسْتَكْمِلُ بِهَا الْكَرَامَةِ عِنْدَكَ 
NASTAKMELO BEHAL KARAAMATA I’NDAKA
through which our achievement of honour from you may be perfected;
ثُمَّ لَا تَصْرِفْهَا عَنَّا بِجُوْدِكَ 
SUMMA LAA TASRIF-HAA A’NNAA BE-JOODEKA
Then never deprive us of it by Your generosity.
وَاسْقِنَا مِنْ حَوْضِ جَدِّهِ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهٖ 
WAS-QENAA MIN HAWZE JADDEHI SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI 
And quench our thirst from the cistern of his (Imam a.s.) grandfather, may Allah bless him and his progeny, 
بِكَاْسِهٖ وَ بِيَدِهٖ رَيًّا رَوِيًّا هَنِيْٓئًا سَآئِغًا 
BEKAA-SEHI WA BE-YADEHI RAYYAN RAWIYYAN HANEE-AN SAAA-EGHAN 
in his own cup and from his own hand. A sweet, cool, clear, agreeable drink 
لَا ظَمَأَ بَعْدَهٗ يَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ
LAA ZAMA-A BA’-DAHU YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEENA
after which no thirst is felt. O Most Merciful of All.

E35.Title: Dua e Sabah
E35.Data:
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيمِ 
اَللّٰهُمَّ يَا مَنْ دَلَعَ لِسَانَ الصَّبَاحِ بِنُطْقِ تَبَلُّجِهٖ وَ سَرَّحَ قِطَعَ اللَّيْلِ الْمُظْلِمِ بِغَيَاهِبِ تَلَجْلُجِهٖ وَ أَتْقَنَ صُنْعَ الْفَلَكِ الدَّوَّارِ فِي مَقَادِيرِ تَبَرُّجِهٖ وَ شَعْشَعَ ضِيَاءَ الشَّمْسِ بِنُورِ تَأَجُّجِهٖ يَا مَنْ دَلَّ عَلٰى ذَاتِهٖ بِذَاتِهٖ وَ تَنَزَّهَ عَنْ مُجَانَسَةِ مَخْلُوقَاتِهٖ وَ جَلَّ عَنْ مُلَائَمَةِ كَيْفِيَّاتِهٖ يَا مَنْ قَرُبَ مِنْ خَطَرَاتِ الظُّنُونِ وَ بَعُدَ عَنْ لَحَظَاتِ الْعُيُونِ وَ عَلِمَ بِمَا كَانَ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَكُونَ يَا مَنْ أَرْقَدَنِي فِي مِهَادِ أَمْنِهٖ وَ أَمَانِهٖ وَ أَيْقَظَنِيْ‏ إِلَى مَا مَنَحَنِي بِهٖ مِنْ مِنَنِهٖ وَ إِحْسَانِهٖ وَ كَفَّ أَكُفَّ السُّوءِ عَنِّي بِيَدِهٖ وَ سُلْطَانِهٖ صَلِّ اَللّٰهُمَّ عَلَى الدَّلِيلِ إِلَيْكَ فِي اللَّيْلِ الْأَلْيَلِ وَ الْمَاسِكِ مِنْ أَسْبَابِكَ بِحَبْلِ الشَّرَفِ الْأَطْوَلِ وَ النَّاصِعِ الْحَسَبِ فِي ذِرْوَةِ الْكَاهِلِ الْأَعْبَلِ وَ الثَّابِتِ الْقَدَمِ عَلٰى زَحَالِيفِهَا فِي الزَّمَنِ الْأَوَّلِ وَ عَلٰى آلِهِ الْأَخْيَارِ الْمُصْطَفَيْنَ الْأَبْرَارِ وَ افْتَحِ اَللّٰهُمَّ لَنَا مَصَارِيعَ الصَّبَاحِ بِمَفَاتِيحِ الرَّحْمَةِ وَ الْفَلَاحِ وَ أَلْبِسْنِي اَللّٰهُمَّ مِنْ أَفْضَلِ خِلَعِ الْهِدَايَةِ وَ الصَّلَاحِ وَ اغْرِسِ اَللّٰهُمَّ بِعَظَمَتِكَ فِي شِرْبِ جِنَانِي يَنَابِيعَ الْخُشُوعِ وَ أَجْرِ اَللّٰهُمَّ لِهَيْبَتِكَ مِنْ آمَاقِي زَفَرَاتِ الدُّمُوعِ وَ أَدِّبِ اَللّٰهُمَّ نَزَقَ الْخُرْقِ مِنِّي بِأَزِمَّةِ الْقُنُوعِ إِلٰهِي إِنْ لَمْ تَبْتَدِئْنِي الرَّحْمَةُ مِنْكَ بِحُسْنِ التَّوْفِيقِ فَمَنِ السَّالِكُ بِي إِلَيْكَ فِي وَاضِحِ الطَّرِيقِ وَ إِنْ أَسْلَمَتْنِي أَنَاتُكَ لِقَائِدِ الْأَمَلِ وَ الْمُنَى فَمَنِ الْمُقِيلُ عَثَرَاتِي مِنْ كَبَوَاتِ الْهَوَى وَ إِنْ خَذَلَنِي نَصْرُكَ عِنْدَ مُحَارَبَةِ النَّفْسِ وَ الشَّيْطَانِ فَقَدْ وَكَلَنِي خِذْلَانُكَ إِلَى حَيْثُ النَّصَبِ وَ الْحِرْمَانِ إِلٰهِي أَ تَرَانِي مَا أَتَيْتُكَ إِلَّا مِنْ حَيْثُ الْآمَالِ أَمْ عَلِقْتُ بِأَطْرَافِ حِبَالِكَ إِلَّا حِينَ بَاعَدَتْنِي ذُنُوبِي عَنْ دَارِ الْوِصَالِ فَبِئْسَ الْمَطِيَّةُ الَّتِي امْتَطَتْ نَفْسِي مِنْ هَوَاهَا فَوَاهاً لَهَا لِمَا سَوَّلَتْ لَهَا ظُنُونُها وَ مُنَاهَا وَ تَبّاً لَهَا لِجُرْأَتِهَا عَلٰى سَيِّدِهَا وَ مَوْلَاهَا إِلٰهِي قَرَعْتُ بَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ بِيَدِ رَجَائِي وَ هَرَبْتُ إِلَيْكَ لَاجِئاً مِنْ فَرْطِ أَهْوَائِي وَ عَلَّقْتُ بِأَطْرَافِ حِبَالِكَ أَنَامِلَ وَلَائِي فَاصْفَحِ اَللّٰهُمَّ عَمَّا كُنْتُ أَجْرَمْتُهُ مِنْ زَلَلِي وَ خَطَائِي وَ أَقِلْنِي مِنْ صَرْعَةِ دَائِي فَإِنَّكَ سَيِّدِي وَ مَوْلَايَ وَ مُعْتَمَدِي وَ رَجَائِي وَ أَنْتَ غَايَةُ مَطْلُوبِي وَ مُنَايَ فِي مُنْقَلَبِي وَ مَثْوَايَ إِلٰهِي كَيْفَ تَطْرُدُ مِسْكِيناً الْتَجَأَ إِلَيْكَ مِنَ الذُّنُوبِ هَارِباً أَمْ كَيْفَ تُخَيِّبُ مُسْتَرْشِداً قَصَدَ إِلَى جَنَابِكَ صَاقِباً أَمْ كَيْفَ تَرُدُّ ظَمْآنَ وَرَدَ إِلَى حِيَاضِكَ شَارِباً كَلَّا وَ حِيَاضُكَ مُتْرَعَةٌ فِي ضَنْكِ الْمُحُولِ وَ بَابُكَ مَفْتُوحٌ لِلطَّلَبِ وَ الْوُغُولِ وَ أَنْتَ غَايَةُ الْمَسْئُولِ وَ نِهَايَةُ الْمَأْمُولِ إِلٰهِي هٰذِهٖ أَزِمَّةُ نَفْسِيْ عَقَلْتُهَا بِعِقَالِ مَشِيَّتِكَ وَ هٰذِهٖ أَعْبَاءُ ذُنُوبِي دَرَأْتُهَا بِعَفْوِكَ‏ وَ رَحْمَتِكَ وَ هٰذِهٖ أَهْوَائِيَ الْمُضِلَّةُ وَكَلْتُهَا إِلَى جَنَابِ لُطْفِكَ وَ رَأْفَتِكَ فَاجْعَلِ اَللّٰهُمَّ صَبَاحِي هَذَا نَازِلًا عَلَيَّ بِضِيَاءِ الْهُدَى وَ السَّلَامَةِ فِي الدِّينِ وَ الدُّنْيَا وَ مَسَائِي جُنَّةً مِنْ كَيْدِ الْعِدَى وَ وِقَايَةً مِنْ مُرْدِيَاتِ الْهَوَى إِنَّكَ قَادِرٌ عَلٰى مَا تَشَاءُ تُؤْتِي الْمُلْكَ مَنْ تَشاءُ وَ تَنْزِعُ الْمُلْكَ مِمَّنْ تَشاءُ وَ تُعِزُّ مَنْ تَشاءُ وَ تُذِلُّ مَنْ تَشاءُ بِيَدِكَ الْخَيْرُ إِنَّكَ عَلٰى‏ كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ قَدِيرٌ تُوْلِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهارِ وَ تُوْلِجُ النَّهارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ وَ تُخْرِجُ الْحَيَّ مِنَ الْمَيِّتِ وَ تُخْرِجُ الْمَيِّتَ مِنَ الْحَيِّ وَ تَرْزُقُ مَنْ تَشَاءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ سُبْحَانَكَ اَللّٰهُمَّ وَ بِحَمْدِكَ مَنْ ذَا يَعْرِفُ قَدْرَكَ فَلَا يَخَافُكَ وَ مَنْ ذَا يَعْلَمُ مَا أَنْتَ فَلَا يَهَابُكَ أَلَّفْتَ بِمَشِيَّتِكَ الْفِرَقَ وَ فَلَقْتَ بِقُدْرَتِكَ الْفَلَقَ وَ أَنَرْتَ بِكَرَمِكَ دَيَاجِيَ الْغَسَقِ وَ أَنْهَرْتَ الْمِيَاهَ مِنَ الصُّمِّ الصَّيَاخِيدِ عَذْباً وَ أُجَاجاً وَ أَنْزَلْتَ مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجاً وَ جَعَلْتَ الشَّمْسَ وَ الْقَمَرَ لِلْبَرِيَّةِ سِرَاجاً وَهَّاجاً مِنْ غَيْرِ أَنْ تُمَارِسَ فِيمَا ابْتَدَأْتَ بِهٖ لُغُوباً وَ لَا عِلَاجاً فَيَا مَنْ تَوَحَّدَ بِالْعِزِّ وَ الْبَقَاءِ وَ قَهَرَ عِبَادَهُ بِالْمَوْتِ وَ الْفَنَاءِ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِهِ الْأَتْقِيَاءِ وَ اسْمَعْ نِدَائِي وَ اسْتَجِبْ دُعَائِي وَ حَقِّقْ بِفَضْلِكَ أَمَلِي وَ رَجَائِي يَا خَيْرَ مَنْ دُعِيَ لِكَشْفِ الضُّرِّ وَ الْمَأْمُولِ لِكُلِّ يُسْرٍ وَ عُسْرٍ بِكَ أَنْزَلْتُ حَاجَتِي فَلَا تَرُدَّنِي مِنْ سَنِيِّ مَوَاهِبِكَ خَائِباً يَا كَرِيْمُ يَا كَرِيْمُ يَا كَرِيْمُ وَ لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِيمِ ثُمَّ يَسْجُدُ وَ يَقُولُ إِلٰهِي قَلْبِي مَحْجُوبٌ وَ نَفْسِي مَعْيُوبٌ وَ عَقْلِي مَغْلُوبٌ وَ هَوَائِي غَالِبٌ وَ طَاعَتِي قَلِيلَةٌ وَ مَعْصِيَتِي كَثِيرَةٌ وَ لِسَانِي مُقِرٌّ بِالذُّنُوبِ فَكَيْفَ حِيلَتِي يَا سَتَّارَ الْعُيُوبِ وَ يَا عَلَّامَ الْغُيُوبِ وَ يَا كَاشِفَ الْكُرُوبِ اغْفِرْ ذُنُوبِي كُلَّهَا بِحُرْمَةِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ يَا غَفَّارُ يَا غَفَّارُ يَا غَفَّارُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ يَا أَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ

E36.Title: Dua e Sad Subhan (Dua e Sahifa)
E36.Data:
بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
سُبْحَانَ اللّٰہِ الْعَظِیْمِ وَ بِحَمْدِہٖ 
SUBHAANALLAAHIL A’ZEEME WA BE HAMDEHI. 
Glory be to Allah, the Supreme! Praise be to He!
سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مَلِيكٍ مَّا اَقْدَرَہٗ 
SUBHAANAHU MIN ELAAHIM MAA-A’QDARAHU. 
Glory be to He in (His) Divinity! How omnipotent He is!
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ قَدِیْرٍ مَّا اَعْظَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN QADEERIM MA-AKHZAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) omnipotence! How powerful He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ عَظِیْمٍ مَّآ اَجَلَّہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN A’ZEEMIN MAA-AJALLAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) power! How mighty He is!
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ جَلِیْلٍ مَّا اَمْجَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAU MIN JALEELIM MAA AMJADAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) might! How eminent He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مَّاجِدٍ مَّآ اَرْاَفَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MAAJEDIM MAA AR-AFAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) eminence! How compassionate He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ رَّءُوْفٍ مَّا اَعَزَّہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN RA-OOFIM MAA A-A’ZZAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) compassion! How powerful He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ عَزِیْزٍ مَّا اَکْبَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAU MIN A’ZEEZIM MAA AKBARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) power! How majestic He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ کَبِیْرٍ مَّا اَقْدَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN KABEERIM MAA-AQDAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (his) majesty! How eternal He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ قَدِیْمٍ مَّا اَعْلَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN QADEEMIN MAA-A-A’LAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) eternity! How high He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ عَلِيٍّ مَا اَسْنَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN A’LIYYIM MAA ASNAAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) highness! How sublime He is!
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ سَنِیٍّ مَّا اَبْھَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SANIYYIM MAA ABHAAHO
Glory be to He in (His) sublimity! How beautiful! He is!
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ بَھِیْءٍ مَّا اَنْوَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN BAHIHIM MAA AWWARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) beauty! How resplendent He is!
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مُّنِیْرٍ مَّآ اَظْھَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MONEERIM MAA AZHARAHU
Glory be to He in (His) splendour! How manifest He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ ظَاھِرٍ مَّا اَخْفَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN ZAAHERIM MAA AKHFAAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) manifestation! How secret He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ خَفِیٍّ مَّا اَعْلَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN KHAFIYIM MAA A-A’LAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) secrecy! How intelligent He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ عَلِیْمٍ مَّا اَخْبَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN A’LIMIM MAA AKHBARAHU 
Glory be to He in (his intelligence! How aware He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ خَبِیْرٍ مَّا اَكْرَمَهٗ
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN KHABEERIM MAA AKRAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) awareness! How generous He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ كَرِيْمٍ مَّا اَلْطَفَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN KAREEMIM MAA ALTAFAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) generosity! How kind He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ لَطِیْفٍ مَّا اَبْصَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN LATEEFIM MAA ABSARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) kindness! How sagacious He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ بَصِیْرٍ مَّا اَسْمَعَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN BASEERIM MAA ASMA-A’HU 
Glory be to He in (His) sagaciousness! How attentive He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ سَمِیْعٍ مَّا اَحْفَظَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SAMEE-I’M MAA AHFAZAHU 
Glory be to be in (His) attendancy! How watchful He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ حَفِیْظٍ مَّا اَمْلَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN HAFEEZIM MAA AMLAAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) watchfulness! How persuasive He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مَّلِیٍّ مَّا اَوْفَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MALIYYIM MAA AWFAAHO
Glory be to He in (His) pervasion! How complete He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ وَفِیٍّ مَّا اَغْنَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN WAFIYYIM MAA AGHNAAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) completeness! How sufficient He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ غَنِیٍّ مَّا اَعْطَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN GHANIYYIM MAA A-A’TAAHO
Glory be to He in (His) sufficiency! How liberal He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مُّعْطٍ مَّا اَوْسَعَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MO’TIM MAA AWSA-A’HU 
Glory be to He in (His) liberality! How bountiful He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ وَّاسِعٍ مَّا اَجْوَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN WAASE-I’M MAA AJWADAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) bountifulness! How plenteous He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن جَوَادٍ مَّا اَفْضَلَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN JAWAADIM MAA AFZALAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) plenteousness! How superb He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن مُّفْضِلٍ مَّا اَنْعَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MOFAZZELIM MAA AN-A’MAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) superbness! How charitable He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن مُّنْعِمٍ مَّا اَسْیَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MAN-A’ MIMMAA ASYADAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) charitableness! How masterful He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ سَیِّدٍ مَّا اَرْحَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SAYYEDIM MAA ARHAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) masterdom! How Merciful He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن رَحِیْمٍ مَّا اَشَدَّہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN RAHEEMIM MAA ASHADDOHU 
Glory be to He in (His) mercifulness! How resoulute He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ شَدِیْدٍ مَّا اَقْوَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SHADEEDIM MAA AQWAAHO
Glory be to He in (His) resoluteness! How strong He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن قَوِیٍّ مَّا اَحْمَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN QAWIYYIM MAA AHMADAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) strength! How praiseworthy He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ حَمِیْدٍ مَّا اَحْکَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN HAMEEDIM MAA AHKAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) praiseworthiness, How wise He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن حَکِیْمٍ مَّا اَبْطَشَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN HAKEEMIM MAA ABTASHAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) wisdom! How confident He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن بَاطِشٍ مَّا اَقْوَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN BAATESHIM MAA AQWAMAHU
Glory be to He in (His) confidence! How durable He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ قَيُّوْمٍ مَا اَدْوَمَهٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN QAYYOOMIM MAA ADWAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) durability! How everlasting He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ دَآئِمٍ مَّا اَبْقَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN DAAA-EMIM MAA ABQAAHO
Glory be to He in (His) everlastingness! How perpetual He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن بَاقٍ مَّا اَفْرَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN BAAQIM MAA AFRADAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) perpetuality! How unique He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن فَرْدٍ مَّا اَوْحَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN FARDIM MAA AW-HADAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) uniqueness! How singular He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن وَّاحِدٍ مَّا اَصْمَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN WAAHEDIM MAA ASMADAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) singularity! How independent He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ صَمَدٍ مَّا اَمْلَکَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SAMADIM MAA AMLAKAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) independence! How sovereign He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مَّالِکٍ مَّا اَوْلَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MOLEKIM MAA AWLAAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) sovereignty! How authoritative He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن وَّلِیٍّ مَّا اَعْظَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN WALIYYIM MAA A-A’ZAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) authority! How great He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ عَظِیْمٍ مَّا اَکْمَلَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN A’ZEEMIM MAA AKMALAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) greatness! How perfect He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن کَامِلٍ مَّا اَتَمَّہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN KAAMELIM MAA ATAMMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) perfectness! How thorough He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ تَآمٍّ مَّآ اَعْجَبَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN TAAAM-MIM MAA A’J-MAHU 
Glory be to He in (his) thoroughness! How marvellous He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ عَجِیْبٍ مَّا اَفْخَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN A’JEEBIM MAA AFKHARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) marvelousness! How proud He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ فَاخِرٍ مَّا اَبْعَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN FAAKHERIM MAA AB-A’DAHU 
Glory be to hew in (His) pride! How remote He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ بَعِیْدٍ مَّا اَقْرَبَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN BA-E’EDIM MAA AQRABAHU 
Glory be to He is remoteness! How near He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن قَرِیْبٍ مَّا اَمْنَعَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN KAREEBIM MAA AMNA-AHU 
Glory be to He in (His) nearness! How inaccessible He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن مَّانِعٍ مَّا اَغْلَبَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MAAA-NE-I’M MAA AGHLABAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) inaccessibility! How victorious He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ غَالِبٍ مَّا اَعْفَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN GHAALEBIM MAA A-A’KAAHU 
Glory be to (His) victoriousness! How tolerant He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ عَفُوٍّ مَّا اَحْسَنَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN AKUWWIM MAA AHSANAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) toleration! How indulgent He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مُحْسِنٍ مَّا اَجْمَلَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MOHSENIM MAA AJMALAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) indulgence! How adorable He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ جَمِيْلٍ مَّا اَقْبَلَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN JAMEELIN MAA AQBALAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) adorableness! How obliging He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ قَابِلٍ مَّا اَشْکَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN QAABELIM MAA ASHKARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) obligingness! How thankworthy He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن شَکُوْرٍ مَّا اَغْفَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SHAKOORIM MAA AGHFARAHU 
Glory be to He in His thank worthiness! How Oft-forgiving He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ غَفُوْرٍ مَّا اَصْبَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN GHAFOORIM MAA ASBARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) oft-forgiveness! How patient He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ صَبُوْرٍ مَا اَجْبَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SABOORIM MAA AJBARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) patience! How effective He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ جَبَّارٍ مَّا اَدْیَنَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN JABBAARIM MAA ADYANAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) effectiveness! How judicious He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ دَیَّانٍ مَّا اَقْضَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN DAYYAANIM MAA A’KZAAHO
Glory be to He in (His) judiciousness! How decisive He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ قَاضٍ مَّا اَمْضَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN KAAZIM MAA AMZAAHO 
Glory be to He in (His) decisiveness! How alert He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مَّاضٍ مَّا اَنْفَذَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MAAZIM MAA ANFAZAHU
Glory be to He in (His) alertness! How executive He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ نَافِذٍ مَّا اَرْحَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN NAAFEZIM MAA AHLAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) execution! How gentle He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ رَحِیْمٍ مَّا اَخْلَقَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN HALEEMIM MAA AKHLAQAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) gentleness! How refined He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن خَالِقٍ مَا اَرْزَقَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN KHAALEKIM MAA ARZAQAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) refinement! How sustaining He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ رَازِقٍ مَا اَقْھَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN RAAZEKIM MAA AQHARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) sustainment! How forceful He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن قَاھِرٍ مَا اَنْشَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN QAAHERIM MAA ANSHAAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) forcibleness! How creative He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مُّنْشِءٍ مَا اَمْلَکَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MUNSHE-IM MAA AMLAKAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) creativeness! How kingly He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مَالِكٍ مَا اَوْلَاهُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MAALEKIM MAA AWLAAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) kingdom! How lordly He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ وَالٍ مَا اَرْفَعَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN WAALIM MAA AR-FA-A’HU 
Glory be to He in (His) lordliness! How lofty He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ رَفِیْعٍ مَّا اَشْرَفَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN RAFEE-I’M MAA ASHRAFAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) loftiness! How dominant He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ شَرِیْفٍ مَّا اَبْسَطَهٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SHAREEFIM MAA ABSATAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) dominancy! How extensive He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَهُ مِنْ بَاسِطٍ مَا أَقْبَضَهٗ
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN BAASETIM MAA A’KBAZAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) extensiveness! How appropriative He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ قَابِضٍ مَّا اَبْدَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN QAABEZIM MAA AB-DAAHO 
Glory be to He in (His) appropriativenes! How originative He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِن بَّادٍ مَّا اَقْدَسَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN BAADIM MAA A’KDASAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) origination! How holy He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ قُدُّوْسٍ مَّا اَطْھَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN QUDDOOSIM MAA AZHARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) holiness! How pure He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ طَاھِرٍ مَّا اَزْکَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN TAAHERIM MAA AZKAAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) purity! How pious He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ زَکِیٍّ مَّا اَهْدَاهُ
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN ZAKIYYIM MAA AHDAAHO
Glory be to He in (His) piety! How guiding He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ هَادٍ مَا اَصْدَقَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN HAADIM MAA ASDAKAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) guidance! How truthful He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ صَادِقٍ مَّا اَعْوَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SAADEKIM MAA A-A’WADAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) truthfulness! How timeless He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ عَوَّادٍ مَّا اَفْطَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN AWWAADIM MAA AFTARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) timelessness! How intentive He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ فَاطِرٍ مَّا اَرْعَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN FAATERIM MAA AR-A’AHU 
Glory be to He in (His) inventiveness! How protecting He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ رَاعٍ مَّا اَعْوَنَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN RAA-I’M MAA A-A’WANAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) protectorship! How supporting He! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مُّعِیْنٍ مَّا اَوْھَبَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MO-E’ENIM MAA AWHABAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) supportment! How benevolent He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ وَھَّابٍ مَّا اَتْوَبَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN WAHHAABIM MAA ATWABAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) benevolence! How accommodative He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ تَوَّابٍ مَّا اَسْخَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN TAWWAABIM MAA ASKHAAHO 
Glory be to He in (His) accommodativeness! How munificent He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ سَخْیٍ مَّا اَنْصَرَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SAKHIYYIM MAA ANSARAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) munificence! How helpful He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ نَصِیْرٍمَّا اَسْلَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN NASEERIM MAA ASLAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) helpfulness! How peaceable He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ سَلِيْمٍ مَا اَشْفَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SALAAMIM MAA ASHFAAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) peaceableness! How able He as a healer! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ شَافٍ مَّا اَنْجَاہُ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SHAAFIM MAA ANJAAHO
Glory be to He in (His) ability to heal! How able He is as a deliver! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مُّنْجٍ مَّا اَبَرَّہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MUNJIM MAA ABARRAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) ability to deliver! How innocent He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ بَآرٍّ مَّا اَطْلَبَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN BAARRIM MAA ATLABAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) innocence! How deamandant He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ طَالِبٍ مَّا اَدْرَکَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN TAALEBIM MAA ADRAKAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) demand! How perceptive He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مُّدْرِکٍ مَّا اَشَدَّہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MUDREKIM MAA ARSHADAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) perceptiveness! How reasonable He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ شَدِیْدٍ مَا اَعْطَفَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN RASHEEDIM MAA A-A’TAFAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) reasonableness! How affectionate He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مُتَعَطِّفٍ مَّا اَعْدَلَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MOTA-A’TTEFIM MAA A-A’DALAHU
Glory be to He in (His) affectionateness! How prudent He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ عَدْلٍ مَّا اَتْقَنَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN A’DLIM MAA ATQANAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) prudence! How perfect He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ مُتْقِنٍ مَّا اَحْکَمَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN MUTQOMIN MAA AHKAMAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) perfection! How wise He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ حَکِیْمٍ مَّا اَکْفَلَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN HAKEEMIM MAAA-AKFALAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) wisdom! How able He is to stand security! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ کَفِیْلٍ مَّا اَشْھَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN KAFEELIM MAAA ASH-HADAHU 
Glory be to He in (His) ability to stand security! How able He is!
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ مِنْ شَھِیْدٍ مَّا اَحْمَدَہٗ 
WA SUBHAANAHU MIN SHAHEEDIM MAAA AHMADAHU 
Glory be to He to give witness! How most praiseworthy He is! 
وَ سُبْحَانَہٗ ھُوَ اللّٰہُ الْعَظِیْمُ وَ بِحَمْدِہٖ 
WA SUBHAANAHU HOWAL LAAHUL A’ZEEMO WA BE HAMDEHI 
Glory be to He! He is Allah the Supreme and (all) praise be to Him. 
وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ وَ لَا اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اللّٰہُ وَ اللّٰہُ اَکْبَرُ وَ لِلّٰہِ الْحَمْدُ 
WAL HAMDO LILLAAHE WA LAA ELAAHA ILLALLAAHO WALLAAHO AKBAR, WA LILLAAHIL HAMDO 
And (all) praise be to Allah. There is no god except Allah, and Allah is Great and for Allah is Praise.
وَ لَا حَوْلَ وَ لَا قُوَّۃَ اِلَّا بِاللّٰہِ الْعَلِیِّ الْعَظِیْمِ 
WA LAA HAWLA WALAA QUWWATA ILLAA BILLAAHIL A’LIYYIL A’ZEEM, 
There is no power, and no might, except (with) Allah, the Highest High. 
دَافِعَ کُلِّ بَلِیَّۃٍ 
DAAFE-A’ KULLE BALIYYATIN 
Disperser of all calamities. 
وَّ ھُوَ حَسْبِیْ وَ نِعْمَ الْوَکِیْلُ.
WA HOWA HASBEE WA NE-A’MAL WAKEEL.
Sufficient is He, and the Best Supporter.

E37.Title: Dua e Sanamay Quraish
E37.Data:
It is reported through the source of Abdullah bin Abbas that once he went to the Masjidun Nabawee in the small hours of the night and saw Ali ibne Abi Talib (a.s.) praying Tahajjud Namaz. After the Namaz of watr, Maula Ali (a.s.) recited a Dua which Abdullah had never heard.
In reply to his question Ali ibn Abi Talib (a.s.) said:
“Dua, I was reciting is Sanamay Quraysh. If someone recites this Dua sincerely, Almighty Allah will forgive him of his sins and fulfil his legitimate desires. Ibne Abbas remember that this Dua can also be recited to seek Almighty Allah’s help on behalf of any of your believing friends or relatives.”
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ.
BISMIL LAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
ALLAAHUMMA SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN.
O  Allah! Send Your blessings upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad
اَللّٰهُمَّ الْعَنْ صَنَمَیْ قُرَیْشٍ وَ جِبْتَیْهَا وَ طَاغُوْتَیْهَا 
ALLAAHUMMAL A’N SANAMAY QURAISHIN WA JIBTAYHAA WA TAAGHOOTAYHAA 
O  Allah! Curse the two idols of Quraish, and their two magicians, and their two tyrants,
وَ اِفْكَیْهَا وَ ابْنَتَیْهَا 
WA IFQAYHAA WAB NATAYHEMAL 
and their two accusers of falsehood, and their two daughters,
اللَّذَیْنِ خَالَفَا اَمْرَكَ وَ اَنْكَرَا وَحْیَكَ وَ جَحَدَا اِنْعَامَكَ 
LAZAYNE KHAALAFAA AMRAKA WA ANKARAA WAHYAKA WA JAHADAA INA’AMAKA 
that opposed Your order, and denied Your revelation and rejected Your graces,
وَ عَصَیَا رَسُوْلَكَ وَ قَلَّبَا دِیْنَكَ 
WA A’SAYAA RASOOLAKA WA QALLABAA DEENAKA 
and disobeyed Your Messenger, and destroyed Your religion, 
وَ حَرَّفَا کِتَابَكَ وَ اَحَبَّا اَعْدَآئَكَ 
WA HARRAFAA KETAABAKA WA AHABBA A-A’DAA-AKA
and distorted Your Book, and loved Your enemies, 
وَ جَحَدَ اٰلَآئَكَ وَ عَطَّلَا اَحْكَامَكَ 
WA JAHADA AALAAA-AKA WA A’TTALAA AHKAAMAKA 
and negated Your Graciousness, and obstructed Your laws,
وَ اَبْطَلَا فَرَآئِضَكَ وَ اَلْحَدَا فِیْ اٰیَاتِكَ 
WA ABTALAA FARAAA-EZAKA WA ALHADAA FEE AAYAATEKA 
and revocated Your obligations, and disbelieved in Your Signs,
وَ عَادَیَا اَوْلِیَآئَكَ وَ وَالَیَا اَعْدَآئَكَ 
WA A’AADAYAA AWLEYAAA-AKA WA WAALAYAA A’ADAAA-AKA 
and antagonized Your Allies, and befriended Your enemies, 
وَ خَرَّبَا بِلاَدَكَ وَ اَفْسَدَا عِبَادَكَ 
WA KHARRABAA BELAADAKA WA AFSADAA E’BAADAKA 
and ruined Your cities, and corrupted Your servants.
اَللّٰهُمَّ الْعَنْہُمَا وَ اَتْبَاعَہُمَا وَ اَوْلِیَآئَہُمَا 
ALLAAHUMMAL A’NHOMAA WA ATBAA-A’HOMAA WA AWLEYAAA-AHOMAA
O Allah! Cure them both and their admirers and their friends 
وَ اَشْیَاعَہُمَا وَ مُحِبِّیْهِمَا 
WA ASHYAA-A’HOMAA WA HOHIBBEEHEMAA
and their followers and their lovers
فَقَدْ اَخْرَبَا بَیْتَ النُّبُوَّۃِ 
FAQAD AKHRABAA BAYTAN NOBUWWATE 
for they have ruined the house of Prophethood
وَ رَدَمَا بَابَہٗ وَ نَقَضَا سَقْفَہٗ 
WA RADAMAA BAABAHU WA NAQAZAA SAQFAHU 
and closed its door, and broken its roof, 
وَ اَلْحَقَا سَمَائَہٗ بِاَرْضِهٖ وَ عَالِیَہٗ بِسَافِلِهٖ 
WA ALHAQAA SAMAAA-AHU BE-ARZEHI WA A’ALEYAHU BE-SAAFELEHI 
and brought down its elevated ceiling to its ground, and its height to a lower status,
وَ ظَاهِرَہٗ بِبَاطِنِهٖ وَ اسْتَاْصَلاَ اَهْلَہٗ 
WA ZAAHERAHU BE-BAATENEHI WAS TAASALAA AHLAHU 
and its exterior to its interior, and destroyed its inhabitants, 
وَ اَبَادَ اَنْصَارَہٗ وَ قَتَلاَ اَطْفَالَہٗ 
WA ABADAA ANSAARAHU WA QATALAA ATFAALAHU 
and exiled their helpers, and killed their children, 
وَ اَخْلَیَا مِنْبَرَہٗ مِنْ وَ صِیِّهٖ وَ وَارِثِ عِلْمِهٖ 
WA AKHLAYAA MINBARAHU MIN WASIYYEHI WA WAARESE I’LMEHI
and confiscated their pulpit from its successor and inheritor,
وَ جَحَدَا اِمَامَتَہٗ وَ اَشْرَكَا بِرَبِّهِمَا 
WA JAHADAA EMAAMATAHU WA ASHRAKAA BERABBEHEMAA 
and negated the righteous leadership (Imamat) and ascribed a partner to their Lord, 
فَعَظِّمْ ذَنْبَہُمَا وَ خَلِّدْہُمَا فِیْ سَقَرَ 
FA-A’ZZIM ZAMBAHOMAA WA KHALLIDHOMAA FEE SAQARA 
so maximize their sins and make them abide forever in the bottom of Hell, 
وَ مَا اَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرَ لاَ تُبْقِیْ وَ لاَ تَذَرْ 
WA MAA ADRAAKA MAA SAQARA LAA TUBQEE WA LAA TAZAR
And what will make you realize what the bottom of hell is? It leaves nothing nor spares anything. (The Holy Qur’an, 74:27-28)
اَللّٰهُمَّ الْعَنْہُمْ بِعَدَدِ کُلِّ مُنْكَرٍ اَتَوْہُ 
ALLAAHUMMAL A’NHUM BE-A’DADE KULLE MUNKARIN ATAWHO 
O Allah! Curse them by the number of each evil they have brought,
وَحَقٍّ اَخْفَوْہُ وَ مِنْبَرٍ عَلَوْہُ وَ مُؤْمِنٍ اَرْجَوْہُ 
WA HAQQIN AKHFAWHO WA MINBARIN A’LAWHO WA MOAMENIN ARZAWHO
and truth they have concealed, and pulpit they have ascended, and believers they have hurt, 
وَ مُنَافِقٍ وَّلَّوْہُ وَ وَلِیٍّ اٰذَوْہُ وَ طَرِیْدٍ اٰوَوْہُ 
WA MONAAFEQIN WALLAWHO WA WALIYYIN AAZAWHO WA TAREEDIN AAWAWHO 
and hypocrites they have befriended, and pious ones they have hurt, and rejected one in exile they have brought back, 
وَ صَادِقٍ طَرَدُوْہُ وَ كَافِرٍ نَصَرُوْہُ وَ اِمَامٍ قَهَرُوْہُ 
WA SAADEQIN TARADOOHO WA KAAFERIN NASAROOHO WA EMAAMIN QAHAROOHO 
and truthful ones they have exiled, and disbeliever they have supported, and Imam they have subjugated, 
وَ فَرْضٍ غَیَّرُوْہُ وَ اَثَرٍ اَنْكَرُوْہُ وَ شَرٍّ اٰثَرُوْہُ 
WA FARZIN GHAYYAROOHO WA ASARIN ANKAROOHO WA SHARRIN AASAROOHO 
and obligatory laws they have changed, and tradition they have denied, and evil they have authorized, 
وَ دَمٍ اَرَاقُوْہُ وَ خَیْرٍ بَدَّلُوْہُ وَ کُفْرٍ نَصَبُوْہُ 
WA DAMIN ARAQOOHO WA KHABARIN BADDALOOHO WA KUFRIN NASABOOHO
and blood they have shed, and goodness they have changed, and disbelief they have established, 
وَ اِرْثٍ غَصَبُوْہُ وَ فَیْءٍ اقْتَطَعُوْہُ 
WA IRSIN GHASABOOHO WA FAY-ENIQ TATA-O’OHO 
and inheritance they have plundered, and booty they have prevented, 
وَ سُحْتٍ اَكَلُوْہُ وَ خُمْسٍ اسْتَحَلُّوْہُ 
WA SOHTIN AKALOOHO WA KHUMSENIS TAHALLOOHO 
and prohibited things they have consumed, and khums they have legalized (for themselves), 
وَ بَاطِلٍ اَسَّسُوْہُ وَ جَوْرٍ بَسَطُوْہُ وَ نِفَاقٍ اَسَرُّوْہُ 
WA BAATELIN ASSASOOHO WA JAWRIN BASATOOHO WA NEFAAQIN ASARROOHO 
and falsehood they have established, and cruelty they have practiced, and hypocrisy they have concealed,
وَ غَدْرٍ اَضْمَرُوْہُ وَ ظُلْمٍ نَشَرُوْہُ وَ وَعْدٍ اَخْلَفُوْہُ 
WA GHADARIN AZAMAROOHO WA ZULMIN NASHAROOHO WA WA’DIN AKHLAFOOHO
and treachery they have bored, and oppression they have spread, and promises they have dishonoured, 
وَ اَمَانَۃٍ خَانُوْہُ وَ عَهْدٍ نَقَضُوْہُ وَ حَلاَلٍ حَرَّمُوْہُ 
WA AMAANATIN KHAANOOHO WA A’HDIN NAQAZOOHO WA HALAALIN HARRAMOOHO 
and covenants they have broken, and lawful they prohibited, 
وَ حَرَامٍ اَحَلُّوْہُ وَ بَطْنٍ فَتَقُوْہُ وَ جَنِیْنٍ اَسْقَطُوْہُ 
WA HARAAMIN HALLALOOHO WA BATNIN FATAQOOHO WA JANEENIN ASQATOOHO
and prohibited they have made lawful, and stomach they have ruptured, 
وَ ضِلْعٍ دَقُّوْہُ وَ صَكٍّ مَّزَّقُوْہُ 
WA ZIL-I’N DAQQOOHO WA SAKKIN MAZZAQOOHO 
and rib they have fractured, and document they tear apart, 
وَ شَمْلٍ بَدَّدُوْہُ وَ عَزِیْزٍ اَذَلُّوْہُ وَ ذَلِیْلٍ اَعَزُّوْہُ 
WA SHAMLIN BADDADOOHO WA A’ZEEZIN AZALLOOHO WA ZALEELIN A-A’ZZOOHO 
and unity they have dispersed, and honoured one they have degraded, and degraded one they have honoured, 
وَ حَقٍّ مَنَعُوْہُ وَ کِذْبٍ دَلَّسُوْہُ 
WA HAQQIN MANA-O’OHO WA KIZBIN DALLASOOHO
and right they have prevented, and lies they have covered,
وَ حُکْمٍ قَلَّبُوْہُ وَ اِمَامٍ خَالَفُوْہُ 
WA HUKMIN QALLABOOHO WA EMAAMIN KHAALAFOOHO 
and command they have altered, and Imam they have opposed.
اَللّٰهُمَّ الْعَنْہُمْ بِکُلِّ اٰیَۃٍ حَرَّفُوْهَا 
ALLAAHUMMAL A’NHOMAA BEKULLE AAYATIN HARRAFOOHO 
O Allah! Curse them for each (Quranic) verse they have distorted, 
وَ فَرِیْضَۃٍ تَرَکُوْهَا وَ سُنَّۃٍ غَیَّرُوْهَا 
WA FAREEZATIN TARAKOOHAA WA SUNNATIN GHAYYAROOHAA 
and obligation they have abandoned, 
وَ رُسُوْمٍ مَنَعُوْهَا وَ اَحْكَامٍ عَطَّلُوْهَا 
WA ROSOOMIN MANA-O’OHAA WA AHKAAMIN A’TTALOOHAA 
and tradition they have distorted, and (Divine) laws they forbade, 
وَ بَیْعَۃٍ نَكَثُوْهَا 
WA BAY-A’TIN NAKASOOHAA 
and the allegiance they have violated, 
وَ دَعْوٰى اَبْطَلُوْهَا وَ بَیِّنَۃٍ اَنْكَرُوْهَا 
WA DA’WAA ABTALOOHAA WA BAYYENATIN ANKAROOHAA 
and call they have invalidated, and evidence they have denied,
وَ حِیْلَۃٍ اَحْدَثُوْهَا وَ خِیَانَۃٍ اَوْرَدُوْهَا 
WA HILYATIN AHDASOOHAA WA KHEYAANATIN AWRADOOHAA 
and crime they have committed, and betrayal they have performed, 
وَ عَقَبَۃٍ اِرْتَقُوْهَا وَ دِبَابٍ دَحْرَجُوْهَا 
WA A’QABATIN IRTAQOOHAA WA DEBAABIN DAH-RAJOOHAA 
and the hill they have climbed, and fixed rules they have changed, 
وَ اَزْیَافٍ لَزَمُوْهَا 
WA AZYAAFIN LAZAMOOHAA 
and the defects they have promoted,
وَ شَهَادَاتٍ كَتَمُوْهَا وَ وَصِیَّۃٍ ضَیَّعُوْهَا 
WA SHA-HAADATIN KATAMOOHAA WA WASIYYATIN ZAYYA-O’OHAA 
and testimonies they have concealed, and advice they have made useless.
اَللّٰهُمَّ الْعَنْہُمَا فِیْ مَکْنُوْنِ السِّرِّ وَ ظَاهِرِ الْعَلاَنِیَۃِ 
ALLAAHUMMAL A’NHOMAA FEE MAKNOONIS SIRRE WA ZAAHERIL A’LAANEYATE 
O Allah! Curse those two secretly as well as openly, 
لَعْنًا کثِیْرًا اَبَدًا دَآئِمًا دَآئِبًا سَرْمَدًا 
LA’NAN KASEERAN ABADAN DAAA-EMAN DAAA-EBAN SARMADAN 
a curse that is great in number, everlasting, abiding, persistent, eternal, 
لَا انْقِطَاعَ لِاَمَدِهٖ وَ لَا نَفَادَ لِعَدَدِهٖ 
LAN QETAA-A’ LE-AMADEHI WA LAA NAFAADA LE-A’DADEHI 
for a limitless duration, for unlimited number of times and without any bounds. 
لَعْنًا یَغْدُوْا اَوَّلُہٗ وَ لَا يَرُوْحُ اٰخِرُہٗ لَہُمْ 
LA’NAN YAGHDOO AWWALOHU WA LAA YAROOHO AAKHEROHU LAHUM 
A curse that commences from the first one (of them) and continues after the last one of them 
وَ لِاَعْوَانِهِمْ وَ اَنْصَارِهِمْ وَ مُحِبِّیْهِمْ وَ مُوَالِیْهِمْ 
WA LE-AA’WAANEHIM WA ANSAAREHIM WA MOHIBBEEHIM WA MOWAALEEHIM 
and for their helpers, and their associates, and their lovers, and their friends, 
وَ الْمُسْلِمِیْنَ لَہُمْ وَ الْمَائِلِیْنَ اِلَیْهِمْ 
WAL MUSLEMEENA LAHUM WAL MAA-ELEENA ELAYHIM 
and their submitters and those who are inclined towards them, 
وَ النَّاهِضِیْنَ بِاِحْتِجَاجِهِمْ وَ الْمُقْتَدِیْنَ بِكَلاَمِهِمْ 
WAN NAAHEZEENA BE-EHTEJAAJEHIM WAL-MUQTADEENA BE-KALAAMEHIM 
and those stand with them in their protests and those who follow their words 
وَ الْمُصَدِّقِیْنَ بِاَحْكَامِهِمْ.
WAL MOSADDEQEENA BE-AHKAAMEHIM.
and those who approve their actions.
Then say four times:
اَللّٰهُمَّ عَذِّبْهُمْ عَذَاباً يَسْتَغِيْثُ مِنْهُ اَهْلُ النَّارِ 
ALLAAHUMMA A’ZZIBHUM A’ZAABAN YASTAGHEESO MINHO AHLUN NAARE 
O Allah! Punish them a punishment that the people of Hell seek refuge from, 
آمِيْنَ رَبَّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ
AAMEENA RABBAL A’ALAMEENA.
So be it, Lord of the Worlds.

E153.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ 
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا نُوْرَ النُّوْرِ تَنَوَّرْتَ بِالنُّوْرِ وَالنُّوْرُ فِی نُوْرِ نُوْرِکَ یَا نُوْرُ 
O Allah! O the One Who makes the light Radiant! (Verily) You radiated Yourself through Your Light (entering the souls of the Faithful). O absolute Light! All lights are the result of the abundance of Your light. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا عَزِیْزُ تَعَزَّزْتَ بِالْعِزِّۃِ وَالْعِزَّۃُ فِی عِزَّۃِ عِزَّتِکَ یَا عَزِیْزُ 
O Allah! O the One Who controls all! Verily You are honoured because of Your (Divine) Honour. O the One Who grants honour to the creation! All honours are due to Your Honour.
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا جَلِیْلُ تَجَلَّلْتَ بِالْجَلَالِ وَالْجَلَالُ فِیْ جَلَالِ جَلَالِکَ یَا جَلِیْلُ 
O Allah! O the owner of limitless greatness! You are Great through Your own greatness (There is no doubt in it). O greater than all greats! All greatnesses are owing to Your greatness. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا وَہَّابُ تَوَہَّبْتَ بِالْہِبَۃِ وَالْہِبَۃُ فِیْ ہِبَۃِ ہِبَتِکَ یَا وَہَّابُ 
O Allah! O the One Who alone is worthy of worship! O the Bestower! Only You have (truely) bestowed favours on the creation, and O Favourer Lord! All these favours are because of Your favour. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا عَظِیْمُ تَعَظَّمْتَ بِالْعَظَمَۃِ وَالْعَظَمَۃُ فِیْ عَظَمَۃِ عَظَمَتِکَ یَا عَظِیْمُ 
O Allah! O the owner of real greatness and grandeur! Only You are the possessor of true gtraetness and all the greatnesses of the peopole of the world are, O the Great!, due to Your greatness. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا عِلِیْمُ تَعَلَّمْتَ بِالْعِلْمِ وَالْعِلْمُ فِیْ عِلْمِ عِلْمِکَ یَا عَلِیْمُ 
O Allah! O the possessor of limitless knowledge! The sciences of all the scholars are but tiny reflections of Your attribute of omniscience as only Your knowledger is absolute knowledge. O the One Who is aware (of the wholes and parts). 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا قُدُّوْسُ تَقَدَّسْتَ بِالْقُدْسِ وَالْقُدْسُ فِی قُدْسِ قُدْسِکَ یَا قُدُّوْسُ 
O Allah! O Holy Lord! (Doubtlessly) You are Holy through Your own holiness and all the holinesses are the result of Your holiness. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا جَمِیْلُ تَجَمَّلْتَ بِالْجِمَالِ وَالْجَمَالُ فِیْ جَمَالِ جَمَالِکَ یَا جَمِیْلُ 
O Allah! O the One Who is beautiful through Your own beauty! You alone is beautiful by Your own virtue of beauty. All the things beautuiful are beautiful only as a consequence of the reflection of Your beauty. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا سَلَامُ تَسَلَّمْتَ بِالسَّلَامِ وَالسَّلَامُ فِیْ سَلَامِ سَلَامِکَ یَا سَلَامُ 
O Allah! O the provider of protection and salvation! You are the possessor of self-protection and all these safeties are as a result of Your virtue of safety. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا صَبُوْرُ تَصَبَّرْتَ بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّبْرُ فِیْ صَبْرِ صَبْرِکَ یَا صَبُوْرُ 
O Allah! O the One Who is patient and Who makes delay in punishing the sinners! You alone are truly patient and all these instances of patience are the reflections of Your patience. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا مَلِیْکُ تَمَلَّکْتَ بِالْمَلَکُوْتِ وَالْمَلَکُوْتُ فِیْ مَلَکُوْتِ مَلَکُوْتِ وَالْمَلَکُوْتُ فِیْ مَلَکُوْتِ مَلَکُوْتِکَ یَا مَلِیْکُ 
O Allah! O the owner of the kingdom of the entire creation! Only in Your hands is the real reins of kingdom and all the kingdoms have been granted only by You. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا رَبُّ تَرَبَّیْتَ بِالرَّبُوْبِیَّۃِ وَالرَّبُوْبِیَّۃُ فِیْ رَبُوْبِیَّۃِ رَبُوْبِیَّتِکَ یَا رَبُّ 
O Allah! O the sustainer of the entire universe! Only You are the Sustainer because of Your own virtue of Lordship. All nourishments are due to Your nourishment. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا مَنَّانُ تَمَنَّنْتَ بِالْمِنَّۃِ وَالْمِنَّۃُ فِیْ مِنَّۃِ مِنَّتِکَ یَا مَنَّانُ 
O Allah! O the One Who favours limitlessly! You alone deserve the showering of favours. All the favours shown by the crreation are only the consequence of Your favours. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا حَکِیْمُ تَحَکَّمْتَ بِالْحِکْمَۃِ وَالْحِکْمَۃُ فِیْ حِکْمَۃِ حِکْمَتِکَ یَا حَکِیْمُ 
O Allah! O the Wise! All of your commandments are full of wisdom. Every one of Your actions are sound through wisdom. All wisdoms are owing to Your wisdom. O Absolute Intelligence! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا حَمِیْدُ تَحَمَّدْتَّ بِالْحَمْدِ وَالْحَمْدُ فِیْ حَمْدِ حَمْدِکَ یَا حَمِیْدُ 
O Allah! O the One Who is worthy of all praise! You are praiseworthy due to Your personal virtues and all the laudations are due to Your praiseworthiness. O the Entire Praise! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَاوَاحِدُ تَوَحَّدْتَّ بِالْوَحْدَانِیَّۃِ وَالْوَحْدَانِیَّۃُ فِیْ وَحْدَانِیَّۃِ وَحْدَانِیَّتِکَ یَا وَاحِدُ 
O Allah! O the One Who has no partner! You alone, due to Your virtue of being one, the only ruler of the entire creation. No doubt, every uniqueness is nothing compared to Your attribute of being Only One God. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا فَرْدُ تَفَرَّدْتَّ بِالْفَرْدَانِیَّۃِ وَ الْفَرْدانِیَّۃُ فِیْ فَرْدَانِیَّۃِ فَرْدَانِیَّتِکَ یَا فَرْدُ 
O Allah! O the Unique. One Who has no likeliness. Verily, You remained the only One due to Your unity and the uniquemesses of all the creation are the samples of Your uniqueness. O the One and the Unique! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا حَلِیْمُ تَحَلَّمْتَ بِالْحِلْمِ وَالْحِلْمُ فِیْ حِلْمِ حِلْمِکَ یَا حَلِیْمُ 
O the Forbearer! Only You are the forebearer because of your virtue of forebearance and all the good behaviours are because of Your virtue of forebearance. O the One Who is more patient than all patients! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا قَدِیْرُ تَقَدَّرْتَ بِالْقُدْرَۃِ وَالْقُدْرَۃُ فِیْ قُدْرَۃِ قُدْرَتِکَ یَا قَدِیْرُ 
O Allah! O the possessor of unlimited power! You are Absolute Power only because of Your attribue of Omnipotence. All powers and freedoms are the fruits of Your strength. O Absolute Power! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا قَدِیْمُ تَقَدَّمْتَ بِالْقِدَمِ وَالْقِدَمُ فِیْ قِدَمِ قِدَمِکَ یَا قَدِیْمُ 
O Allah! O the One Who is Everlasting! You are ancient and eternal because of your attribute of being eternal. All lastings are because of your eternity. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا شَاہِدُ تَشَہَّدْتَّ بِالشَّہَادَۃِ وَالشَّہَادَۃُ فِیْ شَہَادَۃِ شَہَادَتِکَ یَا شَاہِدُ 
O Allah! O the Testifier (of the prophethood of Muhammed)! Verily You are unique in Your attribute of testifying and the witness, being Your witness, is above all witnesses. O the Testifier! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا قَرِیْبُ تَقَرَّبْتَ بِالْقُرْبِ وَالْقُرْبُ فِیْ قُرْبِ قُرْبِکَ یَا قَرِیْبُ 
O Allah! O the One Who is near! O the One Who is nearer than the jugular vein! You are near due to the virtue of being near and every nearness is because of your nearness. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا نَصِیْرُ تَنَصَّرْتَ بِالنُّصْرَۃِ وَالنُّصْرَۃُ فِیْ نُصْرَۃِ نُصْرَتِکَ یَا نَصِیْرُ 
O Allah! O the One Who is everhelping in every circumstance! You help by the virtue of being the Helper. All helps are due to Your help. O the Best Helper! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا سَتَّارُ تَسَتَّرْتَ بِالسَّتْرِ وَالسَّتْرُ فِیْ سَتْرِ سَتْرِکَ یَا سَتَّارُ 
O Allah! O the One Who is hidden behind the veil of Oneness! And O the One Who hides the errors of sinners in the veil of Your Mercy! You are the Hider by virtue of being the hider and all hidings (like the hiding of the Qaem-e-Aal-e-Muhammad Imam Mehdi a.t.f.s.) are the examples of your veiling. O the Veiler! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا قَہَّارُ تَقَہَّرْتَ بِالْقَہْرِ وَالْقَہْرُ فِیْ قَہْرِ قَہْرِکَ یَا قَہَّارُ 
O Allah! O the One Who frowns upon the unbelievers and the hypocrites! You are the suppressor by virtue of Your being the crusher. All pressures and suppressions are becoming only to You. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا رَازِقُ تَرَزَّقْتَ بِالرِّزْقِ وَالرِّزْقُ فِیْ رِزْقِ رِزْقِکَ یَا رَزَّاقُ 
O Allah! O the One Who gives sustenance to the entire creation! You are the Sustainer by virtue of Your being the nourisher and all the nourishings are the samples of Your nourishment. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا خَالِقُ تَخَلَّقْتَ بِالْخَلْقِ وَالْخَلْقُ فِیْ خَلْقِ خَلْقِکَ یَا خَلَّاقُ 
O the giver of provision! O the Creator! You, by virtue of being the creator came into being to be the real creator of all, and all the created things are (in the matter of procreation) subservient to Your command. O Creator! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا فَتَّاحُ تَفَتَّحْتَ بِالْفَتْحِ وَالْفَتْحُ فِیْ فَتْحِ فَتْحِکَ یَا فَتَّاحُ 
O Allah! O the One Who resolves all problems to grant success by easing all hardships! You alone are the real Opener of the doors to success. There is no doubt that all the successes achieved by the creation are the result of the intelligence granted by You. O the Opener! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا رَفِیْعُ تَرَفَّعْتَ بِالرِّفْعَۃِ وَالرِّفْعَۃُ فِیْ رِفْعَۃِ رِفْعَتِکَ یَا رَفِیْعُ 
O Allah! O the One Who is High by virtue of Your Height. 0 Allah! O the One Who is higher than all highs! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا حَفِیْظُ تَحَفَّظْتَ بِالْحِفْظِ وَالْحِفْظُ فِیْ حِفْظِ حِفْظِکَ یَا حَفِیْظُ 
O Allah! O the Unique Protector! You alone are protected through Your own Protection and all protections are under Your protection. O Protector! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا فَاضِلُ تَفَضَّلْتَ بِالْفَضْلِ وَالْفَضْلُ فِیْ فَضْلِ فَضْلِکَ یَا فَاضِلُ 
O Allah! O the owner of self-perfection! Verily You are perfect by Yourself and the perfections and excellences of the creations are through Your excellence and perfection. O the Perfect and the excellent! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا وَاصِلُ تَوَصَّلْتَ بِالْوَصْلِ وَالْوَصْلُ فِیْ وَصْلِ وَصْلِکَ یَا وَاصِلُ 
O Allah! O the keeper and maintainer of the relation of love and affection! You Yourself have taught love and all these intimacies are the result of Your teaching. They are also for meeting You. O the Best gatherer! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا فَاعِلُ تَفَعَّلْتَ بِالْفِعْلِ وَالْفِعْلُ فِیْ فِعْلِ فِعْلِکَ یَا فَاعِلُ 
O the One Who does at will! Whatever You have done has been done by Your absolute will, and real authority and will is only Your authority and will and all authorities are the gifts of Your authority. O the One Who does whatever You want! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا فَارِضُ تَفَرَّضْتَ بِالْفَرْضِ وَالْفَرْضُ فِیْ فَرْضِ فَرْضِکَ یَا فَارِضُ 
O Allah! O the One Who has created this universe with measure and the real measure is only Your measure. All measures and plannings are grace of Your planning. O the Measurer! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا غَفَّارُ تَغَفَّرْتَ بِالْمَغْفِرَۃِ وَالْمَغْفِرَۃُ فِیْ مَغْفِرَۃِ مَغْفِرَتِکَ یَا غَفَّارُ 
O Allah! O the Forgiver of all big and small sins! It is only You Who forgives due to Your attribute of pardoninmg. As for the pardonings and forgivenesses of the creation, they are mere reflections of Your forgiveness. O Pardoner! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا جَبَّارُ تَجَبَّرْتَ بِالْجَبَرُوْتِ وَالْجَبَرُوْتُ فِیْ جَبَرُوْتِ جَبَرُوْتِکَ یَا جَبَّارُ 
O Allah! O the One Who joins the broken hearts and the dilapidated bones! In fact, such power is possessed only by You, and the joining and gatgering by the creations is but due to Your attribute of imposing Your Will. O Omnipotent! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا سَمِیْعُ تَسَمَّعْتَ بِالسَّمْعِ وَالسَّمْعُ فِیْ سَمْعِ سَمْعِکَ یَا سَمِیْعُ 
O Allah! O the One Who hears the voice of the weak and the ill (steps of an ant)! You hear by virtue of Your All-Hearingness. The hearing and answering of the creation is merely due to Your hearing and responding. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا کَبِیْرُ تَکَبَّرْتَ بِالْکِبْرِیَآءِ وَالْکِبْرِیَآءُ فِیْ کِبْرِیَآءِ کِبْرِیَآءِکَ یَا کَبِیْرُ 
O Allah! O the biggest Merciful and Beneficent! Only You are the owner of true greatness and all these greatnesses are existing and continuing only because of Your greatness. O the Greatest of all greats! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَاکَرِیْمُ تَکَرَّمْتَ بِالْکَرَمِ وَالْکَرَمُ فِیْ کَرَمِ کَرَمِکَ یَا کَرِیْمُ 
O Allah! O the One Who causes the rivers of kindness flow! (really generosity is only Your generosity) and all these generosities of the people are only the leftovers of only Your table ofgenerosity. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا رَحِیْمُ تَرَحَّمْتَ بِالرَّحْمَۃِ وَالرَّحْمُ فِیْ رَحْمِ رَحْمِکَ یَا رَحِیْمُ 
O Allah! O the One Who pities every one of Your sinful slaves! Verily You are kind and merciful only on the basis of Your attribute of pity and sympathy. All kindnesses are because of Your kindness and pitifulness. O Centre of Mercy! 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا مَجِیْدُ تَمَجَّدْتَّ بِالْمَجْدِ وَالْمَجْدُفِیْ مَجْدِ مَجْدِکَ یَا مَجِیْدُ 
O Allah! O the Owner of great Highness! (Reality is that) it is only Your height where even the bird of imagination cannot reach and the heights of these low ranking slaves are merely Your gifts. 
اَللّٰہُمَّ یَا مُجِیْبُ یَا اَللہُ یَا رَحْمٰنُ یَا رَحِیْمُ یَا حَیُّ یَا حَلِیْمُ یَا عَزِیْزُ یَا نُوْرَ النُّوْرِ یَا لآ اِلٰہَ اِلَّا ہُوَ عَلَیْہِ تَوَکَّلْتُ وَہُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِیْمِ 
O the Hearer of the cry of the inflicted! O Lord! O Merciful! O Beneficent! O Everliving! O the One Who is leninent in punishing! O Dominent over all O the One Who makes hearts radiant! O the One besides Whom there is no deity! I have alsorelied only on You, that is, on the Lord of the Great Throne. 
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ الْوَہَّابِ سُبْحَانَ الْمَجِیْدِ سُبْحَانَ الصَّبْرِ سُبْحَانَ الْبَصِیْرِ 
All praise is for the limitlessly forgiving God. We hallow only HIS Name Who is extremely Great. We hallow only Him Who shows patience and mercy in giving punishment. We halow Him Who sees each and every deed done by us. 
سُبْحَانَ الْمَانِعِ سُبْحَانَ الْقَیُّوْمِ سُبْحَانَ الْبَرِّ سُبْحَانَ الْمُعَافِیْ 
We hallow Him Who has no partner and Who will save us from hell. We hallow Him Who protects the whole world. We hallow Him Who is Kind. We hallow Him Who will forgive us.
سُبْحَانَ الْاَوَّلِ سُبْحَانَ الْمُعِزِّ سُبْحَانَ الظَاہِرِ سُبْحَانَ الشَّافِیْ 
We hallow Him Who is older than oldness (ancientness). We hallow Him Who is the owner of honour and power. We hallow Him Whose existence is manifest to all We hallow Him Who cures the ill (gives health). 
سُبْحَانَ الْکَافِیْ سُبْحَانَ السَّلَامِ سُبْحَانَ الْمُؤْمِنِ سُبْحَانَ الْمُہَیْمِنِ 
We hallow Him Who is sufficient for us all. We hallow Him Who provides safety to us. We hallow Him Who makes us Faithful. We hallow Him Who shelters us. 
سُبْحَانَ الْمُصَوِّرِ سُبْحَانَ النَّاصِرِ سُبْحَانَ الْوَاحِدِ سُبْحَانَ الْاَحَدِ 
We hallow Him Who the best designer of faces. We hallow Him Who helps us. We hallow Him Who is absolutely unique. 
سُبْحَانَ الْفَرْدِ سُبْحَانَ الرَّحِیْمِ سُبْحَانَ الْمُؤَخِّرِ سُبْحَانَ الْمُقَدِّمِ 
We hallow Him Who is like only Him (no one is like Him). We hallow Him Who showers mercy. We hallow Him Who holds us back from evils. We hallow Him Who leads us toward good. 
سُبْحَانَ الضَّآرِّ سُبْحَانَ النُّوْرِ سُبْحَانَ الْہَادِیْ سُبْحَانَ الْمُقَدِّرِ 
We hallow Him Who causes harm. We hallow Him Who grants light. We hallow Him Who is absolute Guidance. We hallow Him Who is the Master of destiny. 
سُبْحَانَ الْجَلِیْلِ سُبْحَانَ الْمَجِیْدِ سُبْحَانَ الرَّقِیْبِ 
We hallow Him Who is the Greatest. We hallow Him Who is High. We hallow Him Who watches the whole world. 
سُبْحَانَ اللہِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ وَ لآ اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اللہُ وَاللہُ اَکْبَرُ 
We hallow Him Who is Holy. His is the holy existence. All praise is for Allah. None besides Him is worthy of worship. So only Allah is the greatest of all. 
وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّۃَ اِلَّا بِاللہِ الْعَلِیِّ الْعَظِیْمِ 
What is reality is that no one except the only One Allah has any power. Only He is High and Great. 
سُبْحَانَ مَنْ یَّشَآءُ بِقُدْرَتِہٖ وَ یَعْلَمُ مَا یُرِیْدُ بِعِزَّتِہٖ سُبْحَانَ اللہِ وَ بِحَمْدِہٖ 
We hallow Him Who carries out His acts with His perfect power and Who imposes His command, with His particular strength. 
سُبْحَانَ ذِی الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِیْمِ وَالْہَیْبَۃِ وَالْقُدْرَۃِ وَالْکِبْرِیَآءِ وَالْجَبَرُوْتِ 
We hallow him and praise Him Who is the master and owner of the high Throne. Awe, Power, Greatness and Pomp becomes only Him.
سُبْحَانَ الْمَلِکِ الْمَقْصُوْدِ سُبْحَانَ الْمَلِکِ الْمَوْجُوْدِ سُبْحَانَ الْحَیِّ الْحَکِیْمِ 
We hallow only Him Who is really the absolute Ruler Sovereign. We hallow only Him Who is the Lord of every thing existing. We hallow only Him Who is Ever-living and the Wise. 
سُبْحَانَ اللہِ تَوَکَّلْتُ عَلَی الْحَیِّ الَّذِیْ لَا یَمُوْتُ سُبُّوْحٌ قُدُّوْسٌ رَبُّ الْمَلآئِکَۃِ وَالرُّوْحِ 
We hallow the only one Lord and rely on Him Who has no death at all. Only He deserves all praise and hallowing and He is Holy. He is the nourisher of all angels and the Trustworthy Gabriel (Jibraeel). 
لآ اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اللہُ وَحْدَہٗ لَا شَرِیْکَ لَہٗ لَہُ الْمُلْکُ وَلَہُ الْحَمْدُ وَہُوَ عَلٰی کُلِّ شَیْءٍ قَدِیْرٌ 
There will never be any deity except Him. He is totally unique and only one. HE has no partnher. Entire kingdom is for Him alone. All praise is proven for Him. He dominates everything. 
یَا اَللہُ یَا رَحْمٰنُ یَا رَحِیْمُ یَا حَیّ یَا قَیُّوْمُ یَا ذَالْجَلَالِ وَالْاِکْرَامِ 
O Allah! O Beneficent! O Merciful! O Everliving! O Everlasting! O the possessor of grace and mercy!
یَا نُوْرَ السَّمَوَاتِ وَالْاَرْضِ یَا لَا اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اَنْتَ عَلَیْکَ تَوَکَّلْتُ 
O Light of the heavens and the earth Who makes them bright! O the Being Who alone is the Merciful Lord! We have trusted only You.
وَ اَنْتَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِیْمِ اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْلِیْ بِحُرْمَۃِ ہٰذِہِ الْاَسْمَآءِ 
You alone are the nourisher of the Great Throne. O Allah! We seek intercession of Your Honour and Greatness. Forgive us just in the name of these holy names of Yours. 
وَاصْرِفْ عَنِّی الضَّرَّآءَ وَالْبَلآءَ وَالْہُمُوْمَ وَالْغُمُوْمَ وَ جَمِیْعَ الْاٰفَاتِ 
Keep all troubles and all calamities and anxieties and sorrows and all hardships away from us. O My Nourisher!
وَ مِنْ اَوْلَادِیْ وَ اٰبَآئِیْ وَ اُمَّہَاتِیْ وَ اَقْرِبَآئِیْ وَ عَشِیْرَتِیْ 
Protect my family members (for the sake of Muhammad and his progeny) from all evils 
فَاِنَّ عَلَیْکَ فِیْ جَمِیْعِ الْاُمُوْرِ اعْتِمَادِیْ 
because, in all of my affairs I have relied only on You. 
وَالصَّلوٰۃُ وَ السَّلَامُ عَلٰی خَیْرِ خَلْقِہٖ مُحَمَدٍ وَ اٰلِہٖ اَجْمَعِیْنَ بِرَحْمَتِکَ یَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِیْنَ.
O Allah! Shower safety and bounty on Your best creation, that is, Muhammed and his progeny, and on their pious offsprings, for the sake of Your perfect Mercy, O Allah! O Merciful! O Beneficent!

F2.Title: Namaz e Shab
F2.Data:
First Recite 8 rak’ats prayer (in units of 2 rak’ats each) with the intention of reciting the Naafelah of Namaaz-e-Shab. In the first rak’at, after surah Hamd recite surah Tawheed once and in the second rak’at after surah Hamd, recite surah Kaaferoon once.
In the remaining six rak’ats recite any short surah after surah Hamd. After completing 8 rak'ats of Naafelah recite Tasbih of Faatemah Zahra (s.a.). Thereafter recite 2 rak’ats ‘Namaaz-e-Shaf’. In the first rakat after surah Hamd recite surah Tawheed once. In the second rak’at after surah Hamd recite surah Falaq once.
After ‘Namaaz-e-Shaf’ recite the following dua:
اِلٰہِی تَعَرَّضَ لَکَ فِیْ ھٰذَا اللَّیْلِ الْمُتَعَرِّضُوْنَ 
ELAAHEE TA-A’RRAZA LAKA FEE HAAZAL LAYLIL MOTA-A’RREZOON 
O Allah! Tonight, the seekers of favors, restless and eager, present themselves to You,
وَ قَصَدَکَ الْقَاصِدُوْنَ 
WA QASADAKA FEEHIL QAASEDOON 
the determined aspirers have You in mind,
وَ اَمَّلَ فَضْلَکَ وَ مَعْرُوْفَکَ الطَّالِبُوْنَ 
WA AMMALA FAZLAKA WA MA’ROOFAQAT TAALEBOON 
and those who make requests look long and attentively at Your obligingness and kindness.
وَ لَکَ فِیْ ھٰذَا اللَّیْلِ نَفَحَاتٌ وَ جَوَآئِزُ
WA LAKA FEE HAAZAL LAYLE NAFAHAATUN 
You, at this night, give gifts, bounties beyond measure,
وَ عَطَایَا وَ مَوَاھِبُ 
WA JAWAAA-EZO WA A’TAAYAA WA MAWAAHEBO 
free donations, and favors
تَمُنُّ بِھَا عَلٰی مَنْ تَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِکَ 
TAMUNNO BEHAA A’LAA MAN TASHAAA-O MIN E’BAADEKA 
to those whom You will from among Your servants when they make a request,
وَ تَمْنَعُھَا مَنْ لَّمْ تَسْبِقُ لَہُ الْعِنَایَۃُ مِنْکَ 
WA TAMNA-O’HAA MAN LAM TASBEQO LAHUL E’NAAYATO MINKA 
and You say no to those who do not try to get in advance (i.e. remain behind) for obtaining the bounties from You.
وَ ھَا اَنَاذَا عُبَیْدُکَ الْفَقِیْرُ اِلَیْکَ 
WA HAA ANAA ZAA O’BAIDOKAL FAQEERO ELAYKAL 
I, a modest needy bondman,
الْمُؤَمِّلُ فَضْلَکَ وَ مَعْرُوْفَکَ 
MO-AMMELO FAZLAKA WA MA’ROOFAKA 
am hopeful of Your obligingness and kindness.
فَاِنْ کُنْتَ یَا مَوْلَایَ 
FA-IN KUNTA YAA MAWLAAYA 
Indeed, if You, O My Master, 
تَفَضَّلْتَ فِیْ ھٰذِہٖ اللَّیْلَۃِ 
TAFAZZALTA FEE HAAZEHIL LAYLATE 
bestows a favor on any one, at this night, 
عَلٰیٓ اَحَدٍ مِّنْ خَلْقِکَ 
A’LAA AHADIM MIN KHALQEKA 
from among Your created beings,
وَعُدْتَ عَلَیْہِ بِعَآئِدَۃٍ مِّنْ عَطْفِکَ 
WA U’DTA A’LAYHE BE-A’AEDATIM MIN A’TFEKA 
and multiply profits and gains for him out of Your love and affection,
فَصَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ اٰلِ مُحَمّدٍ 
FA-SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADENIT 
please send blessings to Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad:
الطَّیِّبِیْنَ الطَّاھِرِیْنَ 
TAYYEBEENAT TAAHEREENAL 
the pure, the immaculate, 
الْخَّیِّرِیْنَ الْفَاضِلِیْنَ 
KHAYYEREE-NAL FAAZELEENA 
the virtuous, and the righteous,
وَجُدْ عَلَیَّ بِطَولِکَ وَ مَعْرُوْفِکَ 
WA JUD A’LAYYA BE-TAWLEYA WA MA’ROOFEKA 
and then give me abundantly on account of Your liberality and obligingness,
یَا رَبَّ الْعَالَمِیْنَ 
YAA RABBAL A’ALAMEENA 
O Lord of the worlds!
وَ صَلَّی اللّٰہُ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ خَاتَمِ النَّبِیِّیْنَ 
WA SALLAL LAAHO A’LAA MOHAMMADIN KHAATAMIN NABIYYEENA 
May Allah send blessings to Muhammad, the seal of the Prophets,
وَ اٰلِہِ الطَّاھِرِیْنَ 
WA AALEHIT TAAHEREENA 
and upon his Household, the immaculate,
وَ سَلَّمَ تَسْلِیْمًا 
WA SALLAMA TASLEEMAA 
and may He exalt them very much.
اِنَّ اللّٰہَ حَمِیْدٌ مَجِیْدٌ 
INNAL LAAH HAMEEDUM MAJEED 
Verily, Allah is worthy of all praise, full of all glory.
اَللَّھُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَدْعُوْکَ کَمَآ اَمَرْتَ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AD-O’OKA KAMAA AMARTA 
O Allah, I am praying You as You ordered me to do;
فَاسْتَجِبْ لِیْ کَمَا وَعَدْتَ 
FAS-TAJBI LEE KAMAA WA-A’DTA 
so, (please) respond to me as You promised.
اِنَّکَ لَا تُخْلِفُ الْمِیْعَادَ.
INNAKA LAA TUKHLEFUL MEE-A’AD.
Verily, You never break Your promise.
After this recite one rak’at Namaaz-e-watr, in which, after surah Hamd, recite surah Tawheed, surah Falaq and surah Naas once each. Then raise your hands and recite the following Dua in Qunoot:
لَا اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اللّٰہُ الْحَلِیْمُ الْکَرِیْمُ 
LAA ELAAHA ILAL LAAHUL HALEEMUL KAREEM
There is none worth worshipping but Allah Who is Forbearing and Generous
لَا اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اللّٰہُ الْعَلِیُّ الْعَظِیْمُ 
LAA ELAAHA ILAL LAAHUL A’LIYYUL A’ZEEM
There is none worth worshipping but Allah Who is Most High and Great
سُبْحَانَ اللّٰہِ رَبِّ السَّمٰوٰتِ السَّبْعِ 
SUBHAANAL LAAHE RABBIS SAMAAWAATIS SAB-E’ 
Glory be to Allah, Who is the Sustainer of the seven heavens 
وَ رَبِّ الْاَرَضِیْنَ السَّبْعِ 
WA RABBUL ARZEENAS SAB-E’ 
and of the seven earth
وَ مَا فِیْھِنَّ وَ مَا بَیْنَھُنَّ 
WA MAA FEEHINNA WA MAA BAYNAHUNNA 
in them, and between them,
وَ مَا فَوْقَھُنَّ وَ مَا تَحْتَحُنَّ 
WA MAA FAWQAHUNNA WA MAA TAHTAHUNNA 
above them, beneath them
وَ ھُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِیْمِ 
WA HOWA RABBUL A’RSHIL A’ZEEM 
And Who is the Lord of the great ‘Arsh (Divine Center of Authority & Power)
وَ سَلَامٌ عَلٰی الْمُرْسَلِیْنَ 
WA SALAAMUN A’LAL MURSALEEN 
And peace be on the apostles. 
وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِیْنَ 
WAL HAMDO LILLAAHE RABBIL A’ALAMEEN 
And all praise for Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
یَا اللّٰہُ الَّذِیْ لَیْسَ کَمِثْلِہٖ شَیْءٌ 
YAA ALLAAHUL LAZEE LAYSA KAMISLEHI SHAYUN 
O Allah! The One nothing is like Him
وَ ھُوَ السَّمِیْعُ الْبَصِیْرُ 
WA HOWAS SAMEE-U’L BASEER 
and He is the Hearing, the Seeing.
وَ صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ.
WA SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMAD.
And blessings be upon Muhammad and the progeny of Muhammad.
Recite the following 70 or 100 times:
اَسْتَغْفِرُ اللّٰہَ رَبِّیْ وَ اَتُوْبُ اِلَیْہِ.
Recite the following 7 times:
اَسْتَغْفِرُ اللّٰہَ الَّذِیْ لَا اِلٰہَ اِلَّا ھُوَ الْحَیُّ القَیُّوْمُ بِجَمِیْعِ ظُلْمِیْ وَ جُرْمِیْ وَ اِسْرَافِیْ عَلٰی نَفْسِیْ وَ اَتُوْبُ اِلَیْہِ.
Recite 7 times:
ھٰذَا مَقَامُ الْعَائِذِ بِکَ مِنَ النَّارِ.
Recite the following 300 times:
اَلْعَفْوَ
Then say:
رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِيْ وَ ارْحَمْنِيْ وَ تُبْ عَلَيَّ
RABBIGH FIR LEE WAR HAMNEE WA TUB A’LAYYA
O my Lord, (please) forgive me, have mercy upon me, and accept my repentance,
اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الْغَفُوْرُ الرَّحِيْمُ
INNAKA ANTAT TAWWABUL GHAFOORUR RAHEEMO
for You are surely the Oft-Returning, the All-forgiving, and the All-merciful.
Mention names of 40 living or deceased believers one by one and say:
اَللّٰھُمَّ اغفِرْ لِھٰذَا ...........Name
This dua is to be recited after Namaz-e-Shab:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ.
اُنَاجِیْکَ یَا مَوْجُوْدًا فِیْ کُلِّ مَکَانٍ 
ONAAJEEKA YAA MAWJOODAN FEE KULLE MAKAANIN 
O One who is present everywhere. 
لَعَلَّکَ تَسْمَعُ نِدَآئِیْ 
LA-A’LLAKA TASMA-O NEDAAA-EE 
I beseech You (and) hoping that You will listen to my voice, 
فَقَدْ عَظُمَ جُرْمِیْ وَ قَلَّ حَیَآئِیْ 
FAQAD A’ZOMA JURMEE WA QALLA HAYAA-EE 
because surely, my sin is big and my feeling of guilt has lessened.
مَوْلَایَ یَا مَوْلَایَ اَیَّ الْاَھْوَالِ اَتَذَکَّرُ وَ اَیَّھَا اَنْسٰی 
MAWLAAYA YAA MAWLAAYA AYYAL AHWAALE ATAZAKKARO WA AYYAHA ANSAA 
My Lord, My Lord! How many fear do I recount, how many fear do I forget. 
وَ لَوْ لَمْ یَکُنْ اِلاَّ الْمَوْتُ لَکَفٰی 
WA LAW LAM YAKUN ILLAL MAWTO LAKAFAA 
It there was no fear except fear of death, that fear was enough. 
کَیْفَ وَمَا بَعْدَ الْمَوْتِ اَعْظَمُ وَ اَدْھٰی 
KAYFA WA MAA BA’DAL MAWTE A-A’ZAMO WA ADHAA 
The fear of after death is very big and very severe.
مَولاَیَ یَا مَوْلاَیَ حَتّٰی مَتٰی وَ اِلٰي مَتٰي 
MAWLAAYA YAA MAWLAAYA HATTAA MATAA WA ELAA MATAA 
My Master and My Lord! How many times should I say that I want You should be pleased with me. 
اَقُوْلُ لَکَ الْعُتْبٰی مَرَّۃً بَعْدَ اُخْرٰی 
AQOOLO LAKAL UTBAA MARRATAN BA’DA UKHRAA 
I say this again and again. 
ثُمَّ لاَ تَجِدُ عِنْدِیْ صِدْقًا وَ لاَ وَفَآءً 
SUMMA LAA TAJEDO I’NDEE SIDQAN WA LAA WAFAAA-AN 
Even then, You do not get truth and acceptance of faithfulness from me! 
فَیَاغَوْثَاہُ ثُمَّ وَاغَوْثَاہُ بِکَ 
FA-YAA GHAWSAA-HO SUMMA WAA GHAWSAA-HO BEKA 
So give me protection. There is no protection save from You. 
یَا اَللّٰہُ مِنْ ھَوًی قَدْ غَلَبَنِیْ 
YAA ALLAAHO MIN HAWAN QAD GHALABANEE 
O Allah, safeguard me from the desires of the soul which have overpowered me, 
وَ مِنْ عَدُوٍّ قَدِ اسْتَکْلَبَ عَلَیَّ 
WA MIN A’DUWWIN QADIS TAKLABA A’LAYYA 
safeguard me from the enemy who is ready to attack me, 
وَ مِنْ دُنْیَا قَدْ تَزَیَّنَتْ لِیْ 
WA MIN DUNYAA QAD TAZAYYANAT LEE 
protect me from the evils of the world 
وَ مِنْ نَفْسٍ اَمَّارَۃٍ بِالسُّوٓءِ اِلاَّ مَا رَحِمَ رَبِّیْ 
WA MIN NAFSIN AMMAARATIN BIS-SOOO-E ILLAA MAA RAHEMA RABBEE 
and the evil of the soul which has disobeyed me. Except that You have mercy on me.
مَوْلاَیَ یَا مَوْلاَیَ اِنْ کُنْتَ رَحِمْتَ مِثْلِی فَارْحَمْنِیْ 
MAWLAAYA YAA MAWLAAYA IN KUNTA RAHIMTA MISLEE FARHAMNEE 
My Lord, My Lord! if You have shown Mercy on someone like me, then have mercy on me. 
وَ اِنْ کُنْتَ قَبِلْتَ مِثْلِیْ فَاقْبَلْنِیْ 
WA IN KUNTA QABILTA MISLEE FAQBALNEE 
If you have accepted repentance of someone like me, then forgive me. 
یَا قَبِلَ السَّحَرَۃِ اِقْبَلْنِیْ 
YAA KAABELAS-SAHARATE IQBALNEE 
O Acceptor of morning Dua. Accept my Dua.
یَا مَنْ لَمْ اَزَلْ اَتَعَرَّفُ مِنْہُ الْحُسْنٰی 
YAA MAN LAM AZAL ATA-A’RRAFO MINHUL HUSNAA 
O whom I always consider goodness. 
یَا مَنْ یُغَذِّیْنِیْ بِالنِّعَمِ صَبَاحًا وَ مَسَآءً 
YAA MAN YOGAZZEENEE BIN NEA’ME SABAAHAN WA MASAAHAN 
O who provides me sustenance morning and evening. 
اِرْحَمْنِیْ یَوْمَ اٰتِیْکَ فَرْدًا شَاخِصًا اِلَیْکَ بَصَرِیْ 
IRHAMNEE YAWMAA AATEEKA FARDAN SHAAKHESAN ELAYKA BASAREE 
Have mercy on me on the day when I come to You alone, 
مُقَلَّدًا عَمَلِیْ قَدْ تَبَرَّءَ جَمِیْعُ الْخَلْقِ مِنِّیْ 
MOQALLADAN A’MALEE QAD TABARRA-A JAMEE-U’L KHALQE MINNEE 
my deeds hanging around my neck, at a time when everyone will be disgusted with me, 
نَعَمْ وَ اَبِیْ وَ اُمِّیْ وَ مَنْ کَانَ لَہٗ کَدِّیْ وَ سَعْیِیْ 
NA-A’M WA ABEE WA UMMEE WA MAN KAANA LAHU QADDEE WA SA’YEE 
so much so that even my father and mother for whom I had tried and worked (they also will be disgusted with me)
فَاِنْ لَمْ تَرْحَمْنِیْ فَمَنْ یَرْحَمُنِیْ 
FA-IN LAM TARHAMNEE FA-MAN YARHAMONEE 
So (that day) if You will not show mercy on me, who will show mercy on me? 
وَ مَنْ یُوْنِسُ فِیْ الْقَبْرِ وَحْشَتِیْ 
WA MAN YOONESO FIL QABRE WAHSHATEE 
Who will be my well-wisher in the loneliness of the grave? 
وَ مَنْ یُنْطِقُ لِسَانِیْ اِذَا خَلَوْتُ بِعَمَلِیْ وَ سَاءَلْتَنِیْ 
WA MAN YUNTEQO LESAANEE EZAA KHALAWTO BE-A’MALEE WA SAA-ALTANEE 
Who will activate my tongue (give me strength of speak), when I will be coming with my deeds and You will ask me about my life 
عَمَّا اَنْتَ اَعْلَمُ بِہٖ مِنِّیْ 
A’MMAA ANTA A-A’LAMO BEHI MINNEE
with which You are more familiar.
فَاِنْ قُلْتُ نَعَمْ فَاَیْنَ الْمَحْرَبُ مِنْ عَدْلِکَ 
FA-IN QULTO NA-A’M FA-AYNAL MAHRABO MIN A’DLEKA 
So, if I accept my deeds, where is the place to run away from Your Justice. 
وَ اِنْ قُلْتُ لَمْ اَفْعَلْ قُلْتَ اَلَمْ اَکُنِ الشَّاھِدَ عَلَیْکَ 
WA IN QULTO LAM AF-A’L QULTA ALAM AKANISH SHAAHEDA A’LAYKA 
If I deny me deeds, You will say ‘Was I not watching your deeds?’
فَعَفْوُکَ عَفْوُکَ یَا مَوْلاَیَ قَبْلَ سَرَابِیْلِ الْقَطِرَانِ 
FA-A’FWOKA A’FWOK YAA MAWLAAYA QABLA SARAABEELIL QATERAANE 
So, forgive me, O my Lord, my Master. Forgive me before I wear the dress of Hell. 
عَفْوُکَ عَفْوُکَ یَا مَوْلاَیَ قَبْلَ جَھَنَّمَ وَ النِّیْرَانِ 
A’FWOKA A’FWOK YAA MAWLAAYA QABLA JAHANNAMA WAN NEERAANE 
O my Lord, forgive me before the Hell and Fire,
عَفْوُکَ عَفْوُکَ یَا مَوْلاَیَ قَبْلَ اَنْ تُغَلَّ الْاَیْدِیْ اِلٰی الْاَعْنَاقِ 
A’FWOKA A’FWOK YAA MAWLAAYA QABLA AN TOGHALLAL AYDEE ELAL A-A’NAAKE 
O my Lord, forgive me before my hands are tied towards my neck, 
یَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِیْنَ وَ خَیْرَ الْغَافِرِیْنَ.
YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEEN WA KHAYRAL GHAAFEREEN.
O the most Merciful and the most Benevolent.

F5.Title: Namaz e Ghufaylah
F5.Data:
(i)	Imam Ja’far bin Mohammed al-Sadiq (a.s.) said:
	“Whoever prays salaat of ghofaylah and beseeches Allah for fulfillment of his legitimate desires, receives positive response from Him.”
(ii)	Whosoever prays salaat of ghofaylah secures a home in the land of peace and honor, the paradise.
(iii)	Salaat of ghofaylah is a two rak-at salaat. It is prayed between Maghrib and Isha. In fact it is prayed in place of the 4 rak-at naafelah of Maghrib salaat.
	Recite verses 87 and 88 of surah Anbiya after surah Faatehah in the first rak-at:
وَ ذَا النُّوْنِ إِذْ ذَّهَبَ مُغَاضِبًا فَظَنَّ أَن لَّنْ نَّقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ فَنَادٰى فِيْ الظُّلُمَاتِ أَنْ لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّيْ كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِيْنَ. فَاسْتَجَبْنَا لَهٗ وَ نَجَّيْنَاهُ مِنَ الْغَمِّ وَ كَذٰلِكَ نُنْجِي الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ.
WA ZANNOONE IZ Z’AHABA MOGHAAZEBAN FA ZANNA AN LAN NAQDERA A’LAYHE FANAADAA FIZ ZOLOMAATE AN LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTA SUBHAANAKA INNEE KUNTO MENAZ-ZAALEMEENA. FASTAJABNAA LAHU WA NAJJAYNAAHO MENAL GHAMME WA KAZAALEKA NUNJIL MOA-MENEENA.
(Remember) Yunus, when he went away in anger and imagined that We would never straiten him: then he cried out from the darkness: “There is no god but You. Glory bet to You. Verily I was of the unjust.” Then We responded to him and delivered him from grief, thus do We deliver the believers.
In the second rak-at recite verse 59 of surah An-a’am after surah Faatehah.
وَ عِنْدَهُ مَفَاتِحُ الْغَيْبِ لاَ يَعْلَمُهَا إِلاَّ هُوَ وَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي الْبَرِّ وَ الْبَحْرِ وَ مَا تَسْقُطُ مِنْ وَرَقَةٍ إِلاَّ يَعْلَمُهَا وَ لاَ حَبَّةٍ فِيْ ظُلُمَاتِ اْلأَرْضِ وَ لاَ رَطْبٍ وَ لاَ يَابِسٍ إِلاَّ فِيْ كِتَابٍ مُّبِيْنٍ.
WA I’NDAHU MAFAATEHUL GHAYBE LAA YA’LAMOHAA ILLAA HOWA WA YA’LAMO MAA FIL BARRE WAL BAHRE WA MAA TASQOTO MINW WARAQATIN ILLAA YA’LAMOHAA WA LAA HABBATIN FI ZOLOMAATIL ARZE WA LAA RATBIWN WA LAA YAABESIN ILLAA FI KETAABIM MOBEEN.
And with Him are the keys of the unseen. None but He knows them; and He (alone) knows what is in the land and the sea. Not a leaf falls but He knows it, and there is not a grain in the darkest (recess) of the earth, nor anything wet or dry but is in a clear book.
Then recite the following Qunoot:
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّىْ اَسْأَلُكَ بِمَفاتِحِ الْغَيْبِ الَّتِىْ لاَ يَعْلَمُهَا اِلاَّ اَنْتَ اَنْ تُصَلِىَّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اَنْ تَفْعَلَ بِىْ...
ALLAAHUMMA INNEE AS-ALOKA BEMAFAATEHIL GHAYBIL LATEE LAA YA’LAMOHAA ILLAA ANTA AN TOSALLE A’LAA MOHAMMDINW WA AALE MOHAMMAD. WA AN TAFA’LA BEE... (mention your legitimate desires)
O Allah, verily I beseech You in the name of the keys of the unseen about which no one knows anything save You. Send blessings on Mohammed and on his children and fulfill my desires. (mention your needs)
 Then say: 
اَللّٰهُمَّ اَنْتَ وَلِىُّ نِعْمَتِىْ وَ الْقَادِرُ عَلٰى طَلِبَتِىْ تَعْلَمُ حَاجَتِىْ فَأَسْاَلُكَ بِحَقِّ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِهٖ عَلَيْهِ وَ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّلاَمُ لَمَّا قَضَيْتَهَا لِىْ.
ALLAAHUMMA ANTA WALIYYO NE’MATEE WAL QAADERO A’LAA TALEBATEE TA’LAMO HAAJATEE FA-ASALOKA BEHAQQE MOHAMMDINW WA AALEHI A’LAYHE WA A’LAYHEMUS SALAAMO LAMMAA QAZAYTAHAA LEE. (mention your legitimate desires). 
O Allah, You are the sole master of every bounty given to me and You have total control over that which I ask for and You are fully aware of my desire, therefore I beseech You for the sake and in the name of Mohammed and his children, peace be on them all, when You have fulfilled it for me. (mention your legitimate desires)
