J1.Title: Merits & Rituals of Friday Night & Day

J3.Title: Ziyarah of Imam al Mahdi (a.t.f.s.) on Friday
J3.Data:
As per the traditions of the infallible Imams (a.s.), the day of Friday is reserved for the Imam of the Time, Imame’ Zamana (a.s.). Since Friday is largely considered as the day of zohoor (reappearance) of the Imam, this ziyarat assumes that much more importance. While it is essential for the Shiah to convey salaam to Imam every day, this ziyarat is special because it is recited on the day reserved for the Imam (a.s.). In this ziyarat, the believer salutes the Imam (a.s.) through his forefathers and affectionately calls out to the Imam (a.s.) saying that since this is Friday; the day on which your zohoor is ordained, come soon and extract revenge from the enemies of Allah and your enemies and please the hearts of the believers through that. Then the believer pleads to Imam (a.s.) saying, O my master, on this day, I am your guest. You are an marvellous host, you are generous and the son of generous (Imams). So be an excellent host to me!
One of the benefits of reciting these loving sentences is that Inshallah, when the Imam (a.s.) arrives, he will remember our dua and invite us to be his guest. It is the habit of worldly parents that they remember the requests of their children. Imam (a.s.) loves us more than our parents and therefore he will remember our request well. Hence one should not forsake the recitation of this special ziyarat on Friday.
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا حُجَّةَ اللهِ فِیْ اَرْضِهٖ 
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA HUJJATAL LAAHE FEE ARZEHI 
Peace be upon you, O argument of Allah in His lands!
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا عَيْنَ اللهِ فِیْ خَلْقِهٖ 
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA AYNAL LAAHE FEE KHALQEHI 
Peace be upon you, O sight of Allah on His creatures!
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا نُوْرَ اللهِ 
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA NOORAL LAAHIL 
Peace be upon you, O light of Allah
الَّذِیْ يَهْتَدِیْ بِهِ الْمُهْتَدُوْنَ 
LAZEE YAHTADEE BEHIL MOHTADOONA 
by which those who have been guided [to the true guidance] are guided
وَ يُفَرَّجُ بِهٖ عَنِ الْمُوْمِنِيْنَ 
WA YOFARRAJO BEHI A’NIL MOMENEENA 
and by which the believers are relieved!
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا الْمُهَذَّبُ الْخَآئِفُ 
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHAL MOHAZZABUL KHAAA-EFO 
Peace be upon you, O polite and fearful! 
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا الْوَلِیُّ النَّاصِحُ 
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHAL WALIYYUN NAASEHO 
Peace be upon you, O sincere patron! 
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا سَفِيْنَةَ النَّجَاةِ 
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA SAFEENATAN NAJAATE 
Peace be upon you, O ark of salvation!
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا عَيْنَ الْحَيَاةِ 
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA A’YNAL HAYAATE 
Peace be upon you, O essence of life! 
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ صَلَّی اللهُ عَلَيْكَ 
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYKA 
Peace be upon you. May Allah send blessings to you 
وَ عَلٰی آلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّيَّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ 
WA A’LAA AALE BAYTEKAT TAYYABEENAT TAAHEREENA 
and upon your Household, the pure and immaculate.
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ عَجَّلَ اللهُ لَكَ مَا وَعَدَكَ 
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA A’JJALAL LAAHO LAKA MAA WA-A’DAKA 
Peace be upon you. May Allah hasten that which He has promised you;
مِنَ النَّصْرِ وَ ظُهُوْرِ الْاَمْرِ 
MENAN NASRE WA ZOHOORIL AMRE 
namely, victory and prevalence of your authority.
اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا مَوْلاَیَ 
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA MAWLAAYA 
Peace be upon you, O my master.
اَنَا مَوْلَاكَ 
ANAA MAWLAAKA 
I am a servant of you 
عَارِفٌ بِاُولٰيكَ وَ اُخْرٰيكَ 
A’AREFUN BE OOLAAKA WA UKHRAAKA 
and I recognize the first and the last of your affair.
اَتَقَرَّبُ اِلَی اللهِ تَعَالٰی بِكَ وَ بِآلِ بَيْتِكَ 
ATAQARRABO ELAL LAAHE TA-A’ALAA BEKA WA BE-AALE BAYTEKA 
I seek nearness to Allah, the Exalted, through your Household and you
وَ اَنْتَظِرُ ظُهُوْرَكَ وَ ظُهُوْرَ الْحَقِّ عَلٰی يَدَيْكَ 
WA ANTAZERU ZOHOORAKA WA ZOHOORAL HAQQE A’LAA YADAYKA 
and I am expecting your advent and the prevalence of the truth at your hands.
وَ اَسْئَلُ اللهَ اَنْ يُصَلِّیَ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ 
WA AS-ALUL LAAHA AN YOSALLEYA A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN 
And I beseech Allah to send blessings to Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad,
وَ اَنْ يَجْعَلَنِیْ مِنَ الْمُنْتَظِرِيْنَ لَكَ 
WA AYN YAJA’LANEE MENAL MUNTAZEREENA LAKA 
and to include me with those who are expecting you,
وَ التَّابِعِيْنَ وَ النَّاصِرِيْنَ لَكَ عَلٰی اَعْدَآئِكَ 
WAT TAABE-E’ENA WAN NAASEREENA LAKA A’LAA AA’-DAAAEKA 
those who follow you and support you against your enemies,
وَ الْمُسْتَشْهَدِيْنَ بَيْنَ يَدَيْكَ 
WAL MUSTASH-HADEENA BAYNA YADAYKA 
and those who will be martyred in front of you 
فِیْ جُمْلَةِ اَوْلِيَآئِكَ يَا مَوْلاَیَ يَا صَاحِبَ الزَّمَانِ 
FEE JUMLATE AWLEYAAA-EKA YAA MAWLAAYA YAASAAHEBAZ ZAMAANE 
in the group of your loyalists. O my master, O Patron of the Age!
صَلَوَاتُ اللهِ عَلَيْكَ وَ عَلٰی آلِ بَيْتِكَ 
SALAWAATUL LAAHE ALAYKA WA A’LAA AALE BAYTEKA 
May Allah’s blessings be upon you and upon your Household.
هٰذَا يَوْمُ الْجُمُعَةِ وَهُوَ يَوْمُكَ الْمُتَوَقَّعُ فِيْهِ ظُهُوْرُكَ 
HAAZAA YAWMUL JOMO-A’TE WA HOWA YAWMOKAL MOTAWAQQAO’ FEEHE ZOHOOROKA 
Today is Friday, which is your day on which your advent is expected
وَ الْفَرَجُ فِيْهِ لِلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ عَلٰی يَدَيْكَ 
WAL FARAJO FEEHE LIL MOMENEENA A’LAA YADAYKA 
to bring about relief to the believers at your hands,
وَ قَتْلُ الْكَافِرِيْنَ بِسَيْفِكَ 
WA QATLUL KAAFEREENA BE-SAYFEKA 
and killing of the disbelievers with your sword.
وَ اَنَا يَا مَوْلاَیَ فِيْهِ ضَيْفُكَ وَجَارُكَ 
WA ANAA YAA MAWLAALYA FEEHE ZAYFOKA WA JAAROKA 
On this day, O my master, I am your guest and in your vicinity
وَ اَنْتَ يَا مَوْلاَیَ كَرِيْمٌ مِنْ اَوْلاَدِ الْكِرَامِ 
WA ANTA YAA MAWLAAYA KAREEMUN MIN AWLAADIL KERAAME 
and you, my master, are generous and the descendant of the generous people,
وَ مَاْمُوْرٌ بِالضِّيَافَةِ وَ الْاِجَارَةِ 
WA MAAMOORUN BIZ-ZEYAAFATE WAL EJAARATE 
and you are commanded to receive your guests and neighbors hospitably; 
فَاَضِفْنِیْ وَ اَجِرْنِیْ 
FA-AZIFNEE WA AJIRNEE 
so, receive me as your guest and neighbor.
صَلَوَاتُ اللهِ عَلَيكَ وَ عَلٰی اَهْلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ.
SALAWAATUL LAAHE A’LAYKA WA A’LAA AHLE BAYTEKAT TAAHEREENA.
May Allah’s blessings be upon you and upon your Household, the immaculate.

J4.Title: The Supplication of Friday
J4.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْم
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الْاَوَّلِ قَبْلَ الْاِنْشَآءِ وَالْاِحْيَآءِ وَالْآخِرِ بَعْدَ فَنَآءِ الْاَشْيَآءِ الْعَلِيْمِ الَّذِىْ لَا يَنْسٰى مَنْ ذَكَرَهٗ وَ لَا يَنْقُصُ مَنْ شَكَرَهٗ وَ لَا يَخِيْبُ مَنْ دَعَاهُ وَ لَا يَقْطَعُ رَجَآءَ مَنْ رَجَاهُ اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّىْ اُشْهِدُكَ وَ كَفٰى بِكَ شَهِيْدًا وَّ اُشْهِدُ جَمِيْعَ مَلَآئِكَتِكَ وَ سُكَّانَ سَمٰوَاتِكَ وَ حَمَلَةَ عَرْشِكَ وَ مَنْ بَعَثْتَ مِنْ اَنْبِيَآئِكَ وَ رُسُلِكَ وَ اَنْشَاْتَ مِنْ اَصْنَافِ خَلْقِكَ اَنِّىْ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ اَنْتَ اللهُ لَا اِلٰهَ اِلَّا اَنْتَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيْكَ لَكَ وَ لَا عَدِيْلَ وَ لَا خُلْفَ لِقَوْلِكَ وَ لَا تَبْدِيْلَ وَ اَنَّ مُحَمَّدً صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهٖ عَبْدُكَ وَ رَسُوْلُكَ اَدّٰى مَا حَمَّلْتَهٗ اِلَى الْعِبَادِ وَجَاهَدَ فِىْ اللهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ حَقَّ الْجِهَادِ وَ اَنَّهٗ بَشَّرَ بِمَا هُوَ حَقٌّ مِنَ الثَّوَابِ وَ اَنْذَرَ بِمَا هُوَ صِدْقٌ مِنَ الْعِقَابِ اَللّٰهُمَّ ثَبِّتْنِىْ عَلٰى دِيْنِكَ مَا اَحْيَيْتَنِىْ وَ لَا تُزِغْ قَلْبِىْ بَعْدَ اِذْ هَدَيْتَنِىْ وَ هَبْ لِىْ مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ عَلٰى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَّاجْعَلْنِىْ مِنْ اَتْبَاعِهٖ وَ شِيْعَتِهٖ وَاحْشُرْنِىْ فِىْ زُمْرَتِهٖ وَ وَفِّقْنِىْ لِاَدَآءِ فَرْضِ الْجُمُعَاتِ وَ مَا اَوْجَبْتَ عَلَىَّ فِيْهَا مِنَ الطَّاعَاتِ وَ قَسَمْتَ لِاَهْلِهَا مِنَ الْعَطَآءِ فِىْ يَوْمِ الْجَزَآءِ اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ الْعَزِيْزُ الْحَكِيْمُ.
BISMIL LAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM. ALHAMDO LILLAHIL AWWALE QABLAL INSHAAA-E WAL AHYAAA-E WAL AAKHERE BA’DA FANAAA-IL ASHYAAA-IL AZEEMIL LAZEELAA YANSAA MAN ZAKARAHU WA LAA YANQOSO MAN SHAKARAHU WA LAA YAKHEEBO MAN DA-A’AHO WA LAA YAQTA-O’ RAJAAA-A MAN RAJAAHO ALLAAHUMMA INNEE USH-HEDOKA WA KAFAA BEKA SHAHEEDAN WA USH-HEDO JAMEE-A’ MALAAA-E-KATEKA WA SUKKAANA SAMAAWAATEKA WA HAMALATA ARSHEKA WA MAN BA-A’STA MIN AMBEYAAA-EKA WA ROSOLEKA WA ANSHAATA MIN ASNAAFE KHALKEKA ANNEE ASH-HADO ANNAKA ANTAL LAAHO LAA ELAAHA ILLAA ANTA WAHDAKA LAA SHAREEKA LAKA WA LAA ADEELA WA LAA KHULFA LE-QAWLEKA WA LAA TABDEELA WA ANNA MOHAMMADAN SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI WA SALLAMA A’BDOKA WA RASOOLOKA ADDAA MAA HAMMALTAHU ELAL E’BAADE WA JAAHADA FILLAAHE HAQQAL JEHAADE WA ANNAHU BASHSHARA BEMAA HOWA HAQQUN MENAS SAWAAB WA ANZARA BEMAA HOWA SIDQUN MENAL E’QAABEALLAAHUMMA SABBITNEE A’LAA DEENEKA MAA AHYAYTANEE WA LAA TOZIGH QALBEE BA’DA IZ HADAYTANEE WA HABLI MIN LADUNKA RAHMATAN INNAKA ANTAL WAHHAB, SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN WAJA’LNI MIN AT-BAA-E’HI WA SHEE-A’TEHI WAHSHURNEE FEE ZUMRATEHIWA WAFFIQNEE LE ADAAA-E FARZIL JOMO-A’ATE WA MAA AWJABTA A’LAYYA FEEHAA MENAT TAA-A’ATE WA QASAMTA LE AHLEHAA MENAL A’TAAA-E FEE YAWMIL JAZAAA-E INNAKA ANTAL A’ZEEZUL HAKEEM.
In the Name of Allah, the All-merciful, the All-compassionate. Praise belongs to Allah, the First before the bringing forth and the giving of life, and the Last after the annihilation of all things, the All-knowing who forgets not him who remembers Him, decreases not him who thanks Him, disappoints not him who supplicates Him, and cuts not off the hope of him who hopes in Him! O Allah, I call You to witness – and Youare sufficient witness – andI call to witness all Your angels, the inhabitants of thy heavens, the bearers of Your Throne, Your prophets and Your messengers whom Youhave sent out, and the various kinds of creatures Youhave brought forth, that I bear witness that YouareAllah; there is no god but You, You alone, who have no associate nor any equal, and Your word has no failing, nor any change; and that Muhammad (Allah bless him and his Household) is Your servant and Your messenger; he delivered to the servants that with which You charged him, he struggled for Allah as is His due,he gave the good news of the truth of reward, and he warned of the veracity of punishment. O Allah, make me firm in Your religion as long as You keepest me alive, make not my heart to swerve after Youhave guided me, and give me mercy from You, surely Youare the Giver.Bless Muhammad, and the Household of Muhammad, make me one of his followers and his partisans, muster me in his band, and give me the success of accomplishing the obligatory observance of Friday, performing the acts of obedience which You has made incumbent upon me within it, and (receiving) the bestowal which Youhave apportioned for its people on the Day of Recompense! Surely Youare Mighty, All-wise!

J5|E144.Title: Salawat Abul Hasan al Darrab al Isfahani

J7.Title: Aamal of Zuhr Prayers on Friday

K1.Title: The Supplication of Saturday
K1.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْم
بِسْمِ اللهِ كَلِمَةِ الْمُعْتَصِمِيْنَ وَ مَقَالَةِ الْمُتَحَرِّزِيْنَ وَ اَعُوْذُ بِاللهِ تَعَالٰى مِنْ جَوْرِ الْجَآئِرِيْنَ وَ كَيْدِ الْحَاسِدِيْنَ وَ بَغْـىِ الظَّالِمِيْنَ وَ اَحْمَدُهٗ فَوْقَ حَمْدِ الْحَامِدِيْنَ اَللّٰهُمَّ اَنْتَ الْوَاحِدُ بِلاَ شَرِيْكٍ وَالْمَلِكُ بِلاَ تَمْلِيْكٍ لَا تُضَادُّ فِىْ حُكْمِكَ وَ لَا تُنَازَعُ فِىْ مُلْكِكَ اَسْئَلُكَ اَنْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ عَبْدِكَ وَ رَسُوْلِكَ وَ اَنْ تُوْزِعَنِىْ مِنْ شُكْرِ نُعْمَاكَ مَا تَبْلُغُ بِىْ غَايَةَ رِضَاكَ وَ اَنْ تُعِيْنَنِىْ عَلٰى طَاعَتِكَ وَ لُزُوْمِ عِبَادَتِكَ وَاسْتِحْقَاقِ مَثُوْبَتِكَ بِلُطْفِ عِنَايَتِكَ وَ تَرْحَمَنِىْ بِصَدِّىْ عَنْ مَعَاصِيْكَ مَا اَحْيَيْتَنِىْ وَ تُوَفِّقَنِىْ لِمَا يَنْفَعُنِىْ مَا اَبْقَيْتَنِىْ وَ اَنْ تَشْرَحَ بِكِتَابِكَ صَدْرِىْ وَ تَحُطَّ بِتِلاَوَتِهٖ وِزْرِىْ وَ تَمْنَحَنِىْ السَّلاَمَةَ فِىْ دِيْنِىْ وَ نَفْسِىْ وَلاَ تُوحِشَ بِىْ اَهْلَ اُنْسِىْ وَ تُتِمَّ اِحْسَانَكَ فِيْمَا بَقِىَ مِنْ عُمْرِىْ كَمَا اَحْسَنْتَ فِيْمَا مَضٰى مِنْهُ يَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ.
BISMIL LAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM
BISMIL LAAHE KALEMATUL MOA’TASEMEENA WA MAQAALATUL MOTAHARREZEENA WA A-O’OZO BILLAHE TA-A’ALA MIN JAWRIL JAA-EREENA WA KAYDIL HAASEDEENA WA BAGHYIZ ZAALEMEENAWA AHMADOHU FAWQA HAMDIL HAAMEDEENA ALLAAHUMMA ANTAL WAAHEDO BELAA SHAREEKIN WAL MALEKO BELAA TAMLEEKIN LAA TOZAADDO FEE HUKMEKA WA LAA TONAAZA-O’ FEE MULKEKA ASALOKA AN TOSALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN A’BDEKA WA RASOOLEKA WA AN TOOZE-ANEE MIN SHUKRE NOA’MAAKA MAA TABLOGHO BEE GHAAYATA REZAAKA WA AN TO-E’ENANEE A’LAA TAA-ATEKA WA LUZOOME E’BAADATEKA WAS-TEHQAAQE MASOOBATEKA BE LUTFE E’NAAYATEKA WA TARHAMANEE BE SADDEE A’N MA-A’ASEEKA MAA AHYAYTANEE WA TOWAFFIQNEE LEMAA YANFA-O’NEE MAA ABQAYTANEE WA AN TASHRAHA BE KITAABEKA SADREE WA TA-HUTTA BE-TELAAWATEHI WIZREE WA TAMNA-HANIS SALAAMATA FEE DEENEE WA NAFSEE WA LAA TOO-HESHA BEE AHLA UNSEE WA TOTIMMA EHSAANAKA FEEMA BAQEYA MIN U’MREE KAMAA AHSANTA FEEMAA MAZAA MINHO YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEEN.
‘In the name of Allah’, the word of those who hold fast to Him, the speech of those who seek His protection! I seek refuge in Allah (high exalted is He) from the injustice of the unjust, the trickery of the enviers, and the oppression of the wrongdoers, and I praise Him beyond the praise of the praisers! O Allah, Youare the One without partner, and the King without having been made sovereign; no one opposes You in Your decree and no one contests You in Your kingdom! I ask You to bless Muhammad and his Household, Your servant and Your messenger, inspire me with a thanksgiving for Your favours which will take me to the utmost limit of Your good pleasure, help me through the gentleness of Your solitude to obey You, hold fast to worshipping You, and deserve Your reward, have mercy upon me, bar me from acts of disobedience toward You as long as You keepest me alive, give me success in what profits me as long as You sparest me, expand my breast through Your Book, lessen my burden through its recitation, bestow upon me health in my religion and my soul, estrange not my intimates from me, and complete Your beneficence in what is left of my lifetime, just as Youhave shown beneficence in that of it which has passed! O Most Merciful of the merciful!

K3.Title: Ziyarah of Holy Prophet (s) on Saturday
K3.Data:
اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لاَ اِلٰهَ اِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهٗ 
ASH-HADO AN LAA ELAAHA ILLAL LAAHO WAHDAHU LAA SHAREEKA LAHU 
I testify that there is no god save Allah; He is One; there is no associate (partner) with Him. 
وَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ رَسُوْلُهٗ وَ اَنَّكَ مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ عَبْدِ اللهِ 
WA ASH-HADO ANNAKA RASOOLOHU WA ANNAKA MOHAMMADUBNO A’BDIL LAAHE 
I testify that you are His Apostle, and you are Mohammad son of Abdullah; 
وَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ قَدْ بَلَّغْتَ رِسَالاَتِ رَبِّكَ وَ نَصَحْتَ لِاُمَّتِكَ 
WA ASH-HADO ANNAKA QAD BALLAGHTA RESAALAATE RABBEKA WA NASAHTA LEUMMATEKA 
and I testify that you had delivered the Message of your Lord, advised and warned your followers (Ummah) like a sincere friend, 
وَ جَاهَدْتَ فِیْ سَبِيْلِ اللهِ بِالْحِکْمَةِ وَ الْمَوْعِظَة الْحَسَنَةِ 
WA JAAHADTA FEE SABEELIL LAAHE BILHIKMATE WAL MAWE’ZATIL HASANATE 
and strived, leaving no stone unturned, against heavy odds, in the cause of Allah, with wisdom, 
وَ اَدَّيْتَ الَّذِیْ عَلَيْكَ مِنَ الْحَقِّ 
WA ADDAYTAL LAZEE A’LAYKA MENAL HAQQE 
and good advice you performed that which were entrusted with by Allah 
وَ اَنَّكَ قَدْ رَؤُٔفْتَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَ غَلَظْتَ عَلَی الْكَافِرِيْنَ 
WA ANNAKA QAD RAOOFTA BILMOMENEENA WA GHALAZTA A’LAL KAAFEREEN 
(and) you had been kind and compassionate to the believers, (but) was harsh with the disbelievers, 
وَ عَبَدْتَ اللهَ مُخْلِصًا حَتّٰی اَتٰيكَ الْيَقِيْنُ 
WA A’BADTAL LAAHA MUKHLESAN HATTAA ATAAKAL YAQEENO 
and had sincerely served Allah, till the inevitable (what was certain) came unto you. 
فَبَلَغَ اللهُ بِكَ اَشْرَفِ مَحَلِّ الْمُكَرَّمِيْنَ 
FABALAGHAL LAAHO BEKA ASHRAFA MAHALLIL MOKARRAMEENA 
So Allah made you reach the highest stage of glory and honour. 
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِیْ اسْتَنْقَذَنَا بِكَ مِنَ الشِّرْكِ وَ الضَّلاَلَةِ 
ALHAMDOLIL LAAHIL LAZEES TANQAZANAA BEKA MENASH SHIRKE WAZ ZALAALATE 
(All) praise is for Allah (only) who saved us through you from the polytheism and going astray.
اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهٖ 
ALLAAHUMMA SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADINW WA AALEHI
O Allah! Send blessings on Mohammad and on his children. 
وَ اجْعَلْ صَلَوَاتِكَ وَ صَلَوَاتِ مَلآَئِكَتِكَ 
WAJ A’L SALAWAATEKA WA SALAWAATE MALAAEKATEKA 
Your blessings, and invocations of Your Angels, 
وَ اَنْبِيَائِكَ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ وَ عِبَادِكَ الصَّالِحِيْنَ 
WA AMBEYAAEKA WALMURSALEEN WA E’BAADEKAS SAALEHEENA 
(of) Your Prophets and Apostles, (of) Your pious servants, 
وَ اَهْلِ السَّمَوَاتِ وَ الْاَرَضِيْنَ 
WA AHLIS SAMAAWAATE WAL ARAZEEN 
(of) the people of the heavens and the earths, 
وَ مَنْ سَبَّحَ لَكَ يَا رَبَّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ مِنَ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ وَ الْاٰخِرِيْنَ 
WA MAN SABBAHA LAKA YAA RABBAL A’ALAMEEN MENAL AWWALEENA WAL AAKHEREEN 
and (of) those who glorify You, (O the Lord of the worlds), from among the ancient and the present, 
عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ عَبْدِكَ وَ رَسُوْلِكَ وَ نَبِيِّكَ وَ اَمِيْنِكَ 
A’LAA MOHAMMADIN A’BDEKA WA RASOOLEKA WA NABIYYEKA WA AMEENEKA 
be on Mohammad, Your servant and Apostle Your Prophet Your confidant, 
وَ نَجِيِّكَ وَ حَبِيْبِكَ وَ صَفِيِّكَ وَصِفْوَتِكَ وَ خَاصَّتِكَ 
WA NAJEEBEKA WA HABEEBEKA WA SAFIYYEKA WA SIFWATEKA WA KHAASSATEKA 
Your volunteer, Your intimate friend, sincerely attached to You, purified by You, Your favorite, 
وَ خَالِصَتِكَ وَ خِيَرَتِكَ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ 
WA KHAALESATEKA WA KHEYARATEKA MIN KHALQEKA 
the best essence from You, chosen in preference by You from Your creation,
وَ اَعْطِهِ الْفَضْلَ وَ الْفَضِيْلَةَ وَالْوَسِيْلَةَ وَ الدَّرَجَةَ الرَّفِيْعَةَ 
WA AA’TEHIL FAZLA WAL FAZEELATA WAL WASEELATA WADDARAJATAR RAFEEA’TA
and gave him surpassing superiority and eminence in wisdom and character, subtle ways and means, highest stations, 
وَ ابْعَثْهُ مَقَامًا مَحْمُوْداً يَغْبِطُهٗ بِهِ الْاَوَّلُوْنَ وَ الْاٰخِرُوْنَ 
WABA’SHO MAQAAMAM MAHMOODAN YAGHBETOHU BEHIL AWWALOONA WAL AAKHEROONA 
and put him on the pedestal of (praiseworthy) fame and fortune; found his position enviable the men of old and the men of later time. 
اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنَّكَ قُلْتَ وَ لَوْ اَنَّهُمْ اِذْ ظَلَمُوْا اَنْفُسَهُمْ 
ALLAAHUMMA INNAKA QULTA WA LAW ANNAHUM IZZALAMOO ANFOSAHUM 
O Allah. You said: “And if, when they had wronged themselves, they had 
جَآئُوْكَ فَاسْتَغْفَرُوْا اللهَ وَ اسْتَغْفَرَ لَهُمُ الرَّسُوْلُ 
JAAAOOO-KA FASTAGHFARUL LAAHA WASTAGHFARA LAHOMUR RASOOLO 
but come unto you and asked forgiveness of Allah, and asked forgiveness of the Apostle, 
لَوَجَدُوْا اللهَ تَوَّابًا رَّحِيْمًا 
LAWAJADUL LAAHA TAWWAABAR RAHEEMAN 
they would have found Allah Forgiving, Merciful.” 
اِلٰهِیْ فَقَدْ اَتَيْتُ نَبِيَّكَ مُسْتَغْفِرًا 
ELAAHI FAQAD ATAYTO NABIYYAKA MUSTAGHFERAN 
O my Allah, therefore I turn repentant to Your Prophet (s.a.), 
تَآئِباً مِنْ ذُنُوْبِیْ فَصَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اٰلِهٖ 
TAAEBAN MIN ZONOOBEE FASALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALEHI 
asking pardon for my sins, (so send blessings on Mohammad and on his children), 
وَ اغْفِرْ هَالِیْ يَا سَيِّدَنَا اَتَوَجَّهُ بِكَ 
WAGH FIR HAALEE YAA SAYYEDANAA ATAWAJJAHO BEKA 
and he kind to me. O our chief direct yourself, 
وَ بِاَهْلِ بَيْتِكَ اِلَی اللهِ تَعَالٰی رَبِّكَ وَ رَبِّیْ لِيَغْفِرَ لِیْ
WA BEAHLEBAYTEKA ELAL LAAHE TA-A’ALAA RABBEKA WA RABBEE LEYAGHFERA LEE
and your household towards the Most praised Allah, Your Lord and my Lord, in the matter of my request for forgiveness.
Say 3 times:
اِنَّ للهِ وَ اِنَّا اِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُوْنَ.
INNAA LILLAAHE WA INNAA ELAYHE RAAJEO’ON
Verily we are Allah’s; and verily unto Him shall we return.
Then recite:
اُصِبْنَا بِكَ يَا حَبِيْبَ قُلُوْبِنَا 
OSIBNAA BEKA YAA HABEEBA QOLOOBENAA 
With love and longing for you, we move, O dearest friend, in your direction, 
فَمَا اَعْظَمَ الْمُصِيْبَةَ بِكَ حَيْثُ انْقَطَعَ عَنَّا الْوَحْیُ 
FAMAAA A’ZAMAL MOSEEBATA BEKA HAYSUN QATA-A’ A’NNAL WAHYO 
because the misery has increased, since revelation has been cutoff, 
وَ حَيْثُ فَقَدْ نَاكَ فَاِنَّا للهِ وَ اِنَّا اِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُوْنَ 
WA HAYSO FAQAD NAAKA FAINNAA LILLAAHE WA INNAA ELAYHE RAAJEO’ON 
and we lost you. Verily we are Allah’s; and verily unto Him shall we return. 
يَا سَيِّدَنَا يَا رَسُوْلَ اللهِ صَلَوَاتُ اللهِ عَلَيْكَ 
YAA SAYYEDANAA YAA RASOOLAL LAAHE SALAWAATUL LAAHE A’LAYKA 
O our Chief! O our Apostle of Allah! Blessings of Allah be on you and on the pure 
وَ عَلٰی اٰلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ 
WA A’LAA AALEBAYTEKAT TAAHEREENA 
and pious people of your house. 
هٰذَا يَوْمُ السَّبْتِ وَ هُوَ يَوْمُكَ 
HAAZAA YAWMUS SABTE WA HOWA YAWMOKA 
Today is Saturday, your day, 
وَ اَنَا فِيْهِ ضَيْفُكَ وَ جَارُكَ 
WA ANAA FEEHE ZAYFOKA WA JAAROKA 
and I, in its hours, take refuge with you; seek your nearness, 
فَاَضِفْنِیْ وَ اَجِرْنِیْ فَاِنَّكَ كَرِيْمٌ 
FA-AZIFNEE WA AJIRNEE FA-INNAKA KAREEMUN 
(so) receive me with open arms, let me be near you, 
تُحِبُّ الضِّيَافَةَ وَ مَاْمُوْرٌ بِالْاِجَارَةِ 
TOHIBBUZ ZEYAAFATA WA MAAMOORUN BILEJAARATA 
because you are very kind, love to be hospitable, chosen and assigned to given asylum and refuge, 
فَاَضِفْنِیْ وَ اَحْسِنْ ضِيَافَتِیْ 
FAAZIFNEE WA-AHSIN ZEYAAFATEE 
(therefore) make me feel at home, amost generous friendly welcome, 
وَ اَجِرْنَا وَ اَحْسِنْ اِجَارَتَنَا 
WA-AJIRNAA WA-AHSIN EJAARATANAA 
take us under your shelter, a most reliable protection; 
بِمَنْزِلَةِ اللهِ عِنْدَكَ وَ عِنْدَ اٰلِ بَيْتِكَ 
BEMANZELATIL LAAHE I’NDAKA WA I’NDA AALEBAYTEKA 
in the name for the sake of your belief in Allah, and your AhlulBayt’s belief in Him, 
وَ بِمَنْزِلَتِهِمْ عِنْدَهُ وَ بِمَا اسْتَوْدَعَکُمْ مِنْ عِلْمِهٖ 
WA BEMANZELATEHIM I’NDAHU WA BEMASTAWDA-A’KUM MIN I’LMEHI 
and the status He has assigned to them, whereby you (all) took into your keeping His Wisdom. 
فَاِنَّهُ اَکْرَمُ الْاَکْرَمِيْنَ.
FAINNAHU AKRAMUL AKRAMEEN.
Verily He is the most kind of all who show kindness.

L1.Title: The Supplication of Sunday
L1.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْم
بِسْمِ اللهِ الَّذِىْ لَا اَرْجُوْ اِلَّا فَضْلَهٗ وَ لَا اَخْشٰى اِلَّا عَدْلَهٗ وَ لَا اَعْتَمِدُ اِلَّا قَوْلَهٗ وَ لَا اُمْسِكُ اِلَّا بِحَبْلِهٖ بِكَ اَسْتَجِيْرُ يَا ذَالْعَفْوِ وَالرِّضْوَانِ مِنَ الظُّلْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ وَ مِنْ غِيَرِ الزَّمَانِ وَ تَوَاتُرِ الْاَحْزَانِ وَ طَوَارِقِ الْحَدَثَانِ وَ مِنِ انْقِضَآءِ الْمُدَّةِ قَبْلَ التَّأَهُّبِ وَالْعُدَّةِ وَ اِيَّاكَ اَسْتَرْشِدُ لِمَا فِيْهِ الصَّلاَحُ وَالْاِصْلاَحُ وَ بِكَ اَسْتَعِيْنُ فِيْمَا يَقْتَرِنُ بِهٖ النَّجَاحُ وَالْاِنْجَاحُ وَ اِيَّاكَ اَرْغَبُ فِىْ لِبَاسِ الْعَافِيَةِ وَ تَمَامِهَا وَ شُمُوْلِ السَّلاَمَةِ وَ دَوَامِهَا وَ اَعُوْذُبِكَ يَا رَبِّ مِنْ هَمَزَاتِ الشَّيَاطِيْنِ وَ اَحْتَرِزُ بِسُلْطَانِكَ مِنْ جَوْرِ السَّلاَطِيْنِ فَتَقَبَّلْ مَا كَانَ مِنْ صَلاَتِىْ وَ صَوْمِىْ وَاجْعَلْ غَدِىْ وَمَا بَعْدَهٗ اَفْضَلَ مِنْ سَاعَتِىْ وَ يَوْمِىْ وَ اَعِزَّنِىْ فِىْ عَشِيْرَتِىْ وَ قَوْمِىْ وَاحْفَظْنِىْ فِىْ يَقَظَتِىْ وَ نَوْمِىْ فَاَنْتَ اللهُ خَيْرٌ حَافِظًا وَّ اَنْتَ اَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّىْ اَبْرَءُ اِلَيْكَ فِىْ يَوْمِىْ هٰذَا وَ مَا بَعْدَهٗ مِنَ الْاَحَآدِ مِنَ الشِّرْكِ وَالْاِلْحَادِ وَ اُخْلِصُ لَكَ دُعَآئِىْ تَعَرُّضًا لِلْاِجَابَةِ وَ اُقِيْمُ عَلٰى طَاعَتِكَ رَجَآءً لِلْاِثَابَةِ فَصَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ خَيْرِ خَلْقِكَ الدَّاعِىْ اِلٰى حَقِّكَ وَ اَعِزَّنِىْ بِعِزِّكَ الَّذِىْ لَا يُضَامُ وَاحْفَظْنِىْ بِعَيْنِكَ الَّتِىْ لَا تَنَامُ وَاخْتِمْ بِالْاِنْقِطَاعِ اِلَيْكَ اَمْرِىْ وَ بَالْمَغْفِرَةِ عُمْرِىْ اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ الْغَفُوْرُ الرَّحِيْمُ.
BISMILLAAHIR RAHMANIR RAHIM.
BISMIL LAAHIL LAZEE LAA ARJOO ILLAA FAZLAHU WA LAA AKHSHAA ILLAA ADLAHU WA LAA A-A’TAMEDO ILLAA QAWLAHU WA LAA UMSEKO ILLAA BE HABLEHI BEKA ASTAJEERO YAA ZAL A’FWE WAR RIZWAANE MENAZ ZULME WAL UDWAANE WA MIN GHAEYARIZ ZAMAANE WA TAWAATORIL AHZAANE WA TAWAAREQIL HADASAANE WA MENAL QAZAAIL MUDDATE QABLAT TA-AH-HOBE WAL UDDATE WA IYYAAKA ASTAR SHEDO LEMAA FEEHIS-SALAAHO WAL ISLAAHO WA BEKA ASTA-E’ENO FEEMA YAQTARENO BEHIN NAJAAHO WAL INJAAHO WA IYYAAKA ARGHABO FEE LEBAASIL A’AFEEYATE WA TAMAAMEHA WA SHUMOOLIS SALAAMATE WA DAWAAMEHAA WA A’OOZO BEKA YAA RABBE MIN HAMAZAATISH SHAYAATEENE WA AH-TAREZO BE-SULTAANEKA MIN JAURIS SALAATEENE FA TAQABBAL MAA KAANA MIN SALAATEE WA SAWMEE WAJ’AL GHADI WAMA BA’ADAHU AFZALA MIN SAA-A’TEE WA YAWMEE WA A-I’ZZANI FEE ASHEERATI WA QAUMEE WAH-FAZNI FEE YAQAZATEE WA NAWMEE FA ANTAL LAAHO KAIRUN HAAFEZAN WA ANTA ARHAMUR-RAAHEMIN ALLAHUMMA INNI ABRA-O ELAYKA FEE YAUMI HAAZAA WA MAA BA’DAHU MENAL A-HAADE MENASH-SHIRKE WAL ILHAADE WA UKHLESO LAKA DOA’A-EE TA-A’RROZAN LIL EJAABATE WA OQEEMO A’LAA TA-A’TEKA RAJAA-AN LIL ESAABATE FA-SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN KHAYRE KHALQEKAD DAA-E’E ELAA HAQQEKA WA A-A’IZZANI BE I’ZZEKAL LAZEE LAA YOZAAMO WAHFAZNEE BE A’YNEKAL LATEE LAA TANAAMO WAKHTIM BIL INQETAA-E ELAYKA AMREE WA BIL MAGHFERATE U’MREE INNAKA ANTAL GHAFOORUL RAHEEM.
In the name of Allah, the All-merciful, the All-compassionate In the name of Allah, from whom I hope for nothing but bounty, and from whom I fear nothing but justice! I rely only upon His word, and I cling only to His cord! In You I seek sanctuary – O Possessor of pardon and good pleasure – from wrong and enmity, from the changes of time and the recurrence of sorrows, from the striking of mishaps, and from the expiration of my term before preparation and readiness. From You I seek guidance to that wherein is righteousness and being set right. From You I seek help in that which is linked to success and favourable response. You I beseech for the grament of well-being and its completion and for the covering of health and its permanence. I seek refuge in You, my Lord, from the goadings of the satans, and I seek protection in Your sovereignty from the injustice of the sovereigns. So accept my past prayers and fasting and make my tomorrow and what is after better than my present hour and my today! Exalt me in my clan and my people and protect me in my waking and my sleeping! For YouareAllah, the Best Guardian, and Youare the Most Merciful of the merciful. O Allah, I am quit before You on this day of mine and on all Sundays that follow it of associating others with You and of heresy, and I devote my supplication sincerely to You, addressing myself to Your response. So bless Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad, the best of Your creation, the summoner to Your truth, exalt me with Your exaltation, which is never made to suffer loss, protect me with Your eye, which never sleeps, and seal my affair by cutting me off from everything but You and me life with forgiveness! Surely Youare the All – for giving, the All-compassionate!

L3.Title: Ziyarah of Ameerul Momineen (a) on Sunday
L3.Data:
اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَی الشَّجَرَةِ النَّبَوِيَّةِ وَ الدَّوْحَةِ الْهَاشِمِيَّةِ الْمُضِيْئَةِ الْمُثْمِرَةِ بِالنَّبُوَّةِ الْمُوْنِقَةِ بِالْاِمَامَةِ وَ عَلٰی ضَجِيْعَيْكَ اٰدَمَ وَ نُوْحٍ عَلَيْهِمَا السَّلاَمُ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ وَ عَلٰی اَهْلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ وَ عَلَی الْمَلآَئِكَةِ الْمُحْدِقِيْنَ بِكَ وَ الْحَآفِّيْنَ بِقَبْرِكَ يَا مَوْلاَیَ يَا اَمِيْرَ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ هٰذَا يَوْمُ الْاَحَدِ وَ هُوَ يَوْمُكَ وَ بِاسْمِكَ وَ اَنَا ضَيْفُكَ فِيْهِ وَ جَارُكَ فَاَضِفْنِیْ يَا مَوْلاَیَ وَ اَجِرْنِیْ فَاِنَّكَ كَرِيْمٌ تُحِبُّ الضِّيَافَةَ وَ مَاْمُوْرٌ بِالْاِجَارَةِ فَافْعَلْ مَا رَغِبْتُ اِلَيْكَ فِيْهِ وَ رَجَوْتُهٗ مِنْكَ بِمَنْزِلَتِكَ وَ اٰلِ بَيْتِكَ عِنْدَ اللهِ وَ مَنْزِلَتِهٖ عِنْدَکُمْ وَ بِحَقِّ ابْنِ عَمِّكَ رَسُوْلِ اللهِ صَلَّی اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ اٰلِهٖ وَ سَلَّمَ وَ عَلَيْهِمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَ.
ASSALAAMO A’LASH SHAJARATIN NABAWIYYATE WAD DAWHATIL HAASHEMIYYATIL MOZEE-ATIL MUSMERATE BIN NOBUWWATIL MOONEQATE BIL EMAAMATE WA A’LAA ZAJEEA’YKA AADAMA WA NOOHIN A’LAYHEMAS SALAAMO ASSALAAMO ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA WA A’LAA AHLE BAYTEKAT TAYYEBEENAT TAAHEREENA ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA WA A’LAL MALAAAEKATIL MOHDEQEENA BEKA WAL HAAAFFEENA BE QABREKA YAA MAWLAAYA YAA AMEERAL MOMENEENA HAAZAA YAWMUL AHADE WA HOWA YAWMOKA WA BISMEKA WA ANAA ZAYFOKA FEEHE WA JAAROKA FA AZIFNEE YAA MAWLAAYA WA AJIRNEE FA INNAKA KAREEMUN TOHIBBUZ ZEYAAFATE WA MAAMOORUN BIL EJAARATE FAF-A’L MAA RAGHIBTO ELAYKA FEEHE WA RAJAWTOHU MINKA BE MANZELATEKA WA AALE BAYTEKA I’NDALLAAHE WA MANZELATEHI I’NDAKUM WA BEHAQQIBNE A’MMEKA RASOOLIL LAAHI SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI WA SALLAMA WA A’LAYHIM AJME’EN.
Peace be on the Tree (inseparably tied up with) of prophethood, tall and strong trunk (mainstay) of “Bani Hashim” (the family) pregnant and fertile with prophethood, refined and blossomed with Imamat; (on account of) you being the colleague of Adam and Nooh, peace be on them both. Peace be on you, and your pure and pious children. Peace be on you, and on the Angels who stand (around you) at your beck and call, and, ever alert, move about near your resting place. O Master! O Ameer Al Moamineen! Today is Sunday, your day, refers to you, and I, in its hours, take refuge with you, seek your nearness, therefore make me feel at home. O Master! Take me in under your shelter because you are very kind, love to be hospitable, chosen and assigned to give asylum and refuge, therefore do that for which I have come unto you in this hour, and have turned to you, in the name and for the sake of your position, and your children’s belief, in Allah, and the position He has assigned to you (all), for the sake of your brother (cousin), the Apostle of Allah, blessings of Allah be on him and on his children and peace be on them all.

L4.Title: Ziyarah of Lady Fatimah al Zahra (s) on Sunday
L4.Data:
اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكِ يَا مُمْتَحَنَةُ امْتَحَنَكِ الَّذِیْ خَلَقَكِ فَوَجَدَكِ لِمَا امْتَحَنَكِ صَابِرَةً اَنَا لَكِ مُصَدِّقٌ صَابِرٌ عَلٰی مَا اَتیٰ بِهٖ اَبُوْكِ وَ وَصِيُّهُ صَلَوَاتُ اللهِ عَلَيْهِِمَا وَ اَنَا اَسْئَلُكِ اِنْ کُنْتُ صَدَّقْتُكِ اِلاَّ اَلْحَقْتِنِیْ بِتَصْدِيْقِیْ لَهُمَا لِتُسَرَّ نَفْسِیْ فَاشْهَدِیْ اَنِّیْ ظَاهِرٌ بِوَلاَيَتِكِ وَ وِلاَيَةِ اٰلِ بَيْتِكِ صَلَوٰاتُ اللهِ عَلَيْهِمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَ.
ASSALLAMO A’LAYKE YAA MUMTAHANATUM TAHANAKIL LAZEE KHALAQAKE FAWAJADAKE LEMAM TAHANAKE SAABERATAN ANAA LAKE MOSADDEQUN SAABERUN A’LAA MAA ATAA BEHI ABOOKE WA WASIYYOHU SALAWAATUL LAAHE A’LAYHEMAA WA ANAA ASALOKE IN KUNTO SADDAQTOKE ILLAA AL-HAQTENEE BE TASDEEQEE LAHOMAA LETOSARRA NAFSEE FASH-HADEE ANNEE ZAAHERUN BE WELAAYATEKE WA WELAAYATE AALE BAYTEKE SALAWAATUL LAAHE A’LAYHIM AJMAE’EN.
Peace be on you, O the carefully examined, tried and measured by Him who created you, and found you, in your test, cool and compact, steady and stable. I tell the truth about you; calm and quiet, with self-control and composure (you) put up with all that which your father and his successor came across, blessings of Allah be on them. I beseech you, (If I have stated the truth), to bind me together with the testimony, concerning both of them, in order to give joy and satisfaction to my heart and soul. So bear witness that truly I, by heart, made evident your, and your children’s superintendent guardianship, blessings of Allah be on them all.

M1.Title: The Supplication of Monday
M1.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْم
اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِىْ لَمْ يُشْهِدْ اَحَدًا حِيْنَ فَطَرَ السَّمٰوَاتِ وَالْاَرْضَ وَ لَا اتَّخَذَ مُعِيْنًا حِيْنَ بَرَءً النَّسَمَاتِ لَمْ يُشَارَكْ فِى الْاِلٰهِيَّةِ وَ لَمْ يُظَاهَرْ فِى الْوَحْدَانِيَّةِ كَلَّتِ الْاَلْسُنُ عَنْ غَايَةِ صِفَتِهٖ وَالْعُقُوْلُ عَنْ كُنْهِ مَعْرِفَتِهٖ وَ تَوَاضَعَتِ الْجَبَابِرَةُ لِهَيْبَتِهٖ وَ عَنَتِ الْوُجُوْهُ لِخَشْيَتِهٖ وَانْقَادَ كُلُّ عَظِيْمٍ لِعَظَمَتِهٖ فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ مُتَوَاتِرًا مُتَّسِقًا وَ مُتَوَالِيًا مُسْتَوْسِقًا وَ صَلَوَاتُهٗ عَلٰى رَسُوْلِهٗ اَبَدًا وَ سَلاَمُهٗ دَآئِمًا سَرْمَدًا اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْ اَوَّلَ يَوْمِىْ هٰذَا صَلاَحًا وَّ اَوْسَطَهٗ فَلاَحًا وَآخِرَهٗ نَجَاحًا وَ اَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ يَوْمٍ اَوَّلُهٗ فَزَعٌ وَ اَوْسَطُهٗ جَزَعٌ وَ آخِرُهٗ وَجَعٌ اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّىْ اَسْتَغْفِرُكَ لِكُلِّ نَذْرٍ نَذَرْتُهٗ وَكُلِّ وَعْدٍ وَعَدْتُهٗ وَكُلِّ عَهْدٍ عَاهَدْتُهٗ ثُمَّ لَمْ اَفِ لَكَ بِهٖ وَ اَسْأَلُكَ فِىْ مَظَالِمِ عِبَادِكَ عِنْدِىْ فَاَيُّمَا عَبْدٍ مِنْ عَبِيْدِكَ اَوْ اَمَةٍ مِنْ اِمَآئِكَ كَانَتْ لَهٗ قِبَلِىْ مَظْلِمَةٌ ظَلَمْتُهَا اِيَّاهُ فِىْ نَفْسِهٖ اَوْ فِىْ عِرْضِهٖ اَوْ فِىْ مَالِهٖ اَوْ فِىْ اَهْلِهٖ وَ وَلَدِهٖ اَوْ غِيْبَةُ ۣاغْتَبْتُهٗ بِهَا اَوْ تَحَامُلٌ عَلَيْهِ بَمِيْلٍ اَوْ هَوًى اَوْ اَنَفَةٍ اَوْ حَمِيَّةٍ اَوْ رِيَآءٍ اَوْ عَصَبِيَّةٍ غَآئِبًا كَانَ اَوْ شَاهِدًا وَّ حَيًّا كَـانَ اَوْ مَيِّتًا فَقَصُرَتْ يَدِىْ وَضَاقَ وُسْعِىْ عَنْ رَدِّهَا اِلَيْهِ وَالتَّحَلُّلِ مِنْهُ فَاَسْئَلُكَ يَا مَنْ يَمْلِكُ الْحَاجَاتِ وَ هِىَ مُسْتَجِيْبَةٌ لِمَشِيَّتِهٖ وَ مُسْرِعَةٌ اِلٰى اِرَادَتِهٖ اَنْ تُصَلِّىَ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ اَنْ تُرْضِيَهٗ عَنِّىْ بِمَا شِئْتَ وَ تَهَبَ لِىْ مِنْ عِنْدِكَ رَحْمَةً اِنَّهٗ لَا تَنْقُصُكَ الْمَغْفِرَةُ وَ لَا تَضُرُّكَ الْمَوْهِبَةُ يَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ اَللّٰهُمَّ اَوْلِنِىْ فِىْ كُلِّ يَوْمِ اثْنَيْنِ نِعْمَتَيْنِ مِنْكَ ثِنْتَيْنِ سَعَادَةً فِىْ اَوَّلِهٖ بِطَاعَتِكَ وَ نِعْمَةً فِىْ آخِرِهٖ بِمَغْفِرَتِكَ يَا مَنْ هُوَا لْاِلٓهُ وَلاَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوْبَ سِوَاهُ.
BISMIL LAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM. ALHAMDO LILLAAHIL-LAZEELAM TUSHID AHADAN HEENA FATARAS-SAMAAWAATE WAL ARZA WA LAT TAKHAZA MO-E’ENAN HEENA BARA-AN NASAMAATE LAM YOSHAARAK FIL ELAAHIYYATE WA LAM YUZAHAR FIL WAHDAANIYYATE KALLATIL ALSONO A’N GHAAYATE SEFATEHI WAL O’QOOLO A’N KUNHE MA’REFATEHI WA TAWAAZA-A’TIL JABAABERATO LE- HAYBATEHI WA A’NATIL WOJOOHO LE-KHASHYATEHIWAN-QAADA KULLO A’ZEEMIN LE-A’ZAMATEHI FA-LAKAL HAMDO MOTAWAATERAN MUTTASEQAN WA MOTAWAALEYAN MUSTAWSEQAN WA SALAWAATOHU A’LAA RASOOLEHI ABADAN WA SALAAMOHU DAA-EMAN SARMADAN ALLAAHUMMAJ A’L AWWALA YAWMEE HAAZAA SALAAHAN WA AWSATAHU FALAAHAN WA AAKHERAHU NAJAAHAN WA A-O’OZO BEKA MIN YAWMIN AWWALOHU FAZA-U’N WA AWSATOHU JAZA-U’N WA AAKHEROHU WAJA-U’N ALLAAHUMMA INNEE ASTAGHFEROKA LE KULLE NAZRIN NAZARTOHU WA KULLE WA’DIN WA-A’DTOHU WA KULLE A’HDIN A’A-HAD-TOHU SUMMA LAM AFE LAKA BEHI WA ASALOKA FEE MAZAALEME E’BAADEKA I’NDEEFA AYYOMAA A’BDIN MIN A’BEEDEKA AW AMATIN MIN EMAAA-EKA KAANAT LAHU QEBALEE MAZLEMATUN ZALAMTOHAA IYYAAHO FEE NAFSEHI AW FEE I’RZEHI AW FEE MAALEHI AW FEE AHLEHI WA WALADEHI AW GHEEBATO NIGH- TABTOHU BEHAA AW TAHAAMOLUN A’LAYHE BE-MAYLIN AW HAWAN AW ANAFATIN AW HAMIYYATIN AW REYAA-IN AW A’SABIYYATIN GHAAAEBAN KAANA AW SHAAHEDAN WA HAYYAN KAANA AUW MAYYETAN FA QASORAT YADEE WA ZAAQA WUS-E’E A’N RADDEHAA ELAYHE WAT-TAHALLOLE MINHO FA AS-ALOKA YAA MAN YAMLEKUL HAAJAATE WA HEYA MUSTAJEEBATUN LE-MASHIYYATEHI WA MUSREA’TUN ELAA ERAADATEHIAN TO-SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIN WA ANN TURZEYAHU A’NNEE BEMAA SHEA-TA WA TAHABA LEE MIN I’NDEKA RAHMATAN INNAHU LAA TANQOSOKAL MAGHFERATO WA LAA TAZURROKAL MAWHEBATO YAA AR-HAMAR-RAAHEMEEN ALLAAHUMMA AWLENEE FEE KULLE YAWMIS NAYNE NEAMATAYNE MINKA SIN-TAYNE SA-A’ADATAN FEE AWWALEHI BE-TAA-A’TEKA WA NEA’MATAN FEE AAKHEREHI BE MAGHFERATEKA YAA MAN HOWAL ELAAHO WA LAA YAGHFERUZ ZONOOBA SEWAAHO.
In the Name of Allah, the All-merciful, the All-compassionate Praise belongs to Allah, who allowed none to witness when He created the heavens and the earth, and who took no helper when He authored the spirits! He has no associate in Divinity and no support in Unity. Tongues fall silent before the limit of describing Him, intellects fail before the core of knowing Him, tyrants fall low in awe of Him, faces are humbled in fear of Him, and everything mighty yields of His mightiness! So to You belongs praise, again and again, well-measured, continually, methodically! And may His blessings be upon His Messenger endlessly, His salutation everlastingly, eternally! O Allah, make the beginning of this day of mine righteousness, its middle prosperity, and its end success! I seek refuge in You from a day whose beginning is fright, whose middle is anxiety, and whose end is pain! O Allah, I pray forgiveness from You for every vow I have vowed, every promise I have promised, and every pledge I have pledged and then failed to keep for You. I ask You concerning the complaints of Your servants against me: If there is a servant from among Your servants or a handmaid from among Your handmaids, who has against me a complaint because I have wronged him in respect to himself, his reputation, his property, his wife or his child, evil words i have spoken about him in his absence, an imposition upon him through inclination, caprice, scorn, zeal, false show, bigotry, whether he be absent or present, alive or dead, such that my hand has fallen short and my capacity has been too narrow to make restitution to him or to annul my obligation to him, I ask You, O He who owns all objects of need – which are granted by His will and hasten to His desire – that You blessest Muhammad and the Household or Muhammad, makest (the one I have wronged) satisfied with me in the manner that You willest, and givest me mercy from You! Forgiveness decreases You not and giving injures You not, O Most Merciful of the merciful! O Allah, give me on every Monday two favours from You: the felicity to obey You at its beginning and the favour of Your forgiveness at its end! O He who is Allah and none other than whom grants forgiveness for sins!

M3.Title: Ziyarah of Imam al Hasan(a) on Monday
M3.Data:
اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَابْنَ رَسُوْلِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا بْنَ اَمِيْرِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا بْنَ فَاطِمَةَ الزَّهْرَآءِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا حَبِيْبَ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا صِفْوَةَ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا اَمِيْنَ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا حُجَّةَ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا نُوْرَ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا صِرَاطَ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا بَيَانَ حُکْمِ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا نَاصِرَ دِيْنِ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا السَّيِّدُ الزَّكِیُّ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا الْبَرُّ الْوَفِیُّ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا الْقَآئِمُ الْاَمِيْنُ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا الْعَالِمُ بِالتَّاوِيْلِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا الْهَادِی الْمَهْدِیُّ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا الطَّاهِرُ الزَّكِیُّ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا التَّقِیُّ النَّقِیُّ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا الْحَقُّ الْحَقِيْقُ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ اَيُّهَا الشَّهِيْدُ الصِّدِّيْقُ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا اَبَا مُحَمَّدٍ الْحَسَنَ بْنَ عَلِیٍّ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَ بَرَكَاتُهٗ.
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YABNA RASOOLE RABBIL A’ALAMEENA ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YABNA AMEERIL MOMENEENA ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YABNA FAATEMATAZ ZAHRAAE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA HABEEBAL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA SIFWATAL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA AMEENAL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA HUJJATAL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA NOORAL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA SERAATAL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA BAYAANA HUKMIL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA NAASERA DEENIL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHAS SAYYEDUZ ZAKIYYO ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHAL BARRUL WAFIYYO ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHAL QAAAEMUL AMEENO ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHAL A’ALEMO BIT TAAWEELE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHAL HAADIL MAHDIYYO ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHAT TAAHERUZ ZAKIYYO ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHAT TAQIYYUN NAQIYYO ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHAL HAQQUL HAQEEQ ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA AYYOHASH SHAHEEDUS SIDDEEQO ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA ABAA MOHAMMADENIL HASANABNA A’LIYYE WA RAHMATUL LAAHE WA BARAKAATOHU
Peace be on you, O son of the Apostle of the Lord of the worlds! Peace be on you, O son of the Commander of the faithfuls! Peace be on you, O son of Faatemah Zahraa! Peace be on you, O dearest intimate of Allah! Peace be on you, O sincere friend of Allah! Peace be on you, O faithful confidant of Allah! Peace be on you, O decisive argument of Allah! Peace be on you, O light of Allah! Peace be on you, O the “way” unto Allah! Peace be on you, O meaning and demonstration of the commands of Allah! Peace be on you, O he who rescued the religion of Allah! Peace be on you, O liberal, mild and wise sage! Peace be on you, O he who was kept out of (his) rightful office (but) carried out (his) duty! Peace be on you, O confident guardian! Peace be on you, O scholar who determined the essential feature of Religion! Peace be on you, O the rightly guided guide! Peace be on you, O impeccable “man of learning”! Peace be on you, O Allah-fearing, holy! Peace be on you, O genuine, worthy and deserving right! Peace be on you, O truthful witness who gave life in the way of Allah! Peace be on you, O Abu Mohammad, Hasan son of Ali! Mercy of Allah and His blessings be on you.

M4.Title: Ziyarah of Imam al Husayn (a) on Monday
M4.Data:
اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَابْنَ رَسُوْلِ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَابْنَ اَمِيْرِ الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَابْنَ سَيِّدَةِ نِسَآءِ الْعَالَمِيْنَ اَشْهَدُ اَنَّكَ قَدْ اَقَمْتَ الصَّلوٰةَ وَ اٰتَيْتَ الزَّکٰوةَ وَ اَمَرْتَ بِالْمَعْرُوْفِ وَ نَهَيْتَ عَنِ الْمُنْكَرِ وَ عَبَدْتَ اللهَ مُخْلِصًا وَ جَاهَدْتَ فِی اللهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهٖ حَتّٰی اَتٰيكَ الْيَقِيْنُ فَعَلَيْكَ السَّلاَمُ مِنِّیْ مَا بَقِيْتُ وَ بَقِیَ اللَّيْلُ وَالنَّهَارُ وَ عَلٰی اٰلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ اَنَا يَا مَوْلاَیَ مَوْلًی لَكَ وَ لِآلِ بَيْتِكَ سِلْمٌ لِمَنْ سَالَمَکُمْ وَ حَرْبٌ لِمَنْ حَارَبَکُمْ مُؤْمِنٌ بِسِرِّکُمْ وَ جَهْرِکُمْ وَ ظَاهِرِکُمْ وَ بَاطِنِکُمْ لَعَنَ اللهُ اَعْدَآئَکُمْ مِنَ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ وَ الْاٰخِرِيْنَ وَ اَنَا اَبْرَءُ اِلَی اللهِ تَعَالیٰ مِنْهُمْ يَا مَوْلاَیَ يَا اَبَا مُحَمَّدٍ يَا مَوْلاَیَ يَا اَبَا عَبْدِ اللهِ هٰذَا يَوْمُ الْاِثْنَيْنِ وَ هُوَ يَوْمُکُمَا وَ بِاسْمِکُمَا وَ اَنَا فِيْهِ ضَيْفُکُمَا فَاَضِيْفَانِیْ وَ اَحْسِنَا ضِيَافَتِیْ فَنِعْمَ مَنِ اسْتُضِيْفَ بِهٖ اَنْتُمَا وَ اَنَا فِيْهِ مِنْ جِوَارِکُمَا فَاَجِيْرَانِیْ فَاِنَّکُمَا مَاْمُوْرَانِ بِالضِّيَافَةِ وَ الْاِجَارَةِ فَصَلَّی اللهُ عَلَيْکُمَا وَ آلِکُمَا الطَّيِّبِيْنَ.
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YABNA RASOOLIL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YABNA AMEERIL MOMENEENA ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YABNA SAYYEDATE NESAAAIL A’ALAMEENA ASH-HADO ANNAKA QAD AQAMTAS SALAATA WA AATAYTAZ ZAKAATA WA AMARTA BIL MA’ROOFE WA NAHAYTA A’NIL MUNKARE WA A’BADTAL LAAHA MUKHLESAN WA JAAHADTA FIL LAAHE HAQQA JEHAADEHI HATTAA ATAAKAL YAQEENO FA A’LAYKAS SALAAMO MINNEE MAA BAQEETO WA BAQEYAL LAYLO WAN NAHAARO WA A’LAA AALE BAYTEKAT TAYYEBEENAT TAAHEREENA ANAA YAA MAWLAAYA MAWLAN LAKA WA LE-AALE BAYTEKA SILMUN LEMAN SAALAMAKUM WA HARBUN LEMAN HAARABAKUM MOMENUN BE SIRREKUM WA JAHREKUM WA ZAAHEREKUM WA BAATENEKUM LA’NAL LAAHO AA’DAAAKUM MENAL AWWALEENA WAL AAKHEREEN WA ANAA ABRAO ELAL LAAHE TA-A’ALAA MINHUM YAA MAWLAAYA YAA ABAA MOHAMMAD YAA MAWLAAYA YAA ABAA A’BDIL LAAHE HAAZAA YAWMUL ISNAYNE WA HOWA YAWMOKOMAA WA BISMEKOMAA WA ANAA FEEHE ZAYFOKOMAA FA-AZEEFAANEE WA AHSENAA ZEYAAFATEE FA-NE’MA MANIS TUZEFA BEHI ANTOMAA WA ANAA FEEHE MIN JEWAAREKOMAA FA AJEERAANEE FA INNAKOMAA MAAMOORAANE BIZ ZEYAAFATE WAL EJAARATE FASALLAL LAAHO A’LAYKOMAA WA AALEKOMAT TAYYEBEENA.
Peace be on you, O son of the Apostle of Allah! Peace be on you, O son of the Commander of the faithfuls! Peace be on you, O son of the chief of all the women of the worlds! I stand witness that you established prayers, and paid the poor-due, preached goodness, proscribed evil, had sincerely served Allah, strived, leaving no stone unturned, against heavy odds, in the cause of Allah, to the fullest extent, till the inevitable came unto you. So “peace be on you” from me so far I live, and the orbit of “nights following days” call it a day; and on the pure people of your house, I, O my Master, again and again willingly pay allegiance to you, and to your family. I am at peace with him who makes (his) peace with you. I make war against him who goes to war with you. I truly believe in your innermost best aspect, in your evident public role, in your externally appearing style, in your mystical dimensions of spirit. Allah condemns your enemies, those of old, and those of later time. I turn to Allah, the highly praised, breaking all connections with them. O my Master! O Abu Mohammad! (and) O my Master! O Abu Abdullah! Today is Monday, it belongs to both of you, refers to your names, in its hours I take refuge with both of you make me feel at home, a most generous friendly welcome, because whoso turns to you for accommodation lives in ease and comfort, and in this hour it is I who is in your neighborhood, so let me be near you. Verily both of you have been chose and assigned to give asylum and refuge. Blessings of Allah be on you both, and on you pure children.

N1.Title: The Supplication of Tuesday
N1.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْم
اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ وَالْحَمْدُ حَقُّهٗ كَمَا يَسْتَحِقُّهٗ حَمْدًا كَثِيْرًا وَّ اَعُوْذُ بِهٖ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِىْ اِنَّ النَّفْسَ لَاَمَّارَةٌ بِالسُّوْٓءِ اِلَّا مَارَحِمَ رَبِّىْ وَ اَعُوْذُ بِهٖ مِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ الَّذِىْ يَزِيْدُنِىْ ذَنْبًا اِلٰى ذَنْبِىْ وَ اَحْتَرِزُ بِهٖ مِنْ كُلِّ جَبَّارٍ فَاجِرٍ وَّ سُلْطَانٍ جَآئِرٍ وَّعَدُوٍّ قَاهِرٍ اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِىْ مِنْ جُنْدِكَ فَاِنَّ جُنْدَكَ هُمُ الْغَالِبُوْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِىْ مِنْ حِزْبِكَ فَاِنَّ حِزْبَكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُوْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِىْ مِنْ اَوْلِيَآئِكَ فَاِنَّ اَوْلِيَآئَكَ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَ لَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُوْنَ اَللّٰهُمَّ اَصْلِحْ لِىْ دِيْنِىْ فَاِنَّهٗ عِصْمَةُ اَمْرِىْ وَ اَصْلِحْ لِىْ آخِرَتِىْ فَاِنَّهَا دَارُ مَقَرِّىْ وَ اِلَيْهَا مِنْ مُجَاوَرَةِ اللِّئَامِ مَفَرِّىْ وَاجْعَلِ الْحَيٰوةَ زِيَادَةً لِىْ فِىْ كُلِّ خَيْرٍ وَالْوَفَاةَ رَاحَةً لِىْ مِنْ كُلِّ شَرٍّ اَللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ خَاتَمِ النَّبِيِّيْنَ وَ تَمَامِ عِدَّةِ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ وَ عَلٰى آلِهِ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ وَ اَصْحَابِهِ الْمُنْتَجِبِيْنَ وَ هَبْ لِىْ فِىْ الثُّلَثَآءِ ثَلاَثًا لَا تَدَعْ لِىْ ذَنْبًا اِلَّا غَفَرْتَهٗ وَ لَا غَمًّا اِلَّا اَذْهَبْتَهٗ وَلاَ عَدُوًّا اِلَّا دَفَعْتَهُ بِبِسْمِ اللهِ خَيْرِ الْاَسْمَآءِ بِسْمِ اللهِ رَبِّ الْاَرْضِ وَالسَّمَآءِ اَسْتَدْفِعُ كُلَّ مَكْرُوْهٍ اَوَّلُهٗ سَخَطُهٗ وَ اَسْتَجْلِبُ كُلَّ مَحْبُوْبٍ اَوَّلُهٗ رِضَاهُ فَاخْتِمْ لِىْ مِنْكَ بِالْغُفْرَانِ يَا وَلِىَّ الْاِحْسَانِ.
BISMIL LAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM. ALHAMDO LILLAAHE WAL HAMDO HAQQOHU KAMAA YASTAHIQQOHU HAMDAN KASEERAN WA A-O’OZOBEHI MIN SHARRE NAFSEEINNAN NAFSA LA AMMAARATUN BIS-SOOE ILLAA MAA RAHEMA RABBEE WA A-O’OZO BEHI MIN SHARRISH SHAYTANIL LAZEE YAZEEDONI ZAMBAN ELAA ZAMBEEWA AHTAREZO BEHI MIN KULLE JABBAARIN FAAJERIN WA SULTAANIN JAA-ERIN WA A’DUWWIN QAAHERIN ALLAHUMMAJ A’LNEE MIN JUNDEKA FA INNA JUNDAKA HOMUL GHAALEBOONA WAJ-A’LNEE MIN HIZBEKA FA INNA HIZBAKA HOMUL MUFLEHOON WAJ-A’LNEE MIN AWLEYAAA-EKA FA INNA AWLEYAA-AKE LAA KHAWFUN A’LAYHIM WA LAA HUM YAHZANOON ALLAAHUMMA ASLEH LEE DEENEE FA INNAHU I’SMATO AMREE WA ASLEH LEE AAKHERATEE FA INNAHAA DAARO MAQARREE WA ELAYHAA MIN MOJAASARATEL LE-AAME MAFARREE WAJ-A’LIL HAYAATA ZEYAADATAN LEE FEE KULLE KHAYRIN WAL WAFAATA RAAHATAN LEE MIN KULLE SHARRIN ALLAAHUMMA SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN KHAATAMIN-NABIYYEENA WA TAMAAME I’DDATIL MURSALEENA WA AALEHIT-TAYYEBEENAT-TAAHEREENA WA ASHAABEHIL MUNTAJEBEENA WA HABLEE FIS SOLASAA-E SALAASAN LAA TADA’ LEE ZAMBAN ILLAA GHAFARTAHU WA LAA GHAMMAN ILLAA AZHABTAHU WA LAA A’DUWWAN ILLAA DA-FA’TAHU BE-BISMIL LAAHE KHAYRIL ASMAAA-E BISMIL LAAHE RABBIL ARZE WAS-SAMAAA-E ASTADFE-O’ KULLA MAKROOHIN AWWALOHU SAKHATOHU WA ASTAJ-LEBO KULLA MAHBOOBIN AWWALOHU REZAAHO FAKHTIM LEE MINKA BIL GHUFRAANE YAA WALIYYAL EHSAAN.
In the Name of Allah, the All-merciful, the All-compassionate. Praise belongs to Allah – and praise is His right, since He deserves it – abundant praise! I seek refuge in Him from the evil of my soul, for surely the soul commands to evil except as my Lord has mercy. I seek refuge in Him from the evil of Satan who adds sins to my sin. I seek protection with Him from every wicked tyrant, unjust sovereign, and conquering enemy. O Allah, place me among Your troops, for Your troops – they are the victors, place me in Your party, for Your party – they are the ones who prosper, and place me among Your friends, for Your friends – no fear shall be upon them, nor shall they sorrow. O Allah, set right for me my religion, for it is the preserving tie of my affair, set right for me my hereafter, for it is the abode of my permanent lodging and to it I flee from the neighbourhood of the vile! Make life an increase for me in every good and death an ease for me from every evil! O Allah, bless Muhammad, the Seal of the Prophets and the completion of the number of the envoys, his Household, the good, the pure, and his Companions, the distinguished, and give me on the Tuesday three things: Leave no sin for me unless You forgivest it, no grief unless You takest it away, and no enemy unless You repellest him! By means of ‘in the name of “Allah”‘, the best of the Names, in the name of Allah, Lord of earth and heaven, I seek to repulse every hateful thing, the first of which is His anger, and I seek to attract every lovable thing, the first of which is His good pleasure! So seal me with forgiveness from You, O Patron of beneficence!

N3.Title: Ziyarah of Imam Zayn al Abidin, Imam Muhammad al Baqir & Imam Jafar al Sadiq (a) on Tuesday
N3.Data:
اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْکُمْ يَا خُزَّانَ عِلْمِ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْکُمْ يَا تَرَاجِمَةَ وَحْیِ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْکُمْ يَا اَئِمَّةَ الْهُدٰی اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْکُمْ يَا اَعْلاَمَ التُّقٰی اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْکُمْ يَا اَوْلاَدَ رَسُوْلِ اللهِ اَنَا عَارِفٌ بِحَقِّکُمْ مُسْتَبْصِرٌ بِشَانِکُمْ مُعَادٍ لِاَعْدَآئِکُمْ مُوَالٍ لِاَوْلِيَائِکُمْ باَبِیْ اَنْتُمْ وَ اُمِّیْ صَلَوَاتُ اللهِ عَلَيْکُمْ اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَتَوَالیٰ اٰخِرَهُمْ كَمَا تَوَالَيْتُ اَوَّلَهُمْ وَ اَبْرَءُ مِنْ کُلِّ وَلِيْجَةٍ دُوْنَهُمْ وَ اَکْفُرُ بِالْجِبْتِ وَ الطَّاغُوْتِ وَ اللَّاتِ وَ الْعُزّٰی صَلَوَاتُ اللهِ عَلَيْکُمْ يَا مَوَالِیَّ وَ رَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَ بَرْكَاتُهٗ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا سَيِّدَ الْعَابِدِيْنَ وَ سُلاَلَةَ الْوَصِيِّيْنَ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا بَاقِرَ عِلْمِ النَّبِيِّيْنَ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا صَادِقًا مُصَدَّقًا فِی الْقَوْلِ وَ الْفِعْلِ يَا مَوَالِیَّ هٰذَا يَوْمُکُمْ وَ هُوْ يَوْمُ الثُّلَثَآءِ وَ اَنَا فِيْهِ ضَيْفٌ لَکُمْ وَ مُسْتَجِيْرٌ بِکُمْ فَاَضِيْفُوْنِیْ وَ اَجِيْرُوْنِیْ بِمَنْزِلَةِ اللهِ عِنْدَکُمْ وَ اٰلِ بَيْتِکُمُ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ.
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKUM YAA KHUZZAANA I’LMIL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKUM YAA TARAAJEMATA WAHYIL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKUM YAA A-IMMATAL HODAA ASSALAAMO A’LAYKUM YAA AA’LAAMAT TOQAA ASSALAAMO A’LAYKUM YAA AWLAADA RASOOLIL LAAHE ANAA A’AREFUN BEHAQQEKUM MUSTABSERUN BESHAANEKUM MOA’ADIN LEAA’DAAAEKUM MOWAALIN LEAWLEYAAAEKUM BEABEE ANTUM WA UMMEE SALAWAATUL LAAHE A’LAYKUM ALLAAHUMMA INNEE ATAWAALAA AAKHERAHUM KAMAA TAWAALAYTO AWWALAHUM WA ABRAO MIN KULLE WALEEJATIN DOONAHUM WA AKFORO BILJIBTE WAT TAAGHOOTE WAL LAATE WAL UZZAA SALAWAATUL LAAHE A’LAYKUM YAA MAWAALIYYA WA RAHMATUL LAAHE WA BARAKAATOHU ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA SAYYEDAL A’ABEDEENA WA SOLAALATAL WASIYYEENA ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA BAAQERA I’LMIN NABIYYEENA ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA SAADEQAN MOSADDAQAN FIL QAWLE WAL FE’LE YAA MAWAALIYYA HAAZAA YAWMOKUM WAHOWA YAWMUS SOLASAAA-E WA ANAA FEEHE ZAYFUN LAKUM WA MUSTAJEERUN BEKUM FAAZEEFOONEE WA AJEEROONEE BEMANZELATIL LAAHE I’NDAKUM WA AALEBAYTEKOMUT TAYYEBEENAT TAAHEREENA.
Peace be on you, O depositories of Allah’s knowledge! Peace be on you, O commentators of the revealed word of Allah! Peace be on you, O rightly guided Guides unto the true way of life! Peace be on you, O symbols of devotion to duty! Peace be on you, O descendents of the Apostle of Allah! I am aware of your true rights; look at tentively at your refined disposition, full of joy, honour and dignity, take leave and go far away from your enemies, love dearly and keep company of your friends, with my father (I am) at your disposal, and also my mother, blessings of Allah be on you. O my Allah, I willingly submit (out of love and friendship) to all of the minun broken succession, just as You appointed the first of them the “Master”, and I am free from the guilt of taking shelter with any other save them, deny and curse “Jibt” and “Taghoot” “Laat” and “Uzzaa” Blessings of Allah be on you O my beloved Masters! Mercy of Allah be on you, and His blessings. Peace be on you, O pride of worshippers (of Allah) (Zaynul Aabedeen), the founder of the family of the successors (Imaams). Peace be on you, O (Baaqir), he who inherited, knew, and enlarged the knowledge of the Prophets. Peace be on you, O (Saadiq) truthful, his words were true, his deeds were good. O my Masters! Today is your day, Tuesday, in its hours I take refuge with you, and seek your nearness, therefore receive me with open arms, and let me be near you, in the name and for the sake of you belief in Allah, and (belief) of your pure and pious family.

O1.Title: The Supplication of Wednesday
O1.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْم
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلهِ الَّذِىْ جَعَلَ اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا وَّالنَّوْمَ سُبًاتًا وَّ جَعَلَ النَّهَارَ نُشُوْرًا لَكَ الْحَمْدُ اَنْ بَعَثْتَنِىْ مِنْ مَّرْقَدِىْ وَلَوْ شِئْتَ جَعَلْتَهٗ سَرْمَدًا حَمْدًا دَآئِمًا لَا يَنْقَطعُ اَبَدًا وَّلاَ يُحْصِىْ لَهٗ الْخَلَآئِقُ عَدَدًا اَللّٰهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ اَنْ خَلَقْتَ فَسَوَّيْتَ وَ قَدَّرْتَ وَ قَضَيْتَ وَ اَمَتَّ وَ اَحْيَيْت وَ اَمْرَضْتَ وَ شَفَيْتَ وَعَافَيْتَ وَ اَبْلَيْتَ وَ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ اسْتَوَيْتَ وَ عَلَى الْمُلْكِ احْتَوَيْتَ اَدْعُوْكَ دُعَآءَ مَنْ ضَعُفَتْ وَسِيْلَتُهٗ وَانْقَطَعَتْ حِيْلَتُهٗ وَاقْتَرَبَ اَجَلُهٗ وَ تَدَانٰى فِى الدُّنْيَا اَمَلُهٗ وَاشْتَدَّتْ اِلٰى رَحْمَتِكَ فَاقَتُهٗ وَ عَظُمَتْ لِتَفْرِيْطِهٖ حَسْرَتُهٗ وَ كَـثُرَتْ زَلَّتُهٗ وَ عَثْرَتُهٗ وَ خَلُصَتْ لِوَجْهِكَ تَوْبَتُهٗ فَصَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ خَاتَمِ النَّبِيِّيْنَ وَ عَلٰى اَهْلِ بَيْتِهِ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ وَارْزُقْنِىْ شَفَاعَةَ مُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهٖ وَ لَا تَحْرِمْنِىْ صُحْبَتَهٗ اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ اَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ اَللّٰهُمَّ اقْضِ لِىْ فِى الْاَرْبَعَآءِ اَرْبَعًا اِجْعَلْ قُوَّتِـىْ فِىْ طَاعَتِكَ وَ نَشَاطِىْ فِىْ عِبَادَتِكَ وَ رَغْبَتِىْ فِىْ ثَوَابِكَ وَ زُهْدِىْ فِيْمَا يُوْجِبُ لِىْ اَلِيْمَ عِقَابِكَ اِنَّكَ لَطِيْفٌ لِّمَا تِشَآءُ.
BISMIL LAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM. AL-HAMDO LILLAAHIL LAZEE JA-A’LALLAYLA LEBAASAWNWAN-NAWMA SOBAATAWNWA JA-A’LAN NAHAARA NOSHOORANLAKAL HAMDO AM BA-A’STANEE MIM MARQADEE WA LAW SHEA-TA JA-A’LTAHU SARMADANHAMDAN DAAA-EMAN LAA YANQA-TE-O’ ABADAWN WA LAA YOHSEE LAHUL KHALAAA-EQO A’DADAN ALLAAHUMMA LAKAL HAMDO ANKHALAQTA FA-SAWWAYTAWA QADDARTA WA QAZAYTAWA AMATTA WA AHYAYTAWA AMRAZTA WA SHAFAYTAWA A’AFAYTA WA ABLAYTA WA A’LAL A’RSHIS TAWAYTAWA A’LAL MULKEH TAWAYTAAD-O’OKA DO-A’AA-A MANZA-O’FAT WASEELATOHUWAN-QATA-A’T HEELATOHUWAQ-TARABA AJALOHUWA TADAANAA FID-DUNYAA AMALOHUWASH-TADDAT ELAA RAHMATEKA FAA-QATOHUWA A’ZOMAT LE-TAFREETEHI HASRATOHUWA KASORAT ZALLATOHU WA A’SRATOHUWA KHALOSAT LE-WAJ-HEKA TAWBATOHUFA-SALLE A’LAA MOHAMMADIN KHAATAMIN NABIYYEENAWA A’LAA AHLE BAYTEHIT TAYYEBEENAT TAAHEREENAWAR-ZUQNEE SHA-FAA-A’TA MOHAMMADIN SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHIWA LAA TAHRIMNEEE SOHBATAHUINNAKA ANTA ARHAMUR RAAHEMEENA ALLAHUMMAQZE LEE FIL ARBA-A’AE ARBA-A’NIJ-A’LQUWWATEE FEE TAA-A’TEKA WA NASHAATEE FEE E’BAADATEKA WA RAGH-BATEE FEE SAWAABEKA WA ZOHDEE FEEMAA YOOJEBO LEE ALEEMA E’QAABEKA INNAKA LATEEFUL LEMAA TASHAA-O.
In the name of Allah, the All-merciful, the All-compassionate Praise belongs to Allah, who appointed the night to be a garment, and sleep for a rest, and day He appointed for a rising! To You belongs praise, for You roused me form my sleep, - and hadYou willed, Youwould have made it everlasting – an everlasting praise that will never be cut of and who number the creatures with never count! O Allah, to You belongs praise, for You created, then proportioned, ordained and decreed, gave death and bestowed life, made sick and healed, made well and afflicted, sat upon the Thorone and encompassed the Kingdom! I supplicate You with the supplication of one whose mediation is weak, whose stratagems have been cut off, whose term has drawn near, whose expectation from this world has shrunk, whose neediness for Your mercy has intensified, whose remorse for his neglect has become great, whose slips and stumbles have become many, and whose repentance is devoted sincerely to Your face. So bless Muhammad, the Seal of the Prophets, and his Household, the good, the pure.Provide me with the intercession of Muhammad (Allah bless him and his Household) and deprive me not of his companionship! Surely Youare the Most Merciful of the merciful! O Allah, decree for me on Wednesday four things: Induce me to be strong in obedience to You, to be joyful in worshiping You, to be desirous of Your reward, and to abstain from that which would make incumbent upon me Your painful punishment! Youare Gentle to whom You wilt!

O3.Title: Ziyarah of Imam Musa al Kazim, Ali al Rida, Muhammad al Taqi, Ali al Naqi (a) on Wednesday
O3.Data:
اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْکُمْ يَا اَؤْلِيَاءَ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْکُمْ يَا حُجَجَ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْکُمْ يَا نُوْرَ اللهِ فِیْ ظُلُمَاتِ الْاَرْضِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْکُمْ صَلَوَاتُ اللهِ عَلَيْکُمْ وَ عَلٰی اٰلِ بَيْتِکُمُ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ بِاَبِیْ اَنْتُمْ وَ اُمِّیْ لَقَدْ عَبَدْتُمُ اللهَ مُخْلِصِيْنَ وَ جَاهَدْتُمْ فِیْ اللهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهٖ حَتّٰی اَتٰيکُمُ الْيَقِيْنُ فَلَعَنَ اللهُ اَعْدَآئَکُمْ مِنَ الْجِنِّ وَ الْاِنْسِ اَجْمَعِيْنَ وَ اَنَا اَبْرَءُ اِلَی اللهِ وَ اِلَيْکُمْ مِنْهُمْ يَا مَوْلاَیَ يَا اَبَا اِبْرَاهِيْمَ مُوْسَی بْنَ جَعْفَرٍ يَا مَوْلاَیَ اَبَا الْحَسَنِ عَلِیَّ بْنَ مُوْسیٰ يَا مَوْلاَیَ يَا اَبَا جَعْفَرٍ مُحَمَّدَ بْنَ عَلِیٍّ يَا مَوْلاَیَ يَا اَبَا الْحَسَنِ عَلِیَّ بْنَ مُحَمَّدٍ اَنَا مَوْلًی لَکُمْ مُؤْمِنٌ بِسِرِّکُمْ وَ جَهْرِکُمْ مُتَضَيِّفٌ بِکُمْ فِیْ يَوْمِکُمْ هٰذَا وَ هُوَ يَوْمُ الْاَرْبَعَآءِ وَ مُسْتَجِيْرٌ بِکُمْ فَاضِيْفُوْنِیْ وَ اَجِيْرُوْنِیْ بِاٰلِ بَيْتِکُمُ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ.
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKUM YAA AWLEYAAA-AL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKUM YAA HOJAJAL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKUM YAA NOORAL LAAHE FEE ZOLOMAATIL ARZE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKUM SALAWAATUL LAAHE A’LAYKUM WA A’LAA AALE BAYTEKOMUT TAYYEBEENAT TAAHEREENA BE ABEE ANTUM WA UMMEE LAQAD A’BADTOMUL LAAHA MUKHLESEENA WA JAAHADTUM FIL LAAHE HAQQA JEHAADEHI HATTAA ATAAKOMUL YAQEENO FA LA-A’NAL LAAHO AA’DAAA-AKUM MENAL JINNE WAL INSE AJMA-E’EN WA ANAA ABRA-O ELAL LAAHE WA ELAYKUM MINHUM YAA MAWLAAYA YAA ABAA IBRAAHEEMA MOOSABNA JAA’FAR YAA MAWLAAYA YAA ABAL HASANE A’LIYYABNA MOOSAA YAA MAWLAAYA YAA ABAA JA’FARE MOHAMMADABNA A’LIYYIN YAA MAWLAAYA YAA ABAL HASANE A’LIY YABNA MOHAMMADIN ANAA MAWLAN LAKUM MOMENUN BE SIRREKUM WA JAHREKUM MOTAZAYYEFUN BEKUM FEE YAWMEKUM HAAZAA WA HOWA YAWMUL ARBA-A’A-E WA MUSTAJEERUN BEKUM FA AZEEFOONEE WA AJEEROONEE BE AALE BAYTEKOMUT TAYYEBEENAT TAAHEREENA.
Peace be on you, O intimate friends of Allah! Peace be on you, O decisive arguments of Allah! Peace be on you, O light of Allah, in the midst of ignorance and disorder, widespread in the world! Peace be on you, blessings of Allah be on you, and on your pure and pious children. With my father (I am) at your disposal, and also my mother. Surely you sincerely carried out the mission of Allah, and strived in the cause of Allah, leaving on stone unturned, against heavy odds, in letter and spirit, till the inevitable came unto you. Therefore Allah condemns your enemies, whether they be men or jinn, one and all. I turn obedient, unto Allah, and you, keeping away from them. O Master! O Abu Ibrahim! Moosa son of Ja’far! O Master! O Abul Hasan! Ali son of Moosa! O Master! O Abu Ja’far! Mohammad son of Ali! O Master! O Abul Hasan! Ali son of Mohammad! I am your bondman, I truly believe in your innermost best aspects, in your evident public roles: take refuge with you, in the hours of today, your day, Wednesday, and seek your nearness, therefore receive me with open arms, let me be near you, (and near) your pure and pious children.

Q1.Title: The Supplication of Thursday
Q1.Data:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْم
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِىْ اَذْهَبَ الَّيْلَ مُظْلِمًا بِقُدْرَتِهٖ وَ جَآءَ بِالنَّهَارِ مُبْصِرًا بِرَحْمَتِهٖ وَ كَسَانِىْ ضِيَآئَهٗ وَ اَنَا فِىْ نِعْمَتِهٖ اَللّٰهُمَّ فَكَمَا اَبْقَيْتَنِىْ لَهٗ فَاَبْقِنِىْ لِاَمْثَالِهٖ وَ صَلِّ عَلَى النَّبِىِّ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِهٖ وَ لَا تَفْجَعْنِىْ فِيْهِ وَ فِىْ غَيْرِهٖ مِنَ اللَّيَالِىْ وَالْاَيَّامِ بِارْتِكَابِ الْمَحَارِمِ وَاكْتِسَابِ الْمَآثِمِ وَارْزُقْنِىْ خَيْرَهُ وَ خَيْرَ مَا فِيْهِ وَ خَيْرَ مَا بَعْدَهٗ وَاصْرِفْ عَنِّىْ شَرَّهٗ وَ شَرَّ مَا فِيْهِ وَ شَرَّ مَا بَعْدَهٗ اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنِّىْ بِذِمَّةِ الْاِسْلاَمِ اَتَوَسَّلُ اِلَيْكَ وَ بِحُرْمَةِ الْقُرْاٰنِ اَعْتَمِدُ عَلَيْكَ وَ بِمُحَمَّدِ نِ الْمُصْطَفٰى صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهٖ اَسْتَشْفِعُ لَدَيْكَ فَاعْرِفِ اللّٰهُمَّ ذِمَّتِىَ الَّتِىْ رَجَوْتُ بِهَا قَضَآءَ حَاجَتِىْ يَا اَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ اَللّٰهُمَّ اقْضِ لِىْ فِىْ الْخَمِيْسِ خَمْسًا لَا يَتَّسِعُ لَهَا اِلَّا كَرَمُكَ وَ لَا يُطِيْقُهَا اِلَّا نِعَمُكَ سَلاَمَةً اَقْوٰى بِهَا عَلٰى طَاعَتِكَ وَ عِبَادَةً اَسْتَحِقُّ بِهَا جَزِيْلَ مَثُوْبَتِكَ وَسَعَةً فِى الْحَالِ مِنَ الرِّزْقِ الْحَلاَلِ وَ اَنْ تُؤْمِنَنِىْ فِىْ مَوَقِفِ الْخَوْفِ بِاَمْنِكَ وَ تَجْعَلَنِىْ مِنْ طَواَرِقِ الْهُمُوْمِ وَالْغُمُوْمِ فِىْ حِصْنِكَ وَ صَلِّ عَلٰى مُحَمَّدٍ وَّ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَّاجْعَلْ تَوَسُّلِىْ بِهٖ شَافِعًا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ نَافِعًا اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ اَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ.
BISMIL LAAHIR RAHMAANIR RAHEEM. ALHAMDO LILLAAHIL LAZEE AZHARAL LAYLA MUZLEMAN BE-QUDRATEHI WA JAAA-A BIN-NAHAARE MUBSERAN BE-RAHMATEHI WA KASAANEE ZEYAAA-AHU WA ANAA FEE NEA’MATEHI ALLAAHUMMA FA-KAMAA ABQAYTANEE LAHU FA ABQENEE LE-AMSAALEHEE WA SALLE A’LAN NABIYYE MOHAMMADIN WA AALEHI WA LAA TAFJA’-NEE FEEHE WA FEE GHAYREHEE MENAL LAYAALEE WAL AYYAAME BIR-TEKAABIL MAHAAREME WAKTESAABIL MAAA-SEME WAR-ZUQNEE KHAYRAHU WA KHAYRA MAA FEEHE WA KHAYRA MAA BA’-DAHU WASRIF A’NNEE SHARRAHU WA SHARRA MAA FEEHE WA SHARRA MAA BA’-DAHUALLAAHUMMA INNEE BE-ZIMMATIL ISLAAME ATAWASSALO ELAYKA WA BEHURMATIL QUR-AANE A-A’TAMEDO A’LAYKA WA BE MOHAMMADENIL MUSTAFAA SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYHE WA AALEHI ASTASHFE-O’ LADAYKA FA’REFIL LAAHUMMA ZIMMATEYAL LATEE RAJAWTO BEHAA QAZAAA-A HAAJATEE YAA ARHAMAR RAAHEMEEN ALLAHUMMAQ ZE LEE FIL KHAMEESE KHAMSAN LAA YATTASE-O’ LAHAA ILLAA KARAMOKA WA LAA YOTEEQOHAA ILLAA NE-A’MOKA SALAAMATAN AQWAA BEHAA A’LAA TAA-A’TEKA WA E’BAADATAN ASTAHIQQO BEHA JAZEELA MASOOBATEKA WA SA-A’TAN FIL HAALE MENAR RIZQIL HALAALE WA AN TOA-MENANEE FEE MAWAQEFIL KHAWFE BE AMNEKA WA TAJ-A’LANEE MIN TAWAAREQIL HOMOOME WAL GHOMOOME FEE HISNEKA WA SALLE ALAA MOHAMMADIN WA AALE MOHAMMADIWNWAJ-A’L TAWASSOLEE BEHEE SHAAFE-A’N YAWMAL QEYAAMATE NAAFE-A’N INNAKA ANTA ARHAMUR RAAHEMEEN.
In the Name of Allah, the All-merciful, the All-compassionate Praise belongs to Allah, who has taken away the shadowy night by His power and brought the sight-giving day through His mercy. He has clothed me in its brightness and given me its favour. O Allah, just as Youhave spared me for this day, so also spare me for its likes, bless the prophet Muhammad and his Household, torment me not in it and in other nights and days by allowing me to commit unlawful acts and to clothe myself in sins; provide me with this good, the good of all within it, and the good of everything after it; and turn away from me its evil, the evil of all within it, and the evil of everything after it! O Allah, by the protective compact of Islam, I seek mediation with You! By the inviolability of the Qur’an, I rely upon You! By Muhammad the chosen (Allah bless him and his Household) I seek intercession with You! So recognize my protective compact by which I hope my need will be granted, O Most Merciful of the merciful! O Allah, decree for me on Thursday five things which none embraces but Your generosity and none supports but Your favours: health through which I may have the strength to obey You, worship by which I may deserve Your plentiful reward, plenty in my state through lawful provision, and that You makest me secure in the places of fear through Your security, and placest me in Your fortress against the striking of worries and sorrows! Bless Muhammad and his Household, and make my seeking his mediation as an intercessor give profit on the Day of Resurrection! Surely Youare the Most Merciful of the merciful!

Q3.Title: Ziyarah of Imam Hasan al Askari (a) on Thursday
Q3.Data:
اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا وَلِیَّ اللهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا حُجَّةَ اللهِ وَ خَالِصَتَهٗ اَلسَّلاَمُ عَلَيْكَ يَا اِمَامَ الْمُوْمِنِيْنَ وَ وَارِثَ الْمُرْسَلِيْنَ وَ حُجَّةَ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِيْنَ صَلَّی اللهُ عَلَيْكَ وَ عَلٰی اٰلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ يَا مَوْلاَیَ يَا اَبَا مُحَمَّدٍ الْحَسَنَ بْنَ عَلِیٍّ اَنَا مَوْلًی لَكَ وَلِآلِ بَيْتِكَ وَ هٰذَا يَوْمُكَ وَ هُوَ يَوْمُ الْخَمِيْسِ وَ اَنَا ضَيْفُكَ فِيْهِ وَ مُسْتَجِيْرٌ بِكَ فِيْهِ فَاَحْسِنْ ضِيَافَتِیْ وَ اِجَارَتِیْ بِحَقِّ اٰلِ بَيْتِكَ الطَّيِّبِيْنَ الطَّاهِرِيْنَ.
ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA WALIYYAL LAAHE ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA HUJJATAL LAAHE WA KHAALESATAHU ASSALAAMO A’LAYKA YAA EMAAMAL MOMENEENA WA WAARESAL MURSALEENA WA HUJJATA RABBIL A’ALAMEENA SALLAL LAAHO A’LAYKA WA A’LAA AALE BAYTEKAT TAYYEBEENAT TAAHEREENA YAA MAWLAAYA YAA ABAA MOHAMMADENIL HASANABNA A’LIYYE ANAA MAWLAN LAKA WA LE AALE BAYTEKA WA HAAZAA YAWMOKA WA HOWA YAWMUL KHAMEESE WA ANAA ZAYFOKA FEEHE WA MUSTAJEERUN BEKA FEEHE FA-AHSIN ZEYAAFATEE WA EJAARATEE BE-HAQQE AALE BAYTEKAT TAYYEBEENAT TAAHEREENA.
Peace be on you, O intimate friend of Allah Peace be on you, O the decisive argument of Allah, sincerely attached to Him Peace be on you, O Guide-Leader of the faithfuls inheritor of the Apostles, clear convincing sign of the Lord of the worlds, blessings of Allah be on you, and on your pure and pious children. O Master, O Abu Mohammad, Hasan son of Ali, I am your obedient follower and of your children, today is your day, Thursday, I come near you today seek your close friendship receive me with open arms, and keep me close, for the sake of your pure and pious children.
